B: We couldn't be more thrilled with the work of Andy and his team to produce our Basketball team warm-up gear. He helped us find a high quality, affordably priced item that looks fantastic! On top of the great product, these hoodies were turned around in less that two weeks including design time. We will absolutely call on Canadian Custom Apparel for future orders!

I placed an order online of a design I created on their website. Easy to use. I wanted matching hoodies for me and my boyfriend for our anniversary. They turned out perfectly. Except I made a typo when I was designing the hoodies. I contacted them and they fixed it for me! Can't even tell anything was changed. Looks original. My boyfriend loved them. The hoodies are so soft and comfy too. Great gift and great service from the team!

I've never ordered custom T shirts before and I decided to go with.Canadian Custom Apparel based on Google reviews..I'm grateful that I did. Very happy with the quality of the shirt and the image printed on it. Extra thanks to Emma who took care of everything and answered all of my questions..I will definitely order again from Canadian custom apparel.

The folks at CCA have been a joy to work with..we are now so grateful to have found Canadian Custom Apparel, as we have had some bad experiences in the past with other similar companies.
Everyone has been super helpful and we are and incredibly happy with all the finished products! We will be bringing all our future business here.

Super Impressed! Just received our order! I've tried SO many online stores for apparel and I have been disappointed every single time. Canadian Custom Apparel is the first company to not let me down! We love our new shirts! The embroidery is top quality on a great golf shirt! We will be repeat customers forsure!

Terrible company to deal with after repeated attempts via email and phone I finally got a response. All the DTG printing on every hoodie I ordered came off after a couple of washes. Now, in order to replace them, this company wants me to take pictures of all the hoodies side by side. Kind of hard considering they were given out to customers as promotional gifts. Garbage service! Terrible customer service! Do NOT deal with this place. They do NOT know what they are doing.

Thank you Canadian custom apparel for an amazing job on some hats for my company. I highly recommend their online store as well, I ordered these online in less than 5 mins and they were at my door under a week later. I haven't seen anything like this quality and service after using so many different companies for my apparel over the years, You have a customer for life!

Test washed this HERO2020 Hoodie DTG printed by Canadian Custom Apparel. After the 5th wash I've noticed the print lifting and flaking off. The details were not holding up. I asked why this is happening and they blamed my design is causing it. They cannot reassure you with a good print. I asked for compensation and they did not consider it.Unfortunate experience with these guys. Was hoping better.

Two separate sporting spirit-wear Club orders, and wow so impressive.Being able to re-produce photo quality prints on team-wear took our club's projects to the next level!.Decorating process allowed our creative side in creating the most impressive projects, and they.nailed it! Amazing service, and impressive quality in printing..40 kids and parents were delighted with the finished.clothing.
Andy is exceptional to deal with, always positive and ensures you get your order on time.

Andy helped my organisation deliver a ridiculously last minute order, for over 400 participants. Without Canadian Custom - we could never have pulled off the promo shirts we wanted. Not only was he incredibly pleasant to work with, but his professionalism and willingness to assist with the order went above and beyond. They even took care of manipulating our image to make our vision of what we wanted work within printing constraints (something zero other suppliers were willing to do). I can't say enough about how excellent they are. You won't regret it.

These guys at Canadian Custom Apparel are top notch! If you want quality products at the best prices available look no further..Excellent customer service and a true pleasure to deal with..Don't hesitate, call them!.You won't regret it.

Andy was a pleasure to work with! Our merch turned out better than expected! The Embroidering and screen printing were incredible and our customers loved the quality of the threads. Definitely our new spot for future apparel drops!

A total Con Artist Organization. I Don't recommend CCA! Poor customer service. Didn't deliver on quality embroidery as their promo video suggests. Tried to over charge me an additional $20. Nothing they did was professional. Wouldn't even try to correct the issue, once I showed them how bad of an embroidery job was done. Any positive review is done by internal associates. Don't trust the positive reviews.

Had an amazing experience working with this company in creating custom designs for my daughter's birthday. The team is extremely professional and highly experienced and produce exceptional quality work. They ensure customers are happy with their designs and finished products and dedicate the time to work with you in the design process. The items turned out exactly how I envisioned them, and I would definitely highly recommend them for all your custom apparel needs.

Exceptional Customer Service, Great Quality Products! I have been a customer of Canadian Custom Apparel for over five years. Ordering items both for professional and personal use, Andy and his employees have gone above and beyond to assist me. They are quick to respond and give their feedback and suggestions when necessary; they made my vision come to life with ease. CCA perfected each of my orders with patience, professionalism and creativity. My products were detailed, of high quality and they were able to meet my short deadlines!
I highly recommend Canadian Custom Apparel! I can't wait to place my next order with them.

Quality products with quality service! Worked with Andy to come up with a complete design for my first ever shirts and it was a great experience. Turn over for products is quick without any hiccups. Will definitely be looking at more products in the near future. Thank you!
Great products and service (Just Like Hero Fleece Hoodie & Bella T's). This was our first order with CCA and we are very pleased by the service, delivery timelines and response to our inquiries.

I ordered from CCA last week for a client which required a lot of changes in the initial quote. All the while, Andy was being extremely helpful and understanding with each quote request that came through.
When we ordered, they got the job done expediently and delivered to the client on time for a launch for which the embroidered materials were required.
Thank you to the whole CCA team for you hard work and a special thank you to Andy for providing top-tier, white-glove service throughout. The next client that needs embroidery will be getting their merch from CCA. :)

We use Canadian Custom Apparel for our custom design printing and embellishments. The quality is excellent. The staff is always friendly and helpful. Our sales rep, Alex, communicates and collaborates with us very well. We look forward to doing much more business with them in the future.

Great website and easy order process but poor printing quality. I ordered a sweater for in-store pickup. The printing itself was uneven and the color of the fabric can be seen through parts of the printing such that it seems seriously worn. When I asked the person at the counter about the print quality I was told it was the type of printing that was offered for that item. Hopefully this is just a one off experience.

I had a big order for my company..Alex was supper great and supper helpful. So many times we had to change the order and adjust things. He personally took all my phone calls and responded to all my emails promptly. When I received my order everything was great and with good quality. I will definitely work with Canadian custom apparel for my next order and will recommend them to everyone.

I have ordered apparel from Canadian Custom a couple of times now and I'm impressed with the quick service and great quality. There have been a few glitches with some t shirts in our orders but Andy has always made it right which says a lot about the integrity of this business. Sometimes accidents or things can happen but it's how you handle it that makes customer service stellar. Need custom apparel and want to support a local Canadian company? Order from these guys, you won't regret it! :)

I am quite new to designing and ordering customized clothing, however, with Alex's help, I was able to create wonderful, personalized hoodies! He has been extremely helpful in guiding me through the steps, and has been patient and kind during several order adjustments. The hoodies came in excellent condition and the designs came out great! I will definitely consider reaching out to Canadian Custom Apparel again in the future.

After researching screen printing companies for a month I came across Canadian Custom Apparel..I appreciated how clean their site was and the services that are provided. I made an order of 25 hoodies and the customer service I received was exceptional. They were very open about costing and had wonderful communication (they even provided suggestions for the best options based on the type of company I was starting). The products I received are great! Anyone who has seen them are surprised they are screen printed because of how clean and precise the design came out. Really great results, employees, and customer service.

There are a dozen shops that will print off a shirt for you in no time& i'll admit the few day wait period at Canadian Custom Apparel threw me off initially, but when I received my order I knew the wait was worth it..The quality is next level, there was none of that uncomfortable, awkward texture to their prints that crack after the first wash. I can run my hand over the tee and the transition from fabric to print is seemless, all the intricate details of my artwork were captured beautifully, every one of my clients has been super happy with how vibrant the shirts are and the overall quality..On top of it all I love knowing that I'm supporting local Canadian business, which is more important then ever during these times, 5 stars all day boys

They have a fantastic team at Canadian Custom Apparel. I ordered jerseys for my softball team and our rep Andy was very responsive, provided insight on what he thought might work best for the design, and completed our jerseys in a short amount of time. I would highly recommend using them if you ever need to make jerseys for your team. Thanks team!

These guys are amazing. Quality is fantastic. Both silk screen and embroidery always look great. I've worked with other shops in the past and Canadian Custom Apparel are by far the easiest and.I can honestly say the most knowledgeable as well. Love working with them.

Andy was very professional and helpful! The masks I purchased are amazing quality! I was running late to pick them up (on a Saturday) and Andy waited until I got there even tho they were closed. Great customer service. Looking forward to doing business with Canadian Custom Apparel in the future.

Andy has been a client of mine for some time now and I just recently used his company for some branding. The process was extremely smooth, he had helped recommend products that fit my budget and quality expectation. I am super pleased with the outcome and will be returning soon for my next order!

Awesome service, Custom designs, from the initial meeting with the team at Canadian custom Apparel was a smooth ride to choosing the right products for our business. From the quality of the clothing to the competitive pricing they offer, we found they where a one stop shop for us. Would highly recommend to anyone looking to get Branded this company brought our company to the next level!

These guys were a lifesaver when I couldn't find a place to put in a custom order of sweatpants as a gift for an upcoming wedding. I walked in and Andy was helpful right from the get go. Decent prices for quality work. I'd recommend them to anyone and will definitely come back here in the future.

These guys were awesome! Such a great experience dealing with the employees. They were fast at responding and fast with production. Got t-shirts made for my business and they met and exceeded my expectations. Quality and look were phenomenal and all for a good price. Highly recommended this place for custom apparel!

Thank you for the great and fast service. From the beginning Alex took care of me and gave me very clear and professional service. He understood what I was looking for and made it happen as a first priority. I will definitely recommend Canadian Customs to my colleagues! Thank you very much to Alex and I appreciate all the help and great service.

After trying other companies ( major and small shops ) I walked in one day to inquiry about team jerseys . I was greeted by Andy and he was very helpful. I submitted.my logo and he provided great quality shirts at a fair price and the whole process was pretty quick.
Safe to say I'll be coming back to them for my other team shirts

Fantastic service and even better product. The shirts turned out extremely well detailed and high quality, I had both small text and qr codes on the shirts and they were both legible and functional. Turn around time including shipping was extremely fast, while designing I called for a some brief questions and was instantly on the phone with a helpful staff member.

We used Canadian Custom Apparel to print t-shirts for the 2nd annual Adoration Colour Run..The shirts were the cheapest price I could find anywhere, but were great quality..The printing turned out really nice..We got all the sizes we ordered exactly..Great service, professional to work with and our event turned out great..Thanks Andy and Adrian!

Andy and the crew are amazing at what they do and get you exactly what you need. I work at a school and we needed a way to keep an eye on our kindergarten kids during field trips;.they created bright orange custom t-shirts with our school logo on them and they got them to us fast! I've also used them for personal reasons too. One being a personalized 30th birthday shirt for my brother that I can't wait to surprise him with..The quality of their product and the customer service that they provide is exceptional and I'd recommend them again and again!

Excellent service and extremely reliable. We worked directly with Andy, he told us everything would be ready within 7 business days and it was completed even sooner. We couldn't be happier with the work, quality and design - this is the second time we've used them and we will definitely use them in the future. Highly recommended.
Just ordered our Grad hoodies and I am super impressed and pleased how seamless the ordering process was and how quickly they got us our order. Students are pleased and the hoodies look great!

At first I was so excited to start an ecommerce platform with this company then found out that the only one who would be making money would be them. With their 22 dollar shirts and their 20 dollar shipping charge I would have to.charge 80 dollar's for a no name brand shirt..I had to pay 70 dollars for.sample shirt..I laid them 150 dollars for a service I cannot use and they don't offer any refunds. Was an expensive lesson to learn

The customer service with this company was outstanding. They email quickly and back it up everything they do with a great product. If you need any custom apparel, then go Canadian Custom Apparel. My team and myself are really happy with the hockey jerseys they made us!.I'll upload photos in the future.

I recently ordered custom jerseys and t-shirts from Canadian Custom Apparel, and I couldn't be more pleased with the quality and design. Andy did an excellent job designing my jerseys and apparel. I would recommend Canadian Custom Apparel for all your clothing needs.

My company purchased a large order of T-shirts for our employees over 5 years ago. We went based on Andy's recommendation. We are a busy mechanic shop and our shirts get dirty daily. We could not be happier with how well they held up. Can't even say how many times they.have been washed and they did not shrink or fade. Would highly recommend "Canadian Custom Apparel"!

Our customized school hockey jerseys came out amazing, the quality of the work was great! Students are so excited to wear them week after week!And parents loved them! They were very reasonable in price and a great turn around on getting them to us for the start of our season.
I have purchased from CCA on multiple occasions and I can honestly say that they continuously provide excellent products with excellent service..I look forward to using them again.

Quality Products and Super Fast Turn Around for a rush request we received recently! These guys are amazing and I love the service level.5Star all around. Totally impressed with the amount of options and products available. Check out their showroom if you haven't done so already! I highly recommend Canadian Custom Apparel!

The guys at Canadian Custom Apparel gave me quality work at a fair price! Helped me along the way with any questions and weren't pushy about selling. Fast response time with emails and completion of product. Going back for another drop forsure

Nic U working & nic printing setup I wish your business. Sir is may application this need me job i m job lees after lockdown. But is may screen print experience 17/year all kind painting.stekr 'menwal '& screen printing tebile.plz sir Helping to me & may family.but need only Job not anything more.plz sir understand to may canditon.i hope U good response me.thenks & I wishes your business.

Andy and Adrian are two really hard working guys..They have just done an order for us which included some embroidery and print. They helped us select the most appropriate and cost efficient method..The quality of design and execution was top notch, as was the service experience. Their shop is always busy, yet they still found time to accomodate a last minute request, which needed to be done on the same day. Thank you, Canadian Custom Apparel.

The team was super cooperative and super patient with all of our requests. They wanted to make sure we were satisfied every step of the way. We got jackets done, and our team absolutely loves them. Will definitely use their services again! 100% recommend.

Zia at Customize it ALWAYS goes the extra mile in all of his work! He's provided our touch football league (ONTFL) hundreds of shirts every year always on time, EXCELLENT quality - many times coming through for us with last minute orders! He helps me with shirts for my real estate clients/events and even fun get togethers with family/friends.like Superbowl! You need quality prints done by someone who cares - Zia at Customize It is your choice! Thanks Zia! Tammy Laverty Hall Royal Lepage Team Realty - ONTFL/Ed Laverty Legacy Fund.

2020 i ask for a madmo business card.to be printed.on the back of a zipper hoodie he supplied..I don't know the font, the size, or anything to help Zia,he manages to replicate the card on the sweater, and I LOVED IT. This year 2022 i ask to print more,.he brought to my attention things are not as sharp in image he uploads, somehow he manages to extract the blurry images from the upload,.and print it so that its very clear and bold.He somehow managed to make it 100√óBETTER ! HE IS A MAGICIAN! He is patient and you also need to be patient with him! And he gives honest feedback! íóthank you so much again!

Glad to have found such an amazing business. Great customer service. Their work is very well done and good quality. They were great in helping me customize a shirt.
Very friendly and helpful. Will definitely buy from again

Not impressed. Brought a $200 jacket to get embroidered here. They made their own digital key and insisted that it would work. After numerous attempts to call and no call back to let me know if it was done I went in to see them. The circle was stretched to an oval which looks so tacky, would of preferred them not ruin my clothing if they couldn't do it right.

I have used this establishment twice and both times I had a great experience. The product was ready for me the next day and looked great! Also the gentleman behind the counter was very professional and knew what he was doing! Would definitely recommend this place.

I had a wonderful experience working with Customize It!.I ordered group shirts, wanting a specific picture and design in mind (from a photo I found on Pinterest!)..They were able to make it work while adding a few extra touches..Customize It was also able to have our shirts ready by a given date..Payment (with a discount!) and pick up was easy..I even added an order after the fact without any issues..All in all, a great experience and would recommend to anyone looking for fast, quality printing!

I've used their service twice for custom work on my own tees. They do a fantastic job. Very fast and efficient. Prices are reasonable. I'm always completely satisfied with the results. I will continue to use them for any future work that I need done. Highly recommend.
Second time I've had a custom shirt made here. Super fast and EXCELLENT customer service! Helped me design the logo and printing looked amazing! Very happy. Will be back.

I wanted a specific design for a baseball teeshirt for my husband and they didn't disappoint. They did a great job on the graphic and a speedy turnaround. I wouldn't hesitate to order more from them and they were excellent in their customer service.

I have had Tshirts made here a couple of times. This place is amazing - friendly & knowledgeable staff, fast & efficient service, affordable. Love the Tshirts & print quality..Definitely coming back for all my custom tee needs. Highly recommended !

Dropped off a Rugby shirt for a friend's 50th this weekend..Wanted his last name printed in the back and the number 50..Not only did I have to stand there for 20 minutes and wait to be served, we just went to pick up the shirt after 4 DAYS and were told they couldn't do it (something about the letters wouldn't last on the textured shirt)..Apparently the manager should have called us..No call and now the shirt will have to be given as is..The party is tomorrow..We will not be returning.
Manager is super friendly, he's made a few shirts for me and I'm always happy with how they turn out, good quality, fast service, very good prices. I will definitely be going back!
I had custom t-shirts made for my dad who is retiring. I showed customizeit what I wanted done and after a day they were ready!.They were better then I could have ever imagined!.Highly recommend.
Great customer service..Rokibul let me know details on cleaning the newly printed shirts..The printing was done very well and ready the next day!
Wow! I am in love with the quality of these shirts. I not only wear them at work but now I also sleep in them. East or west, Mr. Zia is the best !
Decent pricing, very quick turnaround, very pleasant to work with..I was happy with the shirts that I ordered.
I had two custom Tees made and I bought one off the rack. All are of pretty good quality and were priced right. Thanks!
Super nice guy customized a design on a dress that has been previously denied because it was 100% polyester but did a fantastic job on it without burning. WILL DEFINITELY COME AGAIN
These guys are great and always do a great job. Will never customize anything online anymore with bigger companies. Support local!
Nice guy working. But need to update the supplys

I am a long time customer of Entripy..Each year we outfit our team-wear for an annual relay race..Each year, year after year the results are fantastic..WE get hats every year. I have had jackets stitched, shirts with transfer as well as screen printing - all perfect. Can't say enough!

Placed an order for 65 items in June. Completion date was July 8 and I chose to pick it up. July 8 came and went with no contact from them, I called and emailed looking for updates. The event I needed the shirts for has now passed but my order is still not ready. July 28 I get an email saying my big box is now ready to be picked up. I asked since it's no longer a rush, can they ship out my items and I will pay shipping. I complete the credit card authorization form to proceed, was told by the finance department I wouldn't need to pay for shipping. (Thank you for that, since it's 3 weeks past when the order should have been ready!) A week later, I still don't have my order so I call again. Was told it would ship later that day and arrive the next day. I get my package excited to finally have them after 6 weeks.My package.Contains 2 shirts! Where are the other 63 items? I call again and was told those 2 shirts were the back ordered items and the rest of the order is ready for pick up! You can imagine my frustration when I tell them it was all supposed to ship. Their response. You will need to pay for shipping!.Here we are over 2 months later still going round and round. I have 2 out of 65 items, they have my $1800 and I've completed all the necessary paperwork to have my items shipped. Fingers crossed this happens soon! I would no longer recommend them especially if you are looking to have your items in a timely fashion. Quite disappointing.

As a designer, working with this supplier was easy and straightforward. Their online proofing setup worked well and it was easy to send them a corrected file after the first proof. Delivery was earlier than estimated, print quality is good, shirt specs are clear and easy to understand. Thanks, guys! I ordered a few dozen shirts in two cuts for a staff association.

Recently placed a second order in November, with plenty of time for the items to arrive before Christmas. Was hoping to sell these on my site, and make some Christmas sales as a small business owner. When the order arrived, over 50 items were defective, and were unfit to sell. After contacting their resolutions line, they were quick and hassle free to offer replacements. Although since this offer, the customer service has been terrible. I was told they would ship out last Friday, but they won't reply to me to confirm if that's happened, if they have started making the replacement items, or provided any tracking information. So I'm left waiting, wondering, if and when my items will arrive. Which clearly won't be in time to sell before Christmas. Quite frustrating.

After reviewing this shop I got a call from customer service who talked to me about my issues and fixed the problem! Thanks so much Kim, I really appreciate your patience and responding quickly to me! Received sweatshirt in a timely matter but was not correct. Will only communicate through email telling me I didn't search the proper logo when on my end there is no where to search it. Very disappointed with the customer service. all I was asking was for the club logo to be added

The quality is not bad but the customer service is terrible. This is not the first time I have issues so will no longer use them. They would not let me modify my order as i needed to add more items,.under the pretext it's in "production" but.the last time I order it took months to receive my golf shirt because they are "special order". They also do not honor the discount they advertised on their website.

Best print on demand company I have used! Amazing service, amazing follow up reminders of orders forgotten in the approval process!
Mr. Brar the owner took the time to contact me and help me solve my problems!
Thank you!

Terrible customer service. Ordered blue polo shirts 6 months ago and then green ones 3 weeks ago. The logo on the green shirts is much smaller than the blue shirts even though it's a repeat order and I never made any changes to the logo. Contacted customer service and was told by Anna that this was my fault since I approved the order. Such arrogance ! Will take my business elsewhere in the future !

I ordered hats for a conference, was guaranteed they would make it on time. Day after day the order was delayed by their production department. I reminded them daily for two weeks and was assured they would make it on time. The hats finally arrived the day the conference ended. The hats were shoddily embroidered. Meanwhile, seeing the writing on the wall, I ordered backups last-minute from a local company. Those were completed on time and look excellent. This was my fourth order. I've had one good order out of four. I will never order from Entripy again. Nothing but lip-service.
Daughtereen from customer service was very nice, helpful and able to solve my concern quickly. Will buy again.

My experience with Entripy has been very.good. Custom orders delivered exactly when expected and the quality of the clothing and prints has been perfect. No complaints at all and will continue to use them for custom clothing orders.

After about 7 years of dealing with these guys. I have to say, stay away. Do you like delayed orders? What about forgotten orders? Or orders that were sent to their print on demand department (heat transfer printing) even though I paid for screen printing. What about calling their support line and getting told no problem we are rushing this order and then You find out the order wasn't rushed in fact it was still sitting in ‚Äúqueue‚Äù after 2 months.

The worst customer service I have ever received when buying branded apparel.

Just find a company that wants to actually support their customers and help them get what they paid for. It's ok when the company makes an error it's not a big deal but when they lie and delay you you further?!? Why?!?

Not a good choice unless you don't mind waiting and getting the run around.

Outstanding service from the initial phone call, to placing the order to picking it up. Very friendly and extremely helpful and the final product exceeded my expectations. And the price was very reasonable - the best part
Thank you very much . I will be back !

Ordered 20 hoodies for a high-school club, and it came down to a really cheap price. Order was ready (pickup) on time, no mistakes. But the quality was disappointing, and there was a bit of white print found on the neck of every hoodie, which was irritating. Custom clothing operation was good, but the general quality of the hoodies themselves were not great

Just ordered 2 joke t-shirts for a family event and was shocked at how well they turned out for $10 each!.The shipping is kind of a killer but was pleasantly surprised that there was no additional charge for differently designed shirts packaged in one order! The quality of the print is really spectacular - super bright and sharp. The t-shirt does seem a little smaller in sizing but I ordered larger because of previous peoples complaints. Definitely won't hesitate coming back if I ever need something printed again!

Sadly I cannot write all the details of my review as it exceed the word limit. I placed an order on May 20th with a "Hot Rush". Expected to receive my proofs on Tuesday after the long weekend by 12:30 at the latest as they indicate 3-4 hours. I did not receive them until 3:40PM (after the production cut off). I was given a cut off extension until 5PM, I contacted by e-mail and phone with my changes. I did not receive he changes until 11:16 the NEXY DAY! I contacted multiple times and was assured the front logo WOULD NOT LAND ON THE BOOB. I was assured their standard print area for left chest was 5 inches from the shoulder seam for women. Their website also has a list that states the same. I was ASSURED my order would be completed and shipped on time for my event on the 26th. E-mail quote: "We will not make you drive 5 hours to pick up your order. Rather, we will complete your order by end of day tomorrow, and have it shipped to your listed address via UPS Express Saver. UPS indicates it will arrive at your address by Friday. This will save you a trip down to the GTA, and will ensure you have your order in your hands before your event."
That did not happen! I HAD TO DRIVE 5 HOURS TO PICK MY ORDER TO GET IT ON TIME! Upon my arrival, the shirts were still not ready and were in packing. I opened the box to look at them before leaving to find the front logo positioned RIGHT ON THE BOOB! I measured and rather than the promised 5 inch from shoulder seam placement it was sitting at 8 inches! Upon further inspection OVER half the order men's and women's had ink stains, smears and damaged/snagged material.
Initially they took immediate action to remedy the situation. They said they would not charge for the order AND reprint everything all at no charge! I was assured this twice by Sally te Kamp and Alva Troubetzkoi. I was also PROMISED that since there were no longer all the sizes available that I needed, they would print and send those sizes at a later date. They put me in a hotel and advised my new order would be ready in a few hours, this was 3:30 and I still have a 5 hour drive home. My order was not ready until 9:10 PM. Upon my arrival for pick up I could tell right away the front logo was still not at 5 inches this time it was too high, but had no more energy left so took as it. Upon further inspection later I realized even on the new order MULTIPLE pieces were damaged. ink stains/smears and damaged material. I slept a few hours and drove home at 4am the day of my event. This was an event in memory of 2 family members who have lost their lives to suicide so this meant a lot to us.
I sent Alva and Sally a list of all the damaged shirts in the new order, as well advised that 1 shirt was missing entirely a 3XL. I also included the shirts I was promised would be reprinted at a later date due to stock unavailability. I also sent pictures of the damage and notified that that I was not requested reprint of all new shirts but wanted to point out that the front logo position was still not correct at 5 inches is was now only at 3 inches. First 8, now 3, but their standard states 5. I even marked on a shirt the start and stop dots. Starting at 5 inches from the shoulder seam, and the logo was 3 inches in length, so finishing at 8 inches. NOT STARTING AT 8 AS WAS ON THE ORIGINAL, OR STARTING AT 3 AS WAS ON THE NEWLY PRINTED SHIRTS. I received a very disappointing e-mail from Alva today advising that they are refusing to print and replace the damaged pieces as well as the ones missing from stock unavailability. They are frustrated and retracting on their commitment because my expectation is to receive the shirts in the proper sizes I needed without damage to them. It is not my fault or error that even their second round of printing my shirts included ink stains and damage..So their commitment to customer service ended in a big FU. I am trying to add more photos of damage ink stains in particular but for some reason only this one image will load.

With so many suppliers and vendors out there, you would be best to stay away from these guys. Don't be fooled by the pricing! Their service is absolutely horrible. I ordered FOUR shirts. Just four for our grand opening. I ordered almost 2 weeks in advanced and they delayed the order two times to a date in which I would have zero shirts for the grand opening. They tried to make it right by express shipping me the shirts in order to make the grand opening. They sent me ONE. To say the least, there was no point in having one staff in uniform and 3 others not in uniform. So we had zero uniforms for our grand opening. Not to mention the 1 shirt they sent me was absolute trash quality. There are many suppliers out there that are local and will provide much better service. Stay away from Entripy! Buyer beware!

Edit - Entripy has worked hard to fix the issues. I appreciate their realizing their was an issue and trying their best to rectify it. We have ordered product from Entripy numerous times. The product quality is as described; you get what you pay for. Nothing lasts very long. Shipping was never as promised, although that may have been because they had the wrong postal code and the shipping company would always say that our address did not exist. We had to make Entripy aware of the situation a few times before it was finally fixed. Last week we ordered a bunch of sweatshirts based on previous sizing..We had found Mediums were small and Large were mediums. This time larges were extra large. They could do nothing to fix them other than say we will pick up the old ones and then deliver new ones . Well we needed them for a event and they were not trying to help in a manner that suggested urgency. We have been repeat clients for many years but that does not seem to matter. If your only concern is price then this is your company!

I placed an order for a sample. About 11 days later, I follow up just to be told some story about how the shirt had a hole in it, then another story of the shirt needs to be reprinted because the quality was not up to their standard. They then suggested it will take another 10 days for a reprint. I instantly requested the order be cancelled and refunded. Mistake happens, I get that. But there is no excuse for poor customer service and this level of "he say, she said". I have no confidence in using them again. I will say they provide prompt communication which I appreciate.

Amazing service and quality. I have ordered from Entripy twice. Entripy has exceptional customer service, I always got a reply back almost immediately and if not, maybe in 15-20 minutes max. Entripy met all my demands and the quality of the clothes were beyond my expectations. The embroidery on the 30 something sweaters I ordered was beautiful. These sweaters were also the cheapest of all the options I had looked at. The package took 1 day to arrive after it was shipped which is amazing! All in all, I would definitely recommend Entripy to anyone who needs to do a bulk order, and I definitely will be ordering again from Entripy for any custom clothing orders!

Employees are a pleasure to work with. From the staff to the Client Care team, everyone is really good at their job. I had an amazing experience and will definitely use Entripy again. The designer created proofs fast and exactly how I envisioned it. The turnaround for the t-shirts were surprisingly fast. And Client Care team was able to resolve the small hiccup we had without any hassle. They pay good attention to quality requirements as well.

Originally I had a not so pleasant experience with this company, however, they did make the effort to fix it for me. I ordered rush service for team shirts. They came in and a few were misprinted (no numbers at the back when I paid for them)/1 never showed up. They informed me of the 1 that never showed a few hours AFTER the package was delivered! Then this happened again with the new shirts twice. 3 weeks later and I finally had all my shirts I ordered. The customer service department is very quick at responding and in the end, I received all my shirts and a partial refund for all of this inconvenience. If you're in no rush for your products, I'd recommend this company. The prices are affordable, the site is easily accessible, and the quality is good. Since this incident as well, I've ordered again and the process is was fantastic! 5 stars for their products and customer service

I placed an order for custom Shopping bags and was given a p.u date for completion.supposed to be May 26.I was never informed of any delays to production I guess my business is not important.I am canceling my order and request my money.

Had the worse experience with this company.We ordered 8 printed t-shirt, got the design for confirmation where they altered the size of the print. We had to go back and forth 5 times(!) with the notes because every time we asked to get back to the original size, they said ok, and then didn't do it. Even their customer service girl (who was super nice) thought it was getting ridiculous. We ended up cancelling the order and put a new one with the size we wanted, which was supposed to be ready June 1st. Few days before we got an email saying it didn't go through their quality check so they need to re-do everything, ready 1 week later. Then we got an email saying they ran out of 2 of the sizes we needed, but agreed to give us a slightly better shirt in the same price. THEN we got another email saying that, once again, quality check didn't go, it will be ready June 11. In the end, we got ok shirts, all the same (have no idea which 2 are the "better" ones) and we got it on time because -we- called and asked, since they didn't even bother sending us an email saying we need to come get it. They did end up giving us $50 credit, but honestly, I'd never ever order from them again.

I have had to place many orders over the years..Outstanding service and prompt delivery..Their team was quick to get back to me with any inquiries that I had..Krysta Scott in specific has been amazing..I have dealt with her on many of my orders..She always takes care of things..Great job!

I placed an order of 61 sweaters for my graduating class at the University of Waterloo.After submitting the completed order, I received an email on the following day at 10 am informing me that the asset I had submitted on the website is not supported and would need new assets. I sent them the updated assets an hour after receiving the email, and heard nothing until 24 hours later because I was told digital proofing would require 5 hours by a client specialist over the phone, even though it stated 3 hours on the website. After providing Entripy with the correct assets and approving the mockup, I heard nothing for a week. Then on the day my order was supposed to be finalized and shipped out, I received a call at 6pm informing me that there had been a stock issue. 9 of the 61 order will not be printed and produced in time. I was given the option to either wait indefinitely for the 9 missing sweaters to arrive, or receive the incomplete order of 52 sweaters 2 days later than the promised 5-day turnaround. My experience with Entripy had been very unsatisfactory. With problems and unpredicted delays every step along the production pipeline. They definitely do not live up to their promise of "5-day turnaround". I had originally chose to go with Entripy because of the fast turnaround period. I was willing to pay more due to how quickly they delivered the orders. Unfortunately my suggestion is to order from a competitor instead of Entripy. Traces provides much cheaper prices for the same service, but for a longer turnaround period.

Had t-shirts made for our.club and they turned out fantastic.. Very impressed with the service, quality and price point..And no set up charge! The response time to any questions was great and when I asked to have our art work tweaked, they were more then accommodating. And if there was something they weren't sure about, I actually received a phone call..Great follow up..I would definitely recommend using Entripy!

Quality of product looks fine. I used their sizing guide to a tee. Bought two products - a hoodie and sweats. Both were undersized. The leg length was about 4 inches too short. Arm length was about 2-3 inches too short and body was tight.
Their response when I mentioned this: Unfortunately, due to the custom nature of the clothing that is ordered, we do not allow for any returns, exchanges or refunds. This is why the box in the checkout is advising customers that all sales are final and by the customer checking the box, it ensures you've checked it for accuracy. Pretty hard to be accurate when you don't even have inseam or arm length as a measurement?.Sizes are based on waist, chest and weight . There goes $100+ and two gifts down the drain.

I have been ordering from Entripy for over 15 years - their service and quality is top notch. Orders always arrive on time and if there are every issues, the customer service team works with me to figure out a solution. I have ordered a variety of t-shirts, sweatshirts, jerseys, and promo material for secondary schools - students always appreciate the finished product!

We ordered shirts for our office sports team and LOVED them! They came out exactly how we imagined and were able to receive them on time. Prices are great and the quality is awesome. Customer service was perfect! I'd definitely order from Entripy again!

Used This company many times usually everything was satisfying until my recent order. I have ordered some long sleeved shirt for my guys, when i picked em up i let few of members try it was a lot smaller than expected. I called the company and their rep have told me they cant do anything i stuck with what i got. so i decided to reorder bigger size, they said i cannot because its of production. This company tried nothing to satisfy or help me in this situation just a light sorry., wont use again and will make sure my contractors/friends will stop using them as well. They just leave you hanging with no customer satisfaction what so ever.

I have used Entripy a few times now and their service and products have always been great. However, recently I made an order and I received my product in the wrong size. I alerted their team about it and within a few minutes they responded and told me they would mail me my correct order free of charge. Great customer service!

Patrice Thomas was an absolute angel who was always more than willing to guide me through the process. She communicated frequently and with laser clarity. I really appreciated her help which will allow me not to hesitate to place another order. The Customer Service I received was outstanding and I couldn't have asked for better communication from my contact person who followed my order and myself, all the way through to it being processed and sent. I am in the Customer Service Industry so constructive feedback is in my DNA, however, Entripy totally delivered a high quality service with a great product which I am ultimately satisfied with and because of my excellent experience, I have become a repeat customer. Thank you Entripy!April-Dawn

Entripy is the best custom apparel in the industry, I have been with them for the past few years now, and everything has been seamless when it came to the initial design, digital proof, pricing, and the product itself. Everything about this company is wonderful, in the past I have dealt with many other companies in which cant even come close to be compared with Entripy. Entripy has the most variety and customizability in terms of their products which made finding products very easy and interacting as the website allows you to add your own logo, text, etc. Everyone at the office is so friendly and kind which made the experience even better.  have ordered with Entripy countless amount of times and am happy as the first time I've ordered. Even though Entripy has many very large accounts, they have treated my orders with the same amount of superior service. Nothing but the best from this company!

Was generally been impressed with the quality and speed of Entripy orders, but recently been waiting 7 months for sweaters to even be in stock to make an order. at this point, COVID/supplier issues isn't even a good excuse. I'll just have to look elsewhere that has these sweaters available. Kind of disappointed that they won't just order these sweaters, while they wait for other sizes to be used up to make a large order.

My dad and I loved the shirt I surprised him with (it had his own artwork on it!). The customer support rep I talked to online was super helpful and very nice. My order only took 10 days from order to my door (Ontatio to Nova Soctia) I'll definitely.be buying some more cool stuff in the future. This shipping was a bit pricey but it is a long distance, at least for me and its pretty much balanced out by the cheap prices even on just 1 shirt. 9 bucks is a better deal than even Walmart offers for a shirt with a print on it. My suggestion would be to order a few different things at the same time for friends or family so the shipping becomes even more negligible. I hope this helps someone :)

I did not receive my shirts on time, which I ordered in person in their warehouse and when I followed up with my order status, I was told that the order was ready for shipping on time and the UPS made an error and try to blame it on UPS. Doesn't not make sense, I have all email records and will take them small claim courts. I asked for my refund and they deny the refund..I had ordered online before from them and got my shirt shipped to me, but very low quality. Over all experience has been poor with this company. There are other companies out there that are more responsible and cost effective and better quality shirts. My experiences have been bad with this company, will let you be the judge.

We ordered 32 M&O Adult Baseball T-Shirts from entripy for our company softball team. Their website was super easy to use and when I had a question their online chat was quick, prompt and very helpful. We needed to make a revision in terms of the size of the logo and their team was super quick to do it! The shirts arrived a day later than expected but this did not affect us at all as we did not need them until later on in the week. From what colleagues have said - they sleeves on the shirt are a little tight. Overall, the logo printed on our shirts is of fantastic quality and the prices were great as well. We will definitely order from entripy again!

Received my products in good time, even taking advantage of the "slow delivery" option. Everything was excellent . I made post order changes and the.company worked with me to ensure i was getting exactly what i wanted. I am 100% happy with my order. I will definitely be recommending, and using this company again.

I had heard of Entripy, here and there but I never knew much about their services and what they had to offer. Recently, I needed a batch of t-shirts designed for a girls getaway but the company I had initially contacted was unable to meet my needs and my deadline. It was such a let down. I reached out to Entripy and the whole experience was absolutely exceptional. Even with short notice and a deadline to meet, Entripy exceeded my expectations by completing my order within 48 hours just in time for my trip!. The the packaging was very neat and the quality was on par. It is evident that the needs of their customers are their top priority Thank you Entripy for the great experience, I will definitely be ordering again!

Order about 30 T Shirts. 7 were damaged during production, which was refunded and resolved. one of the logo on the sleeve was faded/damaged during the printing process. Overall, I had an okay experience dealing with Entripy. their customer service is promptly, and T shirts turn out nicely. However, with only 30 T shirts, their staff is already running into quality control issue. I can't find enough trust in Entripy to order a large quantity of products. Everyone make mistake, but many mistakes like this can be detrimental to a big company over time. I will definitely order again, but will keep it to a smaller quantity in the near future.

Orders are delayed - delivery expectations were off by 4 days thus far (full order still not in yet). They explained its due to Covid. I accept that. Then one of the t-shirts arrived with a small spot stain. I was told to send a note to resolution desk. I did. Not sure what to expect..I ordered the Euro Spun Tees hoping the Tee-Shirt fabric was a soft, but its not the soft fabric quality I was hoping for..I'm a feeling a little disappointed.

I will never be using Entripy again. I placed my order online thinking it would be easy and straightforward, but this was not the case. After submitting my order there was confusion regarding whether or not artwork was required. I spoke with someone online through their chat option who told me artwork was mandatory, but then received different information from one of the customer service reps over e-mail who said it was not. For a company who claims to be Canada's leader in custom shirts you would think their staff would be aligned and know what is required and what isn't. When my order arrived there were typos on 2 of the jerseys (it was very obvious these were typos ‚Äì a name on the back that should have had an "√©" at the end had ‚Äú√É ¬©‚Äù instead). Clearly no one checked the order before sending it out which is very disappointing. How is a final check not done before sending shipments out to customers? After reaching out to Entripy and informing them of the mistakes, they told me they would arrange with UPS to pick up the jerseys to bring them back and fix them, and then send them back to me. These jerseys are for a team that has already started the season but Entripy ensured me I would have the corrected jerseys back within 3 business days. Well I received the jerseys and THEY WERE NOT FIXED. They sent back the same incorrect jerseys. How unprofessional! Did they even look at the jerseys when they arrived back to be corrected? A simple order of jerseys has turned into a headache to deal with. No apology was offered when I informed them of the typos and I doubt anything will be offered when I inform them that they once again have messed up. I will not be using Entripy in the future and definitely won't be recommending them to anyone.

Had a terrible experience with Entripy when I wanted shirts printed. The first run of shirts had holes and was not screened on, so all the colors were faded and incorrect. I reached out to customer service, who offered another print room, which had incorrect colors and everything was extremely blotchy. I didn't even ask for a refund afterwards. I got stuck with 2 boxes of unusable product. I definitely would not recommend.

I've dealt with Entripy on numerous projects ranging from a rush order on 1 t-shirt to large orders of thousands of shirts and I was thoroughly impressed every step of the way. From working with their art department to verify and modify our prints, to meeting our admitally unreasonable delivery times, every interaction I had with Entripy and their employees exceeded my expectations. Not only did they have the best prices out of all the companies I've previously dealt with, their quality of product met the strict requirements we held our suppliers to. Entripy's customer service was proactive and made the entire experience painless and pleasant. When you're running a business you don't have time to sweat about the little things - let Entripy know what you need and be confident it will be done right and on time - the first time. I highly recommend using Entripy for all your custom apparel needs!

Wonderful service and great prices. Ordered a batch of sweaters for a team and had them made quickly and at a much lower price than I had expected. Amazing with proofs and helped me get the exact look I wanted before going to production. One sweater did not pass quality control but they worked with me to get a replacement issued immediately. No complaints whatsoever.

As a business owner, I was extremely impressed with the customer service that I received. The prices were good and the quality excellent..Reps had no problem sending me different proofs whenever I changed my mind for the millionth time..Emails were answered within 1 business day!.I will continue to use Entripy Custom Clothing for my business!.A very happy customer from Blossoms Fresh Fruit Arrangements ( Red Deer and Central Alberta ).

outstanding sales and service , before and after purchase. Entripy is the ONLY promo provider we use at ActivEats/GrowFoods.We entrust them with our promo bags, t-shirts, staff jackets and many other items.They follow up on your order to make sure you are happy, and the more you order the more you save. The quality of the merchandise is fantastic and we are always very pleased with the results. On line designing is super easy and their web site is simple to navigate.
Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for awesome promo items,

I ordered two white T-shirts printed with complex multicoloured mathematical formulas and the results were terrific. Even the smallest detail was clear and easy to read. Very pleased. Delivery was faster than promised and the shirt material itself was better than expected. Will definitely use them again.

Needed some t-shirts in a hurry and Entripy more than responded to the call. Customer service was very professional and easy to work with. Moreover, the product quality was fantastic and arrived in the rush time requested. Great prices, great service, I'll be ordering again!

Great customer service! This group helped me through minor artwork tweaks to ensure I was happy with my final product. The 3 different styles of shirts I had embroidered look sharp! Our company will proudly wear these! Would recommend to anyone!

With COVID-19 I have found Entripy's level of customer support has dropped dramatically. I put in an order for Father's Day shirts more than two weeks ahead of the day. They got the first order wrong and I had to redo it. But it was still supposed to be ready the Thursday.before Father's Day. When I received no confirmation email I had to call them on the Friday to ask where the order was. It wasn't until Sat they confirmed the order would not be ready. If they had at least called to share this without me having to prompt them I would give them 3 stars. If you need an order done in a timely fashion you should avoid them for now.

Definitely a great product overall - however the screening cracked pretty overtly after 1 wash. Maybe we just got a "less-than-superb" batch. The custom artworks turned out great though..Will definitely order again and will continue to recommend Entripy.

I had a decent experience with Entripy . So I first ordered about 20 sweatshirts with a simple embroidery and some customizations. They messed up on 2 of them, therefore they did not ship with the rest of them. So, I contact customer service and they send them over. easy. however they both arrived either in the wrong size or with the wrong customization. Then it takes nearly 1.5 months for one to arrive because they "don't have it in stock", meanwhile, it clearly is in stock on their website. I think i emailied them over 10 times back and fourth to coordinate the correct sweatshirt. But I was eventually refunded, so that was fine. But the only reason why I keep ordering from Entripy is the AMAZING prices. It is SOOOOOO much cheaper than competitors and the quality is so amazing. They have so much selection mainly for apparel and not the mention the live chat is FANTASTIC. They will literally reply to your question within 5 minutes and the fact that its a real person is so much better, whereas a robot can't help you with a specific question. I've asked so many questions and they're literally so helpful. They also have so many sales all the time, which is so amazing, so make sure to subscribe to their email list. Great store minus the one bad experience, but i still highly reccomend.

We were looking for a new supplier/printer of water bottles..We hand out these water bottles to our EMBA students so they needed to be of exceptional quality..I also wanted our logo printed on them..I spoke to Daniel Stewart who was very helpful and efficient..From the beginning to delivery he made me feel like an important client. We will definitely be using Entripy again! !

I ordered some t-shirts from them and the service was great! Everyone was very helpful, understanding, courteous and well mannered. There were no delays and everything happened on time. I haven't experienced anything like this before with a printing company. Thank you !

Ordered some tote bags for my company. The back and forth with the designer was a bit of a slower process than expected but it's great that they make sure we're happy before printing. Happy with what arrived-- similar to what I envisioned. Overall, would order again. Good value.

Can't see your design changes in real time Want you to pay before they revise a design. Took a MONTH to send back the revision Had to cancel the order. UPDATE: Only Entripy had the shirt I wanted so tried to use them again.
Product was a lot more expensive than competitors but good quality. Embroidery was well done BUT WRONG COLOUR and one of the three shirts was damaged. Dead center! I opened myself, by hand, from an undamaged package, so it was obviously put in damaged.! So much for quality control.

I ordered t-shirts and tank tops for our first annual fundraising event: the Vincovis 158 Challenge. We wanted to keep costs low so that more proceeds could go to the cause, so I initially chose Entripy because of their great rates. Every aspect of the process exceeded my expectations. I placed the order less than two weeks before the event, and my bright yellow box arrived a day earlier than expected. I have already recommended them to colleagues and will definitely be ordering through Entripy again.

I ordered a couple of tee shirts from a third party brand that were manufactured and shipped by Entripy. Weeks went by and the shirts didn't show up, so I contacted the company. I got a response right away, and we determined that they probably got lost in the mail, but Entripy sent new ones right away using a fast shipping option. I just got the shirts, and they're really nice! Entripy earns five stars for graciously solving a problem that was not their fault, and for delivering a high-quality product in the end. Thanks!

I needed T-shirts for a team celebration and the Entripy team was able to get me the perfect custom T-shirts in less than 48 hours. Shannon from the Client Relations team was able to help me design the T-shirts and got them printed on the next day and delivered to the office by 4pm. Thanks Jas and Entripy team for a great product and fantastic service.
T-Shirts were great quality and arrived early. They made a mistake with both shirts and sent me 2 new shirts free to correct the situation. Will definitely go with them again

We had to order shirts last minute and although the website said that they could not accommodate such a rush order, Jamelle of Entripy got in touch with me and let me know that they indeed, could. Jamelle was very very helpful and easy to work with. She was prompt with her responses and Entripy was able to deliver MORE than expected. Our employees LOVED the shirts we ordered and we all felt that the quality of the material was excellent. Definitely surpassed our expectations and will be using them from now on.

Entripy has definitely provided some of the best coverall service I've seen in the industry in quite a while. I ordered some t-shirts for my team & it was done very quickly & efficiently. Their team is very helpful. They gave me the best routes to ordering the shirts & what choices would work best for us. I'd highly recommend anyone towards them for their services & I will continue doing business with them for any future needs!

I am very impressed with the service & efficiency of Entripy..The process was quick & easy. I like that they take pride in their level of satisfaction & end results of their product quality. My delivery.came hassle free. I will definitely recommend them to friends & family. Thanks Entripy Job Well Done!

Messed up my order, and then will harass you with marketing emails that you can not unsubscribe from. I needed a very simple order..1 shirt with printing on front and back..When the first shirt showed up it was missing the printing on the back..So they offered to send another shirt which didn't show up until after I needed it. Since then they have sent me market emails that have no where to unsubscribe in the email, so after being annoyed by 5 or 6 of them I emailed client care which has their email listed on the bottom of these emails..I have emailed them 4 times, not got a reply, and still get the marketing emails that I have asked to stop. Maybe this will get their attention. In fact I bet if I looked deep into the anti spamming laws in Canada, the fact that they don't have a way to unsubscribe could get them in trouble.

Ordered a few hundred tote bags. Picked them up and noticed our paid bag sponsor logo was missing. Returned the bags and was assured they would be corrected. Returned on date they told me to come and work was not done. Had to take bags "as-is" since I was enroute to event where they were required. Lost bag sponsor revenue. Entripy offered small credit on next order which was not satisfactory to me - why would I want to place another order after this fiasco? Asked for owner to call me - twice. Heard nothing. It has been months. Would not recommend doing business with this firm. They don't take responsibility for their errors and lack customer service commitment. Give them "sub-zero star" rating.

Entripy is a great company with great products. I would insist on them not using UPS to deliver their products. They shipped my product 7 days ago and my package is still "being delivered" by UPS. I live 15km from Entripy's facility. UPS is literally the worst company ever. Entripy, please switch delivery companies!

If I could give this place negative stars I would. I requested some changes, and they uploaded the proof, to which I accepted. Got a confirmation email saying it was in production. My credit card was charged. Having accepted the proof of the order last Friday (6 days ago), they contact me 2 days before the due date and basically gave me an ultimatum. Accept the charges for the additional changes or have your jerseys delayed. Ridiculous. Basically strong-armed me, as I needed the jerseys to be on time. Can't comment on the jerseys as I have not received them, but this company clearly lacks customer service and communication. Will be my last order.

Upon first ordering our softball team jerseys they seemed very helpful, it wasn't until our order wasn't 100% and when I had asked for more that their customer service was an utter disappointment. Apparently ‚Äúit's not their problem‚Äù. We received a duplicate # on one of our jerseys and when asked if it could be replaced I was told I had to place an additional order with a minimum 6 jerseys ordered. The company wouldn't even provide the jersey that their production line didn't produce. As if it's my fault? Wouldn't recommend any company who doesn't stand behind their products. 2 big thumbs down ëéèªëéèª

Dimeji was great and he helped get my order back on the rails and delivered to me on time..After paying $90 "express" fee, I called to follow up and it didn't seem as though there was any chance my order would arrive on time..I called and the order was still in production on the day it was supposed to be delivered to me..Great sense of urgency and follow up by Dimeji..The only reason I ended up happy with this transaction.

We initially ordered items for staff and were so pleased we decided to order more for other key people to our business and customers celebrating our anniversary with us. Super pleased with the responsiveness of the customer service team, end product, and value received. Would not hesitate to recommend. Thanks Entripy

What a horrible customer experience.ordered 300 custom tee shirts for a promotion at our office. Spent money on advertising and giveaways and when our tee shirts arrived the logos were all way off centre. When they looked into it they said it was a problem with their printer alignment (great quality control). They offered me 10% off which I found as a joke as I was out all my planning, advertising and the entire promotion was a write off. I asked them to at least reimburse me 30% and re send them as that was equivalent to my loss. They refused and have definitely lost a longterm customer. Horrible experience, save your money and find someone else.

Shirt quality was alright, nothing spectacular, I've seen better and I've seen worse with other custom shirts I've bought. Seems like the only thing they care about is their public perception of their brand though. Paid $23 for a shirt I had to leave early for work to pick up because their shipping prices/times were insane and the size was abysmally different from what their sizing chart indicates. My girlfriend is regularly a small shirt size. Got her measurements according to the "length and width" image they provide. Measurements of my girlfriend are 15" width and 20" length. Sizing chart says small fits someone 16" width and 25.25" length, so good right? I get the shirt and she can't even fit it over her shoulders, not even close to fitting.I contact customer service asking what the deal is and they email me saying they can't do anything about it. So I ask if maybe they can give me a discount or something on another shirt? Finally a week later someone bothers to respond to me and say they can do 10% off another shirt. Almost a slap in the face. Thanks for the offer of $2 off. I need to find another custom t shirt for my girlfriend's birthday now but I'll definitely be going somewhere else.

To put things simply, terrible quality control. I ordered a bunch of shirts and hats from them and when I opened the box I was impressed. But then a few days later I started to notice problems. The embroidery had loose spots on every single hat and I had to send them back to get fixed, and the screen printing on the shirts was not smooth at all. It's very rough and bumpy. It looks like it was done by a little kid. I would not recommend this company to anyone as there are much better places to go to.

Would never use this company again. We used them once for shirts with limited success. Tried them a second time and found them to be the most disorganized company ever. We wanted a redesign for our new shirts which they said they could help with which wasn't true. They kept sending us old proofs which we didn't like and they kept coming back saying they look good and we should go with them. Honestly would go with any other company. AVOID

This year the Queen's Commerce Service Initiative worked with Entripy to have custom sweaters made for our committee. We were very impressed with their customer service and their high quality product. Entripy was very efficient and professional which made working with them very easy. We would definitely work with them in the future.

I'm sure they're a lovely company but their communication sucks..No notice that there is a proof to look at, no reply to first message - had to contact again to enquire, waiting for an email to say item is done.nada..I know it's only one item, but the one item is what you use to test if you will use the company for larger orders in future..You'd figure an automated email to say item is ready would be standard..sigh.

I am extremely happy with the product we received from Entripy. The product is a great quality and the imprint looks great! The turnaround time was excellent, I received the product with plenty of time to spare. I will definitely be using Entripy for future orders.

I had a really bad experience with them. I ordered around 70 hats and went through the process of getting the logo transferred and etc. The images of the final product didn't resemble what I received. The customer service process was very poor in terms of communicating the exact type of hat, the quality of the hat, and the size of the hat. so i basically got 70 hats that totally sucked and that no one would really want to wear. I followed up about it, and had a pretty bad time with that customer service as well.

Extremely reasonable prices but what sets them apart, in my opinion, is the fantastic customer service..The representative I was lucky enough to deal with,.Krysta Scott,.was a consummate professional and had the patience of a saint..I've yet to receive the product but given the excellent work up done by Ms. Scott and the ease in making my purchases confidently, I can comfortably give a tentative 5 stars..I will lower the score should the quality of the product be below expectation.

I've used Entripy for a wide variety of jobs over 5+ years, for both professional and personal events. I've always had a great experience with their customer service teams, and the product is always great quality. Few companies can offer the quick turnaround on short-notice projects, but Entripy consistently meets the timelines that they provide me when I place my order. If you want quality product, great service, and a predictable experience - I highly recommend Entripy for custom clothing and swag.

Great service, Great products and very nice people! That's the best way to describe my experience with dealing with Entripy..They have been making custom shirts for our Michael Cusimano Volleyball Tournament for 9 years now and we will continue to order shirts for the foreseeable future.

For the past several years, my organization, the Pre-Business Students Network at the University of Western Ontario, has purchased our t-shirts from Entripy Custom Clothing. I am pleased to say that their product, service, delivery, and customer care have consistently meet our high standards and expectations. It is always a pleasure to purchase from Entripy, and I would like to personally thank them for always making this process as seamless and enjoyable as possible. My organization will continue to purchase from Entripy, and looks forward to doing business with them in the future.

10/10 customer service. Really impressed with Selby and the fast replies to my inquiries. Finally a Canadian t shirt printing company that makes things simple and fun. Can't wait to order more shirts.

STAY AWAY. Entripy is riddled with issues, from managment through to production. Although the salesperson was nice. Issues through out the entire process, my products had crooked logos/company names as well as embroidered the wrong size, 3 TIMES the wrong size. 6 hats were good. 6 t-shirts only 2 were delivered and had crooked logos/ company names. 6 high end shirts out of stock.1 hoodie was excellent. 1 week later when shirts were in stock 5 hoodies were added and I was told I now have to order 24 hoodies at $60 a piece in order to get hoodies.what am I gonna do with 24 hoodies? Unbelievable business practices. After many emails and frustration Entripy agreed to make me 5 more hoodies exactly like the first one. What I received wasn't even close! All shirts and the first hoodie have a 4" company name on the left chest and 12" across the back.they sent me new hoodies with a 12" company name right ACROSS the chest. Doesn't look professional when I have employees with all different logo designs. STAY AWAY from Entripy, THERE IS NO QUALITY CONTROL OR CARE that goes into the printing and embroidery into the products they sell.and their business practices are suspect. If you don't care what you get then this is the place for you. If you want it done right.BUY SOMEWHERE ELSE.
My company use to use another company to get our personalized t shirts and our orders were always late and sometimes not done right!.

Placed an order for custom caps. The order did not go through as smoothly as expected, but in the end, customer service and VP did a great job of making sure my satisfaction was met. Order took a little more time for processing than usual, but the quality of the product and price made it worth the wait. I will not hesitate to order again.

SUUUUUPER happy with them ! Customer service is top ! They have always made sure to always answer all my questions and accommodate me. Service is quick and simple. You are always notified of all changes. Quality is great and service is quick ! Ordered some t-shirts for our RED DAY at Keller Williams ConneXion ( Giving back to the community day) and was VERY happy with the experience. Thank you ! ** Selby at the customer service was always super helpful and positive, love when I can hear the person smiling over the phone !

The worst customer experience I've ever had! I am starting a new graphic tee store and submitted Entripy's wholesale request form on their website two weeks ago. After submitting the form, I followed up with their customer experience team to find out when I should expect to hear back about my application ‚Äì they told me the approval process takes a couple days (it actually took 2 weeks!). In addition to asking when my application would be approved, I also asked if they needed my Business License to validate that I was actually a business they said it wasn't required which was very surprising to me because all other suppliers that I have a wholesale account with (in both Canada & the United States) have required my business license and/or HST # to approve my application. While I was waiting for my wholesale application to be approved, I ordered one sample tee (at regular price) to see Entripy's quality for myself. I included a poly bag in my order so I could decide if I wanted to use poly bags when I ship to my customers. Sure enough my sample order arrived WITHOUT the poly bag. After 2 weeks of following up with Entripy's customer experience team several times, I was told that my wholesale application was not approved. I asked why my application wasn't approved and they wouldn't give me any more information other than ‚Äòmy application didn't meet the criteria'. If I don't know what the wholesale criteria is, how can I possibly consider Entripy as a future supplier when my business grows? It's very disappointing that Entripy doesn't support (all) aspiring entrepreneurs in the GTA!

I have ordered with Entripy several times and will continue to do so because of the excellent service, and product. I have nothing but great things to say about entripys service and product. What tops it off is what they do for the community. The #torontostrong t shirts for supporting the Toronto community after the tragedy was amazing. A great company can have excellent service and products. But an outstanding company can have the same and make an impact in the community. This is what puts entripy above the rest. I highly reccomend Entripy for any apparel!

Another great experience with Entripy..I ordered our Tournment merchadise through Entripy..The Sales Representative was great to work with. The merchadise turned out great..The colors were just as.expected and the logo designs (both the screen prininting on the t-shirts and the embroidery on the hats) came out perfect..And I received my order earlier than expected!.Will definately be using Entripy again. And again.

I own a wedding photo and cinema company in Toronto and came across Entripy's flyer in the mail. I worked with Natalie from the office and she was able to show me sample items in their showroom. I have placed many orders through them and always love the quality and look of their clothing. I will use them for sure in the future. I have also recommended them to my family and friends.

I was looking for a rush order and they were the only ones that had it, For and Extra $200 I was suppose to be done and shipped on July 31st, as per website.
I Paid the extra for rush and on Monday they proofed the digital copy. but there were some minor changes , I called them to try to expedite 3 times in 1 day to finish the proof but it was done, til the end of Monday the 29th, I told them if I can get it before I leave on Friday , the shirts were needed on a Friday, to make the ferry. I also said that if I cant be done, I dont want it anymore, cause I wouldn't make the event.
