at that time the scheduled completion date was Aug 1st (Thursday) I paid for the UPS saver shipping, (the fastest they had),
arrived after I left on Friday. Main thing was the Proof took 3h-5h,.per minor adjustment, minor as in adjust the size of the logo by a bit.

We have been using Entripy for a number of years now for many of our T-shirt and hoody needs. Our rep (Kiran) has always been great to deal with and is huge reason we continue to work with Entripy for our school designs.
Entripy are always responsive with short turnaround on their digital proofs so I know exactly what the end product will look like. Excellent quality, price and customer service! The Michener Institute

Jas and his team are great to work with. They try hard to meet the needs of their clients. I often have a modest budget to work with and we always find a product to fit my needs and price point. The staff (Kim et al) are helpful and efficient, friendly and easy to work with. The end product is always great and the process to get to it is smooth..Thanks for the help on our last order. I look forward to working with you again.

I ordered some promotional t shirts and chose the digital printing option. When they arrived, I was disappointed to see that the printing was more like a heavy plastic transfer than a print directly on the shirt (I have had shirts digitally printed in the past by CafePress and VistaPrint, and they both came out nicely, with the ink directly on the fabric, so that you cannot feel the design and the shirts drape nicely.) With the heavy plastic design, the shirts did not drape naturally, and the design area wrinkled in an ugly "folded" kind of way. Also, my design had been given a white outline around all parts, which made it look different than I had intended. I requested a reprint on a heavier t shirt, hoping that the difference in thickness between the fabric and transfer would be less noticeable, or if that wasn't possible, a refund. Entripy replied that they did not give refunds on customized clothing, and that a digital print on a heavier shirt would be the same as the ones I had received. Their suggested solution? That I order a new set of shirts, silk-screened, at "a one-time 15% discount off of that order". Apparently their way of making amends to an unsatisfied customer is to try to sell them more product.
I let them know that this was unacceptable, and have yet to hear back from them 9 days later. Seems their new tactic is to ignore me. I cannot in any way recommend this company to anyone. Next time I will go with VistaPrint. (I've also used VistaPrint for printing business cards, postcards, etc, and when I ran into problems a few times, they simply reprinted my order correctly in a timely fashion at no charge, with no hoops to jump through.)

Horrible job, poor quality‚ÄîNEVER ready when promised. Wasted my time driving hours away twice! They haven't managed to get the order correct no matter how many back and forths we have done. We gave them exact measurements multiple times and the second batch was missing items and items arrived burned by the press. This has been a waste of 5 plus weeks plus putting our business very far behind. Unreliable and poor quality. I wanted to invest in local but this isn't the right place to get it done correctly.

Placed an order for 45 shirts. Simple, 2-colour design. Over a dozen of the shirts were printed crooked or off-centre. Printer lines visible on some other shirts. And the first shirt I washed (cold water, hang dried) faded and looked like it was 6 months old in one day. I've purchased shirts from dudes working out of their basement that look better than these. Very disappointed and will be taking future business elsewhere.

Dealt with them more than a few times. While their prices can be higher than some other places, communication is good. Dont expect small shop help, everything costs at Entripy. Would def use them again for largers tshirt orders.

I have finally found a uniform company that provides exceptional service, great product selection, great prices and best of all - quick turnaround..I highly recommend Entripy, no matter how many or few items you need, Entripy is the place to order from.

Ordered a jacket online to surprise my husband with a branded piece of merchandise for a company he has started. Process was simple, easy and efficient. The jacket looked awesome and he was super happy.

Would never order from this place again. We ordered team hoodies and they forced us to change the colours and designs several times because they ran out of supplies. They rarely responded to our emails and we had to hunt them down to get our sweaters done. The season ended before we even got the final product.
Terrible quality of printing. The lettering is so faded you think it's ten years old and been in the washer and dryer 1000 times on high heat.

I was in a pinch to buy a bunch of shirts for a summer camp and I was thankful for their two rush options..Really easy process and really easy to work with..Sujeet was the first person I contacted and clearly explained the process..Everything worked out and the shirts were great..Thank you.

I have contacted Entripy for both personal and business use..The customer service was phenomenal every time..They respond quickly with accurate information and the turnaround time for products was short..I would definitely use them again.

I placed an order online for a school club and had the privilege of dealing with Matthew. Not only was the order delivered on time, the emroidery was very well done. I will definately be returning and highly recommend Entripy for your custom sweater orders!

Great website and easy to use custom design feature. Prices are great, service is quick and shipping is fairly priced. The reason I gave 4/5.is because very small details, like fine lines, do not print well.

Needed to get a sponsor logo printed on my team's soccer jerseys with only 72 hours before our first tournament. Entripy printed it and had it ready for pick up with a day and half to spare!.Perfectly done the first time. Extremely satisfied..Thanks Manny and your team!

Excellent customer service throughout the process. Finished shirts look great and exactly as anticipated. The women's shirts fit smaller than we thought they would - it would help to have a sizing guide.

I run a small business with my family and we have been using Entripy for our uniforms since 2010. We have always been extremely satisfied with the quality of the garments as well as with the service provided by their team. Thank you!

Shipping was delayed and they don't bother to update you or anything. I only found out because it was expected to arrive December 11th and no email of tracking or anything. Then spoke to a agent on chat support and they blamed it on covid 19. No apologies or anything

Amazing customer support!.The ONLY place I've found where you can use your logo and do the design yourself with added text. They helped to fine tune and make everything perfect. They have a great selection to choose!.So glad I found them!

When we needed a supplier to help us put together school supplies for underserved kids in our region, Entripy was our first call. Entripy stepped up immediately and enthusiastically and provided us with quality backpacks at a great price and with quick turnaround time. Now 100 kids in Peel Region have back-to-school supplies and we have Entripy to thank!

All in all , a good experience: Some mistakes on my end and some oversight on their end when this didn't completely implement my.documented change requests the first time but got it correct the 2nd request. T-Shirts are great . The website was a bit misleading with older details still on the page with newer updates--the whole page needs to be updated to reflect an adjusted order (Change of personalizations)

I placed a very small and very rush order and received absolutely fantastic service and the shirts were great! From my understanding, they had very large accounts but they still treated my tiny order with superior service!.What a great experience! Thank you!

Tried to order 11 Golf Shirts.It took 4 phone calls and them sending me the wrong items 3 times. Very poor. Tried to contact them directly to remedy and am still waiting since 10 days ago to hear anything at all. Terrible service, execution and customer relations.
Glad to receive my order 3 days earlier than planned. Items were in good condition. Surprised to see a bonus Raptors T-Shirt. Look forward to doing business again in the future.

Website is easy to use, however, it is very unreliable service. My order was guaranteed by a date, but was still pending two days after. The customer service was terrible. My questions were not answered and the reps seemed very uninterested.
Just got my Hats and Shirts. Look great!. Only issue was paying for express delivery and delayed due to UPS. They should consider a different carrier partner.
Products quality is good but one of the few companies that do not offer free shipping! In addition, the employees don't know how to fold clothes properly.

First time ordering with this company and chose them due to the positive reviews. Very disappointed when I received the order. The t-shirts are poor quality, very rough feeling and the employee's refuse to wear them because of the quality.

It was an interesting company. I had lots of fun while getting a tour through their facility. I would definitely recommend ordering from this company. The owner Jas is very professional looking and seems as though he has a lot experience.
Awful product. Logo was set up to be a crest on the front left side of the shirt, below the shoulder where they'd typically go..
We ordered the crew neck sweaters with our company logo on them and they turned out great! Fast and efficient service!

I.recently placed an order for 20.T Shirts for.our entire group since we are planning a camping trip .I was very happy.with the service ,quality
of fabric , price.and workmanship.of T Shirts . Truly outstanding and impressive job bu this company !
Had a few issues. But was amazed with their recovery..Products are good and website makes designing the tee shirt a breeze..Would definitely recommend.

order came extremely late, very cheap looking quality and custom print colour was not at all what was asked for in the proofs. the photos were not accurate. was not compensated well by customer service.
It was a true relief to have found Entripy for our custom clothing needs!.No other company has ever matched the level of customer service and delivery speed that Entripy offers.

AMAZING customer service. Worked closely with me to make sure that everything with my order was perfect and that I got exactly what I wanted. The online chat during the ordering process was very helpful and once ordered the manager in charge of my order got back to me quickly and efficiently with all the details.

"We are a very small business that is trying to re-brand and expand our customer base, so improving our image in direct interactions with customers is important to us. We decided to get some embroidered shirts for use at conferences and trade shows, and ultimately chose Entripy for the variety and quality of the garments they offered. The website was very easy to use, and after placing our order we were contacted promptly by a representative who converted our logo image to embroidery (including making some colour changes to ensure that certain elements stood out better on different coloured shirts) and provided proofs. We are pleased to say that the finished product is exactly as shown in the proofs, and the quality of the garments and embroidery is excellent, especially for the price we paid. We are very pleased and will certainly use Entripy again as we continue to grow our business."

This is the coolest facility I've been to. My buddy under me (Lucas Piatek) and I attended an extravagant trip to where our class went to their printing.facility in Oakville. It honestly is a cool experience. I'd recommend ordering their tees. Man, they got fair prices.ò¨.
Great customer service and quality..Selby helped with my order and everything was fast and efficient as promised..Will definitely use them again.
We ordered tshirts and tote bags for my coworking space, Eureka Hub. They look amazing. We are very happy with the end product.

Just completed my second order and I am as happy as the first time I ordered..Great company who has bridged the online ordering experience with client focused staff who actually answer the phone if you call.
Good service. Love the print. Came out better than expected! Was very fast. Only issue was the UPS delivery sucks going to my condo. Otherwise it was good.

Very happy with the product, price and service..Customer service is impecccable, website is easy to use and delivery is on time..What else do you need, will definitely recommend for your next swag needs.
Job well done and finished on time. Kay worked with me to make sure my design came out exactly how I wanted it. I recommend Entripy to anyone needing custom clothes or promo materials.
The artwork on the t-shirts turned out amazing. I received my order quickly and the entire service was smooth and accurate. Thank you!
Matthew from the client expertise team was great in helping me fix some issues with my order. He went above and beyond to make sure everything was right.
I had to order shirts for a bachelor party and i have to say the service i received was impressive..The quality of shirts was amazing and I will retain Entripy for future work I require.
I got 6 bachelorette t shirts made last month and they turned out great! The design and colours were exactly what I requested. Thanks Entripy!

Amazing customer service. Would definitely suggest to companies who are looking for custom uniform ordering. They take good care of all clients and the product results are in high quality and very durable.
Very impressed with the print quality and shirt quality. Would order again! Only issue was UPS required me to pick it up instead of delivering it.
I love the service at Entripy, they are my only choice for custom t-shirts. Great to see the full line of Jerzees product available!

Terrible customer service! I've ordered from them twice, both times the order has been late by more than a WEEK after I got the email confirmation saying it was shipped! we used Entripy for the first time and the costumer service was amazing!.Very happy with the products too!

"I was given a "volunteer" job to do which I thought may end up with 25 shirts being ordered. It ended up to be 200 t-shirts and hoodies. I looked on websites to find a supplier to do this order and chose Entripy. Firstly because it was a Canadian Company, and was in Oakville, Ontario. We started with the logo, then the number of pieces, then the pricing, the colours,the order input by Entripy, my approval, then the shipping of the product to¬†me. All this went very smoothly considering it was a first time for me doing this. They were so very patient with me and what I was trying to do. When the product was received it exceeded my expectations. There has been so much great feedback on the quality of the product and the placement and boldness of our logo. I would definitely recommend Entripy to anyone who is looking for good service and quality product."
Bad service. Sizing issue. Some are too loose n some are too tight and the customer care team blaims it on the customer. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY. BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE

Easy to use to set up custom shirts for our martial arts school and tournament. Fast service and great quality.
Thanks so much Entripy! High Heels Lo Fi are thrilled with our new toques - the quality was outstanding, the price was fair and the speed was fantastic!
Thank you, Entripy! It is always a pleasure working with you, and your timely communication and quick turnaround time make our job so much easier. Have a great weekend!
It was a smooth process and very effecient. The shirts turned out well as well.I'd just mention that the website is a bit slow at times, but otherwise smooth and user friendly.

This is probably the worst company i have ever dealt with. TERRIBLE customer service, terrible product.

Awesome quality, quick turnaround time and reliable communication. Awesome place to get your Tshirts custom printed.
Awesome product and the turnaround was unbelievable.even on my personal orders! Highly recommend!

Quick, easy, and affordable. I got exactly what I paid for, in a very timely manner. Thank you Entripy.

I went into the shop to make sure this is legit after seeing some bad reviews. Love my new t-shirts! They fit perfectly and are so soft. Excellent Customer Service too. Appreciate the help and follow-up with the shipment.

amazing quality and fit.  I am a t-shirt junky and have owned and tried too many t-shirts at this point. During my online ordering, I completely blundered. So, I linked with the sales staff who speedily fixed the errors I made. This order for both my son and myself was very extraordinary. whatever honest review me or you leaves here is gonna be covered by a nice comment from the owner defending his janky services. my friend ordered hats & it took over a month for him to get news on the order and around another month for him to receive an incomplete order. he told him it would take around 12 days.he basically took his order and told him they would start it next but then proceeded to do an order of 300 hats for someone else. he didn't hold his word. it might of only been a verbal agreement but, playing with your customers like this cannot go unnoticed. the lack of professionalism was never acknowledged & a discount wouldve been considered good customer service but, the owner clearly doesn't care all that much about his customers.i was a client myself multiple times over the years to print t shirts with DTG and, i had issues with them everytime.

Hey there! This is my favourite company so far.I have been ordering t-shirts from this company for a month now and they have never made any bad delivery.Their deliveries are always on time. Their fabric is also of best quality and this makes their t-shirts comfortable. Etshirt is such a great company which everyone should know about. If you know anyone who needs t-shirts of any design,just tell them of Etshirt, I promise you that he or she will not regret the decision of shopping here.

Etshirt offers the most amazing products. I am really so happy with the customer service. I made an order for 5hats and they arrived exactly three days after the order just like they promised. I found out about the website from a friend who purchased custom made t-shirt and it was fabulous and a great fit. Their methods of printing that uses DTG printing, sublimation and embroidery stands out and stands the test of time which makes me wonder why the prices are so low and affordable for work that good, I mean $3.19 for printing on a plain white shirt is the cheapest I've ever seen and probably the cheapest we may ever get to see. So which begs your question why do I want the rest of the world to patronize the ETshirt brand? Simple, because I feel good work must always be appreciated.

We had left a first comment, under the account of one of our employees.
A representative of the company went to our offices, indicating that he wanted to meet the employee without informing us in advance of his arrival. We wonder how this representative found the employee's work address. Our management received the representative. He asked that the employee withdraw the comment but was in favor of leaving a comment on behalf of the organization. The representative asked that they be given a chance for future collaboration. As requested, we removed the first comment (in the name of the employee) and we reiterate our disappointment, given that we asked her to identify herself the representative did not have a business card and when we asked for explanations about the order, he told us that the manager of ETshirt, on the move in Italy, could not receive either the internet or the telephone. In short, it seemed complicated. It is for this reason, dear Mathieu from ETshirt, that our relationship is not a guarantee of quality. Thus we leave the comment on behalf of the organization.

TLDR version: stop reading this review and go to the store to get your tshirt made by this team. No negatives

Full review: had an order come in from a supplier on Amazon for a one off custom t-shirt. It was a grey shirt with black block letters; pretty easy ask. When it arrived, a couple letters were randomly missing in the string of text and one letter was also damaged, and not fully printed.

Went into the store and: 1) amazing customer service, including great conversation 2) they saw the issue and under 5 minutes had the solution and already printed onto the t-shirt (they have customer facing monitors so you can see them doodling up your request; was a great feature) 3) smiling customer

I have had bulk orders made or other custom jobs in the past. This was the cleanest, easiest, and best experience hands down.

conclusion: I may need to figure out how to need more custom t-shirts made just to go back and watch a fully vetted shop work from beginning to end.

Original rating 3 stars - Easy to work with them and quick service..Note that online prices are lower than in store..If I were to order again I would do the following - request that all t-shirts are the same exact style and that they are all printed on the same printer..In my order of 18 shirts I received three different versions of the women's shirts, one not particularly high quality and slightly different sizing..Half of the shirts were bright, glossy colours and the other half were like faded concert tees..Since I was ordering for specific people that wouldn't be comparing shirts this was acceptable for me but it was wasn't ideal..These two issues were not annoying enough to ask for reprints..Given that Freshly Baked Tees were the cheapest custom tees I could find and they met the deadline I would consider ordering from them again but I would be more specific in any future orders..Also note that the sizes fit VERY small - make sure you review the measurements provided.
Updated to 2 stars - worked with them again Dec 2022..Very frustrating experience..They lost my order and wouldn't help me when I dropped off my shirts to be printed (learned my lesson from last time and bought my own shirts)..They are very polite people and nice but organization is not their strong suit..I did another order at T-Shirt Guys and they were amazing.
C: Freshly Baked Tees Custom Printed Tshirts

He translated our vision onto the T-shirt and was committed to delivering a high quality product. He kept checking with us at every step of the process that we understood and that we were satisfied with the final product. He did a terrific job! This company really believes in making the customer happy and delivering a customized product. The T-shirt is the best quality as is the production of the image. The silk screening is topnotch. Thank you! We will definitely be returning for more T-shirts.

This is by far the most extensive tshirt printing company available in the lower mainland and definitely North Vancouver. Their staff members are pleasant to deal with, competent and readily available. Their willingness to provide me with swift image file modifications, suggestions, and concise estimates without any hesitance made the tshirt printing company process easy and less of a headache I expected. Their website is well optimized, with extensive content that thoroughly lists their products available, and gives you options to customize and generate your own estimates which I found very convenient. I appreciate all the work they've done and give them a bonus star for getting my project done a week ahead of schedule. In terms of quality these guys deliver.
Big thanks to Andrew for taking lead on my project and his patience with me. Pricing was very reasonable and transparent.

Get Bold was super helpful and efficient in helping our NGO create t-shirts for our international team..They were available to chat online which was a wonderful way to help me through the process of selecting our merchandise and customizing it..Thank you for your great work!

GetBold has been helping our company with promo merch for years and the service can't be beat. Fast service, easy to use website and super helpful live chat options are my favourite things about working with them. Lots of options for product depending on your price point.
Excellent detail, order was done perfect and the wait time was minimal. Can't Recommend another march shop. Ronnie is fast and efficient.

GetBold was absolutely fantastic to work with. I am so happy with how this unfolded from beginning to today when we got them and can't wait for 2 weeks from now. when we give them to staff & students. Very, very happy and will order with them again.

I have nothing but good things to say about GetBold. All of the staff, especially Andrew, have been fantastic to work with. Communication has been prompt, they have been patient with my (sometimes constant) questions and changes, and they have gone above and beyond with a couple of special requests. They have been early on every timeline and the quality of product is exactly what we hoped for.

We plan to continue to use GetBold for all of our apparel needs in the future and will recommend them to other chapters within our charity organization. Our experience has been exceptional.
The Customer Service was amazing. They walked me through the whole process. The prices were also more than reasonable. I would reccomend this company to anyone.

GetBold was super easy to work with. Phone and email communications were quick, team members were super helpful, and ordering was a breeze - plus a crazy fast turnaround time. My order looks amazing and I'll definitely be using them again next time I need screen printing. Would definitely recommend!

Fantastic service and merchandise..From start to finish my experience with the GetBold team was both professional and friendly. I was very impressed by this store's high rating for the amount of reviews it has, and I can confirm that it is very well deserved. I went in with a PNG file on a USB stick around 11am on a Saturday, hoping to get a custom mug made for a friends' birthday the same evening. They told me it would be ready in 20-30m, so I had a coffee and came back. When I returned, the mug had printed with a couple of issues. One of the colours wasn't showing up at all, and the image itself came out looking very compressed. The staff were super friendly and helpful, however, and we spent a little bit of time troubleshooting together on Photoshop (I had designed the image to be printed myself). After that, they spent about half an hour tinkering with their printer to figure out why the colour wasn't coming through for me. In the end, they were able to solve the issue, and they even went through 3 mugs for me until it was just right. I would have felt bad, but they were so kind and assured me that it wasn't a problem at all. I left with a nice product printed in great quality with all the right colours, and even with the issues that we encountered, the entire process only took about an hour.Quality product, reasonable prices, wonderful service :)

The service and price do not match the quality of goods. Let me elaborate.I walked in to get a logo printed on a polo for our company. The logo print and shirt cost 45$ + tax (you can find online for 10$ if you are willing to wait 3-4 days shipping with better quality shirts). The logo was too much on the left pectoral section of the shirt that it would fall into the crease of the armpit. The manager/owner agreed to redo the shirt at zero cost and on a medium shirt instead of small. At the same time, I brought in two shirts of my own to have the same logo printed. Mid way through printing the logo on the two shirts I provide, the manger tells one of his clerks that they need to make me sign a form consenting that if the material is not 50% cotton/50% polyester they can not guaranty the quality of the print, and that the merchant can no be held responsible..I do not sign the form, the clerk messes up one of the logo (confesses it's their wrong doing but informs me I've consented even though I did not sign the form). I get home to find out the logo printed on the medium shirt they have redone has the same issue, the logo is too much on the left instead of being 1 inch from the button line (as requested). I am confused on the lack of standardization and know how for a company who's clerks do the same work everyday. Will gladly change review if they agree to remaking logo.

I arrived at the store yesterday afternoon to have a Christmas present made for someone close to me. It was a zipper hoodie with a small print on the front and a large one on the back. I placed my order then went to eat something. I came back and was told that there was an mistake made and it was being corrected. That was fine.mistakes are human. Then I was asked if I wanted a white border around the back print. I gladly accepted. But then when I was shown the finished product, the white border was an irregularly broken white line around the back logo. It doesn't look good. One employee offered me a T-shirt as compensation. No replacement hoodie was offered. I refused the T-shirt since I had to make it home and travel many hours to see some family before Christmas. I could have mailed the hoodie to my loved one after Christmas once the replacement was ready. That's my issue. I paid 75$ for something I was completely dissatisfied with and I was offered something that was worth half of what I paid. The staff was polite and courteous, but I'm very frustrated and won't return there.

STAY AWAY FROM THIS BUSINESS. I've never ever write down negative reviews but I had this on my mind for too long. First of all the idea of shirt printing is very nice and simple but Instacustoms is not a destination for that, they will take away all the pleasure and happiness behind this concept and give you a hectic experience. I've witnessed numerous gimmick and unsatisfied clients in this store but always kept silence about it. I've done hundreds of shirt and spent thousand of dollars with this company and I still had a disgusting customer service from time to another. I've been working in the printing industry my entire life. The quality of instacustoms is great but the staff often remains unqualified due to poor and inadequate training. I wouldn't blame the staff at all because they are very sweet, polite and simply do their job. The lack of training is probably due to the high rotation of employees occurring because of the heinous administration. I would blame the sickening owner of this business. He's characterized as a poorly raised, rude and disrespectful person. He does not care about you nor your product and will make you go away to save a buck!.*** ps: look at my pictures attached***

This place has a really good rating so I called to get some information. I spoke with Nick, asked him several questions and was told to "go check the website" for all my questions. To be honest, this is a very disappointing service. If a customer walks into the store and asks some questions, would you tell him to go check on the website? Being busy with a lot of customer does not justify your inability to answer simple questions over the phone. You could very well explain your situation such as "I would love to answer your questions but I am currently really busy with other customers, so it would be best to look for these information on our website." instead of "Hey sir, go check our website." All I am trying to convey is that the "service" I received was far from what the reviews say. Maybe I would've gotten a better response if someone else answered the phone instead and you would've had an extra customer.

I visited Instacustom a few months ago in order to create samples for a company I am trying to start. My first experience with the company was good in general and the product they provided us was interesting. As we were satisfied with the sample we adapted our designs and returned to make new samples of the final product, which was also nice, but quite expensive to be honest as I am a student. When ordering the official product in larger quantity my experience got a lot less pleasant. After putting over 500$ in their product for tests, the designs were now considered complex, the prints were now considered oversized and too time consuming for them. In other words, I wasted a lot of time and capital. Also, I was kind of surprised as they claim to be able to ‚Äúput whatever you want onto whatever your heart desires. We accept all types of orders so don't be shy. There is no order that is too big or too small.‚Äù Therefore, I was disappointed with my experience with them.

Please avoid this place at all costs! The manager just tried to hit me!. I actually can't believe this happened! I brought a couple shirts I needed to print that I bought at Costco and they screwed one (the printing was noticeable disaligned and after trying to fix it, the shirt burned in some parts). They offered to give me a t-shirt but I needed a shirt which they don't sell. When I told them I needed the shirt replaced somehow, the manager came in and started yelling that the burning was some chemicals on the shirt and that the whole problem would be solved when I wash the shirt. He then lost his mind. He threw the shirts at me,.punched the table and started calling me offensive names and actually came from behind the counter to hit me! I then got scared and went to the exit. Some people passing by where intrigued about what was happening and I just started telling them what just happened. Then I look back and see the guy just coming back at me again, actually chasing me! It was until I got into the metro that the guy went back to the store, always yelling at me and insulting at me.

I am more impressed than angry at this point. How come a customer-facing store is able to survive with such an aggressive manager?
