This is a fun and eclectic store full of unexpected and unique items.

The store is packed, yet organized in a comfortable view. The store is well-lit which conveys cleanliness. Staff are friendly but not intrusive.

One area of interest is their on site embroidery service. There is a staff member at this area at all times.

What an awesome addition to Granville Island's atmosphere!

If you like stuff and things, this place is for you. Shirts, hats, socks, nick nacks, mugs, books. It is a decent sized store with easy access and lots of paid parking outside. Prices are fair even though it's located in a tourist spot. Even if you don't buy something, you'll have fun looking around.

Great gift shop at Granville Island that sells an assortment of knick knacks, gifts, t-shirts and items from popular TV shows and media.

There is also a customized engraving and stitching service that can make your gifts more special located at the back. This service does require a reservation ahead of time.

My company had a number of jackets embroidered by Make on Friday and I must say they did a great job! Megan helped design our logo into an embroidery file and worked with us to get a great look. We look forward to working with the Make team again soon!

I like the quality of their T-shirts and their customer service is above and beyond! I've made 3 sets of gifts with them. For this last project which I did online, they found and sent me a proof to approve with a better, higher resolution of the image I was using. And when I picked it up, the shirt looked great but the t-shirt sizing ran small (the gift I was making would not fit my sister). The manager helped me find a better size and reprinted for me- no charge!

Wow! I just printed a shirt with Make online and had specific instructions/time frame I needed it for and the customer service was AMAZING! Such an incredible team. So very very helpful! This is my first experience with Make but I will definitely be a repeat customer! Thank you Make! You guys rock:).

Ordered some custom gifts for Christmas last year and they went over very well! They also have a lovely shop and tons of funky local gifts and things. Only complaint is that my order took longer than expected and nobody called to say when it was ready. I'm sure it was an accidental oversight.

This place is amazing! I needed some shirts printed super quickly and they did it the same day, I even needed to adjust the order and they accommodated me! I cannot say enough about how friendly the staff is and how great they did!
Thank you MAKE!

This place should be better known.

MAKE is a great option for when you want to give a personalized gift, or put your design on a standard household item. You could buy a generic item from the internet, or just make your own for a similar price.
We love this store! So many amazing gifts. Always great customer service. We bought some t-shirts and books.

A very well organized and bright store! They carry clothing items, mugs, kitchen ware, jewellery and fun things!

We had a great time looking around and picking out things we liked! I especially liked their jewellery collection. There were quite a few pieces I liked and their pricing is reasonable compared to some of the other stores!

So if you're in this area, I'd recommend checking this store out!

Expensive and incompetent staff. I do not recommend this place for embroidery.

Placed an order for embroidery of 3 Christmas stockings and it was a negative and frustrating experience. Got my stockings back without embroidery and a brown spot on the cuff.

After taking 10 minutes to place a straightforward order (which somehow required 3 different staff members to chime in and me repeating myself multiple times), I paid the whopping $80..I was quoted $24 in the email it the gal didn't clarify that the fee was PER stocking. Then I was asked to sign a waiver that absolves MAKE if they somehow screw up the project. not exactly a vote of confidence.

I'm told my order will take 14 days, not the 5-7 days that I was told.via email 12 hours earlier..I shake off it off, sign the form because I don't have time to look at other places.

The next day I receive an email (without an apology I might add) that they can't embroider the stockings and that I can come pick them up!

**What should have happened: The staff should have inspected the stockings on my first visit to determine if the project was feasible.

Three people gathered around the counter and not one person could do the intake professionally.. A waste of my time, no embroidered stockings and a lot of unnecessary frustration.

Upon pick up, I had a similar experience.. No less than FOUR people . One to initially talk to me, one to find the Xmas stockings, one to refund what I paid, and a 4th person to come talk to me to ask ‚Äúdoes this require any further resolution?‚Äù..I could not believe she said that.. No one was contrite or felt bad about the inconvenience or hassle. The ambivalence was a turn off. I get to the car , notice a brown spot that was not previously on any of the stockings..Do not embroider here.

MY COMMENT TO OWNER'S REPLY POSTED DEC. 2/2022:

I'm not entirely clear on what MAKE Vancouver means by "setting the record straight". My account is accurate and honest and already corroborated by MAKE staff in writing, which I've pasted below. Contrary to your reply, your team already acknowledged via email that they dropped the ball and were 100% at fault.

Following are the emails from your team, admitting MAKE's error pasted below.

MAKE Vancouver Email Responses - Nov. 29/2022:

#1:
Hi Maria,

Yes 100% we should have spotted this issue and we recognise the inconvenience of having to come back to the shop to collect the incomplete order.

#2:
After reviewing your stockings with our production team & management we have identified some issues that were overlooked by the team yesterday when you were in. As you know our main talking point was getting the sizing correct for you so I think this is why this happened. The issue is because of the way the stocking is sewn we can not embroider it to the standards we usually would. As a work around we did look at embroidering it differently but the metallic detailing on the stocking would affect the embroidery quality which we are not comfortable with.

So unfortunately we will not be able to continue on with this order for you. We would be concerned that the end product would not be up to our standards and embroidering the stockings could lead to damaging them.

We will obviously refund you the full amount ($80.64).when you come to collect them.
Megan.
Embroidery Coordinator

***MAKE: Pls don't change the story to say I was confused, didn't understand, or that you were helping me, when it was the other way around. I offered several solutions including abbreviated names, printing the names on paper to confirm fit, staying until your team was sure, and asking your team what they needed to fulfill the order. Your team, all 3, said they were too busy to confirm the size and fit, yet they were all just standing there. It's very unfortunate that you are deflecting and can't simply apologize.

Moreover, you did not do me a favour to accommodate an early pickup. Rather, I upheld you to your original promise of a 5-7 day turn-around stated via email 2x: "It takes about 5-7 days to complete stocking orders."
I had a custom printed t- shirt with them recently. Their print out very fast, and fast respond in email and good services.

I just want to say how amazing my first experience with you has been. The website was very easy for me to use to create a custom product. I made these shirts for my best friends bachelor party and they turned out perfectly. As well I was extremely impressed with the speed of production and delivery. I ordered them and received them 3 days later. Fantastic service, great quality and very reasonable pricing. I will absolutely be shopping with you again and will recommend your company to my friends.

We went to this store on our last day in Vancouver. Their products were reasonably priced and tons of souvenirs to choose from. My daughters bought their Adrian Klis bags at the Capilano Suspension Bridge gift shop and I found mine in this shop. I was so happy to have found that they have the crossbody bag that suited my style. The owner (or so we assumed) was very friendly and was chatting with customers, he complimented my choice of Adrian Klis bag and showed us his own wallet and how the leather will turn out after a few years. I have read that bison leather develops a nice patina over time which makes each purse or wallet unique, and it's so interesting how smooth and nice his wallet turned out.
I have been using the bag eversince, I love it and I love the smell of leather! Honestly, I never thought leather could smell so good!.We probably would have bought more items if we were not travelling with carryon only. I highly recommend to visit their store if you go to Granville Island, you would not leave the place with an empty hand.

We are SO happy with how our company branded bottles turned out! The team at MAKE is excellent and they really came through for us on this order. We highly recommend choosing this friendly and helpful local shop for your next company branded merch order! Thank you very much, MAKE!

*Edit* I was reached out to by the MAKE staff and had a nice phone call with someone who I assume is the owner. She told me that the issue I had with the custom work was unavoidable as the material used in the process could only be as dark as it was and could not be made lighter. She also offered to help me replace the wallet with a different one for a discount if my sister did not like it. Therefore I would like to ammend my review and score with this new information. I would like to once again extoll the virtues of MAKE's wonderful staff. *Edit*

If I wrote this review after my first visit there I would give them 5/5 stars for their fantastic help and patience regarding my order. I went there just a week before Christmas and even though it was clearly very busy and late in the day I was able to find a perfect wallet for my sister, as well as work with their embroidery department in finding a custom image for it to be special.

Unfortunately, after picking up the wallet and giving it a look I realized that the thread that they used to write her name down was the same colour as the wallet itself, making it almost impossible to see unless you look closely. I am not criticizing their work, the shape and size are exactly what I was looking for, but I wish I could actually read the text.

I realized that it was messed up as soon as I took a close look at it. There is not enough time I think between now and Christmas to have them fix the issue so I suppose I will be wrapping it as is for her present. My only wish is that they had perhaps called/left a message letting me know about the issue with the black wallet/black thread. I gave them my number when I dropped the wallet off at the embroidery department so it would not have been hard for them to give me a quick call/text asking me if I wanted to switch from black to white thread, or something like that.

Like I said this review has nothing to do with the service and actual product. I still think the wallet looks nice (at least I hope my sister will think so) and the employee's at the store were incredibly nice. I have attached some photos to this review in order to show off my complaint. In order to be as fair as I can be I have taken them in my lightbox so that they can be seen easier.
What a great store and idea. Very impressed with the staff who are ready to help you create. The service is remarkable with lots of supplies.
This was probably our favorite store on Granville Island. Lots of cool stuff and unique apparel. Cool vibe too. Staff is very nice and helpful.
Such a cool store! An amazing variety of items from creatives and some very funny products in there as well. Sure to get you some Christmas gifts off your list!

MAKE, in Granville Island, has become a destination for anyone interested in original decorating ideas, and if you are a tourist visiting the area, Canadiana & souvenirs. That said, MAKE is a one-stop shop for your business & personal promotional materials. Bring your corporate logo or idea, they can get it embroidered on baseball hats, t-shirts, hoodies, or other articles. Complementary to this, they provide printing services (business cards, brochures and a long etc.). Stop by, there's plenty of originality here!

Excellent service! I've created custom gifts two years in a row here and I have been thrilled with the finished products both times. The staff, especially those that have worked on my embroidered items, are fantastic,.going the extra mile to create gifts that are really special..I will definitely use them again in the future!

Cool place to get custom designs printed (that doesn't have to be a bulk order). Their customer service is responsive and friendly, but I had a small issue with my custom order of tea towels. Went to pick up an order placed online, and one of the towels had these black lines on the inside - very glaring against the white if it was opened up. I asked if it would come off in the washer and they weren't sure, so said they'd re-print and it would be ready in a few days. I had to make a second 30+ minute trip out to pick up the re-print as mailing it to me would have cost money. I wasn't thrilled about the additional trip, but the towels and coasters themselves turned out nice and are of decent quality!

Just wish there was a bit more quality control in checking the towels before telling customers their order is ready for pick-up (in case there are ink issues). I had even emailed for pictures ahead of time, which they kindly sent, but just of the design and not the whole towel. Would still recommend for custom items!
I love visiting this store whenever we come by to Granville island, full of creative items.

I placed my order yesterday afternoon and got an email this morning to pick up my order (super fast!) When I went into the store, the layout was really efficient with many products displayed which you can use to print. The quality of the printing was great as the colours were very vibrant. Highly recommend for digital artists looking to design merch!

Great gift shop packed to the gills with gifts for everyone in the family. Lots of funny stuff, clothing, unique gift ideas and pop culture merch. I wish I could go back so I could take a longer look. Happy friendly staff and a bright atmosphere. Make sure to stop in next time you're shopping on Granville Island.

The cutest shop with fantastic employees. I needed some embroidery done on a denim jacket I own. We had a lot of back and forth as I changed my mind about placement òÇ I never felt I was being inconvenient or asking too much. Our final design is amazing! One of the best parts is they keep your embroidery digitized files forever, so you can keep adding them to things as you want down the road. They do no minimum quantity orders as well as production scales. I can't sing their praises enough tbh and can't wait to embark on other projects!

Lots of fun gift ideas.
Also a great place to print shirts or get custom embroidery.
A while back I got large.patches for my toddlers friends that said "east van tykes" for some jean vests.

I used to get great service last year, however, the new girl that works in the embroidery payed no attention to my requests..When I came in for a refund, I got charged twice on my debit card. What else can go wrong here!.I will take my money somewhere else.

I can't in good conscience give the store 5 stars. Basically don't order from here if you need something done within a week. First sale person lost my order, second sales person lost my package. Talk to the manager and they were able to get my mask in time for Halloween, but it took 3 people to get it right. The mask I order looked better then expected and was of good quality. Will be ordering again soon but hopefully with better results.

10/10 shop at this local business. Not only are their goods curated with love, adventure,
and style, their customer service is impeccable. 100% must stop in if your in the area. I can't wait to come back.

BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE! I received a call and email and the staff were lovely. They may be having a problem with their phone system and really resolved this order. I will be purchasing from them again!

RESOLVED: Designed a beautiful sweater but there was a large darker square of the treatment used to make the design that is not going away after washing the sweater.
I can't seem to get a hold of Make over the phone. I tried taking the sweater back but was assured the sweater's shaded box would go away after washing the sweater per the instructions but this is not the case. Does any one have any advice on how to get ride of the treatment square?

Fantastic customer service..I place an order in a rush and they have exceeding my expectations..Spoke with two different staff for assistance and both are extraordinary.
The matching father and son custom t-shirt turns out absolutely perfect..It is a gift and he loves it.
I would definitely be back for more custom products.

Thank you MAKE team òä

I placed an order in store for the embroidery the 20th of october. i was told it would ready today the 1st of nov after 2pm. When i came to pick up the order was not ready because the font size was far much bigger that what asked. And accirding to the lady i spoke to they were unable to make it that size. Nobody contacted me despite the fact that i left my details. I had a refund. Anyway the birthday gift is now a failure. I do not it recommend
Crazy, creative stuff from wall to wall. Very friendly staff. For a small store, you could spend a while here.

I highly recommend going through Make to get your custom clothing. I primarily dealt with.Alejandra, who was absolutely wonderful to deal with! The process was so easy, and communication was clear and fast (something many other companies struggled with). My custom hats were done and shipped so quickly, and they look amazing! I will be ordering more items through them in the future.

I was really just dropping in to pickup some t-shirts I had ordered from Ole but spent a few minutes wandering around the store. They have an assortment of odds and ends. Fun to look at everything. I should have said, there is a great selection of odds and ends and some really great and different items plus clothing! Plus, as busy as the store was, a very pleasant sales associate helped me with my pickup.

Friendly Helpful staffing. Even when busy, staff will find you to be sure you find what you are looking for. A welcoming atmosphere My daughter and I experienced on our first visit two years ago. This always interesting shop maintains a must drop by while visiting Granville Island almost every visit there. The variety of stock is amazing while staff is a main portion of our wanting to visit time and again. Take care of your selfs staffers during this troubling time and see you soon.

Make provides excellent Customer Service. I arrived with towels to be embroidered with names and logos. Baby presents, Holiday presents, and present for newborn twin girls. The staff at Make have so much patience and are so knowledgeable..They worked with me with the colours of thread, offering suggestions.and.spent time to discuss the many logos available in their book. How tall will they be? Should it be placed here on the towel, or maybe here? No question was too big or too small.
By mistake, the colours on one of the towels was placed wrong.
Courtney, the Manager phoned me to apologize and offer to correct the error.
I continue to order embroidery work from Make.
The recipients of the gifts from Make are always pleased .
Try their work. You will be pleased with the Customer Service and the finished product.
Make is my ,‚Äùgo to‚Äù place for that unique, personable item.

I ordered a special T-shirt for my wife..I looked at her clothes at home and they were mostly size S with a few M's..The person at the store said that I should go with an M because they were a bit undersized.

My wife opened the box on Christmas day and gasped..She said this must be a child's size even though the tag said "Ladies medium"..We returned to the store with one of her medium T-shirts that was noticeably much larger..We were very happy with their customer service, they acknowledged that sometimes the label doesn't accurately reflect real world sizes..The promptly made us another T-shirt..It is size.XL and it's a nice fit.

We are so happy that the staff handled it as they did..Excellent customer service.

I recently gave a low review as a result of an email not being answered..The day after the manager emailed me personally to apologize for the lack of response..Her and the team went out of their way to not only make sure to design my shirt for me, but also offered to make it for me free of charge..I felt a little guilty accepting the offer but I appreciate that they did all this for me and went way above and beyond what they had to do..They had it done for me in less than an hour and the workmanship was perfect. It was like they knew what I wanted more than I did..I've had them design various items for me in the past and have never been anything but 100 percent happy with the quality of work..I will continue to go here and would reccomend them to anyone looking for custom t-shirts and anything else of the sort.

Working with the team at MAKE was such a great experience! I made a bulk order of custom masks for members within my organization, and they were so great to work with. The turn around time was super speedy and the communication was excellent! Not to mention, the masks were beautiful! Would definitely recommend and will use again! Thanks MAKE!
Very fun items, found some nice cheap stuff ar clearance bins too.

I had a new dad with a birthday emergency and Make came through..They printed a very sweet photo of dad and baby on a T-shirt and a mug in four hours. FOUR HOURS!.I'm sure that is not always possible, but I am so grateful for their cheerful speedy service. Thank you Phaedra!

If I could give 6 stars, I would. Terrific customer experience at Make, including fast email responses to my queries, next-day scheduled appointment, and efficient and friendly service from 4 different staff members that yielded two great products (one embroidered, one printed). Couldn't be happier with my shopping experience. Thanks much, Make!

Went here for the first time today to get some custom buttons made. Fiona was very quick to assist me, and was really nice to have some casual small talk with while she made them up for me. I felt very comfortable browsing around, a very casual calm atmosphere and I never.felt like I was pushed or pressured into buying anything. The very reasonable prices (only about 8 dollars for four buttons) and the very genuine, warm and casual customer service I received here today will ensure that I will definitely be back!

I love this store so much. Whether you're visiting Vancouver or have lived here for a while, this store contains some great novelty items and creative fun and strange gifts for those you care for. If you have never been I'd go check it out at least once. You can also create custom T-shirts for like 30 or 40 dollars. They're pretty good quality too. While you're at it, I also really liked the Front & Company's novelty shop on Main Street. I've bought lots of gifts for friends from both locations.
If your a tourist, this is a great spot to buy souvenirs and fairly priced!

Love the gals from the printing department at Make!.My father in law is running the BMO Marathon so I had some "Team Tim" T-shirts made for the family who will be at the finish line. Now I am not the most creative person in the world, so I had some help from the girls in the store to pick a really awesome font and design. In the end, they helped me design shirts that looked super cool and way better than any regular shirt that I've seen in other printing places..The choice of fonts and types of shirts available are what made the big difference. Not only did the shirts turn out great, but they were also done within 15 minutes..When I said that my parking time would be up soon, the girls who were helping me with the order understood and were able to do the three shirts on the spot for me. I was so thankful!
Great store, great staff, and great printing..Can't wait to do my next order!.Definitely recommend!

Special thanks to Yasir for the speedy turnaround & help w my custom laser engraved notebook. I love the diverse selection of brands and friendly staff, thanks to Yasir, Meg, & Nicole for a great experience!

Spent the day at Granville Island and walked into the Make store. We spent over an hour there looking at all their neat and different merchandise! Customer Service Representative Hannah gave my friend and I excellent customer service, and I felt like we had made a new friend by the time we left the store with our purchases. Highly recommend and stop by say hi to my new friend Hannah!

Prices are competitive and people are super nice in-store and over the phone.
Brilliant customer service: they helped with the online ordering which included finding, sizing and uploading an image. This made me place a quick, local custom order instead of looking at ordering existing stock with questionable fit and availability from someplace else.
Placing the order was straightforward, item was delivered exacly as ordered and on-time in just 3 days.

This store is really cool. It has a little bit of everything, but it's a bit expensive. They have some really cool accessories for yourself and your house. Books, bags, shirts, sweaters, mugs, notebooks, cutting boards. they have it all. I definitely recommend coming here if you are at Granville Island.

This shop is the place to be on Granville Island!

There is something for literally anyone, buying presents for relatives and friends here is so easy, even if they're really fussy, you can get almost anything personalised, so why not?
The staff are always smiling and welcoming, informative and also put you at ease in case you're doing any last minute gift shopping too. I had a t-shirt made at the 'Mighty' Prints station at the back in which I could pick 100's of options, or bring in my own photos/ designs too! I had this amazing yawning cat done with a strawberry patterned background, the colours are crazy vivid and I have washed it quite a few times now, no difference whatsoever to the shirt! I can't wait to create another shirt in store and also bring my mum a hilarious tea towel as a souvenir that's a unique design from the creators in store.

Over-all a wonderful experience and would recommend for anyone to pay a visit too, really fun and interactive.
Thanks Make!

The mighty printing on customing garment item is a smart idea! And it works most of the time. What I mean is that some times there will be a lot of unprinted areas because of some folded areas on the shirt. But the result of the printing looks nice! I love using their customizing functions. I'm still exploring!

Excellent custom-printing services and really great, knowledgeable staff. Have had around a dozen short-run projects printed here (on shirts, journals, etc) and am always happy with the results. Being located on Granville Island I initially presumed services would be more tourist-centric but they offer a range of printing options I haven't found anywhere else..Turn-around times have also been great. Will keep coming back!
They helped me out with custom work and were super helpful

Been going to MAKE for the past 4 years and it's so easy to get lost in all of the unique items they have. From clothing to jewelry to fun conversational pieces, it's definitely a go to place for gifts and items to have at home. Wish they had a location in Toronto!

T-Shirts are hilarious! .and if the color or size doesn't suit you, they'll print you a new one in a couple of minutes. Lots of other cool stuff to buy, sold to you by a fun staff. Always worth a visit!
This is a fun store with lots of unique and custom gifts. Lots of fun pop culture items.

I am replacing my original review with this because Floor Manager Courtney took the time to personally contact me to rectify the issue I had. She showed excellent customer service, acknowledgment, and professionalism. That means a lot to me. Very much appreciated. Thank you.
Always one of my favourite stores to visit when in the area. So many fun products by artists worth supporting!

I hadn't been here in a long time and decided to stop in and I felt really uncomfortable. The message that a lot of their products are conveying is extremely divisive and I don't think that's what we need right now.

Unique and hand merchandise available that would make a great gift for someone. They also have some sustainable/recycled material products with some purchases resulting in trees being planted! Very cool store.

I recently had occasion to use Make Vancouver's embroidery services for some corporate work. From initial contact via email, to in-person consultation and test sew out, the team there were wonderful. The final product was beautifully done and really had dimension. I highly recommend you check them out. Make Vancouver is so much more than embroidery, and it's worth a visit to this very unique store and all they have to offer.

The staff here is great even when they are swamped.

There is always something to spend money on and it's fun to window shop.

Have made some great t-shirts here and found countless gifts.

Parking at Granville Island is not always easy but if you can be patient you will find a spot.

MAKE came in first place when I needed custom embroidered polo shirts in time for a conference. Working on a tight timeline and I only need a few shirts (2-3), no one else in Vancouver would work with me due to limited time and qty. The whole process from start to finish was smooth. Yvonne and team in the embroidery department worked with me to ensure I liked the mock up and got these done in time. The quality and care is top-notch. Also, bonus that they are open on the weekend. Thanks!

Just tried this company this year and have been thoroughly impressed!.The customer service is top notch, something you don't see nowadays..I will always recommend this company!.Thank you MAKE Vancouver!
Beautiful place. Fantastic job and top notch quality

Had worked overtime to place a big order did not receive any updates so we assumed all was good, then we went out of town and our bank flagged a large transaction so cheque was blocked which our banker can confirm. We came back.only to find Stacy Nicole Hall the Business Owner wrote on our consignment business page and google review an awful unprofessional review without even resolving the matter with us. This is completely unprofessional and a bad case of slander as the order had NOTHING to do with our consignment business! She had disclosed private information on her disgusting review as well which is beyond comprehension from a business perspective! We also never received an email from them regarding this matter so we were absolutely NOT aware that there was even a problem with our order! We sent an email the day we returned after hearing msgs from our bank regarding a suspicious large transaction that needed our verification which we failed to verify on time so we immediately advised them that we will be coming in to pay in person yet she went out of her way to write us a very rude and awful review. Great customer service skills and what a way to problem solve! Very very disappointed! I would not order from them if you're a business, looks like they have zero patience and would go out of their way to slander your business! We had expressed the importance of this order and the deadline we were working with so we were NOT by any means avoiding or not paying for the order. It was simply lack of communication due to bad reception out of the country. The staff we worked with for the order were good but definitely not impressed with the owner! Do I have to worry about my copyrights to our print order too? Where's good old customer service? Shame on you Stacy Hall! Stacy Nicole we have email records (see photo) of your HR Manager Katy King apologizing on your behalf along with all your staff that were shocked of how you handled this matter, on the email it clearly stated that you will remove all posts regarding my business and you had left the google review posted for 2 months! We had paid our balance the next day we came back to town and you failed to keep your word! Remove your google post or legal action will be taken!

Still the best tourist place.
Nice public market, and nice show as well.

This place is and always has been fantastically run. Been getting hats, shirts.etc embroidered for years hear and have never had anything resembling an issue. Staff is always friendly and happy. If you need anything done this is the place to go!

Fantastic company, fantastic staff. Amazing! Lauren especially was exceptional and I would recommend this company for their professionalism, their concern and remarkable ability to forfil your needs in everything they do! 5 stars is not enough rating for my thoughts on this company! Keep up the great work. And again very special thanks to Lauren!

Loved the difference in this store! Imaginative T shirt images and motiffs. I particularly liked the Canada provinces explanations. A two hour wait for.a motiff was too long for me though and as I live in Europe I did not expect it to be shipped. Staff were helpful and pleasant.

First, they were open when I needed them to be ‚Äìon BC day, a stat holiday! Then they were incredibly helpful, professional, and expedious. Lastly, when I had trouble, their customer service was amazing! Lauren is an angel, Rebecca is fantastic, the gentleman at the counter was a joy, and clearly whoever is doing the hiring is great at their job.

A friend recommended them to me and I will recommend them further
I was really happy with the T-shirts and tote bags I had printed at MAKE for my business, Eve's Crackers..Quality printing and a lovely, helpful staff..Great turnaround time as well!

We thought it was great! Has the standard lineup of Fred and kikkerland, but I love that you can get quirky vancouver related items. Especially love the make your own t-shirt and button stations. Super nice and helpful staff on top of that! Check this place out!

We drove directly to visit this shop, but were disappointed. It is almost nothing to buy. We liked two T-shirts only. Nothing special and extraordinary which I could buy no matter the price. Moreover the shop is small and have very limited variety of products. Nearby shops have better assortment.
Good quality of design and fabric.

Do not go to this store for engraving - their level of expertise and customer service is severely lacking! After purchasing a ceramic mug expressly for the purpose of having it engraved, and upon the recommendation of one of their employees, another worker disputed their own engraving capabilities, and sent me away.

I'm now left with an expensive mug that cannot be returned, and an overall bad experience of this shop. There is an apparent disconnect among their workers regarding the know-how of their own services.

Doesn't even rate a star. Extremely, extremely disappointing customer service. Did a custom order online, received email confirming order was being fulfilled and even given a tracking number for expedited shipping. After a week I tried to track my order, but there was no movement on my package. Communicated with Make and found out my order had not even been started. Asked them not to ship it. Said I would come in and pick it up as I wouldn't receive it in time..Drove in from Abbotsford and spent over two hours in rush hour traffic only to find out they had shipped it earlier that day. It was Friday, I needed it for Sunday. Was to be used at my mum's 75th birthday party. 75! That's a big deal! Was severely disappointed that they didn't even care how badly they had let me down. Didn't even get an apology from the manager.
Ordered three items (one mask, two shirts) and was very impressed by the quality of each.

MAKE always has the coolest gifts, from the typical novelty ice cube trays to the seam-to-seam all over print custom t-shirts. It's one of those stores that are a must visit everytime, even if it's just to aggressively browse their selection.

I needed to get a sweatshirt printed for the next day and MAKE just did the trick! I placed my order in the evening and it was ready for pick up the next morning. Quality is amazing too- this is definitely my new go-to place for custom garment printing. Thanks MAKE!
This is such a cool and unique store that has something for everyone! I especially like it for those "hard to buy for people". The staff are super helpful with gift suggestions if you are stuck:)
Great service and support for my custom shirts! Be aware though, that the shirt sizes run pretty small.

I always get fantastic service from the MAKE team.whether it's a custom order, online purchase, or a question over the phone, they are quick, efficient and knowledgeable. On my go-to list for great gifts!

I really love the service at Make and the quality of the work done each time I go. What amazed me even more was the one time they actually made a mistake! Why? Simply because they looked into the issue, found the error, fixed it, and then went the extra mile to make sure that I was a pleased customer.

What more can one ask? A business that stands by its work and cares about customer satisfaction. Wow! What a concept! Well done, Make Vancouver.

So many cool products in this store! I could have spent a couple of hours! Store staff are great, knowledgeable and friendly. Go see Charise for some on point product advice and more importantly some life guidance.:).like Arnold, I'll be bach

Wonderful, friendly staff!
I had a custom face mask done, and it was very quick from the time of ordering until when it was completed-- great job, too!
They have cool gifts and special Vancouver themed tshirts and cool hats. They can custom embroider or screen print too. Great staff, everyone is super friendly and helpful.

If you're a designer and you want to make one off t-shirts, hoodies, flasks, cutting boards etc this place is for you!.It's pricey though. like getting a print job of one anywhere it's to be expected. other than the fact that their business is based on serving a clientele of single print jobs.
Service was fast and merchandise was hilarious. Didn't end up trying the maker side of the store, but it looked super interesting. I ended up buying 3 pairs of socks!
Really good store to make custom gifts. Staff really friendly. One of my favorite store at Granville Island!
Its ok. Not as good as I remember, catering more to tourist than creators trying to prototype an idea. The staff was friendly but that's the only reason they get 3 stars. Its called MAKE not MADE.

Got a shirt custom printed and I'm pretty happy with it! Some of the colours aren't very bright but I guess I should have guessed that with a shirt fabric choice, just wasn't expecting it. Still a nice product overall though!
Great store with a lot of cool stuff. Staff are great..Fast turnaround on custom stuff. A must see store if you're on Granville Island.
Seriously amazing! Phaedra was so helpful and so fast helping me make my t-shirts. I was blown away by how sweet and helpful all the staff were in the whole store!

Staff are polite enough, however after spending a lengthy phone call confirming what I needed to bring, I was told upon arrival that I need to email them the image instead of having it on a USB. NO solution was given other than I have to go home and email it despite having everything they needed on the USB. The most the staff could do was look at each other blankly. Would have given them one star if were not for the polka dot dress one.of them was was wearing. Do not serve cheese on toast.
Fun store. Low quality product. Good for gag gifts though.
I had a great time making birthday presents for the young ones in my life. Ross helped me design some tote bags and I couldn't be happier.

I had an image digitally printed on the back of some coveralls..They did a terrible job, with a crease running through the graphic and several circular impression from the buttons on the other side of the coverall.
I could have accepted the poor quality to some extent if they had demonstrated some remorse, but they also failed on customer service..The first approach was to try and convince me that "it looked used" (I agree) and thus better (I disagree)..The best they could offer was that next time I come in I could talk to the manager and "they'd see if they could do something for my next order"..That's fantastic, but why would I ever go back to MAKE?
It's a cool store with very neat curios and novelty items. Definitely worth checking out! Oh and they also do custom printing on items of clothing.
Had one issue but was resolved accordingly with great customer service. Courtney went above and beyond what I had expected and displayed sincere integrity. Thanks MAKE!
In this store you can find so many original stuffs! Even if it's a bit expensive, it's the perfect place to find a gift! (4/5 because I definitely don't recommend the t-shirt printing service )
Lovely space with amazing options
We ordered custom print mugs from Make. Fantastic product, fantastic customer service. Will definitely look to them first in the future!
We have been getting our uniforms embroidered at Make since we started our company..We love your shop and staff.

Great support, quick to answer E-mail
Had to repeat myself over E-mail a couple of time and also they didnt communicate with me about the sizing on the T-shirt, which ended up costing me 2 prints instead of one.
Still, I would go back and next time go to them and clarify in person how I want the print.
I've used the custom printing service several times and the service and quality of items I've recieved has been HOT FIRE! I will continue to be a regular customer!

Needed custom t-shirts
Printed and was impressed with service and quality. Would recommend.
Filled with interesting things and giftables. Varying price range from sub 5 dollars to over 150. When I'm in Granville island I always like to poke in to see what's new.
Awesome Experience, super helpful staff and best prices I could find for a custom made shirts. Overall would highly recommend.
LOVE this place! |Makes gift giving so fun and artistic, you can literally go nuts in here..The staff are so professional and fun as well.
A lot of quirky and fun stuff. You can customization clothing here as well. If you're in Grandville Island, definitely stop by just to browse the funny T-shirts
Wide array of gifts. Tentree selection in the back.
One of my favourite stores in Granville! I could spend hours here browsing all of the fun, unique merchandise.
MAKE Vancouver has given me incredible customer service, and the mask I ordered looks fantastic!.I definitely.recommend this business.
Kind & knowledgeable service, quality products, reasonable prices and excellent workmanship..Highly recommend, will definitely collaborate with MAKE again soon!
MAKE is a must see at Granville Island. Always come out with a laugh or inspiration for creative ideas. Very kid friendly, with clothing, designer items and gizmos for all ages.

Staff are super friendly and knowledgeable. I was waiting in line at the back of the store one day to place a hat(s) order and a staff member saw that I had been waiting about a few minutes, even when I wasn't supposed to be helped I was asked if I needed help.
Thee best shop on the island, top notch things to look at and better yet buy. Must stop here everytime I'm in the area!
A true gem in vancouver.awesome designs of tshirts, bags, accessories, and fun products. Oh, and you can actually request a tshirt design! Pay them a visit.
Cool creative options for t-shirts or hats.and lots of fun novelty items as well. Definitely a must stop when visiting Granville Island!

Staff are friendly and helpful,
You can find tentree's products here .
Lovely gifts and crafts ,
Such a fun store!
One of the more unique stores in the city. Lots of fun items that would be great gifts and the can customize many different types of things.
Fun gift and novelty store that has friendly staff and hip vibe. You can get lots of custom embroideries or prints too
Really interesting store. Not your regular tourist shop. You can design your own tshirts.
Awesome shop!.Fun staff, unique Vancouver.products, reasonable pricing..Supports local contributors.
Awesome/unique nicknacks for my clients & top notch customized merchandise with primo customer service, a Granville Island staple - highly recommend.
Great place for gifts/souvenirs albeit somewhat pricey..Our guests went home with arms full.
Interesting place to visit if you are passing by..Lots of cool knick knacks to admire. Great for quick and easy gifts.
Firstly, this place is illegally not accepting cash. And its like government propaganda with all the vaccine pushing.
Amazing job! Thank you Phaedra and staff! The T shirt we have ordered is lovely!
Highly reccomend the leather notebook engraving for graphic designers, 1 EPS file and a couple of hours later I had some amazing looking designed notepads.
Just love all the wacky/hip/edgy stiff you can get. This store made my room like 45% better ^¬¨^
Cute shop with a lot of unique products! Love stopping in here when we are in town.
Cool staff. Nice clothes and gadgets selection. You can make your own t-shirt too.
Such a cool store, so many options for gifts. Great Canadian souvenirs too.
Interesting little place that you could spend ages in. Has quite a few things that I've seen in other place but still worth a look in. Staff know what they're doing too.
What an excellent shop! The tee shirts I bought will keep me going for a few years.
Love the art community, variety of shops & market. It's a nice way to spend a Sunday.
The team at Make recently went out of their way to help me with a last minute request. They were fantastic to work with, I highly recommend them!
Great store, and cool products.but customer service lacks sometimes.
Awesome and unique gifts store, so many options and interesting things!
customer service 11/10
Excellent service and great variety of products. The printed my tee shirt within 60 minutes.
Cool unique items in here. Great place to pick out gifts.
Great place to shop..This place has the funkiest stuff. I always find something amazing.
Pricy but has a variety of gifts and cool accessories you'll want to check out!
Very cool idea and concept to make your own shirts and pillows, great location on granville island
So helpful, fast, and well-priced. Made a very cool gift for a good friend. Thanks!
Great store with lots of interesting options. Friendly and helpful staff.
Fun place with helpful, friendly staff, unique gifts, and embroidery and other services for a reasonable price.
Excellent service from all the staff here. Products are fun, eclectic and beautiful
Quite expensive shop, but has many unique items. Very nice and kids friendly
Nice little shop with a tonne of unique items. Always fun to browse.
I've gotten multiple things from this place and everyone has always been polite and helpful and it's just all around a great place
awesome store. lots of canadian made products, and they're dog friendly!
Fantastic staff,very helpful. Outstanding work! The stitching is incredible.
A must visit, very cool store with tons of novelties and gift ideas.
Fun place to get your supplies for making your own adventure. I mean cool gear!
Cool shop. Unique original modern and fun gift items, jewelry, knick knacks.

Such a fun place! Great stuff including supporting 10 trees!

Make is a lot of fun. They have really unique things for your enjoyment.
Always interesting stuff to look at and interesting gift ideas if you're stuck coming up to Christmas

Great unique items and interesting design. Always find something fun here.
Great place with various selections and variety of shops.
Best place to buy gifts..Great service..My go-to place.

Cute little shop in Granville, with lots of little treasures and cool gifts to be purchased.
Great place to custom create an array of different ideas!
A good way to customize your gifts or find unique things!

I always visit this store when I am in Vancouver. Just ordered a custom t shirt.
The shirt printing guys rushed my order through (with lots of handholding) and it looks awesome! Thanks you guys!

Best place to get tshirts or patches designed or embroidered done !
Fun things and awesome staff. Would visit again!

A must visit on the island, lots of creative stuff and friendly people. They are also probably the most pet-friendly shop in town !
Good selection, but also odds and ends if you like it

As the name MAKE suggests, you can make your own original goods, such as embroidering your own logo on a baseball cap or transferring a child's drawing onto a cloth bag. T-shirts are usually printed in batches of 100, but at this shop, one print costs from $26 + T-shirt fee (you can bring your own). There are many unprinted T-shirts, hoodies, and hats in the store, so you can choose your favorite size and design. There are many goods designed by local artists, so if you are looking for a unique souvenir to remember Canada, this shop is definitely worth a visit.
It is a concept of an editorial shop that collects local productions. There were also made-to-order products that they made themselves, and it's a good place to buy small gifts.
Awesome, interesting location. You get an appetizer at 10.00 in the morning. You just need a grill and a kitchen
Very nice creative gift shop, you can find a lot of interesting things in it, it's worth a visit!
Our favorite place in Vancouver. You can find everything on the island and that's where I take my classes at Emily Carr University of Art and Design.
Store full of cool and different objects, in clothes, accessories, ornaments, it is recommended to visit it, you will be surprised what you can find
Our friends in Germany are still happy about the caps individually made for them.
Really a shop that changes and allows you to find original souvenirs.
Very professional business. Great quality and honesty at what type of prints work on different materials. I'm very happy with my cap prints. Highly recommend visiting this store.

They will "lose" your order at least once. Some of the employees are rude and the store isn't very organized. Bring in your shirt is a must cause their shirts aren't breathable. Quality of the work is good considering everything you have to go through. If you can find another store that does this work, go there instead.

Ordered 20 shirts to be printed, was a rushed order so I can understand a slight to moderate decrease in quality as well as an increased price. What I do not understand is why almost all of the shirts ordered came stained. I'm not sure whether it is stained with bleach, or if the printing ink leaked off of the design and onto the fabric of the shirts, either way this is completely unacceptable for an almost $40/shirt order. I strongly suggest going elsewhere for having your shirts printed, as this company will not only deliver low quality, but will also ruin your shirts in the process with stains.

Very pleased with my order here, got 8 shirts and 4 sweaters for my business (Quality House Cleaning) everything matched up to exactly what we wanted! Will definitely be buying more in the close future.
Excellent products and service,.I have used them several times..It is also great that Mapleimprint exists so that a customer can choose a unique personalized gift for family or team members.

All around 5 stars for Maple Imprint! Amazing customer service, great price, and the print came out exactly as we wanted it, it turned out to be a perfect birthday gift! Will definitely come back!
Terrible imprint work. Poor quality of service, did not find anything wrong with bad workmanship. DO NOT WASTE TIME AND MONEY WITH THEM.

They are very friendly people and have excellent customer service.

they are on time and very cheap price.

I highly recommend for anyone. i would rather meet someone in person and have connections rather than order online

have had great experience with Maple Imprint. I must appreciate its printing quality and responsiveness in customer service. I have dealt with Arif in the store. He was very supportive and did everything to deliver what I want.
Thank you for another successful project I am I am very much satisfied with the quality of its vinyl thank you thank you thank you

I ordered a Gildan Crewneck sweatshirt, and it is so soft and cozy. The screen print looks flawless and better than I had anticipated. I haven't washed the clothing yet but I'm hoping the print holds up.

I am already in the process of completing my next order and can't wait to start designing more !

Bought 2 sweaters, I later got an email saying they are out of stock so they offered another brand in the same colour. I asked if the order could be canceled, called twice, and still am yet to get my refund.

I ordered a sweater from Maple Imprint for myself and I was pleasantly surprised, my family and friends and I are all pumped about it!.You can customize whatever you want!.Make it look deadly on high quality apparel, Definitely going to order more §©.

The staff are very pleasant and are happy to help the customers in every possible way. The design and quality of the fabric looks fantastic.

If they mess up your order, don't expect them to care. My item contained a large area with bright poppy red, and when it came out as a dark cherry, they acted like I should have known. No apology, nor effort to fix the issue, despite voicing my displeasure. Quality left much to be desired. Poor communication. Won't return. Very disappointed.

First time ordering a custom hoodie, tried this company since the price was right and reviews seem ok, though the final product did not turn out as intended.

First, the design tool preview is not a good representation of what you're getting. In fact, I don't think the person who makes the print even looks at the preview as mine was totally different. I asked them to hold off until I change the image to help them fix their problem, but they went ahead and edited my image instead and printed it.

The final product was not bad, but not exactly as designed since the image was edited poorly to fix their problem. I still ended up accepting the order since they put so much work into it. But overall I found my experience to be too much of a hassle, so I would not recommend.
Paying good money for lousy service. I bought 5 shirts with prints and 1 shirt was done right.

I came into the store looking to pick up a sweater. The worker was praying in the back room, as I stood waiting for 20 minutes. I tried getting his attention but nothing.

I'm so disappointed in the service. At least he could have put a sign up to let people know he will back. Never going there again.
First time printing my own t-shirt and the service was fantastic! Waited a whole 10 minutes :) Will certainly be coming back again!
The printed shirt looks exactly as shown online and it was a rush order. Very well done at a reasonable price. I will be returning in the future.

I've ordered with OSP several times now and the company is extremely accommodating. Their product is well made, super comfortable and always comes just the way you want them! Whenever I need swag, I only go to OSP!

Chris was a pleasure to deal with, we needed them as a team booster at work and everyone loves them! Not only did they turn out great, he was days early on the delivery, would definitely recommend this company!
Fast, efficient, good turnaround and great service. Pricing is competitive and we continue to order all of our company clothing from them.

Chris was a pleasure to work with! The service and quality was great and I will definitely be back to order more shirts in the future. Thank you for your help with printing volunteer shirts for our event!
Chris and the team were great to work with. They didn't just take our order, they worked with us to help make our event a success. The shirts were a big hit!
We realized on a Monday that we needed shirts for that Friday. Chris and his team came through, and the finished products exceeded our expectations! Will definitely order from them again!

Chris and the team were fantastic!.We had a very compressed time line and we got our t-shirts exactly when we were told we would (and they looked great)..I would highly recommend Ottawa Shirt Printing to anyone.

Excellent customer service and turned out good quality t-shirts within a short time frame.

Will use your services again. Thanks for the great shirts!
Very good service and came through on time even with worldwide and Canadian shipping and supply chain issues issues..Highly recommended.

Amazing! this is by far the best experience i had with shirt printing and design, it was quick and easy this company went above and beyond to make sure i was satisfied! this is my new shirt supplier from here on.

Great service from these guys - I've used a few print shops in Ottawa and I will definitely be sticking with Ottawa Shirt Prining from now on. Prices are great and they delivered the order right to my door.

been calling in to ask question regarding about a small custom embroidery, quote etc for a few weeks but no one ever picks up the phone nor responded to my voicemail. Does not look like this place has a physical location. Business is hard to reach.

Good service, listening for the art work, delivery on time, I ordered 24 Gildan500 t-shirts with 2-color printing on the front in small and on the back in large, it comes to about $21 per t-shirt in total with the art work and tax understood. good quality t-shirt and good printing. Thank you

I was looking all over for a place to do a VERY short notice run of 35 shirts for a special event for my company. Terry at Ottawa Custom Clothing was the only person who was willing to take on my order. Even though the original artwork I sent him needed to be updated he still had my order complete and shipped in the appropriate time and I received them before the event with time to spare! I am very pleased with my purchase and recommend this business, I will order again.

Initially good service but then no updates or notices when product was mailed out even after I emailed them for updates. Package was missing a shirt and now they are not answering my emails or calls. Do not order from them.

Update: after posting this review I was contacted to fix the mistake by another employee. I was hopeful at first but they are no longer answering emails asking for an update or refund (it's been a month since I heard from them). Don't shop here, not worth the effort to get what you paid for.

I put in a test order of $75 because of the negative reviews on Google. Sure enough, I had a bad experience.

Their budget went into the website to give it a professional design and features but all other aspects of this company are poor to say the least.

Customer service is either unresponsive or evasive. I didn't receive an e-mail (with tracking) when the items shipped, they just. shipped it. Prior to that, I've asked to do local pick up, was told yes, and they shipped it anyways. They used a Purolator bag to ship through Canada Post (not a big deal but rather strange).

I got the custom shirts and the quality is low compared to what you'd get elsewhere.

Save yourself the trouble, I went through it so you don't have to. You're welcome.

Never answers their calls or emails.

Ended up being over 50$ for two plain white t shirts with 1 logo on the front

Was supposed to come on Feb 3, ordered on january 18. we had to call them to remind them to ship it out. It finally came on Feb 10th. And they are the wrong sizes

Ridiculous

Client service is amazing! Super friendly team, great product quality, and overall such an enjoyable company.
Way better than ordering from big chain manufacturers, you get to actually work with real people. If I could, I'd give 6/5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è

Not a great experience. Do not recommend.

Ordered placed mid-June for 8 t-shirts (4 adults, and 4 youths). At the time of order, I was given a July 1st estimate for shipping and my credit card was charged immediately. On July 5th I reached out via email to Ottawa Custom Clothing inquiring on the status of our order and received no response. Called on July 6th and reached someone on a cell phone who sounded like they were out for a walk. Was told during that phone call that they weren't at the office and couldn't help me and was told to email. Order was then received on July 7th. The adult shirts were ok but the 'ladies' version of the t-shirts were just the unisex, and not the correct sizes. The youth shirts brand and colour was substituted so they do not match the adult shirts. Ottawa Custom Clothing has not responded to emails or phone calls.

I'll chalk this one down as a loss and not use them again in the future.

*Updated Review after receiving order*

Order of 2 shirts finally arrived after nearly 2 months. They are as described but I feel I missed how they are made when I placed the order. I was expecting an embroidered logo, however they are simple iron-ons that literally take 5 minutes to print and apply. In that respect I am disappointed, but glad I have backup shirts for my VistaPrint ones.

Secondly, I was surprised that an Ottawa-based company doesn't produce locally. My order came from "A Popular Company" from Kazabazua, QC. After trying to find info on this company, I found nothing. Big red flag right there. I get the whole 3rd-party reselling but be transparent about this.

Lastly, I cannot excuse the complete lack of communication. I phoned twice and spoke with Terry who was nice and all, but never followed up with me. Customer service is extremely high importance so I hope there's improvement there.

All in all, I'm fine with my $130 purchase but this place definitely needs to improve if they want to succeed further. And I hope they do.
The people who work here are amazing! Diligent, they take pride in what they do. Highly recommend this team over any big chain business!

I placed an order a month ago and they haven't contacted me in any way except to send the receipt, and haven't returned my emails or calls when the product was supposed to arrive 2 weeks ago. I saw on their Facebook that they mentioned delays earlier in December, however the least they could do is to send an email to notify their customers currently waiting on orders that they may experience a delay.

EDIT: The sweater I ordered did arrive a month or so after the expected delivery time. While the quality was good, they still never returned my calls nor emails, and only reached out to me to take down my review.

Im literally a broke college student. I work two times a week making $15 an hour I cant work a lot because im in school right now. Im taking art and i wanted one of my designs on a sweater so i ordered from this place. Was suppose to get it March 2nd never got it emailed them and they told me it would be shipped out March 4th. I ordered it in February. It is not March 23rd and still nothing. I emailed them twice about a refund and how i dont want the order now and nothing. I literally have no money as it is i wanted the sweater and didnt get it now im out like $80 thanks a lot guys great service..

Ordered a custom tshirt in dry fit for working out. Received it in standard cotton which made it not fit for purpose. Emailed them to get it rectified and still no answer weeks later.
Printwell in future for me!

Ordered 55 sweaters for my company in early Dec 2020. Received my delivery on time, and everything was there, with no errors. The embroidery looked great! I was happy to be supporting a local Ottawa company. I admit I was a bit worried after hitting a full voicemail box a couple times, and when the sample sweater took longer than expected to come. However, Terry always returned my calls thanks to caller ID as well as my emails. He was knowledgeable when recommending products that matched my budget and features. The Ottawa Custom Clothing team pulled it off brilliantly, thank you.

Placed an order in Nov. Didn't arrive in time for the holidays. All good - called in January and phone was answered. Inquired about specific order. Person on phone confirmed the number I called on and indicated they'd call me back. No call back. Called later that week and next week - no answer. Left a message, no answer. Emailed with a follow-up - no answer. Finally, I emailed telling that I would be canceling the order and leaving a review on line. I received a response within a half an hour claiming that I seem to have a vendetta out for them.

EDIT: expect angry emails post review??

I was very eager to get clothing printed for my new established business. I found OCC on google. Terry was very fast to answer after 9:00 pm. Sent me a sample of what i wanted within two minutes and my order was placed right away. My items were delivered promptly and by the time he had said. All i can say is he met my expectations and beyond. I appreciate it OCC!

One month after the delivery date and my shirts never arrived, and there was no response to my emails or phone calls. I'm all for supporting small business, and understand that smaller operations can get overwhelmed. That being said, they shouldn't be accepting people's money, providing delivery dates, and then disappearing. I had to dispute the charge with my credit card company, just a big waste of time.

My single t-shirt order is over a month post ordering and almost a month over the expected delivery date (June 23rd). I have tried to inquire what is happening with my order through their website, through email, and by phone (there voicemail is too full to even leave a message), without any response. The customer service is poor. If you read any of the other reviews (which I regret not doing before ordering), you will notice many other reviews similar to mine (current and older ones too). I am just frustrated that they have taken my money without the delivery of goods and zero communications about what is happening. I hope to still see my product soon, but even still, I DO NOT RECOMMEND this company.

I placed my order through the website and this company was quick to email me back. Communication was great and professional. Because I ordered over 1000 shirts, hats, and hoodies, it took a few phone calls to iron out the details, but they were very patient with me.

From begining to end it was a positive experience. Delivery was on time, and the price was pretty good. Ottawa Custom Clothing will have my business again.

As of today (July 15th, 2021) the order placed on March 31st, 2021 has not been correctly fulfilled. A mistake was made on the printing of the majority of the order and while trying to resolve the issue, this company has been almost impossible to contact. The last email from the company was on May 25th, 2021 when they cited the reason behind the slow communication was because they had a big order. I'm sorry but every order should be treated with the same respect, and our order was not insignificant. I have tried calling and been met with a full voicemail. They have our money and we have unwearable items due to a misprint. I would take my business elsewhere, but they still have our money.

I ordered 48 shirts from Ottawa Custom Clothing and they turned out beautifully. The staff member who assisted me was very helpful and patient when I was placing my order. The service was excellent! I had a really good experience. The price is very affordable as well. I will be ordering more shirts in the near future for sure.

Ordered a shirt a month ago. Expected delivery October 22nd. Didn't show up. Called on the 28th. Person said they were doing a delivery and would check on the order when they got back home. No call back. Email, no answer. Check the status on my order number, page doesn't show up. Called two other times, no answer, full mailbox. Out $35. Local shops like this make Amazon look great. Beware of this scam.

UPDATE: I am STILL waiting for my missing T-Shirts (Currently August 16, 2017). No one is answering my phone calls so I am going through my Visa to dispute the charge. What a nightmare this experience has been!

I am still waiting on T-shirts from an order placed on May 30, 2017 (Currently July 21, 2017). They sent some but miscounted and left out 28 shirts. I have been trying to get the missing shirts for over a month. They are impossible to get a hold of and unbelievably unorganized. They told me the shirts have been shipped weeks ago but haven't been able to tell me with what company or provide a tracking number. Now they are no longer answering my emails or calls. Worst customer service experience I have ever had. I wish I had checked the reviews before using them because clearly I am not the only one who has been left out to dry by this terrible customer service. I would not recommend this company to anyone.
If I could give zero stars I would..Placed my single shirt order over a month ago..No shirt, no communication from OCC..Sent email, no reply..Call, no answer..DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THESE CLOWNS.

A.M.A.Z.I.N.G experience with Ottawa Custom Clothing. Terry was extremely helpful, meticulous and patient with my order. Had some challenges with other companies getting such a large order in on time, but Ottawa Custom Clothing really pulled through. Great quality shirts. Very pleased with this service.

Terry, became very busy with the onset of Covid and received a crazy amount of orders. After receiving poor reviews he corrected, provided refunds, and hired on staff to make sure they got back to customers in a timely fashion. I would give them another shot for sure just because he reached back out to let me know of the changes.

My order was due last Friday, I have been trying to contact them by email and phone call and I have received no answer, now that I read the other reviews I guess this company is a scam, do not order from them, I wanted to support local but this is what I got for it. What a disappointing experience.

Update: I got an answer about my order, it wasn't placed yet, it was "incomplete, due to back-order" they gave me the option to actually send it or refund the money and I didn't want to take the risk so I asked for a refund and I received it, so it is not a scam, just a company with delayed deliveries and bad customer service

Throughout the span of a week I emailed twice and called twice (and left a message) but still no response on the order :/

Edit: After posting the review I got a call and discussed what was happening with the order..We cleared things up and the guy on the phone was nice but the fact that ordering from the website is only for artwork or that there's 2 emails was still confusing

This is the third time I have bought T shirts for my company from Ottawa Custom Clothing. Terry was extremely helpful . The t shirts were better then I expected and exactly what I wanted. They were completed in a timely fashion and the professionalism was 2nd to none. I will only buy my T shirts from Ottawa Custom Clothing. GREAT JOB!

Despite some minor delay in the communication and delivery of my item I am satisfied with the service. A very kind gentleman made everything possible to catch up with the production of my order and delivered it in person to my address the same day. That was a very positive experience in the end.ëçèª.

After a mild misunderstanding regarding the delivery date, I received my long-sleeved shirt today, and I must say the print quality and the precise application of my final custom design are flawless.

Thanks Terry for a great product!

I've read the other reviews and I'm honestly shocked with the way these people slander this company. Our company started doing charity runs 2 years ago and have ordered shirts from OCC 3 times. Large orders at that of 300+ shirts and not only did the owner go out of his way to make sure our order was correct he ended up hand delivering them to make sure they arrived for our event because of the postal strike.
Thanks OCC! Keep up the good work and we'll be talking to you next summer!

Had such a wonderful experience with Terry at Ottawa Custom Clothing. I needed some t shirts printed for a fundraiser in my art business, in a short amount of time and Terry not only managed to print them, but he delivered them as well. This level of customer service was very much appreciated! And the t shirts turned out exactly as I had imagined. Thank you for everything!

Worst customer service I have ever dealt with.
Emailed over 20 times and only replied once. I left voice messages and still no reply.
Tried to cancel order but instead ignored all my 20 plus phone calls and 20 emails and just sent the shirts.
When they were delivered the shirts were the right size but i order three hoodies. 2 large and 1 small. They were delivered all medium. So can't use them at all..Tried to call to get it fixed and still no answer to calls or emails.
Will never do business again or recommend.

I ordered a large batch of custom t-shirts, 3/4 baseball shirts, and baseball hats and am very happy with the finished products! The quality of the shirts is great, the logos turned out really nice, and the colours are exactly what I expected. Every time I had a question or sent an email, I received a detailed answer right away. It's clear that the professionals at OCC take pride in what they do - I would definitely recommend them! Great prices too!

Great company, great quality on the t-shirts and tanks, and amazing customer service for communication inbetween. They met my deadline (which was not alot of notice) and the shirts arrived a week earlier than I anticipated, thank you thank you! I will be ordering again in future, and recommend OCC. Thank you so much for all your help Terry & your team.

Possibly one of the worst customer service experiences I've ever had.

Ordered and paid for my shirts on June 21st, with a guarantee that they would be finished and delivered by the 30th.

I was then told that they wouldn't be delivered by then, but if I drove up to Wakefield, QC, I could get them the Saturday morning (July 1st).

Drove up there (About 45 mins one way) to a very messy looking house (with puppies that were left out in the rain all night.) alcohol bottles and wine glasses all over the front area of the house..A man came stumbling out shirtless, half asleep to tell me that they had been shipped out with Purolator on THURSDAY. Two days before I drove up. and no one could shoot me an email? Or give me a phone call?

After the weekend (since they were closed) I called Purolator to see where the package was. They told me that someone from Ottawa Custom Clothing had called them that DAY and told them to return the boxes to the shop in Wakefield!

After all of this trying to get ahold of someone again was a nightmare. Multiple unanswered phone calls and texts.

When I finally did get a hold of the company (days later) I was told that no one could drive the shirts out to me and they would have to be sent via Purolator again. I FINALLY received my shirts yesterday (July 6th) 6 days after the promised delivery date.

Nothing about this experience was professional or efficient. I will never be using this service again and will be advising others in the Ottawa business community to stay far, far away.

these guys have the worst customer service, they don't answer phone calls, they don't respond to voice mails, once you give them your money they stop caring. they were also 3months late on some shirts I ordered and during those 3 months of me trying to get in touch with them they responded back to me once and made promises they did not keep. I will not do busy with this company ever again.

i asked for a marine blue shirt web sample and i received a green shirt with different prices and script that I asked .Their web site has a do it yourself mode and the price is quite interesting but when you exchange by email the price is totally different i sent email back with no returns..Thinking may be the person i dealt with was not right, i tried again using their info e mail adress, still no answer!.Ho, also i received an invoice before aprooval of the order!.weird way of doing business .
I ordered 420 shirts and hoodies for my company and they were great! Staff is friendly. Ordering was a pleasant experience.

Terry from this store helped me out and gave me a refund. This store is not fraudulent they were just really busy and understaffed. Terry was really nice and honest

Fast turnaround, really fast with email responses, competitive prices and the print quality meets industry's standards. I'm glad i went with them and would be happy to place another order in the future.

not at all professional.
I was very pleased with my dealing with these guys. Reasonable prices, attention to quality and fast service. Good communication from the owner Terry.

I got nothing but super-professional service here..I would highly recommend Terry and his team..They will get you exactly what you need!
Terrible service..Placed order and paid for it on November 29th, still haven't received it and no one will return calls or emails..Jerk!

good service, would recommend doing business with him.
