I run a small business, and as it grows i need affordable, flexible and quality solutions for all things merch. But more importantly i need it to be Reliable - On time, looking the same, and high quality - every time. And thats why a friend, and also small business owner, referred me to the gang @presstimedesign and im glad he did. Now, theyre the only ones ill deal with. Consistently knocking it out of the park. Its a relationship, that will grow along with the ups and downs of my small company.

When they were in LA and they were a smaller company they used to be amazing. Now they are too big to be bothered to have decent enough customer service to make things work smoothly. The quality of the products is still pretty good, but every order that gets made has some sort of technical hang up now. And it takes forever to get through the customer service chain to anyone who can actually help. Two stars because I still do like the quality of their printing.

The first issue is the inferior quality of items and printing. We used and ordered a wide range of shirts, hoodies, sweat pants, water bottles, phone cases, jackets, and dozens of more items over the last 9 months. The product quality and printing were always inferior - faded and blurred even though their system assured the print quality and files were good.

The worst part has been dealing with them when multiple packages placed by various customers fail to arrive. They do nothing to track or notify of these events and then absolutely refuse to assist in any way to help resolve the issue. They refer you to a website that is in Chinese and proceeds to tell you that you're on your own from there since they have it marked that they sent it out.

After several customer complaints, we gave them the benefit of the doubt, but the same issue keeps reoccurring, and they refuse to help or support us. It has been one problem after another, and they refuse to take any accountability for assisting the customer using their platform.

In addition to these major issues, they have a bunch of hidden fees and price increases that they do not inform you of so we were actually losing money on many items even AFTER we marker them up 5-10%!

Again, we wanted and tried to make this service work and gave them more than enough chances to help us stay a customer. If SERVICE and quality are essential to you and your customers, you should avoid using Printful by all means necessary.

Terrible Quality Control..Their printing quality is bad for shirts, mugs and posters..I received my samples only to be disappointed. The shirts were printed poorly with no line definition. Same thing with the mug, cheap and poorly imprinted..The poster was also fiasco, it seems that they don't know how to use a plotter. Not one product was produce properly.
Quality control should a priority for you company, so your clients can receive quality products..If I received some of the products you sent me as a gift, I would be offended, it was that bad.

Easy to create and so many products to choose from, plus free designs and fonts available with free integration to major ecommerce platforms! They have great online chat support, so you can ask anything with fast response. They provide so many professional mock-ups ready for posting, takes the hassle out of making your own mock-ups, I love it !

I love the material. You can wash it over 1000 times and it will never fade! The design I decided to put on it is so vibrant, even though it's just black and white. I love this skirt so much. It was also definitely true to size and fit me perfectly.

Gotta say the Printful yoga leggings are my most comfortable yoga leggings! The printing quality is good and the design team is easy to work with. As a textile designer by trade- I wanted to make sure the colors reproduced true to my design. The design team was very clear on what I needed to do. The customer service team is AWESOME! Very responsive!
I plan to keep working with Printful for my online store!

After doing a ton research, Printful was the first company I tried for my online business. Now, after spending many months building my website and creating lots of products I have a fully functioning store with hundreds of options on apparel and accessories. In this time I have also looked into other companies and even tried a few, and I have come to the conclusion that Printful is the best option for someone like me that wants a full line of designs and products, but does not have capital to order inventory. They also seem to be the only truly free option where they only make money from you if you sell products!

Pros: There are no hidden fees and they don't charge you to integrate with other sites - like your own website, Amazon, Etsy, etc. Most of the products I have gotten have been really nice. The print and color quality on the all-over print products is really amazing! Plus, every sample I have ordered looks just like the mock-up, that's pretty unbelievable since they are print to order, then cut out, then sewn! For the most part the product integration is really good. You can design products on their mock-up generator and they are automatically synced to your website or another selling platform. One of the best things for me, since I am trying to grow my brand, is that they have the option for labels on many of the products. They also allow for multiple image layers - this is HUGE - so I don't have to tailor multiple images for multiple products. This also makes it possible to put specific size logos on products that do not have labels. I have also found that their customer service is really good! I have had problems with a couple orders and they have gotten back to me right away and rushed out replacements. Also, they have lots of informational videos for when you are first starting out. They also allow sellers to leave reviews and photos on all the products, this is very helpful when trying to decide what products to offer.

Cons: As I said above, for the most part the product integration is really good, when it works, it works great! But I have also had consistent problems with syncing. I will create products and they will sync up with my website just fine, then the next day they are not synced any more. Then I have to go in manually and re-sync each size and variation manually, which takes quite some time! This happens off and on so I do not know why it's happening and their tech support has not been very helpful for this problem despite many chats and emails. I have also had a few problems with the quality of a few of the products. I have ordered 2 hoodies and even though the hoodie itself seems to be really nice quality, the zippers have been bad. I have also changed some of my designs for regular print shirts since the "DTG" printing seems to be quite a bit softer and more fragile than screen printing. Then, there are just some products that are cost prohibitive to sell even though they look very nice - like the towels.

Overall, for me, the positives far outweigh the negatives, mostly due to the extremely high quality of their all-over print - rich vibrant colors. So, I decided to go with 5 starts. I had originally put 4 stars due to the cons I listed, but then I needed to weigh in the fact that the integration thing is a difficult intermittent problem and when compared to other companies, their tech support is probably better than most - at least there is one. So, even though I have had some issues with the integration, once everything is synced - it works GREAT! People make orders on my site and the order goes straight to Printful, then they make the product & ship it. The majority of their products are great and if there is a problem with a product, they will make it right. I highly recommend Printful.

What a great printing company, especially for beginners into the world of merchandise creation. There are plenty of tutorials and videos to help you get started. and so far all the products have looked great. I would like more product options however. Printful does have a huge list of products and none of their logos on your materials. But they could expand into other items, clothing, and features. Over all This place has been amazing!

Customer service is excellent and the products are high quality (I am especially a fan of the sublimation print and all-over-print clothing)..I produce clothes that are not just for workout, and the templates enable me to create interesting designs using my own artwork..I hope Printful will keep adding new products (love the flared skirt - wishing for flared palazzo-style pants!).

Regardless of policy or lack thereof, it baffles me when any company doesn't seek to make something right with their customers. In my case, I placed an order for a customer for some event specific shirts that shipped on time to arrive the day before the actual event, according to tracking. They arrived well after the event and weren't needed anymore. They never arrived for what they were intended for and I at least expected a refund upon returning the items. THAT ABSOLUTELY DIDN'T HAPPEN. In so many words, they basically told me, "Whatever happens, happens" after it's left their hands. Won't even accept a return. Refunded me the shipping but stuck me with $280 and a bunch of shirts that can't even be resold. I had to refund my customer, of course, but they were still made to look bad since they didn't have anything for the event. So my company's integrity takes a huge hit. Pockets take a $280 hit. And there's a $20 refund for shipping to show for it.

Way to go Printful Customer Service. Hell of a way to take care of your customers.

I am looking into using them for my on demand business. I ordered 2 samples. I love the coffee mug. I ordered a t-shirt. I love the feel and the print quality. I am concerned about the fit.

It took a week from date of order to delivery. In theses times of immediate gratification and 2 day shipping, I am concerned about impatient customers.

More tests to run. You still have my attention.

Since I've stuck with them, their prices have gotten better as I'm sure their processes and distribution get better..I'm happy to stay with them and continue to use their services.

I got a refund for the ‚Äúcost‚Äù but it was damaging to my business and still don't feel comfortable moving forward with printful based on the lack of corrective action taken by printful to ensure me that it doesn't happen again.

This is serious, you can't sell products that are received by the customer in a different size than advertised‚Äî ‚Äú3X is 52in‚Äù and ‚ÄúMed is 39in‚Äù but they received the 3X at 48in and the medium was 35in. The size chart was not corrected and there was no indication that the situation was investigated and corrected so why would anyone continue doing business with printful.

I hope printful can figure out how to correct this, but I am still not comfortable moving forward with printful at this time.

So previously I stated the following.
‚ÄúIf printful corrects this issue with the sizes and refunds at least partially for my losses this review will reflect those actions‚Äî until then I highly do not recommend using printful.‚Äù. and still don't recommend doing business with printful.

I'm not a huge fan of direct-to-garment printing, but they have more options that make up for the lack of base-fabric color choices. I can make a FULL SHIRT design - front and back! - and have it produced rather than being limited to a 12x20 box on the front only. Printing and shipping takes about 7 days total for the package to arrive at your door. Not bad at all for designs that are unique and cost-effective! Plus you have the option to do manual, one-time, runs of designs so I can offer custom items too!

At this moment I am not very happy with the services that I am receiving from PrintFul. I have been with Printful for nearly 2 years and they are a great partner! They have THE best customer service! I can really recommend them.

I was working with Printful products during months, I was satisfied about the quality and the customer support. I believed so much in this company that I decided to make them my main partner for my online business. I've created several designs, and uploaded around 200 articles.
So why this company deserve one star ?
Mainly because Printful doesn't know how to deal with technical issues. Without any reasons, without any explanations all my Woocommerce store has been unsynchronised to my Printful store. Result: I lost all my work, with unique descriptions and arts. When I ask at the Printful support some assistance the answer was simple : "You need to do it again".
I won't upload all my products again, for me it's Printful responsibility to guaranty the correct integration with Woocommerce, specially when they're doing updates. I don't want to be in the situation to have everything unsynchronised again because Printful plugin is not working properly with the Woocommerce update.

I've been working with Printful for less than a year, selling a few mugs and such on Etsy..So far, it's been a very positive experience, and I am looking forward to trying out more and more of their products in conjunction with my original designs.
Printful is my go to DTG printer. Their products and customer service are fantastic! Definitely recommend.

I've made several shirts through Printful and each time the quality and price have impresssed me! The website is easy to use, and the fact that I can order a product and know right off the bat how much it will cost is a big time-saver. I'd highly recommend it!

Not a good selection if looking to start your business using this company..They do not always update out of stock items, leaving customers guessing why fulfillment is taking so long. There integration with Zakeke is not well thought out. They allow customers to place orders with images much too small and with non-allowable content. They do not inform the store of this, so again it seems as though there is a delay of fulfillment when there is actually no intent to fulfill. Their product is cheap..The shirt sizes run small and the print is not full..Within a few washes it will bleed out.

Absolutely do not use this company for bulk orders..On November 26 I manually placed an order for my customer for 100 tote bags..At the suggestion of customer service I opted for screen printing because my design was simple and the price would be less than DTG..The total was $1297 or $1,389.72 after shipping..I waited a week but there was no movement on the order..I checked again and then I saw a restocking notice on the order..I contacted customer service, but they assured me that since it was within the fulfillment window, I should not worry as the totes would be restocked soon..I waited for another week, contacted customer service and again I was told not to worry..I was nervous that my customer would not receive the bags in time so I paid extra for expedited shipping..A day before the fulfillment window was up on Dec 13, I called and finally was ‚Äúhelped‚Äù..I was told that the totes were still out of stock and they were ordered to the fulfillment center on December 7 (I placed my order on Nov 26)..At that point I was in danger of losing a huge sale so I asked if they could switch my order to DTG.(bags were in stock in LA) and have it printed and shipped ASAP since my customer needed them a week ago..I would expect that since the extreme delay was not my fault, they would charge me the same amount as screen printing but instead they charged me the DTG rate of $1504.25 including shipping..So because of Printful's error I had to take money out of my small profit..Their Etsy integration for single individual orders is great but do not use them for bulk orders and do not trust that their customer service decisions are in your best interest.

As retailers what sets us apart from our competition is our quality, our price, and our service. Printful understands this and recognizes that the bottom line is not everything and they always provide great quality and their service is almost always fantastic.By the way Michael D. whoever you are, you are the man and you epitomize the customer service of Printful. Thank you!

Printful Provides a decent service with many items to choose from. Their website is very user friendly but they need to do some work on their All-Over Sublimation Prints. The printed areas around the seams of the shirt and underneath the armpits are very cheaply done. In particular, the American Apparel Sublimation Shirt. The prices on all products could be better. And they could provide a much better variety of mockup images at higher resolutions. The are very few mockup images available for many of the products, and the mockup images that you get from their mockup generator aren't even large enough for Etsy's minimum pixel width requirements. If they really cared about selling their products they would spend more time on mockup images for those of us selling print on demand items. All in all, they are not the worst company to in the POD game but they definitely need work!

I recently used Printwell for a bulk order of custom t-shirts for my company and I couldn't be more pleased with the outcome. The team was incredibly helpful and patient throughout the whole process, walking me through the different options and materials available.

Highly recommend Printwell for all your business and personal printing needs and wants . Their whole team is great and helpful. These guys know what they are doing and talking about. If you can think it ,they can print it!

WOW! What a fabulous experience I had with these guys..Firstly, my on-line order came in really quickly..I went to pick it up, and although the quality absolutely perfect, it was the wrong colour..Totally my fault..The two guys who were working not only offered to re-do it, but let me keep the original piece..WOW! Thank you Printwell..I will totally recommend these guys and will go back again without hesitation.

I had ten photocopies made of an ultrasound. It was difficult job because the original copy was small, not not very good quality. The result was amazing. It was a very important job, that I wanted done and they exceeded my expectations.

They did such a great job, it looked better than the original. I've had many photocopies made around everywhere in the city and this was my first time with Printwell Custom Printing and they do by FAR the best job. I look forward to working with them again.

The customer service was great too, they were smart, friendly and not too overly up-tight or pushy or uncomfortable. Great personalities.

I went into Printwell to get some pictures printed for my daughters first communion. Liz was there to help me and she did an amazing job! Excellent Customer Service! Picture turned out amazing. I am so happy with the service and product that I received and I will definitely go back and recommend Printwell to all.

Superior service and customer care. I can't say enough about the staff at Printwell! I needed uniforms for my team in a hurry and they were able to expedite service in 2 days!.The Printwell staff is extremely helpful and courteous..Everyone on my team were beyond impressed and loved their uniforms. Totally recommend, you won't be disappointed!
Fast and friendly service! I was surprised how quick they were. I needed a last minute Halloween costume and they finished it earlier than expected and it turned out amazing. Definitely recommend!

My first time experience was absolutely Fantastic! I walked in with a shirt that needed printing for Halloween they told me it would be done by Friday the latest- a few hours later I get a call to come pick my shirt up because it was all finished! I won't forget to mention that Elizabeth Jones who works there was the woman who assisted me she was extremely friendly and very helpful throughout the whole process of choosing print & color and she also suggested sparkles which was an excellent choice! I will definately be back and would highly recommend this location- they do awesome work! 5 stars!

Recently had the pleasure of dealing with Printwell for work. We had some shirts and business cards printed. The staff was very informative, accommodating and professional..In all aspects of the process,from the design to meeting a tight timeline. I will use them again for the range of services that they offer. Keep up the great service!

DO NOT BUY anything here..I bought a cartridge for a printer here recently and was sold an expired one by 9 months that does not work..I was denied a refund in spite of a defective merchandise sold by them..Worst customer service.

I used to go to Staples but one day I tried Printwell on a whim and the customer service was the BEST I've ever had----the work was amazingly done with great attention to detail .I was blown away! I love Printwell and now I don't go ANYWHERE else, they are fantastic for Xmas gifts or special occasions. The owner knows me by name which is so rare and whenever I come in he greets me and makes me feel special. I recommend Printwell to anyone and everyone.

First time going to printwell and looking for a business that could provide me with high quality prints of art paintings i like for canvas for my new house..I was very please with the result of the prints i received as well as the great customer service i received from the staff who worked with me to find the best quality images for the prints i wanted..Printwell staff were very courteous in ensuring i would be satisfied with what i was buying and even went out of their way to help me bring the rather large canvases to my car..Ill definitely bring more business to them as soon as my budget allows..Anyhow very satisfied with printwell..Thanks again to all the staff that helped me..I was pleased with the product and it worth the cost for me.

I ordered a sweater and jacket back at the beginning of may for my business. I have been waiting over a month (which I completely expected). It the problem is, I just got an email with a full refund the other day. No explanation as to why they aren't completing my order just a refund. I have emailed them three times now and no one will answer me. I'll just go elsewhere not a big deal however, I was on a deadline to get these and waited this long just for them to refund me without any explanation at all. Super disappointed and pretty irritated that no one will answer my emails.

I have been a loyal customer of Printwell for many years. They have produced flyers, postcards, posters, and other promotional material for me. I purchased my last laser printer from them, and I have always been impressed with their prices, but more important the after-service. The team is knowledgeable and always very agreeable. I even know many of them by name.

Many thanks Michael, Charles, Phil, Jenny, and the rest of the team. You've got my vote and my business!
I have been coming here for over 10 years to get my printer cartridges filled. I've.also had custom mugs and t-shirts done here. They always over-deliver. Highly recommend!

I am sooo happy that I found this place! The staff are always so friendly.
I am recently getting married and they helped me make the most beautiful wedding invitations! I really had no clue what I was doing, however the staff made me a beautiful design that I was so proud to use for my invite. They also made my menus, table cards and seating charts. Thank you Printwell for helping make my wedding day even more special! Go Printwell!

Thanks guys for all of your help..With so many of us in charge. I am sure dealing with us girls was like herding cats!.Your patience and the extra efforts taken to make us all happy was outstanding..You truly made our experience using Printwell an amazing one. We loved our shirts! Thanks Elizabeth and Mike for all of your hard work! òÅ

I found out about this place and decided to check it out when I needed my ink cartridges refilled. Jenny and Mike are great people to work with to get the job done. Really quick, I was done in 10 minutes! And did I save?? Lots! I noticed they do t-shirt printing and I asked a couple of questions. I ordered a shirt for my sisters bachelorette party. I mentioned it was an emergency and I needed it done ASAP as the bachelorette party was the next day (Yes, I waited until the last minute). The representative asked to see if we could do it quickly and the other team member nodded without second glance. I appreciated that so much because I was screwed. The shirt looked FANTASTIC! It was pink and pretty and had beautiful font. I would recommend Printwell to anyone who wants professional service and wants to support our local businesses! :)

I purchased some refilled ink cartridges five days ago..They were HP XL cartridges and I only got less than 30 pages of print before the first one ran out of ink..I called for a replacement but was told I would have to wait in the car while they conducted a test..They could not just give me a new cartridge in exchange. The second cartridge is already indicating low ink..I cannot recommend this company for their ink cartridges or their customer service despite their advertisement that their cartridges will work as well as or better than OEM cartridges and that they provide a 100% guarantee.

The whole staff at Printwell went over and beyond in giving us personalized service..They would even take time to walk over to my store as I often worked alone and couldn't leave my store to go to theirs!.They were patient and understanding as we changed our minds frequently but continued to serve us with a smile.
Thanks so much.

Just Outstanding Service,

I gave them a call to get a quote for some shirt for the people at my work they were very polite and helped me until i have all the information i needed.

i decided to go in, and boy i wasn't disappointed. they were very nice and helped me, got me my shirts. The service is out of this world amazing and the price is so good and fair for there products and service. If i could id give them a 10/10 but only lets me do a 5/5

Have been getting Custom Shirts and Hoodies from Printwell ever since they offered them, better quality shirts and print than anywhere I have ever seen!

They do one and two shirt orders for me at amazing prices, staff at the store helps with designs and art work at fractions of the cost of what I have paid before with other stores.

Need custom printing, then Printwell has got you covered. I wear more custom shirts and sweaters than anything else thanks to theses guys!
Absolutely amazing service. Literally brought my vision to life. Great quality pictures. Great staff. Overall amazing experience.

I have been searching for a place to print my wedding invitations for months now and came across Printwell at St. Laurent last week..I went in and they had an amazing book full of examples, and since my wedding is a destination wedding, we were able to get invitations made that looked like a plane ticket!.Being able to customize it was easy and they turned out great!.Thank you so much for all the staff support..I will be back to do Canvas after the honeymoon!

If you are looking to customize your gifts, Printwell is where you want to go. They offer a quick turnaround time and the quality is excellent.

Great customer service, quick turn around. I went to get tank tops for a bachelor party. Great customer service, While waiting in line i learned that the employees are able to speak English and French.Which is fantastic! Came in with some photos to print but wasn't sure about sizes. I had a backdrop banner rush order for a trade show, with poor files, as my graphics guy was out of town..Mike and the helpful folks at Printwell made sure they were going to look great, helping me with the layouts and file conversions.They saved our show by getting the job done fast and beyond my expectations. The service at Printwell is absolutely amazing. I wanted some pictures printed of my baby boys and a tank top with a saying on it. They did an outstanding job! Very fast and efficient service too.

They really came through for me on such short notice & everything looked great! Would highly recommend them!

Stellar service! Mike and his team have the customer always first. Liz is fantastic, Andre is extremely helpful, Becca always accommodating and Paul just gets it done right everything. Mike you've got a great shop I will always repeat business with your store. Keep up.the good work!

I'll never use this place again. First they gave us the wrong pictures, so we had to go back to the mall. Then, the pictures that we got were oddly green, the colors were way off. When my husband went, the people there gave him a really hard time about it and were very rude. They told him it would be a 30min wait. Just seriously the best. Great 1 on 1 customer service, AMAZING web portal for your order and proof (easy to pass on to folks to view, approve + pay for the cost of items). I also love the preview web app thing where you upload your artwork and position it. Just. *chefs kiss*

They were so immensely helpful from start to finish! Definitely will be going to them for all my future screen printed goods. They made my job so much easier and our staff is so excited about their shirts.

I had the pleasure of working at Real Thread for a few months this summer and I can honestly say that they are 100% dedicated to making the best quality shirt on the market. Everyone who works there is good at their job and is part of the reason the company thrives. I saw time and time again how they were able to produce a product most other shops would be envious of.

I even had the pleasure of being a customer and receiving one of the best shirts I've ever helped come up with. Across the board, from how the sales reps handled it, to the design I asked to make, to the person mixing the inks and burning the screens, to one of their many talented screen printers, all the way to the finishing department where they were nicely tucked away in a brand new box with the quantity and a picture of my shirt on the box.

I've worked in other print shops before and where they struggle, Real Thread does not. Make Real Thread the first choice for your t-shirt needs because you ABSOLUTLY will not regret it.

Made about 20 shirts for a soon to be retired accountant. Simple design, one color. They turned out great. Amazed at how fast they arrived. Will be using them again to make shirts this summer. Price was about the same as other sites but they carried performance American Apparel in the sizes that I needed. 100% satisfied with the product.

I gave these guys another chance and they fumbled, big time. In one photo you can see the seems not properly stitched. In the other, you can see the printed wording beginning to crumble.

The thing is, one of their staff called me and offered to refund the cost of the shirt and provide one for free. I said that's cool. When the new ("higher quality") shirt arrived I was happy . until the wording started to come off (after one wash!). It embarrassed me, frankly.

All along the staff told me the quality of the shirts was not the company's responsibility. (Tell that to Elon Musk about the batteries in his cars.) Well, that leaves the writing on the shirts left . and, it sucks.

UPDATE the company contacted me and offered to make it right. Very rare today for a company to take responsibility for their mistake and credit their client. Will absolutely use this company again and sing their praises. great job!

This review is a few months in the making. Ordered seven navy sweatshirts in December for our family vacation. We were excited to get a family photo with everyone in navy and white nautical theme. The order came in a timely fashion as I did pay extra for rush.

Well five of the sweatshirts were great, print was nice and material was just what we ordered, hence the two stars.

I took off stars for the men's 2XL sweatshirts. Never were we told they would be completely different then the rest of the order, they were labeled navy but are really royal blue. Additionally, they were for my 6'3 husband and son, they aren't heavy, just tall so we bought the larger size to give ten length, and paid about $55 each yet they literally looked like they were wearing children's sweatshirts because as well as the color being off, the material was cheaper and they were so short (think crop top) in length and in arms that the sweatshirts came up to their forearms.

We could have dealt with the color difference even though we wanted everyone matching, so we packed them to take with us for photos anyway as there was no time for new ones to be shipped before we left the country but the size disparity was ridiculous and just poor quality control for the amount of money spent.

Needless to say we didn't get a family photo because they wouldn't wear them. Such a waste of money. In this photo I made my son put it in just to show the color difference and how short the sleeves are. Crazy

DO NOT order from this company. we bought around 20 t-shirt for our team and the color is completely different than what was shown on their website. We ordered tan color and got yellow. Such a waste of our money. All the team is disappointed. We contacted the company and they offered a discount of 20% off if we rebuy 20 new t-shirt in another color. Just so that we can waste more money on this company with poor costumer service. Here is a picture of the difference

Absolutely outstanding customer service! Super reasonable pricing, quick shipping and quality products! I have used them for VARIOUS projects and will continue to! AND their shirts made the front cover of our local paper!

I had a custom t-shirt order that was initially cancelled due to potential logo copyright infringement, which was understandable. I sent a follow-up email providing approval of my use of the logo, and then I followed up via RushOrderTees chat. I was put in touch with Luke L. and he handled my situation seamlessly. He was professional, friendly, efficient, and communicated very clearly. Bravo. This has been my second order with them, and after a great customer service experience (which is not as common as one would hope), it won't be my last order. Thanks again!

Okay so I'm leaving 5 stars as I believe it's well deserved
I ordered 4 shirts so far just to test the waters on this company. All 4 shirts are what I expected except that I had an issue with a 2 XL being disproportionate to the print size.

I called the company who is sending me the correct shirt and I feel confident at this point that this place is reputable.

Other than that I'm very pleased with the quality and customer service.

I had such a great experience ordering from RushOrderTees! It was really cool to be able to create a custom design. The website made it super intuitive so I could do it quickly, but I also enjoyed playing around with the design a bit. Communication was great and my shipment came earlier than I expected which was a nice surprise. I love the shirts we ordered and will definitely be ordering from RushOrderTees again!

Luke L. rocked my world on the RushOrderTees chat yesterday. I had placed a very last-minute order and he made sure the proofs got to me quick, the stock got there, and that it all got done and printed to be shipped out in time.

I've used RushOrderTees at least a dozen times and it's like magic. If you call or chat online, their employees are friendly, competent and willing/able to push to meet a deadline. Love it.

I used Rush order tees to get shirts for our churches production team and they were fantastic. Prices were a little bit cheaper than most other places I priced out. After I placed the order, 2 more people got back to me about ordering and I was able to add on to the order no problem. They were very helpful a nice about it. Also, the sweatshirt I had selected was out of stock and they upgraded me to another brand for free! Also the entire process took about 2 weeks from when I ordered to when they came which is super fast in my opinion! I just approved the proofs yesterday and they shipped that day and got here today. Will definitely recommend them and use them again!

I've ordered from RushOrderTees three times now and will definitely continue to use them for my custom clothing. My most recent order had a very intricate design, and I was not satisfied with the original shirts they sent me. When I reached out to customer service, they responded immediately and didn't hesitate to make changes to the design to make me fully satisfied. After numerous orders, things aren't always perfect, but their responsiveness and willingness to make things right shows that this is a customer first company!

RushOrderTees has been fantastic to work with! I have had to contact customer service on different occasions for different orders and they are always polite and handle my issues/questions quickly and make everything a breeze. Most recently I chatted with a customer service rep, Tianna W, she was awesome and diligent in getting my issue resolved. I will continue to use RushOrderTees for years to come!

I received my original order with a problem in printing and I got an immediate response from customer service and without hesitation were reprinting my order and shipping it out as soon as possible. Outstanding service and refreshing how they took time to LISTEN to my needs. Definitely will be my one and only choice going forward for my printing needs. Thank you RushOrderTees!

Awesome service, super user friendly, amazing variety and they probably have the most customizable clothing out of all the sites and services I've used offering printing almost anywhere on the garment. I was particularly having a hard time finding a company that was willing to let me order a single sample with full color prints going down the sleeves and these guys not only made it possible but waived the extra printing fee for the sleeves on the sample I ordered. 5 stars, will absolutely be coming back when I have all the kinks worked out of my prototypes

I was really happy with the ordering process it was easy to use and had a lot of nice options. The finished product was great. I did have an issue with one of the sizes I received but I did not verify if it was my fault or the company's. I got a youth XL when I needed an adult XL. But the other three T shirts were perfect! Either way, the company fixed the problem by getting another sent immediately. I didn't even have to call and hassle with customer service, I just sent a quick email and that's all it took. Absolutely happy with this company. We will use there services again in the future.

When a shipment looked like it wasn't going to arrive in time for my event, I contacted them about my emergency situation. They worked with me to resend the shirt through a faster means. The shirt arrived as promised, looked exactly like I wanted, and was good quality. A+

Every single contact with RushOrder Tees has been outstanding, and the product and turnaround were the same..The customer service reps are second to none, and the manufacturing team must be the same because the 21 shirts of varying colors and designs were perfect..Don't hesitate to consider their work..They earned our deep respect and appreciation.

I've ordered a few shirts from them and the shirts look really good. I have not had to send any back but I needed a issue resolved with customer service and they worked great with me. They resolved my issue and the work looks good. I will be ordering more shirts from them. They are very easy to work with. Thanks RushOrder Tees!

I would recommend RushOrder Tees to everyone! I love how helpful they are! You won't believe how they went way over and beyond for me!.You can't find greater customer service than these guys. I'm a difficult shopper and it's just unbelievable what they did for me!.If you are shopping with other companies, stop, I promise you these guys are the greatest out there! Thank you so much!

We are so pleased with this company. We had a few sweatshirts out of our bulk order come in with odd pockets on the front, and after filing a claim, they urgently took care of our problem and are sending us replacements for the sweatshirts. Their level of quality in product and customer service is unlike anything I've ever seen. Kaha Apparel is a HUGE fan of RushOrderTees!

I could wear out the click button on five stars for these guys. Been dealing with them for years and have always received stellar support on superior products..The print is top notch quality. I have shirts that were printed in 2013 and they still look great.

Very responsive when I sent a chat in with a question to ease my nerves that there may be something wrong with my order as it has been in art review for days. My order is still on schedule for the promised delivery time and almost ready for production. Can't wait to receive my shirts.

I recently started to teach Kenpo Karate again and decided to reconstruct my logo, name (Saber Strike Kenpo Karate) and philosophy and decided to go all in with posters, business cards, flyers, banners patches etc. I also chose to get T-shirts with my logo on front and back with additional graphics on the sleeves too.

The first order had some issues with the ink quality, coloring and sleeve length issues for the adult smalls. The youth large and youth XL sleeves were even longer than the adult small. However, this was a manufacturing issue by Gildan (G200) they were the ones that made the shirts. Rush Order Tees just prints on them and cannot control the quality of the shirts which is why it is nice that they have a huge selection to pick from. (I ended up using the Next Level Apparel for the do-overs.) I had 2 different t-shirts made for the original order, everything identical between them except the back graphics. Half of the order had mismatched colors from the front to back graphics and the ink began to wear off the other half of the order that seemed to be ok. I sold some of the shirts I thought were ok and stopped when my clients reported back they were seeing the ink wear off the shirts after normal wear and a few washes.

These shirts were printed using the Direct to Garment method and looked great other than the already mentioned issues but I can completely understand that not everything always goes to plan in a manufacturing environment from working in a manufacturing environment myself. Nothing to get upset about since this was my first time dealing with t-shirts and it was obvious that something had happened with the quality of the ink or the process.The fact that Rush Order Tees was not only willing to fix this order but wanted to do it as soon as they could displays a solid business ethic that others would do well to model in their corporations. Quality the first time around is just as important as the company wanting to immediately correct and issue or oversight the 2nd time around, which still equates to an A+ in my book. Nothing wrong with a do-over especially when they do as promised or even better in my case!

Either way Rush Order had Alyssa Seiders handle the issue for me. She was great, understanding and really came through to ensure the reprinted shirts were even better than I expected. My shirts had up to 8 colors which was complicated to begin with and when I requested for the screen print option over the Direct to Garment method they recommended I increase the quantity of the shirts in the order to better suit the production needs which I though was fair also coming from a production environment. I trusted they would come through and they DEFINITELY did! My students are excited to get their new shirts as well as the parents and many others that have been waiting to receive them. I am already working on my next few waves of shirts and understand exactly what to ask for in the future when printing on darker colors as well as how to utilize the screen printing over the DTG method when ordering by large quantities.

Thank you Alyssa and to Dean Ridgeway as well who filled in a couple of times when Alyssa was on vacation or unavailable! Great teamwork!

Great quality shirts, clean/professional prints, VERY happy overall with the products..The order came a little late (though I am in remote Alaska), but Luke in customer service was very helpful in tracking down the wayward shipment and even offered to rush out a replacement order at no additional cost..Great customer service, great product.

If I would have known that nothing is their ‚Äúresponsibility‚Äù I would never have purchased from them.

I'm told that size is not their responsibility but I bought the shirts from them, so I don't get it.

I'm happy I only ordered 2 to check quality. Complete fail, and customer service has failed too.

Don't buy from them!

Just did an 55-shirt order for our company event and we're specific on the shirt we want to print on. I'm so surprised by how easy it was for them to order a different shirt than the ones listed on the website. Live chat agent is EXTREMELY FAST and easy to work with. Almost too fast. Also REAL person not ROBOT (that or really good AI, maybe, who knows these days?) Can't wait to see how the quality will be like but so far service has been exceptional.

Just wanted to say this was probably one of the best examples of Customer Service I have experienced recently. I had a small issue with an order and it was addressed and corrected in 1 day! Luke L. absolutely hit it out of the park. I will not hesitate to do business with you again. Top Notch!
So far so good, customer service has been prompt and they waived my sleeve print fee on my first order as a courtesy. Much appreciated! I will update this review once I receive my order.

‚Ä¢ Wait - 5/5
‚Ä¢ Customer service - N/A
‚Ä¢ Product - 3/5
‚Ä¢ Cost - 4/5
‚Ä¢ Ease of use - 4/5

Customized a set of shirts on their website with fair ease. Surprisingly received the shirts several days before the estimated arrival time. Only real gripes 1) One of the shirts had a minor printing error. 2) No matter the different size shirt, the design on the front and back stayed the same size.throughout. Comparing the shirts next to each other, it just looks a little off. 3) Several of the shirt's interior stitching was unraveling. Would probably use them again for my custom shirt needs though.

I found RushOrderTees on a random internet search when i was trying to find a place to print a group tee shirt for my friends and i, first order came, i absolutely loved it, since placed multiple orders. Colors are on point, quality is top notch and the service is always professional. Worth the prices and i can assure you, the materials definitely last well. 10/10 totally recommend
Rush Order Tees has been excellent with all my printings. The shirts are high quality, customer service is great and items arrive quick. Highly recommend.
awesome customer service. Super quick to respond to an inquiry about a change..Shipping is exactly as they say, even their quick 2 day turn around..Very happy with my experiences so far.
Great place to get your TShirts..The shirts are actually good. soft, correct size, quality printing..Any issues, they have very responsive online chat..Highly recommend.

Let me start off by saying, this is an edit to my original review.

I ordered a Gildan brand t-shirt but received a different brand. The print work was great, just not the right shirt. I called to inform them of the problem. This was after 5pm central time. The representative I spoke to was argumentative but I was told I would receive a call back. I'm not sure if it's because of the Holidays but, the call back took a little longer than what I was told. I will say, I was completely done with this company untill I spoke to a very understanding and friendly woman named Laura. Laura is by definition of what customer service should be about. Because of my conversation with her, I have decided to change my review. I hope to do more business with them in the future.
2nd edit:
I have received my shirt and it looks great. The print work is great, size and location is exactly where I wanted it to be. Very pleased with work.

I made a purchase from Rushorder T's in September. It did not go well. I posted my experience online by writing reviews. I immediately received a response from Them and they eventually made it right. It did take finding the right CSR, but in the end the new t-shirt I was sent was better quality, the correct size and they issued a partial refund.

If I could leave these guys 10 starts I would. First have to say, Jace, is an absolute pro and made sure everything was good to go. I had an issue where USPS basically delivered my package in a way where it was easily stolen. I needed the shirts for an event the next day. I called Rush order about this, and they were able to print the shirts same day and I was able to pick them up. Now I'm sure this is not the norm, but customer service was absolutely amazing. You speak to real human who is there to help you. Can't recommend them enough.
I love this place,.I have been using them for almost 8 years with various shirts..Luke L was very helpful in my most recent order and made a quick change for me..They are so helpful and receptive.

although they couldn't fulfill my order because I had a print size specification that was outside of their ability to complete, customer service and every employee i spoke with from start to finish were amazing humans - very kind, understanding, and communicative. The next time I need something printed (that is a little less weird than this request) I will come here first :)

Rush order tees always and I mean always does a great job. They meet deadlines and stand behind there products. I've been buying from the a couple years now and will continue to do so. Thank you Rush Order Tees

Amazing Customer Service..I received my order and was not pleased with the print job..After contacting Customer Service, I received an email the next morning that my replacement order was in process and would be received within 7-10 business days.
I wasn't happy with the way my order turned out the first time but RushOrder Tees made it right quickly. They sent out a new tee and it was perfect! Great Christmas gift.

These guys are the worst. Tried to have some DTG samples made before making a big order, thankfully I didn't. First they altered my image I sent to something I didn't want at all and was completely unnecessary. Not to mention they they tried to pull a fast one on me and send me some cheap iron on heat press vinyl. Then they sent me another lot finally with DTG, but the image was wrong again.but even different from the first.and then just refunded me. Awful experience.

Every order I requested a custom detail they nail it. They are quick to respond, kind, and amazing at what they do. There's a reason why people comeback; the service and quality are hands down the best around.

Just received my order today. Here's what I got so I can only speak for these 3. I picked up Jerzees Nublend Pullover Hoodie, A4 Moisture Wicking Long Sleeve Shirt and 3600 Next Level Apparel Crewneck T-Shirt. I'm impressed by the fit and material of all three. The fit is just as I expected and wanted. The print job came out perfect, but the material and shirt quality are definitely what led me here to leave a review. Also the colors Forest Green (my favorite out of the bunch) Royal Blue, Cool Blue and Burnt Orange really catch my eye and stand out. Highly impressed right now. Will order again.

These guys impressed the heck outta me my customized hoodie came out better than I even came close to expecting! Perfect placement everything is so HD and crisp the quality is top notch! There so good I immediately ordered a 2nd! You can't go wrong with RushOrderTees! òé.
Ordering custom shirts was super easy and much cheaper than other places I've used online!.I haven't got my shirt yet, so I can't comment on that yet, but so far my experience has been great.

My experience started with us ordering the tshirts that they told me were in stock and then no actually having them in stock and delaying production. They then self approved our art and went on to print tshirts that were incorrect and quickly shipped to us even though i had contacted them to tell them we had no approved the art. It takes forever for them to respond when theres an issue and in the end never solved it and we have been left with a bunch of tshirts that cant be used and no refund. If you're just looking for some blah quality product rush order tees is for you. They pretend its personalized service but its another bulk, low quality with little attention to detail tshirt making factory. NEVER AGAIN.

Edited: I see the owners response below. You're right! We had communication since august because nothing was resolved, and once again, with your response here nothing is being resolved. "I will make sure to escalate this to management to make improvements going forward" but, you still wont solve our issue nor refund our order. Once more: NEVER AGAIN!

Pros, delivery came fast.

Cons- Seems very cheaply made. My pull over with the sleeve did not come out how i asked. Out of the bag, the print is peeling off the shirt. For how much you pay, this is not good.
Luke L is amazing!.I submitting a chat with concern that my rush order will not make it in time..He was very reassuring and thorough..Give the guy a raise!

I've heard great things about RushOrder Tees, and they're as advertised as far as service relations. I am still awaiting my order which should arrive around March, "super pumped."
Thanks guys and gals.
Our school is very happy with our RushedOrderTees orders! High quality printing, quick shipping on large orders, and great customer service.
Fantastic customer service! Jace Miller was right to help us when a small detail slipped through the cracks on an order. Couldn't ask for better service. Shirt quality is Top Notch!

Old school customer service is RARE these days especially with large companies..Not with RUSHORDERTEES..My order somehow ended up going to the wrong address..Even though, we communicated via email to resolve the issue, Tianna Wisdom, handled the replacement order with such a personal touch & professionalism that - as I said - is RARE these days..RUSHORDERTEES frequent my newsfeed and I can honestly say that (so far) they have lived up to their reputation with regards to service..I eagerly await the arrival of my product.

I had a few issues with Rush Order Tees related to print placement and consistency. However, the customer service team (I interacted with Alyssa), worked hard to correct the issue and meet my needs in a timely manner. Thank you for your help!

Every time I order from RushOrderTees, the quality is always outstanding. If there is ever an issue with an order, the RushOrderTees staff is always quick to respond and they handle my request with the utmost care. Highly recommended!

OMG! Customer Service Representative was extremely helpful and absolutely superb‚Äîwhich made the ordering process simple and easy. Thank you for your assistance and I cannot wait to receive my products. #firsttimecustomer
Had to get a few shirt printed for my unit do wear for PT..They were kind enough to wave the sleeve printing fee for the US Flag..Top notch service!
Tianna did an excellent job quickly adjusting an error on my order. She customer service, friendliness, and timeliness was unmatched! Thank you Tianna!
I was missing a tank top and some sizes ran small. Tianna was so quick and helpful. I am thankful I discovered this company and will recommend and use again.

Excellent work by Rush Order Tees. I first designed a shirt with an error, upon seeing the error I made an immediate change. However, there were a number of emails to "complete" the changes which I missed. Most places would have made me pay for both the mistake and the fix.
Fortunately I had a great customer service member that guided me through the process and gracefully showed me where I made the mistake, òî..Since it was a Christmas gift for my beautiful wife, I was prepared for the "to bad" pay anyways. This is where I feel ROT's went way beyond customer service at a cost to them and not me, went ahead and sent the proper order, though against ROT's policy, they did it anyway. ROT's isn't a company for anything free, especially if the customer makes the mistake, they did everything right. I am more than thankful ! ôå òå and my beautiful wife loves her gift.

Thank you Rush Order Tees for going above and beyond. I'll be happy to recommend this company as well as use ROT's for my next order.
Friendly staff! My order was perfect and arrived quickly. The quality of work was excellent. Thank you RushOrderTees!

RushOrder customer service is spot on..They work hard to make everything right, and they are incredibly responsive..RushOrder has a huge catalog and really great graphics people who will make your ideas come to life.
I've ordered from them a few times now and I couldn't be more pleased. Orders have always been correct and arrived on time. Not much more I could possibly ask for.
The process was simple and the program was easy to use. I am also impressed with the communication and the speed from the company with changes and starting the production. I will reorder.
This company's customer service were wonderful! They responded very quickly to my request and were able to create the order as I specifically wanted. Great company and customer service!
Amazing company! Their prices are very reasonable, customer service is amazing, and the quality of products is better than I could imagine!

Communicated with me about a problem on my end less than 24 hours after receiving order and are going to fix at no cost from me-just emailed to let me know what was going on and that they have it covered! Great Fast Response!

The online design interface is outstanding. More shirt options than you care to consider. Transparent production process. Text messages with shipping progress. Product arrived ahead of schedule. Everything was perfect--except the order. One t-shirt was not the size I ordered..A replacement was on its way before the end of the business. Their response to their mistake created a loyal customer. Aiming for 5 rating next time.

I've ordered rush order for over 5 years now..The website and staff are literally incredible and that's because they are so customer and service focused..Around 98% of my orders are literally perfect, but our products for our business are very custom, so we expect an issue here and there as you would with a custom printing operation..The important thing is that they ALWAYS fix it for us with reprints or future discounts, it's never an issue.

When I need an order in a rush, they hit the deadline..There was an issue during covid and there have been supply chain issues in the industry itself, so it's understandable if something happens here and there, but if they say they're going to deliver on time, they will deliver unlike most other companies that put me in the back of the line..Delivering custom t-shirts in 1 or 2 days. it's been a life saver.

Rush order tees stands by their products..They have amazing customer service..They hadn't seen my specials instructions and there was a misprint..They fixed it immediately and resent under deadline..Love this company. I will be recommending them to all of my friends.

On Thursday morning I found out I needed 70 tee shirts of three different colors in four sizes each with our company logo printed on the front and back. On Friday afternoon (today) at 2:56pm, UPS dropped them off at my office in California. The quality is fantastic, even beyond what I was expecting. Bonus points for the customer care team for being super patient and helpful in reassuring me they would make it in time each time I called. Oh yeah, the website is super easy to use and extremely user friendly. I may have only found their site yesterday, but I can tell you they'll be my go-to for any custom printed clothes/hats/bags/etc from now on.

Shirts arrived so quickly and were perfect. Unfortunately after a first, very standard, wash all the link peeled off every shift we ordered. I reached out to RushOrder to let me know and they immediately put an order in to get us a new round of shirts. The new shirts arrived so quickly and they upgraded them to the next level of quality as well. Very impressed with the shirts and the service!

Their service was quick and professional. My print unfortunately had an issue when it arrived. I didn't expect anything to be done about it since mine was such a small order. However, after reaching out to customer service, within 30 minutes they have already offered to send a reprint. Really awesome customer service. Highly recommend. Any future prints I need, I'll place through RushOrderTees. Thanks, guys!

RushOrderTees has been fantastic to work with! We have placed 4 orders with them within the last month and the quality and customer service has been fantastic! One order didn't print the way we'd hoped and they immediately responded to us and sent us out replacements. Their customer service is the best I've experienced! Love this company! Thank you!
Excellent quality and remarkably simple UI..Every member of the staff was abundantly helpful..Special thanks to Jason Cao..It was a pleasure doing business with rushordertees.

Horrible experience. I had a rush order for 12 t-shirts that was a last minute need. I couldn't get them locally in time so ordered them from RushOrder.

I paid over $40 per shirt/ including shipping because I needed them in two days. I gave myself an extra day, just to be safe. I never received any messages from them through the process so I had to watch the website anxiously to see if they were coming on time.

They did not arrive on the day they were supposed to, but by the time my delivery person had come, it was too late to do anything that night. I called first thing the next morning and one day before my event. I was told they were printing that day and would be shipped. I knew they could not get them across the country in that little time, the guy I spoke to asked me to please give him a chance to try something that might work. He never called me back!

I called again and got another representative, she told me they were still in printing and wouldn't be received until Monday- almost 1 week after I ordered them! That would be 2 days late and I would have nothing for my event. I am left with less than 24 hours to come up with my own solution. If I had one, I would have done it 4 days ago instead of ordering from them at such a high price!

I was transferred to their Alyssa who offered to refund 50% of my order. After, I explained my anger, she offered me a full refund and free shipping of the shirts. I'm not really sure what I am supposed to do with them now? I was impressed with Alyssa and she did her best to fix an unfixable situation. At least if I get the shirts I will know that somebody at this company cares. I will never order from them again and would suggest that you think carefully about what you will do if they don't live up to their promise. Have a back-up plan!

Unfortunately, I'm super disappointed. I was so excited to find a shop that could turn around my order so quickly. BUT one thing they were very misleading about is that under the tag of every single t-shirt they would be printing their large "Rush Order Tees" logo - without permission. And when I initially ordered over the phone, I communicated to the rep that I was looking for tagless t-shirts, wouldn't this be the time to mention your logo? He still went on to place my order and mentioned nothing about the branding that would literally make every single t-shirt look tacky. I work for a music artist and this is not even something we would sell to his fans. I'm just super disappointed that the rep was misleading about this.

The screenprinting is great! It arrived on time, BUT so many other shops can provide both of these things - so I give one star for misleading your customers. I find it very unprofessional. I'm sure there are many more customers who didn't expect your branding to be on products that we paid for.

I will update my review soon to explain how customer service handles this.

Update. This update is long over due. Customer service handled the situation like champs. They replaced our entire order, suggesting we keep the misprints. And to this day, the screen printing on these shirts is the best quality that we've come across. I'm not kidding. We've been also using Printful for our on demand orders (printful quality has diminished over the last year sadly). Yesterday I found myself recommending RushOrder Tees because of how on point their quality in printing is, and of course the turn around time. Our last order of black tees with white screenprint is bold and will last many many years, where as Printful's quality wears after the 1st wash. It was a little bit of a rough start with RushOrder BUT you can't beat the quality! So thank you for that.

The website lies about when your product will be shipped and printed. Inaccurate tracking. Doesn't matter how quickly art is approved they take forever to ship. ‚ÄúRush order‚Äù but they obviously have no intentions to be fast. Super Overpriced shipping fees. The chat doesn't work on the website, never connects you to an agent. The email customer service is unhelpful and rude. It'd be quicker to go into a mall and get custom clothes made then to shop here.

Update: customer service got to me after leaving this review and my hoodie was printed and delivered today. Wasn't the best quality printing for how long it took to arrive and how pretty basic the printing looks, also some of the image was not printed so it looks kind of like some of the image they forgot to print or was cut off. Nevertheless I think it looks sort of distressed and I have no intentions to return. I stand on my point of going into a mall, it will be def faster, better quality and cheaper. They charge way too much money for a print job that looks like I did it with an at home printer and iron.

Awesome quality screen printing and they all shipped in record time! Logo and lettering turned out better than I had expected. Very clear and crisp! Highly recommend to anyone wanting to design some custom teeshirts! Repeat customer for sure! Thanks again!

I had fun putting together a custom shirt for a concert next week..It arrived quickly, so I can rest easy that I received it in time..The shirt is gorgeous, of quality products and extremely comfortable.

I had a small disappointment with the print of one letter..It was not pressed flat, so it is a little funky..I reached out to RushOrderTees, just to let them know, and they immediately responded with intent to send a replacement.

The replacement was not necessary in my case, but I can tell you to make your purchase with confidence.

Thank You RushOrderTees!

I have been ordering swag from these guys for over a year..Great service and fast turn around times..Today I got an order in and some of the shirts were a different shade they immediately sent an email stating they were re making the entire batch and would have them out in 7-10 days I was super impressed.

I've ordered twice. Once, the t shirts looked great, but after washing the letters on the back started to come off. The second time was a disaster - shirts were printed that were completely illegible. I was surprised to get these and no one bothered to call me to suggest that the shirt or ink color should be changed. It was a big disappointment for the event.

I did have a small issue with the print that was sent to me BUT they replied to my email about my concern almost immediately. And made things right, without hesitation. I have ordered several shirts from them in the past and will continue to use their service. Thank You Rush Order Tees for making things right with no hassle!

I ordered a hoodie and 3 business shirts. They had a misspelled word on them. I told RushOrderTees. They sent out the misspelled hoodie and tees they arrived and I told them they were misspelled they were so polite to send me new hoodies and tees at NO extra charge. And they let me keep the older hoodie and shirts. I did ask if they wanted me to send back the older hoodie and shirt they said no. Very great customer service and business 5‚≠ê well deserved. Production is very quick for custom made orders as well!

20 shirts printed with a white Photoshop PNG. Easy designer interface. I got a little nervous waiting for the proof, but when it came, I got the shirts only 3 days later. 4 days before their latest expected delivery date.

The shirts are awesome, and I can't wait to show them to their owners! It came out to about $40/shirt with front/back one-color designs for about 18 shirts. Very worth it if you put in the effort for your designs.

Will not show mock up until after you place an order and then tried to tell me this is an "industry standard". It's not. Plenty of other companies show you a mockup before the order is placed. Definitely will be ordering elsewhere.
RushOrderTees always comes through! Great quality, great designing system, great customer service

This company has made me change my mind 100%. Initially we did have an issue with the product we received but Mr. Josh Hannum went above and beyond to get us the T-shirt we wanted from the beginning. Thank you so much for taking the time to get this squared away for my classmates. And we thank you.

Man they made me and my boy the coldest jerseys. We made our own basketball squads 25 years ago, we used to make jerseys out of white tees and markers, we finally hung up the sneakers a few years ago. When I saw this site I knew I had to make it official and hang up our official jerseys on our walls as well.
I needed my ordered RUSHED after I had already placed my order..I reached out to the company via email and live chat..Luke L. was able to help me and provide great customer service!
I use this company for our outreach tee's they have great quality items. Quality printing and they stand by their product! I would wholeheartedly recommend!
Excellent product! Great price! FAST DELIVERY TIMES! Will definitely buy from them again! The team is happy with the product!
Ordered it and 2 days later realized I wanted a lastname down the arm, they answered my email within a day and were able to add it ! Awesome
Had a last min change, Luke took care of it!.Great customer service..Cant wait to see how the hoodies turn out!.Website very easy to use.
Perfect customer service. I was able to receive help right away using the live chat option. Tianna W was great and answered all my questions!
I struggled to find a place without a minimum order- so grateful I found this website. They communicate quickly and make what you what WHEN you want! Easy to work with.

This is my 4th time receiving an order from rush order tees. The first time, they totally butchered my design. They put it in the completely wrong spot. 2nd time, they got right, but the design almost completely faded within 5 washes. The.

I won't order from this company again. Ordered a few t-shirts and the company not only changed the brand if the t-shirt I ordered, but printed it as direct-to-garmet, which was not specified anywhere. The print was splotchy and dull. They reprinted on the shirts I ordered, print looked great. until I washed the shirts. Wash in cold water and have never dried - they look more faded with each wash. Total waste of money :-(
Luke L. was great in helping reschedule my order so it would arrive when convenient for me..Painless and quick.
Customer service was very nice & helpful, have yet to receive my order though. Website was very easy to use, will update when I get it!

ordered multiple shirts from rush order tees and they did a wonder job. The one time I was not satisfied they sent me a new shirt no questions asked. this company takes pride in their work with exceptional customer service.

Great company to work with!.I had some last minute changes that were completely my fault and they were able to submit them asap..I had a new proof in 15 minutes and they were off to be printed..It's hard knowing which shirt is exactly what you want, even if you order some samples..There are a lot of choices..Almost too many, but working with customer service we were able to, almost to a tee, match fabric which a local company uses for their t-shirts that we love..Can't wait for the next order!
Anytime I ever need customer service, I know it's only going to be a few short minutes and the problem is ALWAYS taken care of. Love this company, our school will never go through anyone else!

My jacket was made and shipped to my very fast. I was not happy with the placement of my front logo ,when I designed the jacket I had asked them to check to see if it was in proper position. Hard to tell online. Well it's too low. They are now sending me a new one..Great customer service,will be buying more stuff from them. Mike f
I just had an online chat with Luke L. He took care of my request promptly and professionally. Service like this will keep us coming back. :-)
Very nice, courteous and professional people I love ordering designs i make in my spare time for myself from them!

I was procrastinating on ordering shirts for our vending event..I placed my order and selected delivery date a few days prior to event hoping the order would arrive..It arrived on the date specified and the product was great..Even had time to wash the shirts before the event. Thank you so much from Sheldon Woodworking and Fine Crafts..:-)
Tiana was so helpful when I was having trouble uploading my artwork!.I really appreciate the customer support RushOrderTees provides!

Totally satisfied with the speedy response I received to a concern I had with my order. My original item , while well done, was not a match to the proof I submitted. The support team a dressed my concerns promptly and with great professionalism.

Thank you rushordertees!.I will definitely recon end you to other and will not hesitate ordering again for myself in the future.

We ordered several work T shirts from Rush Order tees. They were the last piece of the puzzle and were meant to really tie everyone together. Making everyone look the same. Professional and uniform. The shirts (even though I received an email about them being delayed) arrived very quickly and the entire order process including designing the shirts was very easy to do. The shirts looked perfect when they arrived and we were stylin and profylin. Unfortunately not 7 months later the logo, company name and phone number were fading. I mean completely on a couple, mostly on another couple it was enough to make me reach out to the company just to mention it. I really didn't expect much and truthfully I don't know the life expectancy for this type of shirt. Maybe it was only 2 months and these shirts lasted an incredible amount of time. Not so. One email describing my problem and Rush Order Tees was all over it. Without hesitation they are reprinting and resending out my entire order. BOOM. this is how companies should do business. When Rush Order Tees says Great Product Great Service & Great People in their logo. well it's the truth. These people aren't working in some sweatshop in Bangladesh (I don't think) they are here helping their customers design great looking stuff and backing their product all the way to the bank. FUSH ORDER TEES you have a customer for life. Thank you so much.
Super easy process, Fast- response time, received on time and Product looks great. Would recommend and will use again.
They gave me a courtesy waiver for additional fees on one of my order. Really easy to work with and priced right. Thank you!

UPDATE: They followed up and initially refunded the rush shipping fee. When we missed our deadline for the project, they refunded the remaining balance. When the shirts did arrive, the print quality was very good, as was the shirt quality (Next Level). Despite my initial frustration, I do feel they made an earnest effort to correct the situation, so I've updated my initial 1-star review accordingly.

----

We paid $70 for the fastest rush shipping option on a very time-sensitive job (and the ability to hit the deadline was the entire reason for using Rush Order Tees). The delivery date specified during the ordering process was 9/14. After checkout, they quietly changed the delivery date to 9/16. Now we have a few hundred dollars of useless shirts, plus a pointless rush shipping fee.

Shirt Order arrived with a couple of issues..ROT Custom T-Shirts & Apparel was made aware of it and they were able to quickly and efficiently correct the order at no extra cost..Very Satisfied and would recommend their company..Great work and customer service.
Thank you so much, Tianna, for your help getting my order right. You are very polite, professional, and helpful. I appreciate all you did!

Great quality tshirts, quick delivery, even better customer service. Allison was great. We were initially unhappy with the first set of shirts and they immediately sent another set of edited shirts for free! The new set was perfect and just in time for the event! Allison made sure to have them shipped on time :)

I got tank tops for my bachelor party week and they came out great. We used graphics the company already had to create our own design online. The quality of the shirts and design are impressive. My buddies and I still wear these shirts to the beach and gym. The price is great and I definitely recommend using rushordertees. Our order came in quick too, with free shipping.

Updates 6 years later. Still wearing these shirts and the graphics have not faded from wash.

Ordered shirts for our trade show paid for overnight shipping did not receive! We're supposed to ship to our destination and somehow didn't even get out of production! Service rep didn't even care said we will see about a refund! Awful service!
I screwed up my order but they fixed it in time and got it to us just in time..My son is excited to wear it to school once before we hit the road to Rachel. Come on let's play! Thanks guys!
One of the most simple and most helpful custom t-shirt websites and companies out there. 10 stars if it was an option!

My order arrived and half of the shirts were misprinted. The ones that were printed correctly were perfect!.I emailed them to report the issue and they got back to me within seconds and submitted a reprint order with no questions asked. I appreciate the excellent customer service and will definitely use them again in the future.

Great quality, Service, , options, product and especially the people, thanks to John working out and helping with design , style, color fabric( shirt, Sweater, long/Short sleeve, Golf shirt etc.). Would advise to give this company & their reputation a Shot. Worth every second & Cent

Ordered 1 tank top for my boyfriend that I customized the front and back of. My order came 3 days earlier then planned (standard shipping) unfortunately they sent a t-shirt instead of a tank top, I called the customer service number and the gentlemen I spoke with could not have been nicer or more accommodating! I explained my issue and he let me know they would ship out a new shirt (tank top) with my customizations ASAP and apologized for the mix up. Also let me keep the original T-shirt which was so nice of them. The prints came out amazing on the shirt as well. Great quality and great customer service!
