Will definitely be recommending and using this company in the future !
Excellent customer service! We have used several in-person and online printing services for apparel. This was easy to order and the rush order was on delivered on time. Would use this service again.

I do NOT recommend Rush order tees to anyone. Not only did it take over 45 days to receive my shirts, when they finally did come they looked like trash. The shirt on the right is from Uber Prints. I received it in about 10 days. The shirt on the left is from Rush order tees. Why would Rush order tees even mail out shirts that look like this. Complete trash.
They did not charge me an extra fee for special printing! Greatly appreciate this

Remarkable - Excellent - Marvelous - Fantastic - Great - Awesome - Wonderful - Amazing - Impressive - Spectacular - Outstanding - Stunning - Incredible - Extraordinary - Phenomenal - Just a few words that describe RushOrderTees

Although I had issues with my order I was helped out greatly by the customer service. Thank you for a great product the t-shirts came out great and I plan on working with this company in the future. I recommend them for their great prices and quality product. The website also has a great customization option.
Luke was extremely helpful and gathered the information I needed fast. Explained the reasoning as well..Great asset to your company!
RushOrder Tees done a great job on our T-shirts! They were fast and efficient when it come down to the whole order. I will definitely be ordering shirts again for my business.
This was very easy to use and communication is great can't wait to see how my order turns out

My husband celebrated his 50th birthday in early May this year and I had planned a surprise party for him to celebrate with all our friends during our Outer Banks vacation in mid May. About 2 weeks before we were set to leave I got the bright idea to order shirts for everyone for the celebration. I kept telling myself I wished I'd thought of the idea sooner, but I would somehow make it work. Thanks to Josh and Nathan at Rush Order Tees the surprise went off without any issues or glitches and everyone loved their shirts! They helped me get my order placed AND rushed the delivery so I would receive them before we departed for North Carolina. I can't say enough about how great this experience was. Their customer service and products are top notch! Thank you so much guys!

We placed an order for 100 t-shirts with RushOrderTees..About 15 of these we needed rushed..They created two separate orders, but gave us the bulk rate for the smaller order as well..They even helped us with larger sizes (3X and 5X)..T-shirts arrived when expected and were of excellent quality (Gildan)..We were so impressed, we placed another order soon after for a different design..Again, delivered when expected and, again, excellent quality..We were missing one t-shirt..They responded immediately to the email I sent them and are rushing the missing t-shirt to us..Overall, a great company to work with with fast response times, on-time shipping and a great product!

I ordered a hoodie that was 60 dollars (!) but I liked the design I had made so I ordered despite the price. The day the order was marked as delivered I was excited but the package wasn't anywhere to be found. I called customer service and they told me they could reprint my hoodie on a different brand of hoodie. I didn't want that and requested a refund and was told it's not an option for the representative. I asked if there would be an issue if I disputed it with my bank and the agent said ‚Äúwe have proof of delivery so we would dispute it‚Äù. Unbelievable robbery of my money and rude customer service.

edit: don't think just because they responded to my review they solved my problem. all they did was once again offer me the same design in a different color. will not be using their services again, and i strongly advice you to not as well as they can literally steal your money.

Spent almost $200 on 1 hoodie and 3 shirts and all the shirts were horribly done. Its almost as if they take the name of the brand RUSHordertees literally and they rush everything to the point where it comes out horrible. The logo i wanted on the garments were so low they were pretty much printed on the stomach area of the shirts and hoodie instead of the middle chest area and the logo i wanted on them were crooked and the garments were just completely unwearable. On top of that i ordered a medium hoodie and recieved an XL instead. They are reprinting them so when i have the repirints i will update this with how they come out. This isnt the first order i had like this from this company. Seem they need to take more pride in their work instead of literally rushing everything. And maybe check the work before just packing it up and shipping it out like its all good. People are spending a lot of money on this stuff.

Update: I got my reprints and they came in absolutely perfect just the way i was expecting them to the first time. I will soon be making a bigger order and i just wanted to make sure they were going to be perfect before putting that order in. RushOrderTees customer servicr is on point. Thank you guys.

This was my first time ordering custom shirts, and the staff made it relatively seamless. Although there was an issue with the initial design I wanted due to restrictions of printing area, the staff did their best to accommodate and help with suggestions. I had very minor issues with the shirts delivered, having only 3 out of 65 that weren't quite right. They offered to correct and send out new ones ASAP. Very great team they have and reliably quick with timeframes. Will definitely be returning in the future.

Drop ship company portraying to print themselves. Bulk order of t-shirts showed up partially blank from heat press missed stamps. Customer service , Is beyond rude and does not speak to clients in a professional manner. I hardly ever if almost not at all give one stars on Google maps but these guys are definitely not worth the price to products they require. Furthermore they stay at the top of google for paid advertising not because of great customer reviews.

Rush order is the Best! I have placed many orders with them for our HVAC company. Shirts are made well and arrive quickly. Customer service is amazing! They definitely take pride in their work. If you are not satisfied with something, they quickly remedy the problem. Amazing Company. I cant say enough good things. Thanks for the work you do, and treating your customers so well.
One of the best customer service experiences i have had! The agents always answer my questions in a timely matter and help me with all of my questions!

Needed some tees before a trip with my college friends. USPS lost the package and I was in danger of not having my shirts for the trip. Rush Order Tees printed my shirts that day and offered to ship them overnight which would have solved the issue. I am luckily located near their office so we were able to arrange local pick up which was super convenient for me! The shirts were amazing quality and exactly what I ordered. Al my friends loved them! 10/10 would recommend and will be buying again
Artwork started peeling off after one wash. Email them, attached photos of shirts. Week later i received new shirts. Fair.
I've used ROT several times. The shirts always look great. Also, their customer service is terrific.

Exceptional customer care; they went further than above and beyond to address my concern. Products are very fairly priced and the workmanship in the customization is extremely well-executed. We will return for further business to say the least. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

I ordered 3 shirts with a digital art print that I had created. The shirts were printed slightly higher to the neckline than I would have liked. Yet, when I expressed my dislike of the placement, RushOrder Tees got right on changing the placement and sending me new shirts that fit what I had expected! The customer service was great when dealing with the replacement t-shirts and there was no kickback from the company. Great experience!

My first order with them last year was delivery coming before expected. This last order I was mislead twice when I called in to question the timeline. Both times I called because it was close to delivery date but I was not given a shipping number yet. I was told order was on schedule. a few days after the were supposed to be delivered I emailed customer service and was I told they looked into it and they are behind. It would be completed and shipped sometime next week. I only wish they were upfront about being behind schedule from the beginning and I could have made other arrangements. I do not recommend using them anymore as I did after the first order last year. Going to try somewhere local next time.
Thanks Luke for all the help on confirming the order. Much appreciated. It's my 2nd year ordering, super excited.

Originally, I placed an order for a garment that, it turned out, wouldn't arrive in time for Christmas (supply chain 2021)‚Äîcustomer service reached out to me and walked me through replacement options AND made sure I'd get the sweatshirts in time for Christmas. I honestly like the replacement option they suggested even better than what I originally chose. I will 100% order from them again. The sweatshirts are beautiful, and the customer service is seriously unparalleled.

I love what they made for me! The quality is great.
During the process of making my order, I've bothered them with so many questions and they were open to helping me out every single time.
Their staff is very kind and very helpful.
Loved working with this place!

Ordered my first t-shirt from rushordertees. I was actually able to talk to someone to help me with the order. I wanted a t-shirt that was not clingy but didn't wrinkle. The guy was super nice and picked out the perfect shirt. The order came a week early but unfortunately the logo I picked was to high on the back of the shirt. I sent an email explaining the situation and they are rectifying the problem and sending me a free t-shirt. sometimes problems happen when ordering custom items. I am super happy so far with rushordertees for doing everything possible to resolve the issue. If the shirt arrives corrected I will defiantly order from them again.

I ordered a set of embordered polos. At first the order was delayed and I received zero communication about it, and it was difficult to get a straight answer. However when the polos did arrive, they were atrocious. You couldn't read the logo, several had loose threads, and some didn't even have a completed logo. They were unusable, and because they arrived late I couldn't rush a new order to fix them before the date I needed. I eventually go a re-order for free and those came out a lot better, still messy and not quite up to par but better and I can actually use them.

However, their customer service was far and away the best I have ever worked with. Everyone I spoke to was supper accommodating and helpful and they worked really hard to make sure my re-order was done correctly. The only reason they are getting 3 stars is because the customer service was amazing. I won't necessarily get something embroidered from them again, but I might consider them for an easier, less important job in the future.

I ordered two different styles of shirts. The overall quality of the shirt was good, but.the printing was offset so it looked like it had been double printed. Polo's were supposed to have.embordering instead of ink. Called the customer service and explained to them the situation and with out argument.they responded with an email explaining the situation would be handled ASAP. I run a company and know how orders get mixed up and issues occur but the customer service and response is what makes a company stand out. So far I'm beyond happy with the response from the team and can't wait to see the new shirts with proper lettering..I will give a follow up on the condition of the new polo's. Thank you for the great customer service RushOrderTees.!

Initial ordering was easy and I was able to customize the shirt just the way I wanted in a very short time..Delivery was made on an expedited basis within the time promised..One of the shirts I ordered had a small mistake..I called the 800 number which was promptly answered and the service agent took care of the issue on the spot with no charge to me..She was very polite and professional and was able to immediately confirm the mistake and correct it..Great customer service and great product quality - the shirts turned out just like I envisioned them.

Rush Order Tees was a super easy process from start to finish. If you want great communication.and customer service, Rush Order Tees is rather amazing! My order was designed and shipped promptly. The quality of shirts were exactly as described and the print was exactly as pictured in the design process and design approval stage. 2 of my shirts had minor defects mainly due to the color of the shirt itself bleeding through the design a bit, but within minutes of reaching out, and I mean minutes, they were already on top of making it right and printing me two more. This company is an absolute pleasure to do business with! 5 stars all day!

I recently placed a small order with Rush Order Tees. I found the design process and the order process to be user friendly and quick..The communication from the company was awesome and the speed in which they printed my shirts and shipped them was fast..Part of my order wasn't to my satisfaction as the coloring was not accurate..I quickly notified R.O.T. and they quickly sent me a replacement..Overall, I am very happy with their service and would do business again.

15 shirts with defective logo front and back..(bleeding adhesive or something) company wont replace because its two years old..they blame the storage conditions, but not all the shirts are defective.

but the problem is its a small order, over half the stock ordered in.advance gone bad, sitting in the box, or sent that way, and company REFUSES to correct claiming no liability. Doesn't even offer an option.just a hard no and a tone of voice that expected a confrontation, doesn't reference a policy or contract clause..Just no. Almost as if they are aware of this???.but i digress.

its only 15 shirts. i paid for them. i dont care how long ago. they arent usable..do the right thing.

Great customer service. I run an electric company and ordered shirts with my logo on it that came out better than expected.

Unfortunately t-shirts are not very true to size. I recommend going up a size in adult sizes. I emailed them about my issue with the sizing and they mailed out a new set of shirts the very next day, very fast shipping.

Definitely recommend this place ëçëç will be ordering more in the future through them

This company has been a pleasure to deal with. My first order came perfectly with no issues. The second one I received with an error on the graphic in the back. I contacted them immediately and are fixing and replacing the shirts. Great customer service!
Ordered shirts for my teams and am happy with the selection and service provided by Luke L.

I had a problem with the printing coming off during second washing cycle. I sent an email with pictures and they immediately sent an entire new order (10 shirts). From the design help, to the constant order updates, to the prompt incredible service, all has been excellent! I will never use a different company, they have at least one lifetime customer.

I ordered three logo tshirts printed front and back, although the front logo was slightly tilted and not perfect, I'm giving them a 5 star review for immediately responding to my email, (after normal business hours) and confirming the reprint and delivery date of three new shirts-

Update: upon reading my review below, a customer support rep reached out and gave me a full refund, which I do appreciate given the poor communication combined with my original order arriving on time but not being correctly printed and therefore unusable. Ultimately, my reprinted order did not arrive in time for event, as mentioned below, so the refund here was the appropriate resolution.

Rush Order Tees processed and printed an order incorrectly without letting me know there'd be a change to the design I submitted. I paid nearly double for my order for rush shipping to ensure delivery for an event I had on 11/12. The shirts arrived in time, but were not correct and therefore I could not use them. ROT's customer support apologized and said they'd reprint the order, but knowing the order would arrive after my event, I let them know this was not the desired resolution since the reprinted shirts would be of no value given their late arrival. ROT's team stopped responding to me and sent the order anyway. The reprinted order was correct, but came too late. This approach is very poor customer service, especially since it's clear the mistake was on ROT's end, since they were able to re-print the design correctly the second time around. Why couldn't they have done this the first time, or reached out to let me know if there was some issue? Why did they ignore me when I politely requested a refund since a re-print would arrive too late? I won't be using this company's service again. Their approach to customer service and error resolution leaves much to be desired.

worst experience ever- Payed $50 for a single shirt - the.original.shirt did not ever arrive-.usps says it was never picked up from them- but they said it was when I called to cancel order . At that point we still had 5 days.until the event so they convinced me to let them replace the order so.i did-.Howerver, the second ordered shirt.did not arrive in time for the event i needed it for. When it did arrive a day after the event.it was on a totally different t shirt than i had originally ordered and it had a misprint on the front- a big white dot that was not connected to anything- a simple quality control before it left the facility would have caught this. Bottom line- there are some other options out there for fast low minimum screen printing.and I would use them over rush order t's!

I received my shirt very fast..Once I got it the color was lighter then I had hoped it would be. I sent an email and they are sending a replacement..I find customer service is what really matters to me now and I was happy to hear back from them so soon.
Really easy order process..Reasonable prices..Can't wait to actually get the sweatshirt.
Had a little miss print customer support got back to me within a couple hours and are sending me new shirts!

They were good shirts until I ran them through a washer machine and dryer machine 2 times than the print on the back started to fade away a lot. Recieved new shirts and they work great now. Good Customer Service and fast Delivery of the package

I ordered ten shirts for my business. The shirts arrived early. The material of the shirts was very soft and looked to be extremely comfortable. The sizing was perfect. Unfortunately, my business name and logo on the front of my shirts was much too small. I contacted RushOrder Tees and explained that, overall, the shirts appeared to be pretty much what I wanted however, my business logo and name on the front was much too small. Within hours RushOrder Tees contacted me and advised me that they were sorry that the order wasn't to standard and were going to send me replacements. This is exactly what good businesses do. The fast response to this issue will keep me dealing with RushOrder Tees from this point forward.

Very poor service and misleading.

I was initially glad to have found RushOrderTees after contacting their Online Chat that confirmed delivery could be made for customized T-shirts to arrive on Oct 28th if I placed the order before 7 pm (Eastern time) on Oct 22nd.

However, at 4 pm on the same day (Oct 22nd), when finalizing the order, I was then informed that they could not abide by the agreed date and would actually need 4 extra days to deliver the T-shirts (Nov 1st).

After raising my concerns to the sales and customer services via email, all they would reply was that I could placing an order online or by calling them without addressing or even acknowledging any of the concerns. Very unhelpful and not at all useful.

The whole experience has been extremely misleading, especially having being told very different information as well as their website stating that same day turnaround would be possible and that they advertise that they could delivery in 4 business days. None of the advertised information or agreed delivery date has turned out to be true.

I ordered 12 custom printed t-shirts for a golf weekend we've been doing for over 20 years..After I ordered, I confirmed with a sales rep via e-mail that I would receive a proof of my shirt before it was printed..I did not..I instead received an e-mail that they'd already been shipped..I reached out to them, and they said I'd indicated in my order that I didn't need to see a proof, and assured me the printing would be of the highest quality..When I received the shirts, the printing was indeed great, but just on the WRONG SHIRT..I reached back out to let them know I received the wrong shirt, and they assured me they would reprint and send replacements ASAP..After a few days, I received another e-mail that stated they didn't have the shirt in stock (white XL Hanes Beefy-t -- really?), and that they would simply refund me $60 for my trouble..The shirts they sent were less expensive, so essentially, I just paid for what I received -- even though it was wrong..There was no indication on the site -- and still isn't -- that Hanes Beefy-ts are unavailable..Just gives the impression they didn't want the expense of owning up to their mistake..Very disappointing.

Nothing but good things to say about them. I own and operate a small home restoration business, everything from the design process to the final product was smoothe and efficient..I had a deadline for a recent order and due to unforeseen issues the product was delayed. Their customer service was friendly and efficient and took care of me, offering a refund and still delivering the product as a sign of good faith..I will continue to use their services as they're professional, and handle situations properly with the customer in mind, from one business to another I highly recommend them!

Received my order on August 3, 2021, but it was not quite what I ordered..The image and lettering were in white and should have been black..I called customer support and spoke with Tyler who was very polite and efficient..He is rectifying the situation and I should receive the correct shirts..Thank you for your great customer assistance.

I have recently started a non profit organization (Pier22 Fishing)with my buddies and we needed a place to order product from. I have been working with RushOrderTees for about 3 weeks. The service they provide is unreal. They offer great products but what really makes this company amazing is the customer service they provide. They are quick to respond, help you with your design and offer solutions for you. When there is an issue with your order they are quick to fix it. I've never had customer service like this before. When they say real people unreal service it's 100% spot on.

This company has excellent customer service. I spoke to a representative (Angel) on the phone to discuss the possibility of creating 2 shirts that I could pick up the very next day, and he worked with me to get the entire thing done in an impressive timely fashion. In less than 24 hours I went from having a shirt idea to having the two shirts printed and in my hands. The shirts are good quality and as I said the customer service is really excellent - all of the 3 people I spoke to were extremely responsive and knowledgable, and went above and beyond to get my task done. Highly recommend using this company for your t-shirt orders.
Great quality and great customer service! Tianna W. helped me update my order seamlessly.

Their customer service is 5 stars but as far as making the product look the way I designed it, it would equate 3 stars. I have ordered from them twice now and the first initial shipment has always had some type of issue. The first time I ordered, they gave me the wrong size and wrong brand and the print in the front was incorrectly placed. However, they are very quick to reply to my email and fix this issue by sending me a new one. The replacement hoodie was exactly correct to what I had initially designed. The second time I ordered, the only issue I had was that the print in the front was place in the center of the chest rather than the left as I had designed. Again, they were quick to reply and informed me that they would send a new one. Overall, I would give them a 4 stars. They put forth a good effort and if there is ever any issue they respond immediately and fix the problem. I would recommend this to people who have patience. They take a bit to process the order and print/make the product, it does take a bit of time. In addition, if there is an issue with the product, it will take more time for them to send out a new one to replace the faulty one. Worth a shot though!
Super helpful and professional. Couldn't be happier with the ordering process and communication
Luke was absolutely amazing helping me get my order handled in a timely manner.
RushOrder Tees has such great, attentive customer service, I highly recommend!
RushOrderTees saved us! We needed 30 shirts by Saturday and they actually promised them by Wednesday (less than a week after ordering!) They arrived on Tuesday and were beautiful! Thanks!

5 star service hands down!.I ordered shirts for my business and a few weeks later had letters falling off from the wash. Called and without hesitation they upgraded the level of material and sent out a fresh batch. Jace Miller was awesome! Much appreciated and will 100% use this company again!

Received the wrong product. Was a little frustrated after spending so much money only to receive the wrong shirts. But I've been notified that a replacement is being sent out with my original intended product choice. Rushordertees is great for any print on demand needs you may have. Amazing customer service! Nice they have no minimum order quantity. Thanks Rushordertees!

This is the second time our company has used this service ! We had an issue, and the customer service level is honestly the best customer service. Great job to everyone at Rush order ! Much appreciated! You have a returning customer!

My t-shirt came as ordered..Very happy, but after the first wash some of the letters started peeling before I even got the chance to wear it even once..So I contacted RushOrderTees, and they immediately sent me a replacement..No questions asked..That is great customer service. Thanks!

I ordered a single custom screen printed garment from RushOrderTees; this was my first-ever experience with this company. I purchased from them because they offered a wide selection of products and the design interface was super-easy to navigate. When the order arrived--a week earlier than they had promised--the graphic had been printed in the wrong place. I emailed the company to alert them to the error and within a few hours they had not only responded to express their disappointment in and offer their apologies for the snafu but also to tell me they'd made the correction AND had already begun the process of re-printing the job . . . for FREE. How could I ever do business with anyone else? 100% satisfied!

RushOrderTees is AWESOME! I asked favors of their team twice during the process, and they beyond stepped up to the bat both times to meet my specific needs. I am filled with gratitude. To see why the shirt they made is so important to me, go to Instagram on July 29 and look at posts by @gal0tgo. I cannot rave about RushOrderTees enough -- from ease of creating my order, placing my order, fair pricing, working with members of their customer service team, turnaround time, to finished product. They earned 5++++ stars with me!

Keep up the stellar job, RushOrderTees!

This site is great!.They make sure to get your order to you on time and work with you throughout the entire process.

I was able to chat and confirm our original design would be suitable..After sign off I submitted for proofs..They were not exactly as we expected, but they were able to rectify within 24 hrs and still get us our shirts on the day we were meant to receive them..They came out perfectly and the shirt is great quality!

Best customer experience ever!.I came across this place when looking for a last minute custom T-shirt printing option for my sons birthday..Website was easy to use, and I got immediate responses to all my questions over email..The order arrived as promised, however, a package thief stole the package right from my door!.I filed a police report, but was devastated since I didn't expect to have the order re- fulfilled.within 2 days (in time for the party). I contacted RushOrderTees and they immediately came to the rescue..They saved our party and made a lifelong customer..Everyone loved the shirts, and wore them to school the next day..I washed these shirts, and they still look great - highly, highly recommend! Would give this 6* if I could.

Art approval takes weeks? WHAT?.go to 4imprint and get your art approval same day and your shirts QUICK..Don't know why I strayed but I learned my lesson..Good luck getting what you want in a reasonably fast manor.

RushOrder Tees was very accommodating and easy to work with. They did a great job helping us design t shirts for our company! Definitely would recommend this company and will use again in the near future!

I had a large complex order and RushOrderTees delivered over and above expectations..They put everything in the cart for me, applied the promo codes, held the order while I changed quantities & graphics, and provided outstanding customer service..Michaela & Gigi were both amazing when I had issues and changes, fixed everything without any pushback at all..I order a significant amount of spirit wear from a variety of online and physical vendors and RushOrderTees far exceeded the other vendors I use..The quality of the products was superb, everything arrived when they said it would, and they were extremely responsive..I highly recommend this company, they do a great job all around.
Really great experience on the website and with their customer support on the live chat. Very helpful, seamless and fast!

I placed an order just to try out this company with some basic work t shirts for my Mobile Auto Repair Business. My order arrived about a week sooner then expected. The online design process was pretty simple. My only problem was when i opened my package and started looking at the shirts, I found 2 of them to have what looked like a crease from them folding them but upon trying to get it unstuck it started peeling the logo. I reached out and they handled the problem very quickly and will be sending me a new order to solve my problem. I get it this place is very busy and may have just folded the tees a little too soon as to why the silk screen stuck to itself. But the problem was addressed and overall I am happy with the quality of shirts and also the customer service. Highly recommended if your looking to have shirts made for any business or event. Thanks Rushordertees i now look official with my new company shirts.

First time ordering, arrived on time and design was amazing. Colors got mixed up but their customer service is second to none and re shipped replacements to make my experience the best possible. Definitely will recommend and order again. 5 star items, shipping, and customer service!

It's the poor and unprofessional customer service for me. It's Mike who could not offer any concrete information on where my order is and could only blame me for choosing free shipping for my $200.00 plus order and blame their delivery partner while not confirming the shirts have even shipped. Makes me think they're way behind on production and nothing has shipped at all. I'm not used to calling any professional business with an issue and being met with such lack of accountability AND lack of being solution oriented AND no apology. Just finger pointing and no real update on an order ppaced over three weeks ago. Being I and the company are in the same city, I would have taken an offer to pick up my order. But you can't pick up what's not produced.

I had a t shirt shipped to me that had some stains from the printing on it. Within minutes of notifying them they started the process of making and sending me a new one. It arrived within days. This is the best customer service I have ever experienced! Plus the products they put out are done extremely well and on high quality shirts.

Received my product and quality of Tshirts and print was awesome, just an issue with placement. I sent an email and the same day they advised me they are resending out the order to satisfy my issue. truly amazing customer service which is everything when dealing with companies! Thank you!

I made a custom T-shirt order in plenty of time to receive my order for a specific event..After approving my design I was given the delivery date..The date came and went but my shirts never showed up..I contacted customer support and was given an updated delivery date (a week later)..The second date also came and went but no order was delivered..I also never received any updated information..The event has now passed..I am demanding a full refund.."Rush Order Tees" should be called "You Might Get Your Order IF We Feel Like It.".I am extremely disappointed with this company.

UPDATE:.My initial 1 star review has been updates to 3 stars..The event I needed the shirts for has already passed..After the event passed I contacted the company to cancel my order and get a refund..The customer service people were very nice..They cancelled my order and I received a full refund..I was also contacted by the V.P. of sales (Josh Hannum) who apologized for my order not being ready in time..He fulfilled my order at no cost to me!.The shirts arrived today and are wonderful..If I could have received the shirts when I needed them I would have given 5 stars!.By sending the order, even after I cancelled it, you showed me you do care about the customers..Thank you.

UPDATE:.I must upgrade my experience from a 4 star rating to a 5 star rating due to the efforts of Michael and Alyssa with RushOrderTees!.They promptly addressed the paint residue issue I had by replacing the shirts that had the residue on them..I also mentioned to Alyssa that I actually needed to add a shirt to my order because I had miscounted the number of shirts I needed and she gave me the additional shirt free of charge!.this company is top notch!.They went above and beyond to ensure my experience was the best experience possible..They deserve 6 stars!.I highly recommend using them for your custom t-shirt needs!

Everything about my experience ordering with RushOrderTees was a 5 star experience except the skill with which the shirts were printed..At least 3 of the 13 shirts I ordered had paint residue on the back side..I had nothing printed on the back of the shirts. My order definitely qualified as a RUSH order so I am assuming that may be the reason for the sloppiness on a few of the shirts.

This company has provided some of the best customer service ive experienced in my life..Their was an error with my order that resulted in me receiving the wrong shirts as the ones i ordered were discontinued..The whole process involved with correcting this error was painless and very professional..All of the customer service representatives i interacted with were pleasant and helpful and the wait time was exceptionally low. My experience with Rush Order Tees customer service was exceptional and i will absolutely order from them again.

First and foremost I want to say thank you Evette. She helped me fix an order that did not come as I had planned. Everything was replaced free of charge by Rushordertees and she made the entire experience pain free. She is the BEST! Thank Rushorder for having her on staff.
Edited: I had a bit of a bumpy experience at first, but when things got escalated, RushOrderTees made sure to correct the order, checking in along the way to make sure it was right.

Order was received with errors, on the company's part. I called and they will fix it and reship! They make their returns/exchanges super easy. The only thing was that the customer service guy was a jerk, but that's understandable I guess.

This is my second time using RushOrder Tees and I'm so happy with our shirts! There was a small mistake on my order, but their customer service was amazing and quickly fixed the problem and sent out new shirts immediately. I highly recommend!

My order arrived not as ordered, with some sizes overshipped and another under shipped. I have been assured by email that the short shipped shirts will be sent as soon as the run can be completed. I trust this process will solve the problem, then I'd give the 5 stars

I ordered t shirts and even though there was an error in color, the quality of the shirts and the printing was top rate. Customer service was very quick in resolving the problem and they have made a happy customer out of me. Definitely will be placing orders with them in the future!

The ordering process is easy. I was able to place my order by uploading an image from my Google drive, it arrived within about 10 days (maybe less). The colors were not vibrant and the image was faded. I was disappointed so I called the customer service number provided in the email and easily reached a real person. It was difficult to hear her, but I explained my situation, and she had pulled up my order immediately and said they would send me out a new one at no cost. The situation was handled easily. I'm looking forward to receiving my order. Hoping it's brightly colored and vibrant this time.

Made an order for our company and the shirts look great and we received them very quickly. The sizing ran a little small for some of our guys but Rush order made it right. They are Awesome! Thank you, and I definitely recommend this company :)
After choosing rushordertees for the best pricing, availability and shipping times I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of my shirts (ordered 30 baseball ts) and very responsive customer care.

Outstanding customer service! I had an issue with how my design was printed on the final product, and after reaching out I had a response back from them within a few hours to replace it for me. The quality of the printing is fantastic, and it arrived sooner than expected. I can't wait to buy another custom shirt!
Thank you to Luke for looking in to my question and giving me a quick answer! I can't wait to see the finished product.

Design and selection were very easy using the website tools..Rush delivery rates were also quite reasonable..With a little glitch on the order, customer service was fast and fixed the issue entirely with no hassle or extra charges..Will use again for sure.
We appreciate all the extra help! You guys made it happen for us so quickly and against the odds. Thanks Luke L especially!

I am VERY upset and they are not answering a phone..Everything is so impersonal and automated..I was shipped the wrong thing and they auto answer is to reprint..I don't need a reprint of this, I need someone to here you printed it wrong. I had 2 designs 2 should have been of 1 and the other should be just 1 shirt..I received 3 shirts of the first design..Secondly, I had placed another order for nearly 200 shirts and I am now really concerned they will be wrong..Terrible Customer Service!

RushOrderTees is the absolute coolest company to deal with! They make everything you can think of and their turn around time is lightning fast! I've had several orders with them already and I will always highly recommend them to everyone! Thanks and keep up the AMAZING work!

Do NOT, I Repeat, Do Not use this company! I have used this company twice for the Merch at my Performing Arts school. The first time we spent around $250. When the merch arrived it was extremely cheap quality and the designs were wrong. However we tried this company a second time. Silly us. We spent around $1600 for hoodies and sweatpants. Not a huge order for the high price. When the merch arrived 90% of it was damaged. Not considering the extremely cheap material of both the hoodies and the pants, but the pockets to the hoodies were all hanging off, the stitching was terribly done, there were strings and tattered parts, the pressed logos were peeling, most of the hoodie pockets had small holes AND we were missing items §¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. We attempted several times to communicate with this extremely unprofessional company. Not only were we treated as if it was our fault the order had so many flaws, but they refused to take the full order back and return our money. They also refused to send us the missing merch we paid for or to replace all of the damaged merch. We sent in photos but were told that wasn't good enough to prove the damage. I lost money on this order. Not only that but I've had to return money to families that purchased merch and after ONE WASH - had to contact me because the hoodie pockets came right off the hoodies. Not only is their product cheap, overpriced and damaged but their customer service is enough to make us never return. Waste of money and time!
had a issue with arrival date - ROCKSTAR Luke saved my bacon! You have my business 4 life!

I highly recommend this company! I ordered 66 shirts for my family reunion and It was a pleasant experience from beginning to end. Michael who I worked with was very responsive and patient with me. I had an issue with one of my shirts and my issue was quickly resolved without hesitation by The customer service agent. If you need shirts quickly and for a very reasonable price, please use this company. You won't be disappointed!
Waived my sleeve design fee! Will use them again for my other friends! Thank you

Incredible service..There was a misprint and they sent me the fixed version of my shirts with-in the time frame that I needed them..Barely had to wait a day for their response to my concern..Great company! Great people!

I'm very pleased!.The print on the front was a little more faded than I expected and the black lettering on one shirt had a yellowing effect around the letters - that said, the follow through with this company was painless and they have offered to replace the shirts..GREAT customer service and it was very easy..They stand behind their work.
Thanks for getting the shirts for our team ready so quickly..Everyone loved them..My only complaint would be that my wife's shirt had a hole in the sleeve.

After my initial order went wrong and not being able to speak to customer service,.I was contacted by Heather who was soo nice and apologetic..Heather did everything to try and right the wrongs. Heather stayed in contact with me throughout the process. I received a new order and they were better than the first..Overall, I am satisfied with my new order,.all thanks to Heather.

I ordered from RushOrderTees for my class graduation t-shirts and they turned out amazing! The quality was top class - not your typical marketing t-shirt. We were running against a hard deadline and the sales rep who helped me place the order was super understanding. when i called back in to update sizing after i placed my order, customer service was fantastic! i received my shirt 3 days before the expected delivery date and was amazed! after many failed attempts contacting other companies, RushOrderTees really made it work. my entire class went crazy over the shirts. we're already planning to order more for our summer camps and even some for family reunions! thanks so much Justin and Jess. you were AMAZING!
Had a small issue, and customer service went above and beyond to fix - will be ordering more shirts in the future !

Recently ordered t-shirts for the club I'm in. Designing the shirts was easy and the shipping was on time. The graphics look good, only problem was the front logo was centered instead of top left corner. I called the 800 number and they were glad to help. I will have new shirts within the week on the house. Will definitely be using them again if I need more shirts.

I put an order in 8 days before I needed it (yes - poor planning on my part but thats why I went with "RUSH ORDER TEES." The soonest I could get it was 7 days later - 1 day before the event I was hosting. 2 days before the shirts were to arrive, I got an update from the delivery system saying I wouldn't have my shirts until 2 days later than I paid for (which was after the event). I called and the woman on the phone told me it was UPS' fault and not theirs, but that they would remedy the situation by doing the order - that day in their shop - and overnight it to me to get it to me by 12pm Saturday. I was thrilled with the customer service.

BUT - Saturday at 12 came and went - and I was literally waiting at my house just for the shirts to arrive before I left for my event. No shirts came. I called and asked where they were and customer service told me "Oh yeh, it looks like we weren't actually able to get them printed in time. Sorry." That's it. They refunded me, which is fine, but I would have paid DOUBLE to have them in the time frame they were guaranteed. And once this rush order wasn't going to be possible, had the company let me know then I could have made alternative plans.

Long story short - if you need a rush order and are hoping using "RushOrderTees will be your saving grace, look elsewhere.
Excellent, fast service!.Decided to order shirts for an event at the last minute..Rush Order Tees delivered custom shirts matching men's and women's sizes.

I ordered my first hoody to start my clothing line advertisement and the pics were way smaller and not placed where i designed them at on the website.but they are going to fix it and send me a REPLACEMENT hoodie they are very attentive and professional DEFINITELY will be shopping with them in the NEAR FUTURE
Tianna W. was so helpful in making sure my order was correct and that I was satisfied.

There was an initial quality problem with the graphics, which, to be fair, are intricate. They have remedied the problem and much to our staisfaction, were prompt in addressing it. We commend the support system at RushOrderTees and their professional response.

Love their products! Creating custom shirts etc is so easy! And the one time there was an issue they took care of it right away and sent me a replacement for the incorrect item. I plan to order more in the future!

Most definitely a 5 star experience with this company, the print turned out perfect, it is great quality transfer, thicker stuff rather then thin quick wash off transfer. Also the order came extremely quick, which I was surprised considering it was such a large order. and the colour showed perfectly on all different shades of hoodies to! we will definitely be ordering from Rush Order Tees again! :) Thank you!

I have ordered four times now from Rush Order Tees. The first three times, they knocked it out of the park with their quality and delivery speed. This last order had a couple of small issues with the print quality. When Rush Order Tees found out about these issues, they informed me that they are replacing my order. Wow.now that's customer service. I cannot speak highly enough about the character, quality and service of this company. I would highly recommend them to anyone wanting top notch service and quality.

They are amazing! I will forever order all of my custom orders from them. I've made two different orders and have been beyond satisfied with both. The first came in flawless and although the second came in with a few mess ups, the issue was quickly addressed and resolved. They are extremely responsive and helpful and move quickly to get you what you need when you need it.

My first order had a couple issues with the graphic, and they immediately reached out and told me another shipment was on the way. Customer service was amazing and the print looks great! Highly recommend them!

My order arrived with the wrong color - they sent a re-order and it arrived a second time with the wrong color again. I was unable to have t shirts for the event I needed them for. Super disappointed. Would not use them again.

My sweatshirt arrived quickly and looked great except for two small stains on the front. I emailed rushordertees and they immediately replied and said they would send a new product without the stains. I am very impressed!

I ordered my 12 company shirts from Rush Order Tees..Half of them were great, even better than I had hoped, but the other half were black ink printed on a black shirt, so the designs didn't show up..I could see the logo and words while I was designing, so I figured the shirts were not a solid black and the ink would be visible, but they were not..I also designed a hoodie, and the logo was printed in the wrong spot..I contacted customer service and they were happy to help..They're sending me new shirts with a different ink ASAP..They are also sending me a new hoodie with the logo in the right spot..I appreciate them being willing to work through my issues, and I do plan on using them again in the future.

Best customer service in the world! Had a minor discrepancy with my order and I offered to pay for them to re-do the shirts. They immediately redid them to my specifications and sent them out, no questions asked,.no charge. Great people here! Many Thanx!

PROS: The.website is sharp; the custom t-shirt designer is functional; the ordering process was relatively painless.

Cons: The printing was sub-par; the base and the ink were too thin and the result was the logos look worn out and faded which was not the intent or the design.

Worse, the logo designs use a considerable amount of navy blue and they are on a medium to dark grey shirt. With the poor printing, the logos are barely visible.

The printers completely disregarded my custom layout and just printed the logos directly in the center of the shirt at the wrong scale. There was no attempt at all to position the logos as laid out in the custom design or to scale them as laid out.

To the best of my knowledge, I never received any kind of review notification. I received email notification of my order and shipping confirmation. In the shipping confirmation, that was the first time I could review the t-shirts. On the order, there was a note saying that they followed the custom design. So I assumed they actually did. However, when I got the t-shirts, it was clear they did not.

SUMMARY: Currently very disappointed with what was delivered. I emailed them and let them know how disappointed I was. I haven't received a reply yet.

Overall, the t-shirts are honestly unusable for the purpose I ordered them for. The design is barely legible.

UPDATE 28 AUG 2020: A special thank you to Alyssa for getting back to me and trying to work out the situation!

First, a correction on the custom layout issue; when I was reviewing my custom layout after emailing RushOrderTees about the issues with the shirts, I realized there was white text on the layout image that clearly said that the design was outside the print boundaries they could print.

I didn't notice it when making my order. So that was clearly my user error.

While the layout issue was originally my fault, I do think that either the website's custom designer or the printers themselves should have caught that the layout was outside of the print boundary and verified the print before proceeding.

If either had occurred, I wouldn't have ordered the t-shirts when I realized I couldn't print them using the layout I wanted.

On the printing itself, that remained a quality control issue. The ink was simply too faded. I'm not sure if it was a base issue or that my print would have required more applications. Regardless, despite the layout issue, I wouldn't have been happy with the shirts provided.

Customer service (Alyssa) were really great; she went above and beyond to try to correct the situation and I really appreciate that. They offered a reprint, but due to the layout restrictions I can't take them up on that offer.

In the end, while I was disappointed with the product, RushOrderTees did do their absolute best to try to correct the issue and that goes a long way in my book.

If my print was more conventional and the layout wasn't an issue, I am certain that even if there were print errors, RushOrderTees would have stepped up and corrected them in a timely manner.

I have changed my rating to reflect the level of customer service I received in this situation.

I chose RushOrder because they had a great selection of stylish shirts and colors. Unfortunately the printing process is unreliable. Some are great and have withstood multiple washes and some peal off. They nicely replaced the first batch that did this. But now another one has pealed off. It's too bad.

We had our business tees and hoodies printed by RushOrderTees. The.long sleeve tees, hoodies and sweatshirts are gorgeous!.We had a little issue and had to have a couple of items reprinted, but RushOrderTees got back to me right away and solved the problem!.I would recommend RushOrderTees to anyone for any type of printed marketing/team apparel.

I ordered a shirt that had a flaw on it. Customer service got back to me as soon as possible, and we were able to come to an agreement. I enjoy dealing with Rush Order Tees, as they are respectful, professional, and courteous. I will continue to do business with them for many years to come.
Great customer service,.low minimums!

Steven Cruz, came in clutch. I had an order and a member of my party didn't want a shirt and got shirt envy when it was delivered. Today he shipped a shirt for Saturday on super late notice. A life saver, thank you Steven.

This was possibly one of the best customer experiences I've ever had. First off, designing a ordering hoodies were so simple and easy to do. It took me 15 minutes to completely design and order it. The main reason for me giving a 5 star review though is the customer service. When I made my order, I forgot to order one hoodie. I messaged them about it and within 10 minutes it was already added. Also, when I received the package, the hoodies were designed really well and with incredible quality, however, I received the wrong material hoodie. I just thought, "Oh well, guess I'll just stick with these ones," but they replaced them the moment they found out about the mistake with no extra charge! Overall, the customer service is 10/10 and I would gladly order from them again.

I needed some T-shirts to commemorate a get together and after browsing various websites, decided to order from Rush Order Tees..Definitely the best decision I could have made. It was easy to design the shirts on the website, and when I had questions about ordering, they were answered promptly. When the shirts arrived, I was impressed by their quality. I will definitely be using Rush Order Tees in the future, and the friends I ordered shirts for will also be using them for their needs. If you have any doubts about using Rush Order Tees, have no fear, this is the company to go with!
Excellent shipping speed and the final product is always great..Have placed multiple orders here..Customer service is excellent as well.

While my order did not make it for the Christmas rush, that was due to the overwhelming pressure on the US Postal system..One of the shirts was not printed correctly..Rush Order agent Dana, very quickly got back to me and ordered a reprint of the shirt- no questions asked..The replacement shirt arrived very quickly and to my complete satisfaction..Thank you for "making it right"!

STARTED AS A 1 STAR REVIEW BUT CHANGED TO A 5 STAR

Initially, I called to Rush Order Tees to discuss my order and "Steve" was about as rude, short, curt and coy as a pathetic customer service rep can be.

I had issues with the order and the graphics but "Steve", the customer service rep, was not helpful at all and totally dismissive.

UPDATE: AFTER I RECEIVED A PERSONAL CALL FROM ALYSSA THE CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE MANAGER LESS THAN 24 HOURS LATER TO RESOLVE THIS ISSUE WITH AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE, I CHANGED MY REVIEW TO A 5 STAR.

ALYSSA IS AWESOME AND A GREAT REPRESENTATIVE OF OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE!

Ordered tees for my mom's memorial golf outing that turned into a bowling event due to weather..Website was easy to use, shirts turned out great and very fast!.Came a day earlier than promised I think.

They did a great job on my print lay out , really liked my T's did front and back..Had a little problem with shipping , did not receive an informative e-mail on actual delivery, or pickup by.USPS.and could not track.
However, because of late delivery, they re- processed my order..They, really didn't have to do that, it's great to know they'll go the extra mile to make things right, and the product was perfect.. I will continue to be a customer of RUSHORDERTEES....Thomas

Today I received an email that put a smile on my face; the email was from RushOrderTees. [The Back Story] After carefully inspecting my order of Tees; I noticed my proprietary design was positioned in the wrong area of the shirts.

I reached-out to the RushOrderTees.com team to express my concern; they've advised me that they will correct the mishap and resend the Tees prior to my Ribbon Cutting ceremony on July 21, 2021!

When that commitment is fulfilled; I complete another post showcasing the Tees and the Ribbon Cutting ceremony.

#ThankyouRushOrderTees.com
They understands customer service -- 10/10 service, will be using again!

Great work even after a misspelling..Made the correction and sent replacement tees at no cost to me..All shirts got here on time including replacement tees got here before Christmas..5 stars great job.

Rush order tees is fantastic. I ordered about 120 shirts for a HS band trip. We ordered some youth sizes too..The design process was super easy and the instant messages were very helpful. The tees came in within 2 weeks as promised and the order was completely correct and at a great price. The Tees were true to size and comfortable. Every step of the process was perfect. Everyone I spoke with and messaged was super helpful..I will absolutely be ordering from them again.
Great experience and easy ordering process. Pricing was extremely competitive.

Rush order tee was the place I went to for making my employees shirts. In the past quality of the print and shirts were great. My last order was Terrible. The shirts were of the same quality but the prints were of poor quality. I complained to rush order tee of the substandard and was told that the move was a result of greener.printing. The print look like something I did with my home clothes iron. Rush order tee did try to resolve it by sending me another shirt, but the print was still the same. Rush order tee, it was great doing business with you in the past, but unfortunately I have to move on.

Ordered a couple of shirts from these guys and for some reason, the order was lost in transit..I contacted RushOrderTees and they had a new set of prints and the order arrived the next day..Will DEFINITELY order from you again! THANK YOU!

I had a small order of 13 tee shirts for a construction mission for our church..From the very beginning, the experience with Rush Order Tees was great!.Their website was super easy to use, and the choice of fonts and artwork made designing the tee shirts a lot of fun.
Once I placed my order, I had a customer service rep who contacted me to let me know the shirts were being processed and would be shipped shortly..And then I got an email stating that our shirts were on the way!.I was promised a delivery date, and Rush Order beat it by a whole day!
Overall, I was impressed with the website, the attitude that even my small order was important, and the service..The final product, our tee shirts, are awesome!.I will definitely use Rush Order again!.And I will recommend it to the others in my church who order tee shirts.

I am delighted to post this review for RushOrderTees. Having experience as a marketing pro, I design my own logo's etc. R.O.T.'s faithfully reproduced my design in a timely manner on an excellent quality tee shirt and delivered on time. Further, the made the re-order process seamless and easy with prompt real-time customer service responses. This is a standout operation in the "buyer beware" internet landscape.

I am giving a 5-star review for their professional courtesies. I had a situation and they took care of it wholeheartedly. In the midst of the pandemic I ordered a t-shirt and the company is strictly mandated on getting their orders on deadline, which mine did not. I called the company and noted that it is understanding given the circumstances and they gave me a full refund. While they did not complete the order on schedule (I had a film to shoot and was lucky enough to get one done locally), I was still able to get customer satisfaction.

Rush Order Tees was awesome! I was able to order quickly and receive a proof before printing. I even increased my order and all shirts arrived on time without any issues with increasing my order and changing my template a few times. Even when I called they were very helpful. I would definitely recommend and order from them again. These shirts were for my destination wedding!

Order arrived quickly..One of the items came in with blurry graphics..I sent an email later in the evening and received a reply shortly after indicating that they would send a replacement ASAP..That will be great customer service.
Outstanding to work with, very fast, and excellent quality.

Placed two orders with this company for two sets of tees with two different logos..The quality of both orders was awful. One didn't use enough ink so the color of the shirt bled through the logo leaving it looking bleached out..With the other order the logo printed blurry..They may be "rushed" but it shows in the quality..I will never use this company again.

I ordered 10 tshirts and all 10 faded after one wash. The print on the shirts faded as well as the color of the shirts. I reported the issue to rush order tees and received a quick reply back saying they would take care of the problem but they never did.

Ordered a sweatshirt for my niece on rush delivery. It came on time but had stains all over it as if someone had dirty hands covered in ketchup and then folded it. I've never seen anything like it. Called customer service, spoke with a guy who said they would alert customer care and be in touch. Never heard anything else. Spent a total of $85 for one sweatshirt because of how much my niece would have loved it and I wanted to have it in time for her birthday. Very disappointed and would never recommend this company.

I love RushOrderTees. Especially because of their great service! I have done at least 6-7 mass orders with these guys and the shipping + quality has always been good. There were a few times when some products had been damaged, but the service center was quick to reply and send out the same new products right away.

My hoodies arrived, looked good but after the first wash my images deteriorated. I contacted Rush and they are sending me replacement hoodies. I'll let y'all know how the replacements performed once I receive them.
Amazing customer service. My print was much lighter than I was hoping for and they were quick to make it right. Fast response time and easy to work with. I would recommend this company!

Can I give you six stars?.This is the second time we've used you for what I consider to be a complicated order and the shirts were perfect..Thanks for helping us create an emotional and meaningful moment for our students and staff.

I had a minor issue with my order and the customer service responded very quickly and seamlessly resolved the issue. I spoke with Alyssa and she was a joy to talk to and she helped me every step of the process. She deserves a raise!

I was in a pinch to get a large batch of shirts printed and friend recommended RushOrder and boy did they live up to there name. Not only did I get the shirts in time but everyone RAVED about how comfortable the shirts were. Not your normal heavy, itching and uncomfortable t shirt you normally get when order a large batch of custom shirts. I will definitely be ordering from here again when I need custom tees and would recommend them to anyone!.Great product, great service and amazing turn around!

I cannot even begin to explain how wonderful this company is!.Quality and customer service is incredible..My grandson is wearing my son's school t-shirt and I wanted to make one to fit my son..I sent the design to rush order tees..I was sent a proof to examine for color and positioning of the image and at first the color was off..It was immediately fixed to match perfectly..I then received my shirt and it was somehow discolored..Without question, they had me reorder another one..I have not gotten it yet, but am sure that it will be perfect!.I have spoken to and e-mailed them and each time the person I communicated with was amazing!.Without a doubt I will recommend them..Thank you Rush Order Tees!

My t-shirt came out great! And while the sweatshirt was no quite right at first, all I had to do was let Rush Order Tees know and they were right on it. Just received my new sweatshirt in the mail and it is literally perfect! Thank you so much Rush Order! So happy y'all have helped me bring my sweatshirt idea perfectly to life!

RushOrderTees is very easy to use, various options and customer service is outstanding. Had one detail wrong on an item and they are correcting & replacing it right away. Pleased with how my items came out, placed another order in already.

This company is incredible. Amazing sales team and super helpful. They helped me make our shirts perfect and got them to us in a crazy fast time. My team is a military softball team and we are overjoyed with this product and quality of service. 10/10 would recommend to anyone and am looking forward to doing work with them again in the future!

Not only was the ordering process painless, but when the shirts arrived a different color than ordered, I received an immediate reply and the order was corrected without any difficulty. A level of customer service unheard of in the printing world.

Put it a large business order.they did a amazing job and we had 1 little sizing problem and they fixed the issue and went above and beyond to make it right.we def will be doing business with them in the future and we highly recommend them! And not to forget the fast order shipping!

My first experience with this company has been OUTSTANDING. I really didn't have a real issue, just an inquiry.
Much to my surprise they are redoing the printing on my shirt at no cost.
WOW! I have just discovered a new source for birthday and Christmas presents. I'm telling all my friends and clients.
Best,
Jeffrey Page

GREAT experience!.I ordered 10 t-shirts for my sister's bachelorette and they came out amazing!.The design tools were awesome so you can see what everything looks like before ordering, customer service was very helpful and responsive when I had changes, and the shirts came super fast..They look amazing and everything is high quality..My sister loved them so much, we're ordering a few more. THANK YOU RUSH ORDER TEES!

The website was easy to use to design and order my T-shirts, but it took me a little while to finally decide to go ahead and buy it. When it was time, I needed a little help and rep that I was instant messaging with was very helpful, quick, and efficient. They even gave me a special discount that helped offset the cost of rush delivery (I needed it since it took me so long to decide to buy the order!) It wasn't a huge but lots of companies only do bulk orders. I got the order on time and they look great! Great job Rush Order Tees! I'd recommend you to everyone that needs to order T-shirts.
Customer service was super quick to respond and correct an issue with my order.

I will continue to use RushOrder Tees, there customer service and response time to my inquires was minutes..I would recommend designing your product then connecting on chat with rep to ensure your colors will work with the substrate you have chosen. 1 & Done!

I am so impressed by the professionalism and attentiveness of this business!.I recently placed a fairly small order for custom kids t-shirts..There was an issue with the order at first and they really went out of their way to make sure that it was corrected and that I received the final product on time, despite a nearly impossible deadline and a few unexpected requests for changes along the way..The t-shirts look fabulous and the kids were super excited! The company really is incredible!.I will never even consider anyone else for custom orders in the future.

Just note, that if you are planning to order kids t-shirts, the sizes run pretty big.

RushOrderTees has consistently provided fast and reliable service for TLL Sports LLC merchandise. Our company does tons of live events and marketing throughout the Philadelphia area and whenever t-shirts are needed, RushOrderTees is the only company we call. No matter the order size, from a 10 piece order to a 300 piece order, the RushOrderTees website makes it easy for us to place orders and reorder with a few clicks of a button. They will have our business for life!

It's not always the regret one should hold onto, but the thought and action to create a new experience. I say this because my initial order was completely wrong, nevertheless the RushOrderTees team listened , felt and comprehended my concern; then they took action. I never felt alone or misunderstood in the process of amending my order, they even made sure I didn't have to return anything as they took accountability. I later got my original order with design suggestions from the team that totally worked out. I appreciate the care and responsibility this brand took, and I shall return for further business.

The ordering and delivery were outstanding! The customer service representatives were courteous and helpful. The only issue that I had was.that I received a size 5x shirt that I didn't order and one of the other shirts had a big blue stain on it. I informed the company and they assured me that the problem would be rectified. The problem was never addressed.

Got good rates for 2 days print for 66 Polo shirts. Customer support was good and courteous. Two things I was not happy 1. They could not provide gradient finish to our logo..Seems like they cant desig/print gradients well. Had to do 4 reviews to get it right and the end result came close but not exactly the way our logo is 2. The embroidery came out in a lavender color whereas the design that we approved was dark blue.
I will be a faithful customer. Thank you so much. God Bless.

10/10 experience. The customer service is tremendous. This company is far more affordable than competitors and much more responsive and attentive! Justyne helped me adjust my design and find the cheapest style possible as I was on a tight budget!.my product shipped within one week of ordering. Thanks so much! Will order again!

The relationship of this company with the client is really to be appreciated and admired..A correct and not at all bureaucratic communication..The result, timely solution of the client's request..A business that is in coherence with the requirements of other businesses.
Thank you RushOrderTees

I enjoyed using their website, the staff was very friendly and helpful and the t-shirts were awesome..The shirts got rave reviews from all of my VBS staff and Crew Members. My only issue was getting the site to add my order to my cart..I had to use the real-time chat to have one of Rush Order Tee's staff to add it to the system, but other than that I was very pleased with my experience and will definitely use again when in need of t-shirts..Have also recommended it to several people..Also paid for expedited shipping and it arrived 3 days earlier than expected. AWESOME!
Nice work - responsive customer service. If you specifically want DTG printing, be sure to specify that exact method in your communication.

Recently place an order for t's and tanks for and event this summer. My staff was very happy with the final product..Production time was excellent! Communication was excellent. Material was of great quality. Soft and comfortable. I did order their more expensive line..Logo came out perfect. I have not washed. But, I am expecting no issues. Site may take a little getting use too. But, once you do it's quite easy. I will absolutely order again from Rush Order!
I am extremely impressed with my order! I ordered 2 zip up hoodies with custom logos. They are perfect. Not to mention I got them 3 days early! Great company to order from! I highly recommend!

I am crying as I type this review. After leaving a review about my initial customer experience, Alyssa not only commented back on my review on 2 platforms and provided me with a way to get in contact with her directly, but she also GAVE ME A CALL WITHIN LESS THAN 24 HOURS! Wow!

I cannot explain how wonderful of an experience this has turned out to be. This company has gone completely above and beyond what I could have ever imagined for customer support and ensuring that i would be able to get my order before the holiday even with the holiday rush and COVID delays.

I ABSOLUTELY CANNOT EXPLAIN HOW INCREDIBLE THIS EXPERIENCE HAS TURNED OUT TO BE! I cant say it enough! I will be telling everyone I can how wonderful and caring this company is for their customers and small business alike.

I will be buying again! Thank you so much Rush Order Tees!

I needed a small order of shirts (6) in a 2-week window, and came across Rush Order Tees..Their website design software was straight forward and easy to setup a design with our existing logos/images..We went with a left chest logo and a.

This company is awesome! The shirts are great quality, soft and the printing comes out really well. The web design studio is easy to use. I had an issue with a t-shirt; it arrived and the color of the letters was darker than I expected. They fixed the problem with speed and ease, no hassle. EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!

My order arrived with the incorrect color of shirt and quote missing on the back..To solve the problem, my order was promised to be replaced and I was allowed to adjust my numbers and sizes to accommodate new players added..I was also allowed to keep the incorrect shirts at no additional charge so that my players would have uniforms for the upcoming match. Thank you for being solution oriented!

Terrific experience. Easy to use online tools for creating your custom shirts, with lots of color, placement, and shirt type.options. Clear pricing. Was contacted by a staff member to make a useful suggestion about my order, and was able to review things BEFORE the shirts were made. Everything shipped on time and looked great when I received it, and I got all the correct sizes. Perfect experience and I will buy from them again!

I ordered t-shirts for an large event, and they came out amazing! I wish i ordered more honestly. The people at rush order tees were great at communicating with me, and we spoke on the phone a few times to get the design exactly right. The t-shirts came in on time. I would 100% use them again!

I needed custom T shirts by Friday and ordered on a Wednesday at 3pm local time (2 days earlier)..They were delivered on Friday and were perfect!.This company is amazing and they were incredibly nice and helpful from my first interaction until getting the product to my door less than 48 hours later..I will NEVER go elsewhere for something like this..Above and beyond service..Thank you!

Had multiple orders with RushOrderTees and they provided great work..One order came w/ an error, called them and had replacements fast and easy..Great customer service..We will definitely use them again!

Rush Order Tees is a great company and I will definitely use them again if needed. It was very easy to design the shirt I wanted, and offered many shipping options. There is also the option to choose if you want a proof before printing. They also let me know that I should choose a different type of shirt based on my design for the best over all product. Very helpful.

I gave them 3 stars because they originally got my first order wrong. However they did send a whole new order which made up for the loss and I greatly appreciate them for doing that. I'd probably use them again in the future.

We placed a group order for Christmas parade shirts and they turned out beautifully! The shirts arrived very fast (like 2 weeks early), which was a wonderful surprise. I LOVE that we were able to completely design our own shirts! We will definitely use Rush Order Tees again next year for our shirts!

As a church, we order a lot of t-shirts and other products online..I found the customer service to be outstanding!.It is not too often these days that you encounter an online vendor that cares so much about customer satisfaction..My rep made my first experience very fast andeasy to understand..The product arrived within the week and everyone was very, very happy with the final outcome..I cannot say enough about the level of service we received at Rush Order Tees!.We will definitely be repeat customers!
Quick to rectify any issues, very satisfied with the overall quality of both the shirts and designs printed on them.

The online customer service rep that I chatted with was extremely helpful and courteous..He made my ordering experience quick and easy..My products arrived exactly as scheduled and our T-Shirt looked amazing..I have and will continue to recommend Rush Order Tees! Thank you.

We had a large last minute order for a client (graphic designer here), and Rush Order Tees went above and beyond to make sure everything was exactly what we needed. The shirts arrived on time, quality was great, and it would be hard to beat the price. Our client was very pleased, we'll definitely use them for future shirt orders.

RushOrderTees was extremely helpful during my ordering process. They provided excellent customer service and responsiveness following multiple design iterations. Highly recommend for homemade tee designs!

AMAZING! customer service chat was great! They really helped me get what I needed and fast! Was ordering shirts for a Homecoming event for my father's high school alumni. The shirts turned out so good! People loved them. The price was great as well.

After submitting my order I received an email a day or two later asking for final review of the artwork and order itself. I noticed there was a color discrepancy in the shirt i ordered and asked to change it. I was told id be charged a restocking fee for the old shirts. If they are not going to enable editing easily there then shouldnt be an option for review of order. Overall the shirts were nice quality but service after they got the money seemed to fall short.
