Great experience working with Rush Order Tees. It was Tuesday at noon and we needed quality shirts by Thursday evening. I called, admitted I didn't even have the artwork finished, and asked if there was any way I could get art to them by 5 and still get tees by Thursday. Of course!

My proof was in my inbox Wednesday morning, and my shirts were in by 3 pm Thursday. Rush shipping is hefty, and they aren't totally clear about it on the front end, but I expected there would be a substantial cost there.

The shirts are great quality, exactly what I ordered and exactly the colors we ordered. The print is high quality, no ghosting, no crooked prints, and totally covers the color of the shirt. I have already recommended Rush Order Tees and will use them again.

Outstanding Group to work with! From the Art Work review, to the cost, to the on-time (actually 2 days early) delivery!
Very professional and amazing staff to work with! I will use them for all of my future needs!
Thank you Rush Order Tee Team! Great Job!

Had a great experience!.Fun design prosses and.Extremely helpful customer service.Very quick response when I had questions. I'll definitely use them for future needs..If you're looking for a good quality product quickly give them a try.

"We have been very satisfied with ROT. Their quality, commitment to excellence, product price and quality, and shipping speed are very good. We've only had one minor problem, among our many orders with them, and their customer service is excellent and speedy. They are currently our sole source for custom apparel." (-James)

Although I was sent a replacement, along with a full refund. I still cannot give any more than 2 stars. The great customer service still doesn't outweigh the quality they provide. The original hoodie and shirt was HORENDOUS and came falling apart. faded immediately after washing ONE TIME, same with replacement! I was offered a full refund and replacement so I can see "what their quality really is" well, if the replacement was supposed to show anything better, IT DIDN'T! PLEASE do your research better. I used them based on reviews. but it seems they ask for 5 star reviews after they refund you and replace. expecting everyone to just be satisfied bc they got their money back in turn for a 5 star review. but I'm speaking the truth and will not give a good review just because I was asked to. The only reason I gave a second star is because their customer service IS very nice and willing to satisfy their customers, but this customer isn't satisfied and the quality I received is quite embarrassing.

I had a fan from Australia call and complain the the shirt did not fit. I called Rush Order Tees and asked to place another order for 1 unit and was willing to pay for it but they said they would replace it FREE.This is fantastic customer service.I will use these people going forward for all our needs.When a fan sends you a message you have to respond positively. Rush order Tees made this a win win situation for us and the fan and in the long run for them as I will do everything I can to drive business their way with my other clients and friends.

My review for Rush Order Tees is mixed and corrected from my initial 1 star..Overall, the items were received that were for a special event for my daughter and she is pleased..The initial communication we had with a few different people was rude and inconsistent but Alyssa in service got on top of the issue after the fact and went above and beyond to fix the issue..Since this is our first time ordering from them, I will reserve overall judgement but I would suggest giving them a try if you find something you like.
Expensive but SO WORTH IT. Needed LAST MINUTE custom tees for a tournament and we were blown away. Awesome process designing and updates over the entire process. Highly recommend!

Loved this place!.I will be back often :) Super fast delivery, rush order shipping fees are the most reasonable I've seen, the quality of the shirts exceeded my expectations and they looked amazing..We got TONS of compliments on these shirts, I've referred them to everyone who asks about our shirts :) Bonus, they had some "mistake" shirts that they threw into our order as well so we got a couple extra free shirts in our order..Thanks for a great shirt :)

I could not be happier with the service and quality that I received from Rush order Tees..It was a last minute decision to order tees as a birthday surprise..Needless to say, the associate that helped me on the phone, Julie C. was quick, friendly, and above all, got me exactly what I wanted..Plus, she gave some helpful advice about making sure I received my order on time.allow for a buffer day in case there was a problem with the shipping company, which there wasn't..All in all, my order arrived exactly as it should, the follow up by the company was appreciated, and I will definitely use Rush Order Tees again.

I placed a huge order of T-shirts to support our seniors at our high school with Rush order tees. Evan took care of everything and the order was shipped in just a few days. Everything was perfect and the T-shirts look great! The prices were amazing also! Thank you so much for making our high school seniors smile during this difficult time.

I loved the ability to Chat Live with a Customer Service Rep. My Rep was able to answer all questions and was able to get us a discount. I accidently disconnected from the Live Chat and when I logged back in I was immediately redirected to the Rep I had been working with. I was able to create our Design with ease. The sweatshirts came out great! Turn around time was quick. Very Pleased with product and service.

I've now placed 3 orders with Rushordertees and I have been so happy with the results. My shirts came fast and correct and really high quality. You can't beat their prices for what you are getting and I love that I can do small batch orders. I will definitely be a repeat customer for years to come.

Easy to create my own t-shirt by uploading my logo. Delivered in 2 days as I ordered, all sizes perfect and the printing first rate. Appreciated the fact that T-shirt sizes included Women's as well as Youth and Men's. And when 3 t-shirts arrived for printing with pockets, they called me immediately to let me know of the error in the order they received and gave me 2 excellent options as a work around. I could not be happier.

What a fantastic experience! My design needed work but their design staff helped and made the design a club classic! All the back and forth and they still made the deadline. Everyone thinks I did a great job but the truth is Rush Order Tees made me look great. I talked with four representatives and every one of them had great customer service skills.

I ordered a shirt on May 23rd for a Father's Day gift and I havent received my shirt yet! Father's Day is tomorrow, so I have to go buy another gift, when this company suppose to have my shirt delivered before tomorrow! There is never any up to date tracking and when you email them, they just apologize for the delay! If you need anything in a timely manner, please order elsewhere!

UPDATE: As of today "Father's Day".this company has refunded my money, and told me, that they will send out another shirt.FREE of charge! Still no shirt.so we shall see if they stick to their word!
Super courteous staff online when reaching out about an order. Luke L. coming in big with some help!

Had a bad experience with a customer service rep. Within 40 minutes of posting about my experience I got a call from the VP of Sales Josh. He was super understanding of my situation, took full responsibility for the sales rep and apologized, and then did everything he could to make it right. I really appreciate Josh reaching out and then bringing in a few other higher ups to resolve the issue. Left at 4 stars cause I haven't got the t-shirts yet, but will update the review once they're delivered.

I had to place a t-shirt order with only a couple of weeks' turnaround from when I received the artwork. The Rush Order Tees website is super easy to use (I had never ordered shirts before), prices were great, men's and ladies' sizes were a big plus, and the staff are very prompt and responsive from the time you click Submit. Totally painless experience, and the shirts came out great!

Their website claims, "Our goal isn't just customer satisfaction, it's customer joy!".I believe that..My rush order was on time, done right and high quality..Their design tools were super easy to use..They kept me informed every step of the way and even helped me make a change to my order when I realized it wasn't exactly right (my fault, not theirs.).A great experience..I would definitely recommend them and use them again.

Very pleased with the t-shirts I ordered for my company. The quality/weight of the t-shirt and the fit were both great. After this initial small order, we'll be ordering quite a few more.
I found the web site easy and straight forward to use and my order arrived ahead of quoted delivery time.

Great Product bust most importantly GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE! I had a large order arrived with a minor mistake and they were so fast in getting it fixed..A breathe of fresh air for sure knowing I have had bad luck with a different company in the past..My business will definitely stay with this business..Thanks a ton again for going the extra mile to fix a minor issue..MAHALO!

We needed shirts with an incredibly short turn around time and all local businesses and our normal vendors were unable to fulfill the request..I found Rush Order Tees through a Google search and they were the only company that even agreed to our project based on the due date.

It was a tall order due to the nature of our request and constant changes, but Francis was incredible to work with and handled each change and request very professionally..The shirts arrived right on time and the quality was impressive..Thick shirts and the printing is nice - not the type to peel right off.

Thank you Rush Order Tees!.You made it look easy when I know it wasn't!

Wow wow wow.these guys rock! Gigi, Bria, thanks!

I ordered a single hoodie with printed vinyl to use for advertising during an upcoming trip. The first sweatshirt that arrived was disappointing. The hoodie itself seemed to be of great quality, but the black ink faded quite a bit from the first gentle wash..And the large fit more like an XL+.

I contacted them and, without hesitation, they reordered a medium and ask the production team to ensure the print was fully cured to (hopefully) not fade as the previous one did..They are even rushing the shipping so it'll arrive in time for my trip. That, folks, is the sign of an outstanding business.

If this replacement is what I hope and if it arrives before I leave as promised, I'm going to be one extremely satisfied customer..Already, they've impressed me with the way they have run everything up to this point..Mistakes happen. It's how those errors are addressed that separates the professionals from the amateurs..These guys are pros.
Great quality and prompt service..Everyone loved their "kalu" shirts
The team at Rush Order Tees helped me navigate the design process! Extremely patient, knowledgeable, and efficient! Thanks Mike! I am excited to receive your products!

Bria assisted me with my order..She was knowledgeable, friendly and helpful..I received my order the next day, and the price was not astronomical..One of my students who received a shirt said that she is going to sleep in it because it's one of the softest t-shirts that she's ever worn..Quality product and customer service!.Thank you Rushordertees!

Super easy to design and create what I needed! The products were delivered four days earlier than expected! We had a minor problem, but the customer service was so friendly and sorted out are issues with amazing speed! I cannot wait to receive our next order and we do plan to use them again!

Great customer service! I had to change the ratio of t-shirts and they were happy to adjust my order! Ordered my shirts on Monday and although I asked for a Friday guarantee, I received them Thursday night! Overall, very happy with the product start to finish!

Thank you so much Rush Order Tees! I had ordered a T shirt and there.was a design issue one of the times I ordered it, but when I talked to a service representative they were able to get this issue resolved and reprinted. I'm glad that they were able to help me immediately.
Amazing company..Order came in quick and exactly as I designed it..The staff is super friendly too..Will definitely be using them again.

I ordered a customized tshirt for my department and Kevin was helpful from the very beginning. He matched a competitor's price and was able to deliver the shirts in a very tight time frame. In fact, they arrived a day earlier than expected. The color is true to the proof and the print is strong enough to withstand washing. Would definitely order from Rush Order Tees again!

Awesome shirts and great process to make sure you approve your design. The customer service this company has is out of this world. They treated me with professionalism that can only come from a company that cares about every customer. Thank you Gigi and the whole team.

I needed shirts in a hurry for an event but I didn't have a graphic designer friend to help me with the designs and I couldn't wait 2 weeks for the shirts to be screen printed and shipped. I called Rush Order Tees, they we're super friendly and assured me that the shirts would be done and shipped across the US in time for everyone to have their custom t-shirts at the party..Their team designed what I asked them to design, for free, and the shirts came out awesome..The price was amazingly competitive and the shipping was FREE..I loved ordering from this company and will do it again next time I need shirts or hoodies or something - looks like they have a good selection of products..I'd recommend them to everyone!

When reading about this company on their website, I thought it was perfect.
After beginning, I found that instead of designers, they were people who could pull clip art and letter together quickly..I read the whole website and never found what the charge would be for help..It was very expensive..When I finished, I asked the person working with me if I would get the discount at the top of the site..He assured me I would..So I accepted the mediocre shirts and went to checkout..At checkout there was no discount so I got back on chat..At this time the rep told me it was included no additional..There sure needs to be improvement on the website and in the communication..If I ever use them again which is doubtful, I will sure do my own clip art and letters..They did ship promptly and they came as promised.

Horrible experience dealing with RushOrderTees.com. While the customer service reps were nice, they still sent me incorrectly printed t-shirts for 3 orders in a row. This included working with them in between each order to try and fix the issue (which was a simple logo placement location issue).
Great t-shirt collection, fast service and helpful customer service!

Please read the updates as well.

The shirts came out nice except one bled. I sent communication to the customer.

Hands down best tee shirt company around! From reasonable prices to outstanding customer service I could not be happier! I order shirts for a walk and the design process was so simple ! Free shipping also and added bonus ! But most importantly my shirts looked great! I was even able to add a shirt few days before they shipped with no issues! Also once we recieved our shirts all fit as promised however we did need to call in to customer service one persons at no fault to rush order tees order a size that was a lil snug! Once again to my delight rushordertees took care of the issue above and beyond what I expected! I will only order my shirts from here for now on!

Their service is phenomenal, and they took care of me when I had a problem and dealt with it super fast and caring. I loved the way the print came up and even with Covid-19 going on they kept me up to date on my order. I will be ordering again, (side note: recommend going up a size or 2 for a little more space, especially if your on the bigger size. Certain shirt and clothing brands provided will fit tight or a little snug if your not famliar with that brand like Gildan, or Triple A) Overall great experience!

I came up with the idea for the class t-shirt literally 24 hours before it was needed. From the first online chat for ordering to the onetime delivery, the service was outstanding. Maybe the nicest surprise was the quality of the product, but design and materials. Would absolutely recommend this site for all custom t-shirt needs , especially if you are in a "rush".

I was waiting for another vendor to print my shirts and when that fell through I was in a panic to find another company to do the shirts in time..It is with GREAT confidence that I recommend Rush Order Tees, they confirmed the artwork, printed the shirts and delivered them on time with a quality shirt that everyone was pleased with..I again want to thank them for making my event a success.

Quality printing from the 3XL to the Youth -Medium that were ordered.
A sizing issue with first order. Company rectified the problem. If I could give them 6 stars I would. Great quality and good work. My new favorite hoodie!

Received our sweatshirts with misplacement of logo and missing phone number. They reviewed and are replacing them with no hesitation. 5 star for their customer service and how well they work with you.

Rushed order for a trade show coming up for the crew to wear and items arrived defective. Logo I had printed came out half way. Now I need to find a place local, go out of my way and spend more money to get it done before this coming Monday. Very upset with the results and hope they make it right asap. Would consider re-ordering from them if I was ensured the quality check would be there. Sweater and Shirt material is great, but they let me down with the print.

Great experience with them..They help you make sure your design looks perfect--or can help you with a design altogether.

If you need your order faster than what's provided in check-out, just chat message them.

It's truly the most well-priced, pleasant experience you could have in designing t-shirts.
Super prompt, and very pleasant to deal with. I only order custom shirts from here now, and it's very easy to get answers or issues fixed (I've only had 1 minor error out of 8+ large orders).

I designed and ordered t-shirts for our Boat Club fishing contest and was happy of how easy it was to do. They did a great job making sure everything I put on the t-shirts looked their best. I was 100% satisfied as was all the participants in the tournament. We will be coming back for next years tournament!.A+.highly recommended!

Hi,

The Rush Order Tees Crew was excellent in both service and quality of product. They were more than willing to work with me and my request and I really felt they bent over backwards for me to get my shirts exactly as I requested. 5 Stars and I would give them 6 stars if it was available! They're sending us a whole new order,.because our shirts weren't the same quality as our last couple of orders. I called customer service, and not even an hr later we received an email stating that they were replacing our order!

Rush Order Tees is a great company!.The prices are fair and competitive, and the customer service is top notch..I have ordered 2 different sets of shirts in the last 6 months and the shirts and sweatshirts have been great quality items..I won't go anywhere else when I need shirts in the future.

My entire experience with Rush Order Tees was incredible..My daughter needed t-shirts for her softball team to wear for scrimmages..We ordered the t-shirts Wednesday night and received them on Saturday morning..When we told them we needed them for Monday they did not hesitate in saying they could get the order done and delivered..Everyone was so nice from the very first chat room for questions, to designing the t-shirt, to working with Ian to get the price and the very quick turnaround for the proofs..I would highly recommend Rush Order Tees to anyone who asks..Thank you!

I ordered a t shirt with a special logo for my son for Easter. I was told multiple times through email that it was guaranteed arrival by April 10th. well April 10th came and went and I didn't receive anything. I called and the customer service rep was rude and said they couldn't guarantee delivery because ups is prioritizing shipments. I can understand that but don't guarantee a date if you aren't able to fulfill it by that date. I paid and extra 17.99 for shipping to get here in time. Their website status said it was still being processed and the rep said it was shipped, so which one was it? I wouldn't have purchased the shirt for a total of $40.00 if I knew it wouldn't be here in time for the event it was purchased for. I asked for a refund (since I don't have the shirt and it wasent sent yet) and I was told that they would only refund shipping.very disappointed and will not shop with them again.

Love Rush Order Tees! They made absolute AMAZING tank tops for my sorority for our recruitment event. They were so helpful during the entire process and even with the specific details we wanted. The artists design for the shirt were so much more than we wanted it was above and beyond what we thought it would be. Would definitely recommend!

I have nothing but good things to say about this company.

Fast, accommodating, very knowledgeable staff, and importantly, Matt made certain that I was ordering exactly what I wanted. We needed a few shirts in time for a short notice interview with the local news station for our business and turned to Rush Order Tees since there wasn't a --single-- local embroider who could take our work in less than a week's time.

I'd highly recommend Rush Order Tees to anyone and we'll certainly be back to order more shirts for our company.

I love my t-shirts!.The website was easy to use. I designed great t-shirts for my Girl Scout troop..Customer service was great too..I received awesome shirts at a good price ahead of schedule. Very pleased!

I was shocked at how fast they confirmed my order on such short notice. They were so personable and the email was not automated to confirm my tshirt order- it was from an actual person who emailed me back immediately! Will for sure use again. Their tshirt quality is great and the design transferred perfectly!

What a wonderful site! It was so easy to design the sweat pants. Then I get an email to confirm what I designed was correct- after it was checked over by their staff..The pants were received very quickly in time for our travelling to visit family (they were given as gifts)!.Everyone loved them..I will definitely be back! Thank you very much!

Rush Order Tees delivered my order 4 days ahead of schedule! They called me and made sure my Tees were perfect. They even made my design better. My students loved the quality of the shirt. I will use Rush Order Tees again. Thanks you guys. I wish I could give you a tip!

Amazing!.They got custom printed t-shirts to me in three days, even after I made changes to the proof..A rep personally called me and worked with me through out the process..The price was very competitive and their t-shirt Builder cannot be beat.
Thank you, it was a perfect Father's Day gift, at the last minute no less!

I had a fantastic experience with Rush Order Tees..Design was easy and I was contacted immediately to resolve one small issue in my design..The shirts arrived several days before the estimated date of arrival and they looked great.
Rush order tees thrive for customer satisfaction! I am beyond pleased and very satisfied with customer care. I cannot wait to receive my shirts!

Easy to order, accurate, prompt delivery and fair-priced. The ONLY reason we are not giving 5 stars is although the product (aprons) was very nice looking, the fabric was quite thin, not as heavy as we were anticipating. We would likely use them for future purchases when we have more time and to perhaps ask for a sample of fabric.

I ordered a sweatshirt with rush order tees and it had what looked like a water stain but wouldn't wash out..I contacted them, they answered, and a replacement sweatshirt is already on its way..Great customer service.

This was the best custom shirt company I have ever dealt with. They called me personally a couple of times to make sure my order was correct, and even suggested replacements at no cost for better quality. The had the lowest price and by far the best customer experience I've dealt with for personal online orders. There were no surprises!

Their website was easy to use and very clear. Awesome customer service, responded quickly and worked with me on making a final proof. They even made a new font to work with my design. Usually have some kind of discount going on. Fast shipping and great about keeping you up to date on your order. Will definitely use again.

I ordered a set of t-shirts (printed on both sides) recently. I designed my t-shirts online, went through an easy ordering process, and received my order promptly. T-shirts look great, sizes were true, printing quality was fantastic. I will be a happy repeat customer.
I had an issue with the screen print on the shirts I had ordered a few months ago, and without hesitation after reaching out they are shipping replacements. Amazing customer service.
Not only did I receive my orders in a timely manner, but the quality of the printing and t-shirts is amazing!.

I used the design builder on the website they have and it was VERY easy. At first i only needed 2 t-shirts, but after seeing how much cheaper it was to buy more the 3 i was very amazed! I ended up buying 5 shirts and 2 hoodies for a great price.
I was able to call them and Josh helped with sizing and fitting compared to items i already owned, he spent his time making sure my order was correct and sizing was perfect.
The items came in yesterday and when i opened the box I saw my new company shirts, front was VERY CLEAR and great printing, the back of the items even better, thick ink and ready for a long term usage..The t-shirt alone was a very high commercial grade material.

They will get my business in the future for many years to come.

I recently purchased t-shirts from RushOrderTees! My experience was stellar from beginning to end..I had many questions which resulted in my making multiple phone calls and sending multiple emails..Each phone call and email were met with a prompt, professional and friendly reply..In addition, each request was fulfilled. I will definitely be using this company again and will recommend them to others!

I did not have a good experience with Rush Order Tees. Although the shirts looked great, I was not given the correct quantity of each size. This was extremely unfortunate due to the fact these were needed for an event the day after they arrived so I did not have time to order additional sizes. I wished I had a better experience because they did a good job in terms of the shirts.

Our family reunion T's arrived FAST and they look just as I had designed them - they're awesome!.Quality cotton material; sizing runs 'roomy'; vintage print looks fantastic..Very pleased and will order again from them.

Amazing! Great price and quick turnaround. There was an error my order that the team worked around the clock to make right and ensure my order was on time for a big company event. I was so uneasy and my customer care rep Jarrad Rosson was so kind and detailed. He made sure I was feeling confident in exactly what was happening every step of the way! Shoutout to Jarrad for making it the best experience possible.

the shirts turned out perfect. the price was reasonable, and the website made it very easy to make them exactly how i wanted. after i finished my design they sent an email to confirm they were what i wanted, and everything was recieved the day they were supposed to. thank you Rush Order Tees for a job well done

I've tried quite a few ‚Äúdesign your own‚Äù sites but I always come back to Rush Order Tees. They make it so easy and the quality can't be beat. Just ordered two more shirts so I think that makes about 12 altogether. I'm addicted! You won't be disappointed.

Please don't order from here. The shirts had proofs that were all messed up. It took so many emails to try and get it corrected and I eventually gave up. Then I got an email saying the shirts were delivered when they hadn't been and we've never had a missing package. I call, they did a reprint but I had to send someone to drive to their building to collect because I leave for my honeymoon tomorrow. They had to change it to low quality printing to get it done and I no longer would get the tanks I ordered. I send the person, he gets there and the building is empty three hours before the closing time I was told. He shouted hello a bunch of times and even looked around for someone. This took about twenty mins. Finally someone comes out and tells him he is not allowed to be in the building that we were instructed to go to. My pickup person tells them why he's there and the employee said they would go check. He comes out and says another 20 mins. After this poor person literally circled the building. During all this I was on hold until the call prompted an automatic callback which never came. I'll advise anyone, stay away.
I am very satisfied with RushOrderTees! When a mistake was made on my order, they immediatley fixed the issue! I have used other places, but this Team hands down diliver the best products!

Amazing. Seriously the best service, easy to place my order entirely via Chat on their site. I had some really crappy image files made in powerpoint, and they were able to use them. Several local vendors said they couldn't and needed vector files which I would need help to get. They also were great with changes and sending proofs before starting production, and super quick turnaround.
I will be using them again in the future without question.

My students came across Rush Order Tees over the summer while they were designing their senior shirts this year..The website is easy to use and the personal service is great as well..One of the greatest benefits is the price..I loved that there wasn't any hidden fees and to top it off the prices were the lowest we found..I've already recommended Rush Order Tees to other clubs and organizations at my school and I'm getting ready to place another order for myself as well.

The representative from Rush Order Tees helped me design the T-shirts for my family reunion, taking in mind my limited budget and short-time frame..The T-shirts were beautiful!.They arrived on time and exactly as we discussed and designed..Everyone was happy!.My family wore them during the cook out and they looked beautiful in the summer sun!.I would definitely order from them again!

I got my shirt the print quality was great but I was not happy with the placement so I said something and they made it right I am very happy how things turned out with my sample and think they will be a great fit to do my production runs.

Fantastic customer service and quality! I ordered 10 shirts for a family event last Monday, received by Friday. Unfortunately the womens t shirts ran small so needed to order 2 more shirts. No problem, one phone call on Sunday morning, and the new shirts will arrive by Wednesday. That is amazing! It's the week before Christmas too. The shirt quality is excellent, womens bella is super soft cotton, but slim fit and runs small. Anvil more true to size fit apparently. Men's premium ts are excellent quality, soft and a good weight. Print quality also excellent. I highly recommend and will definitely order again. Thank you for the great service!

I spent hours trying to make t shirts at those other sites where you can sell your cool design, but Rushordertees is by far the easiest to navigate, create and order. And get actual rush shipping. (the other places couldn't rush ship on many t styles , but you don't know that until you get right to the end of the process)

Easy to design, very polite customer service and a.quick turnaround, They were very helpful in honoring a coupon voucher that I had misplaced and that had expired by one day when I found it! The end product looked great too! Prices are very reasonable compared to the same exact design and colors at competitors sites. I will be using Rush Order Tees in the future!
Great quality shirts!.Printing comes out exactly as designed!.If there is any issue they reprint for you.no questions ask..They are the best online design shop by far!

I was very happy with the design we received on our SYNC shirts..They were a big hit with all that saw and received them..This is the second time I have used Rush Order Tees and I am extremely happy with the service we receive..I will order again when we are ready for more shirts.

Thank you
Rhonda Henson
SYNC President/Chairman of the Board

I can't rave enough about the amazing customer service and talent at Rush Order Tees! I had a very last minute special order that was very important to my son and I couldn't find anyone who would do it. From my first contact with Mike Callahan, I felt that I found the right place. I had the design immediately and the t shirts right on time.
You guys are amazing.
THANK YOU

I had them change my design multiple times, sometimes repetitively back to an older version just to make sure that the final was truly what I wanted. They were quick to answer questions (they were very kind and polite with me) and change my design if needed. My purchase was also shipped and delivered by the time that had been stated. The designs were also very good quality! If someone was looking to purchase I would DEFINITELY recommend them!

Not reliable,
Placed an order for a specific date of delivery. Had to confirm with staff via phone service that hung up on you after holding for a long time. Left number and never got a call back, so called the next day, they still confirmed the shipment receipt date. Order was shipped on the date it was due and delivery would not be on time. A total waste of time and an event ruined!

This is the first year we've had our camp T-Shirts done by Rush Order Tees, and I'm very impressed..They were helpful with design and set up, and turn around time is really fast. This is the first time we've had our shirts shipped well before camp. We've used various local companies over the last 15 years, but so far, Rush Order Tees is the best. Great price and quality. I would caution for group orders, be sure to order enough, because it is a little costly to go back and order a few later.

Great job by the folks at Rush Order Tees. I judge a lot of businesses based on what happens if something doesn't go according to plan. We ordered 100 shirts that came with a misprint. We notified ROT and within 5 days, we had the new shipment with the issue fixed. Well done!
My order came but part of the text was missing. They responded quickly and replacements are on the way. Now that's customer service. I will definitely use them again in the future.

This was one of the best experiences I have had with online shopping..This company was professional, ethical(they required approval for my logo), efficient and friendly..The shirts were of outstanding quality! So well made and just as I had hoped/designed..Thank you! I'll be back for more!

These guys are great..I needed some last minute T-shirts in less than 48 hours and they got everything done fast, customer services was great, the shirts looked great and everything arrived on time..I will use these guys even when I don't need a rush order..They are that good.

When my custom t-shirt arrived and i opened the package, one of the images was smudged and distorted..I called customer service and they sent another one quickly and without a hassle..Great customer service experience.

Rush Order Tees was fantastic! We were able to put our artwork together and order the shirts all in one place. The process was simple and the customer service rep on chat was incredibly helpful when i had a question about logo placement. Would highly recommend.

I've never written a review for a service or product..Generally speaking, this is out of apathy..After a friend of mine was diagnosed with brain cancer, we felt it was important to have some shirts made for when she went into surgery..Because of the nature of the surgery it needed to be done fast, so I had very little time to design and have the shirts printed and shipped..Rush Order Tees went out of their way to help me have these done quickly, and they look great..Geraldine was the customer service rep I interacted with and she was wonderful, compassionate, and very helpful..I would definitely recommend this site to anyone looking for quick and quality work.

This is the second Mardi Gras in a row that my friends and I have used RushOrderTees for our custom t-shirt needs and I couldn't be happier. The shirts are of the HIGHEST quality, designed exactly as requested, and delivered SO quickly. We will continue to use them in the future!

I ordered a hoodie from RushOrderTees and when it arrived my whole hoodie was completely changed. I ordered red ink and it came basically faded on the hoodie. Not to mention they gave me a completely different hoodie than I asked for. I called multiple times because my order came about 2 weeks late but I didn't mind because of the outbreak but I had hoped that when it finally came that it would be worth it but that wasn't the case. They had apparently ran out of stock for the hoodie I had ordered so they replaced it with a more thinner cheaper quality hoodie without informing me. If it was possible to give a zero rating I would. This hoodie was $50 and looked more like it cost $5 the most.

If there were an option for a sixth star on this rating, I would give it! Rush Order Tees was incredible to work with. I experienced nothing but friendly, timely, quality, customer-centric service that stood out to me above other vendors. My experience proved to me that Rush Order Tees is definitely on top of their game. I highly recommend them!

They were easy to work with as my order changed..When there was a very minor issue with the order they MORE than made up for it with sending replacements.PLUS!.No questions asked..Great customer service

RushOrderTees was overall wonderful. Great service, very specific as to what their rules and regulations are for a custom designed t shirt . I ordered 20 custom shirts with designs on the front and back for my college's theater club, and they turned out great!
Just for reference, my colors for the design were black, white and red on a black t shirt, so it was a pretty simple design in the scheme of things. I like that you can adjust things to your liking, and RushOrderTees does a wonderful job at keeping a customer in the loop. They also have great suggestions as to the placement of designs on shirts.
The only con is the following: some of the shirts had cardboard fibers on theme because there was no barrier inside between the shirts and the box for shipping. I wish they wrapped the shirts in plastic, and THEN put them in the box.
Even still, all the sizes were correct, the design came out exactly as I wanted, the prices are fair, and everyone loved the result! Will definitely be using this service again! :)

The tee shirts came out perfect an online ordering is super easy. The sales associates seem unnecessary unless you need help designing your shirt. They did not offer any additional price cuts, even though they said they were checking for the "best price" a couple of times. It was the same price the website quoted. I found an online coupon code and got a better deal on my own. The associate seemed upset when I told her I already ordered; I assume because she did not get the commission or whatever. Overall, a good experience and an awesome product we are super happy with, I would just skip the sales people.

Very pleased with our experience. We needed shirts fast and I found this company.on the internet. Took a chance.they took our order easily and quickly over the phone and the internet - simultaneously. They made our graphic look great and I appreciated the women's shirt style which actually looks good on the women. My only complaint was that I had wanted the shirts before my meeting and they arrived the day they were supposed to, but in the evening - after I had already left for my meeting. Well I guess that was the shipper's fault.

The site was very user friendly, and the chat feature really helped me select the right product for my needs and budget..The proofs were provided quickly, as well as when I requested changes. Once the product arrived, I was very happy with the quality and would definitely use them again, and recommend to others.

On the night i placed my order, i realized that i made some mistakes on the names..I emailed them and the next business day they called me back..They were very cooperative, helpful and understanding..They corrected my mistake and the t-shirts were delivered on time..Having not ordered from them before, i did not know what quality the printing would be..I was delighted to see it was very high quality..I will definitely order from them again..Top-notch company, top notch product.
Luke was great. He understood my concern and provided a quick answer.

Rush Order Tees website is easy enough to navigate. My students were able to design their class shirts at an affordable price for everyone. We all love how they came out and are excited to wear them during team competitions throughout the school year! Great quality shirts, bright colors, fun graphics, delivered in a quick timeframe.Good job R.O.T. I look forward to ordering from you once again next year!

I needed 150 t-shirts designed and shipped right away, and Rush Order Tees came through!.I was having trouble with my logo and so I "chatted" with a representative of ROT and they actually worked on my design for me and came up with the perfect t-shirt!.I was so pleased with their customer service and their prices..The shirts came as promised and I couldn't be happier.

The website was very easy to use and my order arrived incredibly quickly considering the circumstances of 2020..Although there was an issue with the printing on the order that arrived, I left a customer complaint and was addressed quickly and very politely..I greatly appreciate how customer-oriented this brand is!

I needed a small order delivered in four days, and they did it!.The shirts looked great, and the staff helped me order just what I needed via the instant chat on their website..The order was affordable, shipped on time, and service was great..I would recommend this company.

UPS apparently did not deliver my order to the proper address although they claimed they did. Rush Order without any hassle immediately agreed to replace the missing order. Very reputable and reliable.Company.

The total experience was wonderful. The t-shirts turned out fantastic and everyone loved them! This is rated 5 stars BUT
It did get a bit bothersome when "sales" would call me and text me pushing me to order. I was working with one person and was very happy with her. I finally got fed up with the sales pitches that I just placed the order and was very satisfied.

Great customer service! Thank you team for the quick response and thank you Dana for helping me out on the phone. Super nice people all around as far as I can tell. I had a hiccup on my order that was partially my fault but they took care of me and the prints do look nice. I'll definitely order from them again!
Easy to use website, truly are "rush" order with quality printing. Rare to find a company that also backs up their commitment to customer service. I would recommend and use again for future items.

I found Rush Order Tees by a Google search. I could not have been happier! The shirts were reasonably priced, they were delivered before the date promised and I was even able to add on to the order when I realized a few days later that I missed one. The shirts are wonderful quality, the colors in the screen printing was so bright and vivid. I can not say enough wonderful things about this company. I will definitely be ordering from Rush Order Tees again! Thank you for being awesome!

Ordered from here on more than one occasion..There was a imperfection only one time and they very quickly fixed and sent out a replacement. Overall a very easy to deal with company with superb quality shirts.

RushOrderTees saved our event! We ordered 500 hats from another company which took 2 months to come in and even though we had approved a proof, the hats came misspelled! So I chatted with Francis from RushOrderTees on a Thursday who assured me 500 hats could arrive that Monday. They came exactly on time and were PERFECT, not to mention much better quality than the hats we had ordered from the other company. We will certainly be working with RushOrderTees frequently in the future.

I placed an online order and then went through 2 rounds of edits (changing quantity, size and adding products) with my customer service rep..The changes were handled quickly and professionally and I was provided with a final date to make any additional changes without affecting my shipment date..Will definitely work with these guys in the future..Total pros!

I was looking for cheap shirts that could be ordered quickly. Designing my shirts were very easy, and even with a sizing mix up my shirts still arrived before my fraternity's event 5 days after I placed my order. Will definitely use them again!

They were really helpful in getting back on my order and said they would send a replacement right away because there was something misspelled. They really got rid of my stress as I was so worried as to what would happen with the shirts. It's for a club on campus and I couldn't disappoint the members so im glad they were so helpful!

I needed 22 teeshirts for a family cruise that my family and I were taking on June 25th. I contacted RushOrder Tees on 6/10 and needed the shirts by 6/21.I had the distinct honor and pleasure of talking with Bria Brown, who not only got me a very good deal on the shirts , but also gave me expedited shipping at no additional cost. I had to contact her several times for changes in the order, and she was always so very pleasant and helpful each time. She made the process so much more pleasant. When I received the shirts, I was blown away by how great they looked. My family members absolutely loved them. Miss Bria Brown also contacted me a few days after I received the shirts to ask if everything was alright. I was so pleasantly surprised by her going the extra mile to contact me. Rush Order Tees should be very proud to have people like Bria Brown represent their company. Talking about customer service, this pleasant young lady was exceptional. I will always use this company for now on and have told friends and family how great this company is to do business with. Thank you Bria Brown for your time, your patience, and for making me feel that I was your only customer and my satisfaction was top priority, I will always remember my experience with YOU!

Excellent experience. There was a miscommunication between sales and the art department but Karie from the art department spoke to me on the phone and cleared everything up. I got my shirts the day they were promised and they were great! My client was thrilled with the end product and we will be ordering hoodies and other items in the fall. This will be my go to company now for this type of project.

Great.if you're not in a RUSH. Got a text day before order was to arrive to be told item wasn't in stock..Order was 17 shirts, some men's some women's..Men's shirt not in stock and can't.get in time..Asked if we could sub another product (for the men's shirt that's outta, stock).Answer was yes, but would have to change change the product for the ENTIRE order?.Went ahead and cancelled order and we will be t-shirtless for our event..Will get refund in 5-7 days, so money tied up till then with no shirts.not happy!
Great service, called me multiple times to confirm design notes. Shirts were easy to design, are great quality and shipped four or five days earlier than stated. No complaints at all.

They have the best online custom t-shirt maker by far so i spent hours creating multiple t-shirts knowing they both accepted PayPal and Visa as payments and they also send overseas. But when i asked for a shipping quote everything became dry. No shipping quote and no other payments than by wire accepted for "security" reasons. i have never in my internet ordering history been asked to do so. not even with motor parts well over many grands in value have i been asked to pay by wire.

Needed custom shirts in a large size and quick, I received my order on time was their when they said it would be. I would recommend to anyone
very easy and quick..The service is unbelievable can't say enough good
things about this company.

Nice enough people to deal with as far as placing the order goes. The printed shirts were fine but sizing the designs for the shirt was a bit tricky. The scale of the shirt image they use for proofs is undersized so your printed design on the final product looks smaller than you intend. They have not taken any responsibility for this discrepancy and have not communicated any interest in changing that. Buyer beware.

In full disclosure, we were not the greatest of clients. We had last minute changes, and funding problems on our end, however, despite this the folks at Rush Order were very understanding, and worked with us every step of the way. We will continue using them, the shirts were a very high quality, very durable and the printing was superb, at the right price.

Their guarantee is worthless.
I wanted a custom shirt for a specific occasion on a specific date..The shirt was terribly expensive because I wanted only one shirt, $32.32 for one shirt with a photo and one word under the photo..I needed it by Friday, on the shipping options there was an option "Guarantee delivery by Friday" for $21.99 extra..Now I'm at $54.31 for one shirt delivered by Friday..Friday rolls around, late in the day and I start to worry so I log in to track the package and their website actually says that the order is on time for guaranteed delivery on Monday..What kind of nonsense is that? I have the email to prove the Friday guarantee - and they certainly took my money..I call the tollfree number, nobody answers..I called 5 more times over the next hour, nobody there but they wanted me to leave a voicemail..Rush Order Tees has poor practices and non-existent customer service..How can you call yourselves "rush order" anything if you mess up this badly on a rush order?
Print was nice, but I ordered one specific brand and also called to confirm that they could get this product. Not one of the shirts was as requested! I will not use this company again.

Amazing customer service! Quick, efficient, and to the point. I received phone calls, text messages, and emails to let me know about the progress of my order. This really sets Rush Order Tees apart from the rest! Would definitely recommend them to anyone.

I ordered a hoodie from this company to give as a gift. I am not satisfied with how it came out. The image printed on the hoodie was not like the proof sent to me; it is small and looks very faded, not vibrant at all. I had higher expectations from this company due to the reviews I read prior to placing my order. Very disappointed in the low quality hoodie I received and will not recommend this place to others.

We had a 30th year college reunion, and at the last minute thought a t-shirt to remember the weekend would be fun idea..We ordered a long-sleeved t, with graphics on the front, back and sleeve. The quality of the shirt and graphic was excellent, and they were delivered on time! We would highly recommend Rush Order Tees!

Great printing on hoodies and customer service is amazing.
-Adela

What began as a terrible experience, turn out to be a decent one. The company started by sending us an incomplete order, then following that by not repsonding to our calls. However after speaking to Alyssa in the customer service department, the company has vindicated themselves. She contacted us & listen to all of our concerns with the order. Shortly after she had a new order sent to our office. Mrs. Seiders is truly an asset to the company.

What a great find this was..I needed shirts to support my son at the NYC marathon..I designed the shirt on the website, then chatted with a customer support staff member to make sure I had done everything correctly..She was so helpful and gave me a delivery date so I would have them in time for the event..They arrived as promised and we were soooo happy with the shirts..Thank you!

I ordered 25 t shirts for the Chicago marathon, for the runners who were running to raise money for the non profit Asha For Education. I asked for discounts as we were a non profit and the person who helped me get it done for a good cost. The designs created are saved for ever so for the next year whoever is placing the order just needs to login and order, that's great.The design was mailed for approval and delivered on time.Very happy with the service

Great experience. Ordered 12 tees for overnight delivery. From submitting my order to receiving the tees only 27 hours passed. Will definitely by from again. Shirts excellent quality, great chat help and quality work.

Not only did they provide a super great quality T-shirt super fast - they called me after I submitted and made some GREAT recommendations for improving my shirt - all at no costs..I am so happy with the final product!.I will definitely use them going forward!.GREAT job!

Well priced shirts, lots of design options, great customer service..They were able to alter our graphic so we could save money on colors and still have it look amazing..We received our shirts a full day before they were promised..I'm thrilled!

Awesome product! It was a little harrowing to get the proof sent to my email two days before the product it supposed to arrive, but once the proof was in my inbox, I approved it and it printed beautifully and it arrive ON TIME. These are quality cotton tshirts. not the cheap ones other places have. I would definitely do business with them again! Thanks!

These guys are AWESOME! I'm a director at a camp and we received 700 misprinted t-shirts (obviously from a DIFFERENT company). Rush Order Tees was a great service. Very helpful when calling them about my order and very nice customer service. They gave us a discount because of the quantity we placed and kept us informed the whole way through the process. The delivery also came 3 days before it was planned to.

I am the Creative Manger for a finance company., I have been designing and working with numerous vendors for a long time. That he had me recorded saying what he was referring to, and was not very nice and fabulous as he first was. I really enjoyed my experience shopping with and purchasing tees through ROT. I needed personalized Tshirts for my family's reunion. What I really liked about the sight was the ease with personalizing your own design. A few clicks, rotations, and color changes I had the exact shirt I envisioned. Further, I appreciated the sizing options for children, youth, and oversized tees. Finally and in my opinion, the best part. the price. I was not in a rush to receive these tees. Because I choose the delayed option, this reduced the price of my entire shipment. I was pleased to have purchased personalized shirts for my entire family for less than $10 per shirt. If I need a shirt in the future, I will be shopping with them.

We had a great experience making t-shirts for our business and race team..Immediately after placing our order someone contacted us letting me know that we were potentially over charged (a user error on my part) they promptly corrected the error and got started on making a sample..After sending us the sample to review we made a slight change and they were prompt about this as well..The next sample was perfect..They emailed asking if it was possible to extend our delivery out by one day (totally understandable because we had asked them to make changes and our original order had a small hiccup)..We needed them from an out of town race and they were so accommodating..Despite the fact that we made all these adjustments they were still willing to stick to the original promised delivery date..While attending that race many of our race competitors were inquiring about where we purchased our shirts from and what the cost was per unit..After comparing with many different teams we were the most affordable for the shirt type and screen printing service..Everyone was so professional and kind we will be putting in our second order soon.

It is surprisingly hard to find gilden sweatshirts, so thankfully this place exists !

Absolutely THE WORST customer service I have EVER encountered. I gave him the benefit of the doubt, brushing off his initial.face to-face rudeness as "maybe he's having a bad day". I phoned back a week later ready to process our order - didn't happen. He had written no relative info down, despite being handed a typed useless quote. Long story short - what I think is the business owner ended up hanging up on me and telling me to go somewhere else!

Horrible HORRIBLE Business. I support local businesses all the way but do not go to this one!

Many thanks, Om Dass!.This is my second order for our hockey association and we're thrilled!.Great communication, great service, great quality, prompt (even early) deliveries!.We couldn't be happier and we'll definitely be back!

My first experience with this business brought me back for more. when my husband was diagnosed with colorectal cancer 2012 I wanted to make him T shirts with ( I CANCERvive) printed on high quality shirts. He is still wearing these shirts every time we go to Juravinski and everyone loves them. Not only it inspired lot of cancer patients but the quality of these shirts stayed the same. the printing never faded off and the colors stayed the same which is so rare nowadays when you buy any shirts out!
I definitely recommend it to everyone I know.

Words just can't thoroughly describe the poor attitude being shown by the 'gentleman' you give your orders to. Rude, short, abrupt and ignorant.even reading this won't prepare you for the nastiness you'll witness. Thanks for always being available and able to bring our ideas to life! You guys are amazing íì.

My experience with Tees n More has always been grade A satisfaction I've watched them grow over the years & learn a lot about them, when I had an issue with my order they were willing to go the extra mile!.Hats off and Koodos 2 teesnmore

We use Tees N More for all our uniform needs because they are nimble and responsive. From graphics assistance on designs for small single team orders, screen printing hundreds of camp tees to designing custom kits for toddlers the team is always helpful, efficient and delivers as promised.
Great service and prompt delivery. Thank you so much for a job well done. You printed my granddaughters' shirts with short notice.

Very impressed with the quality of work done here. The staff is excellent and very talented. I have been to other places that can't compare.
Thank you Tees N More!
Great place for cheap T's..Plus you can get custom.designs put on shirts or hats.
I have used tees and more for a few years.great service, easy to deal with.I would recommend! Thanks Om

These guys have fantastic prices. I bought a bunch of shirts from them and they turned out fantastic.
Perfect for every printing need. Great service and fair pricing.

very good service , very profesionel

I placed a good size order of embodied hoodies for my team..The order was awesome and the service was great. I spent extra on the better quality hoodies and was impressed with the quality of the product and our logo I will be ordering.from them from now on.

From beginning to end, I was so impressed with Thatshirt. The customer service was top notch. Their professional expertise really made me feel comfortable through the entire design process. Thatshirt assisted me in customizing shirts for my entire team. The quality of the shirts.and attention to detail was amazing! I definitely recommend Thatshirt!
Easy order process, received my shirts well before the latest stated delivery date. Will be ordering more again soon for sure.

We have done two large orders of merchandise for The Record Player. We have been impressed with the variety offered and the quality of the merchandise that has been sent to us! The customer service has been great. In particular, David has followed up to ensure that we have received what we ordered and were satisfied with the products. These guys are awesome I ordered my sweaters on a monday and recieved them Friday monday 4 days via ups overall my experience with this company was excellent customer service was great and replied within a timely manner.Keep up the great work.

Horrible customer service. Nobody responds to emails and when you call (if they even answer) they just tell you someone will get back to you but nobody will call you back.

Great quality!

Have used ThatShirt on multiple orders and have been very pleased. The designs I upload are usually done on my iPad (Procreate App) and the quality and colours have been very vibrant and consistent. Listed free shipping in my area, but charged me over $15 for shipping. Never responded to my email about it. Delivery was not attempted, either buzzing me or leaving it with my concierge. Had to go pick up my order. I paid $15 for delivery and had to pick up my order.
purchased a few times now. sometimes they come really fast other times it is when the order says it would come.

Order arrived more than 2 months after it was placed, and I only ordered 6 things. Not a huge amount. So I called them back about 3 weeks later. When my order arrived it was the wrong brand, wrong colour. If you're just going to pick what is.closest in stock What's the point of me.taking time to pick from all the stuff on the website. The sweaters that did arrive are still nice nonetheless not what I ordered.
Purchased 32 shirts, the quality is excellent. Recommending to friends.
Great quality shirt will buy again, Great price definitely worth the money.

June 21: Disappointing service. I have emailed several times to contact someone regarding the status of my order and never received a response. I am aware of some delays due to COVID however it is going on a week past the estimated delivery date and the order is still being assembled. With $1000+ locked into this order, it is frustrating and difficult to take my money elsewhere with nothing to show for it to sell. Will update this review once my items have arrived regarding the quality of products.

Update: July 14. After writing the initial review I was contacted that night to address the status of my order. I had wonderful communication for about a week with David and received the products the day after they were sent..The printing was well done, the designs turned out just how I wanted them. There were several designs that I was missing sizes in, or received two of another size instead. Some had marks, which i understand will come out once washed but explaining that to customers or having to wash items before selling them is a bit inconvenient. I have had barely any communication in the past two weeks now regarding whether I can expect replacements or a refund. Quality products but disappointing service.
Got my SO a gift, came a bit late but it's very nice :)

Always a pleasure ordering from that shirt! Quality is always great and anytime I have a difficult print they do a amazing job. I also use them for promotional shirts for my business and they have fast turn around times, and very competitive pricing! Thanks as always keep up the great work!
The hoodies came out amazing! Thank you very much!

Awful.

Would give 0/5 if possible. It's an absolute scam of a company.

Have made two orders now and both times there has been an issue with my order. Both times one of the items was sent in the wrong colour (not even close).

Excellent customer service! I placed my order and spoke to Dave as I was very right with timing, he expedited the order and got it shipped a week early! The quality of the shirts was amazing and the price was so reasonable! Would highly recommend!
Ive ordered a few different times in small batch and larger quanity. The quality is fantastic and ive been happy with all aspects of their buisness..I highly recommend using this company.
I am very frustrated by the costumer service. I.have attempted several times to contact the company to check on a $200 order my son placed for his school project and haven't heard back.

The quality of the sweaters were excellent. No complaints there. My only issue is the customer service. I placed an order at the end of April and my order was shipped to me i believe in 2 weeks. I have emailed and made multiple calls once again with no reply. Moral of the story i placed an order 1.5 months ago and STILL have not received all the items. take caution when ordering from this company.
I ordered some hoodies. they sent me my hoodies. I wear the hoodies. I like my hoodies.

Terrible customer service, I ordered a custom hoodie size S for men because they didnt have it for women. When I recieved it the hoodie looked like it would only fit a newborn. Update: David contacted me after this review via email, however when i sent him an email back there was no response or anything from him anymore! Completely disappeared

Sept. 2021 - I am missing TWO items from my order that I paid for - I've attempted to contact them 6 times via email, contact form, and phone. Sadly, no response. It's so disappointing when a fellow Canadian small business steals from another.

I am extremely frustrated with this company. I have now placed my order TWO MONTHS ago and the delivery date said May 25th and I have yet to receive my order. David was quick and helped me out with a very quick turn around, especially given the time of year. A very great experience, thank you so much for helping me with my order! I will be ordering again in future :)

Had a great experience ordering with ThatShirt. They made sure my design turned out perfectly on the pieces of clothing I needed for myself and my team. They met the timeline we needed and everything even arrived ahead of when we expected it considering the current Covid delays. If you need a design printed I'd highly recommend this company.

Do not buy from this brand. I think they are out of business maybe? That or it's a scam. They do not answer phone or email - I have tried multiple times. Have been waiting over two months for my order (over a month since the estimated delivery). I can't even get a hold of them to cancel the order and get a refund.

This place is great! Amazing quality, easy to use website, great price and ships super fast. I ordered and paid on Dec 2020. Since then, I sent few email and called to leave message but no response. It is four months now and the order is not arrive yet. I am not sure they are still in business or not. My recommend is before you place an order, make sure you can get response from them.

We can't say enough about the wonderful customer service at thatshirt! They did a great job of our small business' company shirts - their quality of work is excellent. I ordered a hoodie as a gift, but due to some circumstances, I had to cancel my order. They were very helpful and cancelled it as soon as possible and refunded my money. A great company.

What a pleasure to deal with. probably one of the greatest business transactions I have ever done. Smooth and on time. And the shirts look amazing, my staff get compliments everyday on the shirts. Thank you so much.

Thank you for the quick service on the rush order. I love the quality of the hoodie. Thank you so much.
