Excellent service and nice shirts at very reasonable prices!
fantastic product! so looking forward to the next project
Very professional. Great customer service!
Still waiting! No replies.
Great shirts with fantastic service.
Thank you David!
Good quality shirts and the pricing was very reasonable as well
Fast and efficient custom printing! Great quality! Highly recommend!

Fantastic experience with Toronto Tees!

We had some t-shirts done up for a bachelor party, and I couldn't be happier with the end result..The process of submitting art online was very user friendly, and the turn-around time was super quick‚Äînot to mention the quality of the shirts themselves far exceeded anything I could have hoped for from a printshop (and the fact that they are guaranteed from cracking, peeling and fading inspires great confidence in their product)..The groom was thrilled, and so were we; I'd recommend Toronto Tees to anyone, and have no doubt I'll be back the next time I need something printed!

Cheers!

Hey guys @TorontoTees !

Thank you for an amazing final product which was delivered in its appropriate timeline. The quality of graphics and garment fitment are simply perfect, this has motivated me to continue my future projects with them.

The online designer is very easy to use and doesn't feel complicated.

--

I live in Alberta and I needed 14 Custom T-shirts for a wedding I was attending in Toronto. Downside was it was very short notice but I was so lucky to find Toronto Tees who made the entire process so easy & affordable! I was in contact with Joe who was very friendly and helped us get a great deal & of course T shirts were all ready on time!

The guys at Toronto Tees are all fantastic. I had a pretty crazy rush request and not only did they pull through and get the shirts to me 2 days before I asked, they were always open to chat about it and responded extremely quickly whenever I reached out.

Kyle and the team, thank you for everything. Great quality shirts. Amazing print quality. Great prices. The best service. If I could, I'd rate over 5/5.

While the finished shirts (5 of the same 1-colour logo) met my needs and look really great, the process to get them made was less than smooth. I ordered 8 calendar days before I needed them but on the day they were meant to be ready (based on their order confirmation), there was no word from the shop. I emailed and called at the end of that day but the shirts hadn't yet been made.but the lovely guy I spoke to said he'd make sure they'd be prioritized for the next morning. The next day midday I followed up again as there still hadn't been an answer to my email from the day before. I eventually got a text that they'd be done by 2pm that day. Again, the shirts are great. We love them. Important that the quality is there of course - but if I can go in and essentially get shirts on demand I think orders that are planned and paid for over a week in advance should be managed and completed more efficiently. It seems they weren't even started until the follow-ups were done.

I placed an order and the process was simple.

After receiving business cards and the colours not quite matching my request, I emailed Toronto Tee's and they assured my design and responded very quickly.

They kept me informed and the actual delivery date was much faster than the ETA.

When my shirts came, there was 1 unit that was the wrong size but they didn't give me any difficulty. They remade the correct size and even shipping to me as I don't live downtown.

Great customized service, fantastic turnaround time and I'll definitely order where soon.
Joe was incredibly helpful providing quick replies to my questions. Our order came on time and the shirts looked great. Our small business will be sure to use Toronto Tees for our next t-shirt order.

Ordered a custom T-shirt here with my own design and it turned out great!
The online designer was easy to upload and work on and there was a large variety of shirts and sweaters to choose from.
Once ordered it was completed and shipped out to me in a matter of days!
Other companies wanted a minimum order but I had no problems ordering just 2 shirts and pricing was good.
Toronto Tees is amazing. The shirt material is premium and the printing is very high quality. Needed a rushed order for a birthday present and they accommodated it with no issues.

Great quality! I ordered a small batch of hoodies and was really impressed with their quality, I wasn't expecting much for the price. I also got a call to confirm my text because it was missing an apostrophe, which was part of the design but it goes to show the effort and attention to detail they provide. Excellent! Design to doorstep was a week, and their site estimated delivery date much longer. I'll be using these guys in the future.

Amazing experience. Tom was very friendly and helpful. I gave him the design and t-shirt was ready in less then 5 min! Great quality for a fair price. I'll definitely use their services again. Highly recommended.

I needed printed shirts for Christmas - I placed the order on-line- I messed up the hue of letting I needed ( all to be the same - but 1 was not right). I emailed the owner and told them I goofed when ordering and needed them all the same- he was great! He responded really quickly and fixed my error and got them to me in time for Christmas..Excellent customer service!.I wasn't thrilled about the pricing, but everything in the world has gone up I guess, and for excellent customer service, it's a good trade off!

I would recommend this business!

I love the Toronto Tees store on Yonge st. They are always very quick, professional, and friendly. Today, I came in to make a t-shirt for the hubby. Tom, who was helping me, was so fast and skillful. It took him literally 5 minutes to finish everything. I was super happy with the t-shirt and the price and I also got a coupon for the next print. Awesome job! Thank you!

Just wanted to say Tom is AWESOME! I went there after placing my order because I needed it to be a rush order and they completed it so quickly. 10/10 experience. Store has great vibes! And even though I only bought the soft tees, they have samples there for you to see and judging from that, you can tell the material is really high quality.

HIGHLY recommend Toronto Tees Custom Printed T-shirts. I ordered a single shirt for a girlfriends bachelorette.party and not only was it extremely well made, the team (Joe & Jay) went ABOVE and beyond to stay late and make it for me. They are super professional and the customer experience cannot be beat. I designed the t-shirt online within 5 minutes and was able to pick up my t-shirt the next week. You can even pay $5.00 to have it rushed if need be. Thank you SO MUCH for the exceptional service. Will 100% be coming back!

Attended the Queen Street location. Service was excellent. Sam was very helpful, patient and polite, answered all my questions and provided all the info I needed to complete my custom tee, notwithstanding they were very busy when I arrived. Very positive experience and very happy with the end product. Will definitely recommend Toronto Tees to family and friends ( and will tell them to ask for Sam!). For all the above reasons, 5 stars!

The shirt turned out exactly as I made it..Quality was great. Delivery fast and delivery guy had a great sense of humour..Next time I need to do a custom shirt, I'll definitely use this company again..Highly recommend.

Ordered a custom hoodie for my niece for Christmas..It turned out awesome and was delivered quickly!.Would definitely order again!

Only problem is that Toronto Tees doesn't have gift cards! Would love to buy some in the future if they become available :) Great supporting a local business!

I have used Toronto Tees MULTIPLE TIMES and sometimes multiple times on the same job.people get a sneak peek and they want in.so back to Toronto Tees I go.making more.with hours to spare. They work on the worst deadlines with the best attitudes. They are customizable, affordable and entirely flexible with your needs and designs.
Latest props to JAY - killer customer service, amazing attitude and all round awesome experience giver! Thanks Team TO Tees!

Tom was incredible in helping my vision come into fruition with a design that I wanted to put on a golf shirt. He perfectly placed it, and helped problem solve issues that my design had. Overall it turned out exactly how I imagined it and Tom is to thank for that. On top of that, the golf shirts they have are incredibly comfortable and fit extremely well. 10/10 service, will go there again when I print another shirt.

I have ordered from Toronto Tees a couple times and they have never let me down. The quality of the clothing and print job are so impressive. When I had a question, Joe was so quick to answer! A+ customer service and A+ quality and A+ timing. Thank you Toronto Tees for always coming through :)

I was dealing with a previous downtown Printshop and having some issues so I entered this Tee shop with an open mind. No need, questions were answered happily by Staff and with easy instructions on how to get my design onto a shirt most likely that same day! I went home, designed my shirt and returned the next day, this time Jay helped me . Same great level of service! He went over my design, offered tips as to what would work best and why and once the final draft was sent, he said be ready in 10 minutes! I will definitely be back to print more shirts for work! Prices are great too. Thanks @torontotees Great experience.

Had outstanding service from Jay at the 527 Yonge Street store. He was very helpful with the artwork and colour selection. He was very polite with all the clients who came in while we were there. The end product of our t-shirts was better than we had hoped for.

I had no idea this business existed until someone told me about it a few days ago. I was more than pleased by their prompt service. I came in with the best resolution of the graphics that I wanted, but Jay, helped me out and organized things properly for my Valentine's week shirt! Super happy with the time that was taken to help me out today and the finished product which was all done within the 30 min that I was there! Thank you!

Very Poor quality! You gave me a hat full of lint, with a big iron mark on the beak of the hat. Plus the "L" from Control isn't straight. My experience was horrible. The other hat I bought was poor too, with letters lifting up after you said it was finished. Get a iron and do it yourself people!

The shirt came our great! Very vibrant and good quality. The only downside is the shirt I selected is extremely see-through, I'd bring my own shirt next time. Pick was easy and the employees were very nice!

Overall great experience at Toronto Tees. Joe was extremely helpful throughout the entire process which was done entirely via email. Very prompt communication, very accomodating, and fast delivery. Will come back in the future for other custom prints! Thanks Joe.

Went in hoping to just have a few questions answered but came out with the product I wanted in hand. Tom was great to work with, quick, friendly service and helpful with sizing and placement of my desired logo. Very happy with the efficiency and end result.

The people at Toronto Tees are fantastic. There was an issue when I went to pick up my order but these guys are great, no problems.only solutions approach! Thank you Tom and crew I'll be seeing you again!

I had a last minute idea and a super small order of three custom sweatshirts, with a very tight window of opportunity for delivery..Toronto Tees (Joe) was extremely responsive, helpful to expedite, and delivered as I had hoped..I couldn't have asked for anything more!.Thanks again Joe, very much appreciated.

The service was easy to use online, from picking the t-shirt style, to uploading and design of the t-shirt..The order was completed well before the window that was mentioned online, which was amazing speed..I think it was completed the day after I paid for the order online and the site quoted more than a week before the t-shirts would be ready.

Got a tee made today from a photo on the internet. Turned out spot on. Great tee shirt quality. Dan helped me out but his coworker or manager (had his hair in a lil bun) was great too. Super great experience. 100% would recommend.

Tom is amazing! I wanted to make a change with my order when I picked it up, he fixed it on the spot with me and improved the original design. Totally above and beyond! Love this place, have always been really happy with the service and quality. Woohoo!

Great customer service from Tom & Gus.quick turnaround and delivered exactly what I was looking for. I was a walk-in, but they also have a great online design app for custom projects. I highly recommend Toronto Tees :)
It was super easy to create the design that I was looking for and my order was ready for pick up a day earlier than promised. Plus, the quality of both the final print and the fabric was great.

superior customer service and impeccable use of adobe design programs such as Photoshop and Illustrator. Tom was by far the most educated in print editing. I always do and always will suggest this establishment to anyone in need of personalized shirts/hoodies/zip up sweaters. They're amazing!
Very great service and custom prints! I had an issue with my previous print and they allowed me to change my design on the spot with no hassle! Will definitely be ordering from them again!

Great experience with Toronto Tees! They correct a mistake make that I made.by connecting me directly prior to custom printing the T-Shirts and I really appreciated it.
I will definitely use Toronto Tees again!
Great customer service, the design tool is very easy to use and the T-Shirt I had made came out perfect! I'm already planning on printing more shirts as nice custom gifts :)
Fantastic website for designing your hoodie. Super easy and easy to edit if you change your mind about the design. Hoodie arrived early for Christmas and was of great quality. Highly recommend!
It was amazing to see my artwork on a tshirt for the first time. Very glad I did it with Toronto Tees Custom!
Ordered some screen printed t's for my business. The quality of the print was great. Fast shipping too. Thanks Toronto Tee's (Due North MA)

Very fast and high quality custom print! Price was perfectly reasonable given the rush, and though I requested a rush order it came earlier than expected and they didn't charge me the extra for the rush.
Tom is the man! They Printed our T shirt in about 7 minutes. Super friendly and easy to work with. Can't get service like this anywhere else. Thanks guys. - Ary from GTA MAC REPAIR

Ordered a custom tee on line for a b-day present. The delivery date was going to be 3 days after the b-day party. I reached out and Toronto Tees made it happen. I received the tee 3 days before the party! Thanks Toronto Tees!
I recently placed an order with Toronto Tees - I was a little confused about the order process as I was messing up the colours. But a quick inquiry and I was set straight. Love the results

We ordered the shirts online, paid for regular shipping, and still received the shirts within 2 or 3 business days! Exactly as expected per our design.
We meant to write this review sooner, but can definitely attest to the quality since we've had the shirts for a couple of months now.

The quality is perfect; they are super comfortable, we wash them frequently because we work with dogs, and the shirts still look like the day we got them!

We look forward to placing our next order. Thank you for providing great quality and efficient service :)
Really nice, high-quality material for the t-shirts, and printed colours come out very crisp and bright. I would highly recommend, and will definitely use them again in future.
Placed a late Xmas order but didn't want the hassle of rushing but it was still ready 3 days earlier than expected. Great service, loved doing my own design.
Fast, efficient and very helpful. T shirts and print quality are excellent. Would definitely use this company again.

These guys are the best!

I've placed two online orders for shirts for my business, and both came exactly as expected.
The quality of the product, and overall customer experience can't be beat! They're easily reachable by phone or e-mail if you have any questions, and went above and beyond to get my order completed, when I was the one procrastinating (called me on Christmas eve when I hadn't returned their voicemail. Never would have expected it but was truly thankful, and impressed!).

Thank you for setting the bar for customer service!

Fantastic experience. More expedient, efficient & friendly than other place I've gone to. The price was also very fair. I will be back in the future. Highly recommended to anyone wanting to get their custom designs or quotations on cotton based clothing.
