Highly recommended !
I went there with my own hoodies.
Loved the prints on them. Made me own designs and they turned out to be amazing
The best part is, it hardly took 5-7 minutes.

Thanks for everything

After using another online custom t-shirt company who took my money and did not deliver the shirts, I decided to try Toronto Tees based upon the good reviews and I am glad I did. The process was very user-friendly, and the owner (Joe) responded quickly to expedite the order to get it to our friend in time for his birthday (who loved the shirts). Thanks again for an excellent experience!

This is gonna be one of my new favourite local businesses. The ordering process was simple, the prices were reasonable, and the turnaround time was unbelievable! Even for someone who is far from design or tech savvy, like me, it was easy to design a shirt based on a TV show we have been binging--a perfect gag gift to hang out in during these times! Plus, in spite of the current chaos surrounding COVID, my order arrived within a few days, in a lovely reusable tote bag instead of paper/plastic. Plus, the shipping was free! I will definitely be ordering from Toronto Tees again and recommending it to my friends.
Walked in today with super vague idea. The dude was super patient and knowledgeable, here's the end product. Fair pricing too! Will be back for more
Fantastic tees, turned out amazing - Jay provided great service with a really quick turn around. Would definitely buy again!

Kyle was very accommodating and prompt with all communication..We had several calls and emails to talk about deadlines, what's in stock, and what are the best practices. Pleasure to work with, dependable, and great customer service.

If you need to get shirts printed for an event and want to make sure your order gets to you on time, I cannot recommend them enough.

I ordered custom lake hoodies, and we are so in love with them! It was our first time designing custom clothing and the site is very user-friendly. Rave reviews from all of our friends and family! Joe was a pleasure to work with, he responded promptly to all of our inquiries, and he made sure our order arrived by the date of our event. We will be placing another order! Thank you!.(Delhi, Ontario)
Insane! Got an art on my phone. Less than 10min later I was with my t-shirt in the bag leaving the store. The guys working here are very nice and helpful. Great idea and great service. I recommend.

Loved the shirt!
So easy to order online!
I will be definitely buying from here again!

This custom tshirt place is absolutely amazing! They have digital printing which ensures colors are almost identical to your design resulting in the product being spectacular. The employees take the time to understand your needs and deliver an exceptional customer service. If you need a shirt printed or an idea executed this place will make sure you walk out with a smile on your face.
I ordered some custom shirts for a friend's bachlor party. They looked and felt great. The ordering process was super quick too!

The sweater I ordered turned out great.
Used their website to upload an image and did some tweaking and got it made. Simple and easy

I guess it is the best t-shirt print service in the city, with their speed and quality. The guys are very helpful with solving my problems, helping with my requests. Jay and his colleagues acceptedy order which I changed couple times, gave me a good discount and made the order quickly and great! I know fromy experience how hard can get a good print in short term but they did great, thank you!
Quick turnaround time, responsive team, good quality printed shirts. Highly recommend.
Super helpful staff. Great quality. My custom t-shirt was perfect!

Amazing Service, I was greeted by Jay, who was a really nice and informative rep. They were able to get the sweater printed in no time, like 15 mins, which was amazing as I was in a rush. Really nice staff and the prints came out really nice.
Placed an order today and was ready within 15 minutes when I showed up. Great customer service and happy with the shirts! Thanks again!
Ordered a custom t-shirt for my husband's birthday with a picture of our new cat and it turned out beautifully! Designing and ordering online was easy, and it was printed within days.

Ordered a custom Tee for a friend's birthday. Tom was really patient and professional in helping me choosing the right sized Tee and adjusting the graphics and text to make it look better. I would definitely recommend this place to others.
Tom did a t-shirt order for me, he was just the sweetest person to work with, so polite, kind, talented, and his communication was excellent. Absolutely will be ordering from here again!
Got 3 hoodies for me and my team. Order came on time and looks amazing. Worth the price and customer service was super friendly and helpful. Would recommend :)

This is my second time ordering from TT. BOTH experiences were awesome. I submitted via their website(easy to use) my own logo and it was ready by the time i walked there to get it. So, super easy, fast and great quality. The first one.
Autism friendly! Toronto Tees is our new go to for t-shirt printing. Professional service and great quality tees! Will be ordering again!

From the early days when TT opened their doors on Yonge St. until today, Jay and the team at TT's are awesome; and the prints are always on point. Great quality work whether you buy a single shirt or in bulk. I'm always referring people to them bc everyone wants to know where I get my shirts done! Quality product every time.
Reliable service, good print quality, and easy to interact web interface (design). Would give 5 stars if there was more color options on the type of t-shirt I selected.
Great tees even nicer people. Left my wallet here and wasn't able to pick it up for a few days. Retrieved missing wallet and had a great experience with custom tshirt

Great service.jay i believe his name is was so helpful.they made a mistake and printed the wrong size and told me to come back in and they will replace on the spot..Will definitely be using again..I highly recommend
Best Xmas gift I gave this year! Super easy set up. They corrected a spelling error I caught before printing. Friendly staff on site

Went in at the last minute before Halloween to get a Superman Tshirt. Christian was AWESOME.got me set up with a Superman Tshirt and hoodie for a great price. Printed.both on the spot in 20 minutes. Highlllly recommended!
Great service. I got exactly what I designed on their website. The only downside was the price (over $200 for 3 t-shirts) and the fact that they didn't have women's cut t-shirts.
Made a unique birthday gift with the simple and flexible design options. The turnaround time was very reasonable; it arrived with plenty of time to spare.
Excellent customer service from the fellas at Toronto Tees, and the quality of the hoodies I ordered were much better than expected! 10/10 would recommend!
Great website, easy to use but if you do run into problems they will take the reins and get your order exactly how you want it..Outstanding customer service, high quality products.

Toronto Tees is by far the BEST company to print your personal, team or business tees and more. They are always amazingly friendly and super professional- very high quality products! Recommend them highly!

Amazing design to pickup/delivery process! Great one-on-one help via email too! Thank you for the great service & help

Yes the prices are more than competitive than cooler than off the rack!

Please support local businesses in Toronto!
The website was easy to navigate. The design phase is user friendly. The t-shirt was delivered as promised, and customer was excellent
I needed to get a rush order (left my Christmas gift to the last minute), and they printed it in 5 minutes for me - that's a Christmas miracle! I also enjoyed the positive energy of the staff ôå.
Great service. Quick delivery. Beautiful t-shirts!.Thank you so much. Definitely recommend your services.
Great shirt, great service when I originally requested a quote, affordable prices, fast turnaround time, and great service when I picked it up.
High quality shirt and printing, this shirt will last for years to come. Delivery was free and on schedule. I wish I had more reasons to order custom shirts!
I ordered a tee-shirt and the quality of the fabric felt soft and comfortable, and the stitching was great..Thank you!
Excellent customer service I got from Tom today. Because of how well my t-shirt turned out, I will absolutely suggest their service.

Have to say 1st time I ordered from this business and I would definitely do it again in a heart beat..They were efficient, fast and was able to do exactly as I had asked. The pictures are on a t-shirt front and back of same t. Will be back!

I recently had two custom shirts printed at Toronto Tees- so thrilled with how well they turned out. I entered the store without a mask (forgot mine at work, sigh, was one of those days!) and they weren't mean about it- just grabbed me a.
Very happy with the experience. Product came out just as I had hoped and it was a very quick process. 10/10 would do business here again

Really great store to place online orders. The quality of the prints are great as well as the material. I was a little bit frustrated about the inconsistent delivery times. I had ordered 2 sweaters with a mock up design for an event I was hosting and was surprised with the quick turnaround when the order was delivered the next day. With this in mind, I placed an order for 2 more sweaters. 8 days go by and still had not received a shipping confirmation. I was getting anxious because my event was fast approaching. I got in touch with the owner Joe and this is what changed my review. He is very dedicated to his business and offers great customer service. He clearly communicated the status of my order and ensured my order would deliver before my event. I will definitely be a returning customer.

Great experience with shoe and Toronto Tees - ordered 12 shirts initially and then realized through conversation with Joe We could get 25 shirts for almost the same price. Joe answered all my questions about sizing, shirt formats, made a great tweak to my band logo artwork to make it appear larger on the shirts, found unusual extended sizes like 3XL and delivered it all across the country 10 days earlier than I was expecting! And they look great! 10/10 would definitely order from Toronto Tees again

Amazing! Truly Amazing! Joe, the owner, helped me order our first batch of T-shirts and baseball caps and I have to say the experience was exceptional. Joe's professionalism and extensive knowledge in the custom printing world had completely made it easy for me to decide between all of the options he had presented. The communication from him and from his staff, especially from Gabe, was great from beginning to end. We didn't need to worry about a thing as we were confident in Joe's expertise. He was also 100% accommodating with sampling the products and in adjusting our design. We will definitely order from the Toronto Tees Custom Printed T-shirts and Face Masks again. Thank you for all of your hard work. We are impressed with the sheer dedication you and your staff have provided us. Thank you.

Ordered a hoodie and a tshirt as a gift for a friend. Was worried about the quality of the clothing and how well the print would come out but it came out amazingly. Better than my expectations and my friends.

He lives in the city so it was shipped the next day and arrived the following day. Great service, great products. Would definitely purchase again!
Christian did an awesome job mocking up my design and having the shirt printed quickly. Super quality and shopping experience - thanks dudes!

I absolutely loved the seamless service and the professionalism in getting things printed exactly the way I wanted them. I printed a tote bag and a tshirt and it was done super fast. I will definitely be printing more with you guys.

Shirt-sizing was accurate to measurements provided, fit him perfectly - and he was so pleased to see his preferred phrasing for the age question!.Hat came out as I 'designed' as well..Pickup was simple, though there were so many orders waiting for pickup it took me a while to find my Toronto Tees reusable bag!

Awesome boutique t-shirt shop on Queen West! Fun, friendly, professional ,and delivered on time..Quick response to inquiries and they went beyond our expectations with our order..Highly recommend!
- T-Fix It

A few neighbourhood guys were looking to create some swag..We wanted tees and hoodies with a logo we had designed..Because our order amounted to a small amount of garments it was cost prohibitive to go with a screen print as there are usually large minimum orders..Not Toronto Tees! We got two designs printed onto tees and hoodies and the results are quite amazing! The hoodie is now my favourite and the t shirt great..The print quality is top shelf as well..Thank you TT's for making this happen for us.
Really great place for small or bigger orders, people working there are kind and the prints are really good quality:)
These guys are great. They took the bad description that I gave them and made a great looking design. In total, it took 10-15 mins. Great quality t-shirt and friendly service!

It takes a week to get a shirt printed. This is a disappointingly long time to wait.

When I picked up my shirts, I asked them if they print the shirts in-house. They do. So it takes no time to print it. There is no excuse for a delay after they receive the order.

Toronto Tees charges a premium to get the shirt fast. If you don't pay more, then they make you wait a week for your order. This is too long and not right. The shirts are expensive enough already.

The quality of the shirt is average. It is a typical Gildan shirt.

I had purchased a baby onesie and wanted it for our gender reveal on Monday September 28th. I ended up ordering on a Wednesday September 23rd and received it on the Friday Sept. 25th. I did not think it would arrive on time but Toronto Tees took care of things so quick they met my deadline. which they did not even know of. the quality is great and their service is fast. I will very likely use them again in the future and recommend them.

I ordered around 60 mens polo custom made with QR code.and 20 womens tees with QR Code for our company and expo. Came out great! Highly recommend for quality work, fast work and fast shipping within Toronto
Took care of a custom T-shirt order for a bachelor party, right turn around and pricing was very fair..Thanks guys

I ordered some custom hoodies from Toronto Tees and was very impressed..The hoodies turned out great. I will certainly return for more orders in the future.

Ian

Quick and easy design process, entirely online and extremely comprehensive. Delivery was quick and personal too! I missed the knock as I was on a work call, but when I did open the door a nice canvas bag was left tied to my door handle with my purchase inside..It lead me to believe that these products are hand delivered by the employees themselves, as opposed to being shipped via postal services. My step son loves the sweater I made for him, he's 13 and just graduated. I would definitely order from Toronto Tees again and would recommend you do too! :) Thank you so much!
Got my sweaters today and everything was exactly what I ordered. Great job & thank you
Was so easy and quick and made an amazing Christmas gift! Would definitely order from here again!
Awesome.store needed a batman beyond shirt and they did it came out really nice.paid $30 for it. I may come back for some custom sweaters. Workers are also really nice

Worked with Tom on the shirts for our bachelor party weekend. He designed the graphics and text and shared the options with us. Excellent service, diligent care, answered our questions, and ready within the hour. Would absolutely go back to Toronto Tees. Thanks.
This service was easy and quick to deliver and exactly met my needs! Thanks ! I have been using Toronto Tees for several years at Christmas time and the service and delivery couldn't be better !
I had a rush job and was able to get in touch with Toronto Tees and get it done beautifully! Great Job! Toronto Tees is my go-to for custom T shirts. Great service + great quality products.

I ordered these rush and Joe totally delivered above and beyond. The gear was top quality and it arrived a day before I needed.
I'm already looking a other designs as I will continue to order through Toronto Tees!
Top notch service!
Absolutely great place! Customer service was amazing, and the t-shirt was a hit.
Great service, great communication. Highly recommended. Check the sizing on the website: we found the men's hoodies fit large and the women's tees fit small, but YMMV.
Had an order that needed to be done quick. Had to pay an extra fee but it was done on time. Nice hats. Good printing job.
Excellent service, Tom is a very friendly and efficient guy. Printed my shirt very fast and ended up looking amazing. Thanks again

We dealt directly with Joe with an order of over 100 hoodie sweatshirts..He was very responsive, punctual, courteous, and ultimately delivered the product faster and at a lower cost than other places we had sourced..Would highly recommend using Joe because there is a personal touch that you don't get when using other purely online or US sites..Also felt good to support a local business during the covid pandemic..Thanks Joe for your dedication and help!.Will definitely use your services again!
E and T
I LOVE the custom t-shirts I produced with Toronto Tees - Toronto Tees communication, production, shipping and the finished product were exactly what I hoped for. THANK YOU!

Toronto Tees came through for me..I had two friends (one of them was my wife) turning 50 in the same week and I thought a commemorative T-shirt would be fun.
The Toronto Tees website was super-easy to use and I was able to custom design two completely different T-shirts within minutes.
Even delivery was faster than expected.
Thank you so much!
Great quality! I was running late to pick them up and he dated an extra 30mins for me! Very grateful

Received my shirt earlier than expected and it was perfect.
I look forward to putting in another order.

Joe and his team are great! I designed 50th wedding anniversary sweatshirts for my parents online..Joe was extremely helpful during the whole process and ensured the end product was great..I will definitely place another order!
Great company, with zero complications. Designed my shirt in the evening, used "rush" service and picked it up the next day! Very happy with how the shirt came out :)

We ordered two shirts to use as costumes for a show we were putting on and they turned out great! Super fast turn around and so convenient to be able to pick it up ourselves! We saved a lot of money and got to support a local company!

I had some items made and sent as gifts. They have online tools so you can design at your leisure. If you're not tech savvy don't worry because the response time for customer service is awesome and they'll help with everything. The customized gifts were a big hit, thanks Toronto Tees!

First-time customer. I uploaded my "design" (just words, no image) on their site, picked colours for the words and the T, and picked it up a few days later. Husband loved it! Would appreciate more choices in colours and style of Ts, esp for women, but I can still work with what they have. Am pleased with the quality of material of the one we got. Will def be using this biz again. Actually, working on a new design atm.

My T shirt was stolen from my mailbox! Toronto Tees made us a second (for free!) and personally delivered it to my house in record time. Excellent service. Everyone I spoke with at the company was considerate and professional, with the goal of making me a happy customer. It was not their problem that someone stole the shirt, but they dealt with it anyway. I am very happy with the quality of the T and with the overall experience. Nice!

The online editor and the ability to save designs to your profile is very useful, it makes it every easy to compare costs between your different ideas and choose one.

Order came very fast, the shirts fit great and are of great quality, and the printing of my custom logo looks fantastic..Will shop here again.

I had a really good experience with this company. Their website was really easy to use, and it was nice to be able to try out my design on different styles before ordering. The turnaround time was really quick, and the quality of the print is excellent!

Don't do business with these people. Got quoted for 14 t-shirts online before heading to their location the same day. I had purchased blank shirts from a different location. I then decided I only needed 9 t-shirts to be printed out. They tried to charge me $315.00 for printing 9 t-shirts for a basic quote along with a black and white photo. They don't seem to have no consideration about your situation whatsoever nor' does anyone have good team ethics, all they see is a dollar sign. Communication is poor and the environment feels sketchy. One colour t-shirt I particularly had which was sky blue, the guy said he couldn't use the colour even though I seen that colour in their shop.

I had the BEST experience with Joe from Toronto Tees! Excellent customer service! He was super patient, knowledgeable and very efficient as.we went back and forth to design the zip up hoodie. I absolutely love the end product as I saw my vision executed so beautifully. The product and design quality are top notch! I would recommend 100%!

After inquiring for 48 hoodies, Joe Taylor (owner) had been responsive and extremely patient while I had worked out details and designs. His services exceeded expectations and we were thoroughly impressed with our order. Will definitely be ordering from him again.

The whole Team at Toronto Tees was super friendly and very helpful. I ordered a T-shirt online using the design tool and it was really easy. When I went in to pick up the shirt I wanted to have another custom shirt made for a gift to a friend and the staff was able to make that custom shirt for me right away, it only took 10-15 minutes. Good vibes. Custom T-shirts make great gifts for your pals.

Toronto Tees is great. Their website is really easy to navigate and create my tee. Not only did my tee arrive very quickly, the quality of the material is awesome and the print is great quality, too. Thanks Toronto Tees! I'll definitely be a returning customer.

I've used a couple of online T-shirt makers in the past (RedBubble, Entripy, others) but supporting this classic local business that's been in my consciousness seemingly forever is truly the way to do it. Great quality, reasonable turnaround and price. Just wish they could handle fulfillment for me!

I had to print a t-shirt quickly and have it shipped immediately. The entire process from start to finish took less than 2 minutes, and the end result was terrific and arrived in 2 days/right on schedule. Highly recommend!

Amazing company, super helpful and responsive to queries. Simple to use website, gives loads of options. I made 5 designs and compared them all, it was great for making custom Christmas presents. Really had the WOW factor too, people were dazzled by the finished results
Great experience! So accommodating and easy interface for design. Definitely will be returning!

Site was very easy to use. Staff were very helpful and even called me with suggestions on how to improve my design. The shirts were a rush order but they got them done with time to spare. All of my coworkers loved the shirts as well.

One thing to keep in mind: If you are picking up in person, bring a friend to help or be prepared to personally carry the box of shirts to your car or to transit. The staff will not help you. Not complaining; I just hadn't considered that when I had parked my car a few blocks away.

I ordered a custom crew neck as a gift and it was delivered slightly ahead of schedule and completely perfect. I was so happy with the service and product that I ordered another gift as well as a prototype for my emerging merchandise line. The company contacted me to let me know that they'd touch up my logo so that it would print well. I am a single mother, entrepreneur, and student - i made the logo myself - so the help with it was extra-appreciated. I will definitely be printing the rest of my merchandise line with them. Thanks so much for being great at what you do!
Love this place. They print anything. Are quick but patient..The guy working there was helpful and friendly.

I did an online order for a family member who lives in Toronto. Design and shipping were really straightforward and the recipient really pleased with the result. There was a problem with the online payment as I live outside Canada. I almost gave up but very glad I didn't. Emailed Joe, and an alternative, secure arrangement was sorted in.less than 24 hours. Great service - thank you

I placed an order for some T-shirts only a few days before an event. I emailed and asked if it was possible to have them done in time (doubting that it was doable). The reply I got was super helpful and professional, and they made it happen! I was very impressed with the whole process. their website made things incredibly easy, their team was super helpful, and even though I was a dummy who left ordering to the last minute, their team delivered. Great job guys!

I love making shirts for family and friends and have used the services of Toronto Tees for years. They are convenient and great even last minute. But my most recent visit to the shop on Yonge I found the staff not as friendly as in the past and the slogan ‚Äòhome of the 5 min tee' didn't really hold true. When I arrived I was the only person in the store and the first guy who greeted me was not too friendly. When I mentioned I would like to make 6 shirts, most with simple text, I was told I could not get them all at once, I would need to collect 3 of them the next day. I was the only person in the store and it was more than 1 hour til close. I was disappointed as I wanted to give them as gifts the next day and didn't have time to wait. Anyways I did the maximum I was allowed which was 3. In future I will need to plan ahead better.
This is such an awesome business! Jay was especially.helpful with making sure my custom design came out perfectly. I will definitely be back an I highly recommend printing with them!
Great service, so simple..I brought in art work and had 2 t-shirts within 5 minutes..Staff is helpful and friendly..Tshirt quality is excellent..Lots of options.

Toronto Tees is amazing! I received my shirt today and it turned out perfectly. It fits great and the material is light and incredibly soft. My design was taken from a downloaded photo that I had them put on the front. The quality of the design turned out absolutely amazing and even better than I had hoped. Also the service was lightening quick, considering that I just ordered a few days ago. Highly recommend this fantastic business!
Great quality and pretty fast shipping! Also, customer support was really responsive!

I ordered one custom sweater and was very happy with how it turned out. I ordered from another company and the sizing chart was inaccurate and fit way too small. Toronto Tees sizing was legit. I was happy with the quality of the sweater along with the print. My order was ready in just 3 days! I requested for curbside pick-up knowing that I could risk getting a parking ticket along Yonge St. But when I called, they met me at the door ready with my order. Super fast and convenient! Thanks Toronto Tees! I definitely recommend ordering from them.

Great experience! Visited the store to check if they could extract a small portion of a picture and put it on a t-shirt, and 10 minutes later I left the store with exactly what I wanted. What I love about the t-shirt is that the print is not too thick and it doesn't look like it would crack or peel.
I was being helped by Trevor, a wonderful young man/powerful wizard who did his magic to make that t-shirt happen. Great customer service too - even when he was immersed in the picture modifying software, he managed to be engaging, charmingly funny and deal with my questions.
Top marks for both service and product!

This was my first time ordering from Toronto Tees . but not my last!
I was impressed with the level of politeness when speaking with them over the phone, prior to ordering online. As a brand director at my previous job, I was all about the logo placement and quality of garments being ordered for staff. I ordered a custom zip-up hoodie for my mom for Mother's Day and within the week it arrived at my house. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of garment and end-result of art work supplied. I'm very excited and can't wait for my mom to wear it.I know she'll love it!

Five stars for Toronto Tees! From my first contact which was via an email , to the order delivered to my house Joe Taylor was excellent. He listened to what we wanted,.made changes until we were happy and delivered a quality product at a fair price. We are going on a family holiday and ordered customized hoodies. I highly recommend Toronto Tees and Joe is a pleasure to deal with. I could not have asked for better service.

Amazing work by the entire team. I had a golf / bachelor party and needed logo hats created with not a lot of time. Toronto Tees really delivered. Everything was made quickly and perfectly. I got a lot of positive feedback on the hats at the party. Great communication on the order, very professional, would recommend •á
Thanks for making the party memorable!

Last minute order for t shirts for our hockey team.. Tried a few different places but none of them could meet Toronto T's price or delivery time..Staff was accommodating, friendly. Highly recommended Toronto T"s-5 stars!

I ordered a small batch of branded clothing for my business. The order came fast and I was happily surprised with the quality of my long sleeve white shirts. I had a hard time finding a shop in the city that would do custom hats and the team at Toronto Tees did a proper job. Will certainly order again and would highly recommend.
Quick service, very friendly and caring owner. Great quality hoodies
I have bought several t-shirts from Toronto Tees and they are always great. The customer service is awesome.

Okay, I'm editing this because I had such a pleasant experience with Toronto Tees, two days in a row. I am more than happy with the quality and the service. Ethan from the Yonge street office went out of his way to let us know that, in correction to an earlier report that they didn't have medium black tees in stock, that they actually DO have them at the time. He flagged me and my old folks down the street in front of the shop and told us the pleasant news. My family's father's day was made all the more memorable thanks to me not having to return a third time for a third order.

The turnout was fast and the quality is *chef's kiss* excellent. This won't be the last you've heard of me, kind people! I will order again!
Great product, great prices, fantastic customer service! Highly recommended.

Got my Dad a t-shirt for fathers day and it turned out fantastic! The site was easy to use and was great to get to control all aspects of the design. The product came in a cool reusable tote and delivery was fast. My Dad absolutely loved it! Will definitely use this company again. !

This is now my go-to place in Toronto for printing amazing, quick, and high-quality t-shirts for my company. My last few experiences in here with the wonderful team were fun, professional, and memorable. I worked mainly with Trevor and Dan, and my designs were quickly printed before I knew it! Above all, they actually carefully inspected both of my designs and re-examined the printing results, making sure I was happy with each and everyone of them before I left the store. I was SO pleased with the two shirts I got for an amazing price, I will for sure come back for my other designs and will also be recommending my friends and family to come to this store. Absolutely recommended, and thank you, Toronto Tees for an amazing time and product! :)

Great turn around. Slight hiccup at first but the gentleman that called me explained it was a slight system error and that same day it was sent out and I received my shirt the very next day. Shirt quality is great. Very soft and the print is amazing. Definitely will be making more shirts through Toronto tees. Great experience and super nice employees

absolutely would recommend this to a friend! The quality was absolutely amazing and I think price was reasonable as it was a custom shirt. It printed exactly the way I had customized it to look online!
Joe and his team deliver high quality custom tees at a very reasonable price. It's awesome to wear something you thought up and designed!.I'll never buy another off the shelf tee again.

Toronto Tees has the best customer service I've ever experienced - hands down.

The t-shirt I ordered arrived quickly, however, the design came out blurrier than I'd hoped. Joe had already emailed me to confirm my satisfaction, and when I responded with my concern he responded back within minutes offering a replacement. The issue ended up being that the photo I sent was too pixelated. They were able to find a better quality photo of the same design and the new shirt I received is of the highest quality. Not to mention it took only a few days for my orders to arrive, and both orders were hand delivered.

10/10 could not recommend this place more. Thank you, Toronto Tees and Joe!
We had a last minute order and Toronto Tees was able to provide same day service for 3 custom T-shirts..Amazing service and great quality!

Great hoodie comfortable and excellent print! Also i want to mention that i ordered a shirt, and there was an issue with it, they were very responsive and replaced my shirt. Thats what i call excellent customer service and i would buy from them again for sure! And what i really like is its local! Support local

The t-shirts look great, but the women's sizing runs small, so be sure to order a size up. Tom was great in helping me out with re-printing a larger size that fit, so I couldn't be happier, and will definitely be going back. Thanks
Fair price, fast service, highly recommend. Great quality tee as well.

Got the lettering and numbering on my United shirt done here and it was perfect. Great staff and I really appreciated the attention to detail on the font sizing and placement to make sure it came out ëåèΩ. Oh, it was all done in ~ 10 mins.

COME THRU!.

I always thought Toronto Tees only did one offs in their store location on Yonge St. They are even better for large quantity orders.
Even with what I'm sure are serious supply chain challenges which come with a global pandemic. Joe (the owner) dealt with our order personally. He was on top of our order and our design adjustments every step of the way. Toronto Tees got our order of 150 T-shirts out super fast and they are some of the best quality t-shirts I've seen or worn.
We will definitely be back for more and would not think of getting them done by anyone else as our business and promotional needs grow.

Great quality shirts and application of the logo we supplied.

Highly recommend.
They understood my ask perfectly and delivered the items quickly. They look great!
Bought some t-shirt designs and the kind people at Toronto Tees were so helpful in getting me what I needed. Quality of the shirt and print is great too!

Thank you Trevor for the awesome job you did creating the "70th Birthday" T Shirt for me yesterday..I really appreciate the extra time you took,.your attention to detail, and the quick turnaround to produce the perfect gift for my brother's special birthday..I know the shirt will be a big hit at his party this weekend!

Barbara

Awesome service..Ordered a sweater with a big image I provided that covered the whole chest. so impressed with the quality of the print..The image is imbedded into the fabric not on the surface..Sweater came within a day of the estimated time, right before Christmas which I'm sure is a very busy time..Great company ëå.
T-shirt came out well and delivered on a timely basis..May do additional orders..It was easy to create the design.

It was a pleasure doing business with Toronto Tees! I had a large order, but they completed it in an efficient timeframe. Joe was also a great help along the way. He answered all my questions and brought me up to speed on the status of my order. I will definitely be doing business with them again in the future!

I recently placed an order online for 2 custom sweaters (worth about $90). Soon after placing the order, Toronto Tees emailed me saying they needed a higher resolution image to print the sweaters. I didn't have such an image available, so I promptly responded that I'd like to cancel the order and get a refund. I didn't hear back from anybody regarding this cancellation request. After being ghosted for an entire week, I decided to contact my credit card company to charge back the purchase. I felt like I had no choice but to do this, since I was getting zero response from Toronto Tees. Coincidentally enough, on the day after I called my credit card company, I finally got an email from Toronto Tees saying that the refund would be processed. Pretty strange if you ask me.

I placed my order online for curbside pickup. Designing was easy and pick up was fast and courteous. I'm really pleased with how the shirt turned out. I actually just placed another order! Great job Toronto Tees! Shop local guys!

Great quality, fast custom T shirts in Toronto. I needed my order rushed for Christmas, I reached out, and Toronto Tees personally delivered it to my place downtown! 10/10. Would recommend using anytime.
Great shop, friendly and super helpful staff, I'm very happy with the finished product.

Ordered multiple times from Toronto Tees. First couple were t-shirt orders, then it was for a sweatshirt. Always professional and helpful, especially when the logo I sent wasn't going to turn out well as I had sent it. They reached out to ask for a higher resolution image and worked with me to get the best print job. Amazing and punctual in making and delivering. Will definitely order from these folks again!

Amazing experience with Toronto Tees!

I went in on a Monday to get sixty B&W t-shirts printed for Friday. Dan was extremely helpful and efficient in getting my order set up and completed on time.

The whole way along, he called me to check in with if I was happy with how the design looked and let me know as soon as I could pick up my shirts. He even threw in a few extra shirts for me which I was very grateful for.

Will definitely be using Toronto Tees again in the future for any other orders I might have.

I recently reached out to Toronto Tees for a corporate order for t-shirts for a staff event. The team was incredibly quick with responding to inquiries and was accommodating to every need we had, including design changes, quantity adjustments, as well as a very short turnaround time in order for the shirts to be delivered before our staff event. We had approximately 50 shirts printed and ready for pick up in just over 48 hours from finalizing our order..Additionally, when I realized I had made a mistake with the quantities in our order, (at no fault of the company, my math was just off,) Joe.at Toronto Tees was quick to respond to my second order request and printed and expedited an additional shirt for us within an hour of me reaching out. I received my personal shirt yesterday, and the quality is great, and we couldn't be happier with how they turned out. Highly recommend Toronto Tees and their team to anyone needing custom shirts made. Thank you again, for helping us pull of the development of these shirts in time for our event!
Bought 2 custom shirts for my son who's 22. He really liked the design and the size of the font..A great unique gift idea. The turnaround time was only about 2 days as well!
Awesome service, super quick, even before Christmas, and great shirt!
Service was terrific. I had an issue with blurriness of images and they were able to fix my file to improve the quality. Very happy customer.
Could not recommend this place any more. I went in with a bulk t-shirt request and Tom was able to have the order completed on the same day. The staff are very courteous, helpful, and experienced.

They have an amazing website super easy to find information and design your own clothing. My order came fast and was hand delivered with care, the quality is amazing and printed on good quality shirts so I had no problems with shrinking in the wash. 10/10 would definitely recommend for any and all printing needs!

My order (of 10 shirts with a design) was processed and made within a few days, and it got sent to me in less than a week! The quality of printing and the shirts themselves seem great, and I definitely would buy from Toronto Tees again.
Excellent service. My custom shirt turned out perfect!

This is my favourite place to go for gifts in the city. I've purchased several personalized t-shirts as gifts from Toronto Tees. The quality of both the t-shirts and the prints is fantastic, and the customer service is top notch. If you're looking for great quality, service, and to support local business, this is THE place to go! Thanks, guys, for always being awesome! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

I've ordered from Toronto Tees twice. Both times they were super easy to work with. Once online and once in person. I even screwed up with the delivery and they got back to me with emails and phone calls just to make sure I got the package. Forget about buying on Amazon support your local businesses like Toronto Tees.
Sam was an absolute beauty in helping me get a tight turnaround on a shirt for a wedding. Turned out amazing, and super accommodating + friendly. Will be back for more shirts

Put in a custom tee order for mother's day recently, and made a slight mistake on my order. The owner ended up contacting me directly to rectify it free of charge, which was very much appreciated. The tees were printed same day as well, and my parents loved them. Great experience overall!

Amazing service! All my questions and mockup requests were addressed very quick and very professional.
Quality of my products and print work are perfect.
Price - absolutely adequate.
Will recommend Joe and his team to all my friends!
Good luck and keep developing your business with the same attitude :)!

Needed a t-shirt order in a very short time and delivered on time for a sports tournament - Toronto Tees got it done and with terrific communication and most kind customer service! A place you can trust for sure - thanks for everything!

I ordered a last minute shirt for a friend as a joke and needed it right away..The service at Toronto Tees was accommodating and friendly!.I created the shirt easily online, then called to see if I could receive it sooner than their standard timeframe, and they could not have been more responsive..I was thrilled when I opened the bag and saw the quality, it looked better than I hoped..Thank you!

Very fast and accurate local printing on products. The website was very user friendly and it was easy to come up with a design for our gift. Products are sourced from different countries as we got a hat, shirt and free face mask from them! i would definitely purchase from Toronto Tees again for any future gift ideas.

My company had a need for custom masks that needed to be delivered sooner than later..I was very happy with how quickly they communicated both via email and the phone..Really appreciated the smooth business model..And the product was as advertised..It's nice to do straight business with no surprises..I will definitely recommend!.Thanks team!

I made a last minute decision to order a couple of personalized zip up hoodies to celebrate my 30 year wedding anniversary. I was so pleased that they arrived well before the actual date. They looked fantastic. I would have liked to have had them embroidered as opposed to stenciled, and I would have liked to have had a choice of a heavier material. But I am more than pleased with the outcome and will definitely recommend them to anyone. Thank you so much. Oh and BTW, my husband loved the sweater. He thought it was such a clever way to recognize our special day. Thanks again

We absolutely loved our company t-shirts and hoodies which we purchased from Toronto Tees! Joe was amazing and provided great service, answering all our inquiries, preparing mock-ups and sending our order out for delivery with quick turnaround. We would highly recommend and purchase again!

Super customer service! Also very fast and these guys respond within minutes . My tshirt looks great .I had an issue with one of the letters looking scuffed and they fixed me up with a new one without even blinking..Highly recommended
Always the best service and finished products. I love this shop and will continue to have cheesy t-shirts made for every occasion. :-D
Took a picture of a picture and had it put on a T for my boy. It was BETTER than expected. Best gift ever.

I've driven by the store front so many times and have been meaning to try it out for the past year.

Toronto tees (Joe) was easy to coordinate with, made a sample of what I ordered (very accurate) and had it delivered to my doorstep for free within 3-5 days. Quick and easy.
My co-ed volleyball crew loved the shirts and complimented the quality, too (heather grey unisex tshirt).
Definitely will be a returning customer. Happy to support local business too!

Needed a last minute order done on behalf of my kids for their step dad and they got it done a lot quicker than others could. The tshirt is soft and of great quality, fits perfectly and was very much loved by the recipient.
Communication with staff was quick and easy, and Joe was very helpful along the way.

It was about a week before Christmas and both the lineups for ordering and pickups were long. I was impressed with how quick, organized, upbeat and professional the staff remained under those conditions. I gave my t-shirt as a gift and my friend loved it.

Great customer service. I'm happy with the results. My uploads didn't show up on the website, so I received an email from them the same day and they were able to take my uploads via email with no issues. Didn't wait long either ! Highly recommend

Long time visual artist & photoshop user. I sent these guys a custom image for a sweater that printed EXACTLY as I had envisioned. No BS: best quality of work I've seen for a business of this type. Well done guys.
My custom t-shirts came out better than I had hope for. The print came out great, smooth edges, perfect size. And they were ready faster than estimated. Thank you!

I was looking for a tshirt for my daughter upon her graduation. I saw something I liked but, it was based out of California. So I decided to search local and found Toronto Tees. I sent a picture of what I was looking for and they matched it perfectly. I put an order in and it was at my door within days. They really are awesome. Very friendly and accommodating. I'm so glad I decided to shop local. Thank you Joe and your team for a great experience.
Linda

I placed an order and it was ready the same day..I designed the writing to.go on the front of the t-shirt and it was replicated exactly..I am very grateful that this birthday gift could be prepared so quickly, efficiently and within my specifications at such a reasonable cost..I would definitely order again through Toronto Tees!

I had some custom T-shirts printed for my kids for Christmas presents. I was very pleased with how easy it was to design the shirts on the website and they turned out FABULOUS. Good quality, well made and the print job was perfect. Thank you!

Toronto Tees offers excellent custom t-shirt services. They are super fast and easy to deal with. Their online design app is amazing. The quality of the t-shirts is also great. I highly recommend them!

Working with Toronto Tees has been wonderful. They were very responsive to my queries. They went above and beyond getting mock ups made and providing me with helpful information along the way. The shirts look and feel fantastic. I would highly recommend using their services. My family thanks you!

Loooved the shirts we customized for my friend's bachelorette! The shirts were exactly as expected! And was made pretty quick - in 2 days. + I initially paid for a rush fee for the tees to deliver to our home since we were worried about the timing, but later I called the shop to change to an in-store pick-up. The shop owner was patient and helped refund the delivery fee the next day. Would highly recommend!

I love the sweater great material and high quality design..I made one for my Photography business not only were they fast delivery but when there was an issue with one of my pictures they messaged me and when I responded back the answered within 5 hours! Fastest customer service I've gone through will definitely be ordering from them again!

I ordered a hoodie with a custom design. The print turned out crisp and the colour was spot on. The hoodie is also super soft and comfortable! Toronto tees is my favourite print shop and I got my item within 48 hours! Highly recommend to anyone looking to do prints.

Also the team here really cares, and emailed me about colour and logo quality with recommended adjustments before printing to ensure I got the best quality.

Thank you so much!

Toronto Tees provides a very good service..It is easy to design and select your products on the website, shipping is free if you order over a certain number of them, and delivery with Purolator was faster than the estimate promised by 3 business days..I ordered baseball hats and mens and women's t-shirts, one colour printing (black) on white..The t-shirts themselves are good quality and the print quality looks good..The logo on the hats was a little smaller than anticipated, but on the shirts was quite large..The women's T, which I ordered in extra large looks like a medium (very fitted), so I should probably have gone larger with the women's sizing..Men's sizing is as expected..White shirts are a little more off-white whereas the white hats are pure white..Overall I was pleased and would order from Toronto Tees again.

I am thrilled with my products..I had been having an extremely difficult time finding a company that didn't require a minimum order of six products or that wasn't crazy expensive,.and time was of the essence as I needed it for Christmas..Thankfully I found Toronto Tees just in time..The ordering process was easy and when there was a question/potential issue with my order, they called me right away and they consulted with me..You never know with online ordering what kind of quality you're going to get,.but after speaking with Trevor,.I felt confident that I would get a great product, and I did..And it arrived within a week of that phone call!.Super happy and would definitely order from them again.

The t-shirt was great! Even tho they sell Guildan only, the quality of it is decent. I havent washed it yet, so don't know if it shrinks after. Hopefully it won't.
Image application is amazing. It won't come off easily.
Sizing is precise. It fitted my bf perfectly.
Turnaround is fast too. I placed an order and the next day they emailed me that I can come and pick it up.

Very happy with the purchase.

Best place to get custom shirts done! Joe the owner and operator was nothing but awesome and beyond helpful! He got my shirts done ASAP and they looked so good! Great quality and also super affordable and fair prices. You really get what you pay for when you come to Toronto Tees! 10/10!

Amazing quality they did a great job and were a pleasure to work with! I kept asking questions about the design and the team didnt hesitate to help me! They were truly a pleasure to deal with! The shirt came within a week of ordering it! Where else can you get a high quality personalized shirt in less than a week? I will absolutely be using them in the future! Joe and his team are incredible!

Great service! My father in law needed shirts made in 24 hours and the Toronto Tees team delivered.

This is what he had to say:
"No issues. The boys were surprised and loved your design. No problem with the pick up - shirts were ready when I arrived.¬†"
Amazing print - high quality, durable and affordable. I got great service from Jay and I'll definitely be coming back next time I need a print!

My online ordering experience was fantastic. The order was hand delivered by the team within days.
Most importantly, I made a typo when I designed the t-shirts online and I didn't notice. I didn't notice it online or in the confirmation email! So while Toronto Tees was in the middle of making my shirts, they called to triple check the typo is what I wanted. Thank goodness they did! They were able to make the correction and my t-shirts are wonderful. I've washed and hung mine to dry several times and it still looks brand new. If I need t-shirts again I will 100% recommend Toronto Tees.

Great service on a customized print job that I wanted. I brought in a tank top in a small size that they didn't have, and they printed the image in the position where I wanted it while I waited (not long, 15 minutes).
Five star experience with Freshly Baked! They turned around custom t-shirts for a client campaign in 24 hours and delivered it right to my office door.

Customer service was amazing! I ordered two hoodies as a gift for my bosses, there was a VERY slight mix up and Jay the manager had everything sorted for me within an hour! The quality of the product was amazing i couldn't fault any part of the transaction. We will definitely use Toronto Tee's again. Jay deserves a raise for his customer care :)

Extremely fast and friendly service. My team has been using Toronto Tees for years, and they have yet to disappoint. The quality of the shirts and the durability of the ink is unmatched when compared to competitors. I without a doubt would recommend this company when looking for custom printed clothing.

These guys always do an amazing job, I go there to get all my original art printed on shirts and sweaters. I've gotten 7 different shirts printed and 3 sweaters, and they're always professional and make sure I get the product I want.
The shirts were made SUPER fast and the quality of the work/shirts were top notch.
Nice material and the writing printed on the hoody was perfect. It was a nice birthday gift . He loved it. Thanks for processing the urgent request.

I'm so pleased with the service I received at Toronto Tees. Once I put the order through, the T-shirt was quickly customized, packaged, and sent off for delivery. Within a few days my sister received her special birthday present. She was thrilled with the message & the quality of the shirt. A free mask was even included. Thank you to Joe & his team. I wouldn't hesitate to order again & recommend Toronto Tees to my friends.
Linda Rowe

Super friendly staff! I needed to get a custom T shirt as a farewell gift. It couldn't have been more easy. Placed the order online and emailed to get it early heard back from Joe (the owner) in 5 min to come to the shop to pick it up. Excellent service!
Fantastic quality and great customer service..My friends and I were so happy to see our vision of the t shirt come to be..Thank you Joe and all the Toronto Tees staff.

I like this company very much. I had a small issue with my last order and they took care of everything right away with no questions asked. I was very pleased and grateful. They will definitely get my business anytime.

I rush ordered 8 custom baby onesies for an upcoming baby shower last week. Not only were they all perfect, but I had them at my doorstep in Ottawa within two business days. Kyle even added a handwritten note to the package thanking me for the order. Will definitely be using this company again in the future.

Excellent service, great quality print and tees.

Joe was quick, friendly and even touched up the design to ensure that it printed optimally

Several years ago when I started my own business I had tees done here and I'm still wearing one of them so I knew this was where I would go to get a couple of items with my thoughts on them..Service was excellent and Tom who served me gets a thumbs up for being so helpful and fun..In our current upside down world we need more people like him..I have a lot of thoughts lately so I'll definitely be backëçòÅ

If you are looking for a place to print your favorite words/photo on a t-shirt, this is the place to go. I am so happy with my product, Toronto Tees did a great job on my request. They have experience and you will be happy with your order. If you have any issues, you can contact them, they will respond quickly and effectively. I will definitively use their services again!

The online design options made it so easy and fun to create an original custom tee shirt.
There was a bit of a problem with the finished product but the team went above and beyond to fix it.
I will be sure to use Toronto Tee again and highly recommend them too.

I ordered a set of 10 custom, full-colour masks from Toronto Tees just a few weeks ago as a gift for friends. The result was better than I could have hoped. I worried that the design for the masks was too intricate and that either colour or detail would be lost - instead, the printing came out beautifully with perfect colour and detail, and the masks themselves were also of very high quality. Would highly recommend!

We had been looking for a specific shirt from a specific place for my granddad's birthday for years to no avail, so we decided to have one made. Toronto Tees was awesome! I had used them before to make a custom hoody for my husband they were amazing then and amazing now. Fast, courteous, and local (which is my favourite kind of business) Thanks again for all your help Joe and team!

Toronto Tees provided me with the highest quality and service possible!
I am very pleased with the quality of the logo printed on the shirts that I bought. Both shirts arrived super fast which impressed me very much. I highly recommend this company if you are looking for superlative quality and service!

Not only did my order ship super fast, the prints looks great and come with a wash guarantee, but the sweatshirts were one of the softest, most comfortable shirts I've ever worn. 100% will be coming back with my friends to order more!
Very impressed!.The baby onesie arrived in a few days and looks better in real life than online. It would be cool if there was option to print on the back as well.

I recently used the self-serve design tool to create a custom t-shirt and was pleased by how easy it was to use. I placed the order and it was ready for pick-up within a few short hours. Fast service, great quality - would definitely use this service again.

I always thought it would be really expensive to do a small job. But they're actually really well-priced - certainly the same cost of any branded T-shirts like Roots, etc.

I was very happy with the results and very happy that the fit I chose was as advertised - not super tight, but not the boxy kind most souvenir T-shirts are.

Quick to answer questions online and quick to produce the T-shirts. I'll be doing more!

Id say my standards are pretty high when it comes to custom things, being a User Interface designer I'm strongly detail and quality ordinate. Coming into a totally busy store, the guys at Toronto Tees still delivered friendly quick service with excellent attention to detail. Would definitely recommend their easy and fast customization service.

The service was great! Ordered it at noon and the shirt was waiting at my door when I got home! exact quality I was expecting from the previews available online. The shirt and design selection are great for a quick and simple setup! Will use them again for all my silly shirt needs!

Update: I've continued to use this place for other orders.shirts, hats.and it's almost like the service has gotten better. Shipping to NS is always on time or early and the quality it great!

My first time ordering from Toronto Tees. I did it online and e-mailed with Joe. A slight miscommunication that Joe was quick to jump on once it was realized which is appreciated. I was upset but Joe was patient and understanding. The order was reprinted so fast and turned out amazing. I HIGHLY recommend ordering from them. Great customer service and efficient. I look forward to ordering from them again.

I was doing Family T-shirts with Toronto tees, these guys are great!
I used there design tool on the website, which was convenient.
There was an issue with pricing, I ordered 5 t-shirts, but the price was higher per one than it's supposed to be when you do 4+, so I reached out, explained, and was refunded right away.
The T-shirts were delivered next day after I submitted the order.
I am very happy and highly recommended!

I walked in off the street, met Evan, we worked on my idea for a sweater (which required some development) and I am DELIGHTED! Evan was so helpful, cool and kind. The experience was fast and efficient. Oh and I adore my sweater! It's perfect! Thank you!

I bought a customized sweater as a gift and was perfect in size and as I ordered it. My friend said it fit him perfectly and the fabric is pretty soft. As well, he received earlier than expected. Great job Toronto Tees
Fast turn around, great comfortable cotton fabric. Can't wait to reorder ! They even customized the print bags, Joe is accessible on phone for any details. Gotta love their care :)

Making a Special T Shirt order of 1 was as easy and professionally done as it could have been. I ordered the shirt with the design I wanted on line then choose to go down to the store on Yonge Street to have it printed while I waited. The staff were friendly and very helpful. After looking at the design quality and pigmentation we went with another better version of my design. They were quick in doing any additional touch up and scaling the design to the front of the shirt that I was looking for. After that the shirt was produced and ready within 10 minutes. I couldn't have asked for better service. Yes I will use Toronto Tees again and recommended them to anyone looking to have t shirts done from 1 to a large quantity. By the way the t shirt will be making it's way down the Red Carpet at the premiere of JUKEBOX HERO in Toronto.

Great service. I called as wanted a shirt made and didn't want to drive to Toronto. They walked me through on the phone how to do it online: I designed it that night and had the shirt in my hands within a few days. Good quality and fair pricing. Would def use them again!

I had placed an order for 8 custom shirts, front & back. I received my order in a timely manner and exactly to the specifications I had designed online. The team also provided a quick and COVID-safe curbside pickup. The quality of the shirt and printing is incredible and the recipients were very happy with it. Thanks again to Joe and team!

Excellent quality 100% cotton t-shirt and the graphics turned out nicely and even better than I thought they might..The turnaround from online ordering and delivery to my home was quick also..I know where to go for a custom t-shirt and this is the place.
Had a great experience ordering from Toronto Tees. The customer service is brilliant..Joe ensured that my order was ready quicker than expected since it was a birthday gift. Highly recommend them!

We placed an order through Joe at Toronto Tees a couple weeks ago for Hoodies, Tees, Ball Caps & Toques for our business and they arrived yesterday..The process for ordering was seamless, the prices are very reasonable, shipping was quick and the quality of the apparel is fabulous!.We are super happy with our order and will be placing another one soon..Thanks Toronto Tees!

I ordered a set of sweaters two weeks ago and they were ready for pickup the next day. Excellent quality, excellent service. So good that I sent in an order for another set of items this past week. Same quality and service! Super great company, SUPPORT LOCAL!

I had 4 t-shirts printed here, and they turned out great and were ready really quickly. Staff was very friendly.

There was initially an issue where a couple of the vector files for designs I provided weren't displaying properly. I added notes to the order requesting confirmation of whether they were seeing the same incorrect display, but the notes got missed and the shirts were misprinted. However they had me email the files instead and then they displayed properly. The replacement prints were great and ready in no time.

My group and I just recently order sweaters for our team from Toronto tees. The staff was more than helpful with getting us a quote right away and had them done and ready and shipped extremely fast! Everyone on the team was beyond impressed with the way the sweaters turned out - and they were happy with the prices as well. I would highly recommend Toronto tees if you are looking to get print on on clothing !

Fantastic customer service! I ordered a shirt (charcoal gray), and the font (black) was too hard to read because the gray was darker in person than on the site. There was also the issue of image sizing, once again reality was different from the site submission. However,.when I contacted them about these issues, they took care of it immediately. They reprinted another shirt with the requested changes for me without hesitation. The reprinted shirt is perfect! Based on the customer service, I would definitely order again!

My order arrived very quickly but there was a misspell of the text on one of the Tshirts. I sent them a quick email and almost immediately received a call from the gentleman at the shop (forgot his name). He was very professional and polite and resolved the issue right away and sent me another shirt which arrived with no problems.

I also received a follow up email from Joe who is the owner not to shortly after.

Overall very satisfied with the product and even more with ther service.

Thanks1

I called with a rush order for a very special gift and they knocked it out of the park. The fit was perfect, the material was top shelf, and the digital print made the artwork look deadly. They really came through for me at the eleventh hour and I'll never forget it. Toronto Tees is the city's finest.

I ordered online which was fast and easy. But I got the sizing wrong (the women's v-neck tees fit EXTREMELY snug). I called and they were quick to offer to reprint since I was unhappy with the order. The new sizing is great and the shirt looks amazing. Will definitely go back for future t-shirt needs!

Quality exceeded my expectations! The sweater itself is heavy duty, honestly better quality than some of my 'branded' items. The print is super clean and the gold colour looks amazing. Will be ordering again, for myself next time (this was a gift).

I've been getting shirts printed from Toronto Tees for years and it has always been a pleasant, seamless experience. High quality + super quick turnaround = what more can you ask for in a printing service? Highly recommended!

I needed one t-shirt done quickly ( < 24 hours) and Toronto Tees came through for me. I uploaded a design, gave 'em a call like I was supposed to, explained my situation and voila! they were on it and I picked it up in no time. It also looked great. Thank you Toronto Tees.

I wanted printed tees for my bday and found them on Google. The team was professional and got my tops in a timely manner. I was a bit disappointed that they didn't have any of the coloured tees I wanted so I settled with black.
I usually wear medium, but this looks a little small. I like the quality of the prints and will definitely use again or recommend.

Update: I wore the tee for my bday, it wasn't as small as I initially thought. (or as it looked) I'm in love with it and got lots of compliments. Great quality. Highly recommended:)

Very good and fast service. I picked these guys absolutely randomly just by doing a google search last year for a customized T-shirt. Very nicely done while I was waiting at their Yonge location. 100% satisfaction. So when I.needed another one again this year, I ordered it online with my own design and went to pick it up the next day. Good quality T-shirts, good quality print.

I have ordered a few custom tees and tanks through other companies but Toronto Tees is my new favourite go to. It was quick turnaround and the quality of the tank tops I ordered was better than the others I've ordered. Highly recommend and I'm super picky.

Have always had a positive experience when using this company for shirt printing. We had them create our staff T-shirt's with our logo and STAFF written on. We contacted them through email and seamlessly designed our shirt through the website. Turnaround for a few shirts was only a few hours if they aren't busy. At the most a day or two. Larger orders I'm sure would take longer. Overall shirt quality is great and lasts long in the wash. Great customer service experience.

Amazing service! Would definitely recommend for a neat and super quick print and delivery! All 4 of the Tshirts I customized were delivered the very next day.
I just wished they had more products (in terms of variety). Thanks again for your great service
I was thrilled to see the image I had chosen on the t-shirt. After a bit of coordination, the colours and orientation were perfect. Thank you!
10/10 made ordering large amounts super easy! Flexible with their time frames and are able to do rush orders! The t shirts I ordered look amazing and are of great quality! Would order again!

I ordered some individual graphic tshirts for a family member's birthday online from Toronto Tees..The next day when i got there to pick them up, the shirts were all ready but we noticed that on the order (my fault not theirs), one of the graphics was landscape instead of portrait..The staff, especially Trevor, were there to help and fixed it on the spot!.Great customer service! definitely recommend

I absolutely love this store. I have gotten multiple shirts printed here over the years and the quality has always been amazing. The printing on the shirts have lasted for years. I have one shirt I made 10 years ago and even after repeated washings, it's just now starting to fade a bit.

Their customer service is second to none. I ordered a shirt yesterday that was mistakenly done as a pick up when I had ordered it for shipping. It was quickly rectified and I received the shirt yesterday evening.

I have even had shirts printed here as gifts. Will definitely use them again. :)
Great team to work with! The whole process of getting my T-shirts printed was seamless and easy. Shirts were affordable and turned out great. Thanks for a great experience.
T-shirts came out EVEN BETTER than I had hoped. My only suggestion would be in the self-design process, which would be enhanced if the design image could be bigger. Love my T-shirts from Toronto Tees

Never had an experience like this before;

uploaded the artwork, sent the order through, and less that 24 hours later a brand new, stunningly reproduced graphic t-shirt was at my door.
Easy to design (the area available on the fabric seems to be a lot larger than other companies, too, which made the decision that much easier).

Stunning work and service. LOVE IT!

I had a relatively small order of 6 sweatshirts and had some of the best customer service I've received in a long time. They accommodated my request of a 2XL sweater with no issues, checked in to make sure the timeline was okay for me to get them and they arrived right on time.

I don't leave a lot of the reviews but that was absolutely stellar customer service and every time I called the guys were courteous, informative and helpful.

I'll be back for sure
Joe and his team are great!.They don't just make custom shirts..They make amazing memories..Where else can you design a shirt that makes someone feel incredibly special..Thanks Joe!

I had t shirts made for my dental office team and also masks. All with a new logo. Quality clothing and tremendous workmanship.
Good communication during the design and fabrication..Joe's results were great. My staff is pleased.

great sweatshirt, great service! I ordered a sweatshirt to be shipped when an opportunity to do curbside pickup came up and they had it printed for me to pickup shortly after I called and refunded the shipping. My only complaint is that I wish they had had more sweatshirt colour options (the colour I originally ordered was out of stock in S, which wasn't indicated when I intially placed the order). Thanks again!

I've ordered a few times not from Toronto Tees and they've always been top notch.
Very timely on the order time and the quality of the customer hoodies and t-shirts are on point.
Pick up is contactless, smooth and easy.

Outstanding customer service. I recently ordered bulk t-shirts from them for a hackathon event and we had many modifications to the designs. The designs look great and matched what I received on the mockups. :)
The only slight concern I have was the t-shirts turned out a bit bigger in size than expected but considering the material probably shrinks in the wash, it should be okay.

Amazing staff..They helped me get my order rushed and everyone loved the t-shirts for our first in person DnD since Covid.
Thank you very much to the wonderful staff, I will definitely be using their services again.

They did a great job fulfilling my order. They contacted me with suggestions to confirm order details and with suggestions to improve the look. Ordered on several occasions - either a cool shirt for myself or a gag gift for a friend. Quality of the print is always great - holds up well in the dryer. Doesn't feel cheap and plasticy. The shirts have a great fit as well. Nice quality.

Service - even during the holidays - was super fast (same day or next day) and super friendly when you arrive for pickup.

I had a custom hoodie made with them and I had something very specific in mind. Both me and the person who was gifted with the hoodie lived it. I ordered Indie88 merch through Toronto Tees and it's great! The hoodie is super comfy and the vintage T is super soft. The face mask is comfortable to wear and fits well. The quality of the logos on each item is excellent.

We ordered a custom T-shirt for a colleague at work. The designer tool online was very easy to use. It took only minutes to create the custom T-shirt. The service in the store was awesome! Items were made exactly how I wanted and completed in good time! Will shop here again.
Great quality shirt! Printing is perfect and doesn't wear off! Very pleased and great costumer service!
It was very easy to use the website. Customer support was there when I needed it. Prices and selection were great. I would definitely use these guys again.

I am so grateful that I found Toronto Tees!.I needed masks made for an event and only had 7 days to make it happen..Joe was so great - he helped me make sure that the artwork was perfect, had everything printed AND delivered to me in less than 7 days..I will definitely be ordering from Toronto Tees/Joe again in the future!

Once again, a great experience! We are returning customers - they made shirts for our Christmas Family reunion in December and were able to make us a couple of custom shirts to keep it light while we get through this. Communication great and fast shipping. We will be back, I'm sure.

It was so much fun designing the T-shirt on-line and having it show up at my door a few days later..The T-shirt was fabulous - made me feel like an artist (which I am certainly not).. But the best part was the outstanding customer service..I rarely give 5 stars for reviews, but each star was deserved here!
Amazing customer service. Can't say enough good things about Toronto Tees!

Loved the item, it's exactly as I wanted printed. It only took 5 mins to upload and order. It was ready for pick up in 3-4 days which was awesome.

The women's large I ordered fits small but that's not any complaint about the quality of service - just a note for people to order 1 size up.

This place was great. I called and told them I needed something done asap and they got it done within minutes without hassle.

The shirt I designed came out exactly as I wanted it to and the quality was great. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for custom gear!

Delivery was fast and designing is easy. I had an issue the first time, but the customer service was so helpful they resolved my issue quickly and effectively.

These guys are absolutely amazing. Got my order confirmed, shipped, and delivered in 2 days, in what is probably a busy holiday season. The quality of their products is stellar too, and I look forward to working with them again in the future for any of my custom clothing needs!

This company is a life saver! I needed printed shirts for a new job opportunity and with Covid-19 it felt impossible to get this done..Thankfully I was introduced to this company through a classmate and literally within 2 days of purchase I had my order.
