Had a great experience dealing with Toronto Tees. They helped me with my small order, were super helpful and professional. Received my order and it was exactly what I was looking for. I'm happy to have been able to order online and help out a local Toronto business.

Toronto Tees is my number one choice for custom t-shirts..I recently had a rush request, and Toronto Tees designed the shirt for me and delivered the whole project very quickly..Always a wonderful experience!

Joe was great to work with! He replied promptly, was professional, accommodating and worked with me to ensure I was happy with the end product! Shipping was quick and we're very happy with how our shirts turned out!

I am overjoyed with the service and bulk order I received from Toronto Tees!.Trevour was phenomenal to work with..I came in with an image which I knew wasn't the best quality, but I didn't know how to fix the resolution..Trevour did his magic and ensured my teeshirt prints came out topnotch..He was responsive over email, extremely helpful and ensured I had ample opportunity to ask questions and make suggestions..He made minor edits to the design with ease and then the print was flawlessly delivered..My family, friends & I LOVE our tees!

Order 2 t shirts for me and my gf. Need it asap because she was flying away. Sent them an email and asked for rush request. Amazing team and service. They printed t shirts and ready for pick up within 2-3 hours after i placed an order! Awesome job! Thank you!

I needed a t-shirt printed in a very short timeframe for a birthday, and they gave it to me in 10 minutes. Cool store, great service and they get the job done super fast. Also very accurate designer on the website which makes ordering it easier. Highly recommend Toronto Tees!

Ordered a swear shirt that I needed last minute. You guys were amazing! My order was ready in 2 days and the curb side pick up was so convenient and easy. The quality of the sweatshirt is so good too.

Gotta say if you are looking for the perfect gift idea, or have an event that you want shirts for , this is the place to get them made..They have the friendliest staff to help along the way..Each time I have presented my Ideas or asked any questions , they totally worked with me to get the look I.wanted for my shirts. A fantastic experience. The shirts feel solid, the printing is bright & beautiful, the delivery was fast. Joe was a clear & quick communicator and accommodated all our adjustments. Highly recommended.

This is not the first order I have had with Toronto tees. Everything is always done quickly and exactly as requested. This recent order was printed crooked and they reprinted and replaced very quickly at no charge. A great business and treats customers with kindness and respect.

I get my custom tees done here exclusively. I've had a ton of nerd shirts made here and they've never let me down with the quality of the prints. They're local, so we'll worth the visit and business.
I've placed two orders here and both times have been incredibly satisfied. Both baby onesies exceeded our expectations so I would highly recommend these folks! ôåèªôåèª.

Love to support local, and these guys get a solid 5-star! Needed fast and affordable tshirt printing, uploaded my vector artwork, picked up my tshirt curbside in a few days, and couldn't be happier. Some of the best customer service I have ever received, and I am in customer service so was really impressed. Quick and courteous response times, really fast printing & shipping. The quality of the sweaters is wonderful, have washed multiple times already and love!

I have ordered from here twice. I had a slight issue with one of my orders which was technically my fault but the manager Joe corrected it and resent me the order within less then 24h. Ok - these guys do it right!.From a seamless ordering process, to the perfect production of the t-shirt of my daughter's dreams, to an easy curbside pick up..Not only that, but their customer service is spot on!.Joe and Tom are top notch people..After picking up my order I accidentally got permanent marker on the image on my shirt and they reprinted it for me at no-charge..Talk about service and generosity!.I would not hesitate using them and cannot wait to order more from them in the future..(Think team shirts, bachelor/bachelorette tees, cool one-offs, anything!) I've ordered a bunch from this store and their shirts are always good quality. The prints come out really nice and their customer service is amazing. I usually gift the shirts to friends and everyone has loved them. 10/10 would recommend.

These guys are awesome! They have helped with our company merchandise and never disappoint! They do great work and always suggest help with design, colours and products! Just received our most recent order & love the crew neck sweaters, hoodies & tees!

This is the best custom t-shirt place in the city.

I placed my order online and picked it up that afternoon..I wasn't happy with the sizing and they fixed it on the spot..I've used them many times an will continue to do so. the online design/ordering system is so simple to use.

The store opens at 12pm and I arrived there at 11:55am. This employee went to work right away! He managed to finish both of the t-shirts at 12:10pm! They looked amazing! I was so pleased that the employee did a great job in a quick amount of time just to please me! I caught my bus in time and the gift made my friend VERY happy. Toronto tees is a Terrific store!
Great company! Use them every use for my son's birthday t-shirt. They do a great job and delivery within the city, which has really been helpful through Covid. Highly recommend.

I am extremely happy with my experience with Toronto Tees! Joe went absolutely above and beyond to help me with the order and he was so accommodating. When I got home I realized the sizes didn't quite match what I had ordered, and the T-shirts were for an event the very next day. I can't thank them enough. I will be ordering from Toronto Tees again. That was the best customer service experience possible and I am thrilled with how perfect the t-shirts turned out. Thank you!

I had an amazing experience from start to finish! Staff were helpful and polite, my order came fast and was exactly what I wanted. I will definitely be using their service again in the future! Toronto Tees helped me get an order of 40 hoodies designed and printed very quickly. The hoodies and printing were of good quality and the price was competitive. Joe was super responsive and helpful. I wish I knew about this place sooner because now I can make and purchase really amazing, personalized gifts for someone - - or even myself! éÅTrevor and his equally friendly and helpful coworker (sorry, I wish I got your name) were both super patient in helping me design a last minute gift for a friend. Quality of the shirt and print was great. I had a large photo printed and the image quality was good. Curb side pickup at the Yonge street location was very easy and fast. in the current state we are in and especially submitting my order late [of my own fault] before Christmas, Toronto Tees was able to fulfill the order prior to the date for me to provide the gift. Being nice and respectful to a company always goes a long way as opposed to being demanding and rude.

Great shirt printing company. The ordering experience was very simple, uploading my own design was straightforward and easy. Using curbside pick-up was convenient; the quality of the printing on my t-shirt was excellent - it is a gift, and it looks perfect!

Very friendly..Happy to help with design and to trouble-shoot over the phone..End product was perfect and.delivery was immediate--about 2 hours after I submitted the order..This company is working hard to keep service up during Covid-19..Impressive..I will happily drive business their way.

A bricks and morter store. Filled with alot of choice, hoodies, tees, ladies, unisex. I purchased a tee. They were professional and quick and did a fantastic job. It was a gift.

This t-shirt supplier has been my go-to for work shirts for my crew for two years now. Highly recommend. Their customer service is top notch & they complete requests very quickly!

I requested t-shirts for my lab team..A simple, one-colour, text design, back print..Ten tees in various sizes.

The print quality was high, the tees are good quality Gilman brand, and overall, I'm happy with my order.

Superb service ‚Äì would have likely chosen a higher quality t-shirt fabric had I known, but the price/value is great. Will shop again!

The quality of the print was excellent and this was the only place out of like 10 that didn't reject or question my order when I submitted meme images to be used as personal attire.

Placed my order, had communication throughout, my sweater was finished within a day or two and delivered earlier than I expected! High quality, amazing print, images were crisp and colors popped. Couldn't be happier.

Great job of executing a difficult design. Exactly as it appeared on their design app. People on the phone were friendly and helpful and the order was delivered no fuss and quicker than expected. Overall very happy.

I am so impressed with the quality of the T-shirts we ordered and the efficiency of the service. I had a great experience working with Toronto Tees! I needed help with an order and Kyle handled it right over the phone, sending me everything i needed the same day. I would definitely recommend working with them and support your local businesses.
My hoodie fit comfortably and the material was great!

This place is awesome. Had 25 Tshirts made and the process was seamless. The quality of the shirts, printing, and communication were fantastic. Highly recommend! I will be making more shirts with them in the future! Thank you Toronto Tees

Joe and his team were fantastic in terms of communication,.time management and over all design and print of our t-shirts! Excellent customer service and costs. Great service, attention to detail and flexible with last min additional orders. Thanks Tom!
Loved the quality of the tee shirt and the.website is so easy to use. This is our second order and would highly recommend them. And BTW the courier who delivered was hilarious.

Trevor at the Yonge Street Toronto Tees location was fantastic. He search all over the store for the colour and size that I wanted. Once the design was in place, the service was just as fast the website claims. Trevor and Toronto Tees helped me create a fantastic surprise for my friend. I would absolutely go back and I totally recommend Toronto Tees.
Great service and people! Thanks to Tom for turning our Veggie shirt around so quickly!

I waited 2 hrs for 1 shirt. Simple design only took 5 minutes good job. Found another place that does it for half the price. If it wasnt for the wait, price and location would have given 5.

I had some T-shirts printed. All came out exactly as ordered, and they cover my upper body very well. The shirts, when combined with a pair of pantalones, provide great overall coverage. Highly recommended for walking around during those temperate summer days.

Loved this place. I was a walk-in and my 3 items were made super fast. The staff were so amazing, friendly and helpful. Gave me really great suggestions and my items turned out even better than what I had originally planned!

Ordered one custom t-shirt to remember a pet we had to put down..Web site had a very easy to use interface with customization options at your fingertips..The shirt came in way faster then expected and even sent with a free grocery bag and coupon for another order..even though I chose a bad picture, the outcome was perfect..I was expecting a cheap look/feel to the shirt and print, but the quality was amazing, good quality shirt and the printing seems to be embedded right in the shirt, unlike others that you are afraid to put in the wash.

definitely will order from Joe again!
Amazing experience with Toronto Tees. We ordered customized tshirts and got them the next day. They look awesome and Joe was super quick to respond to our emails. Highly recommend!

I ordered 7 t-shirts in the same colour but in several different sizes for a bachelorette party. I was working on a very tight timeline and was pleased/relieved when the t-shirts arrived only a couple of days after the order was placed and the order was fulfilled perfectly.

Once the tees arrived, Kyle helped me out with the printing and did an awesome job. He was also a pleasure to deal with..He was really patient with me and took the time to make sure that the design was exactly as I wanted it. I love the way these tees turned out!

The tees are also really reasonably priced and very good quality. If you're not into printing, consider just buying them as your t-shirt basics. In every single colour.

You all never fail to impress. The sweaters came out better than expected. The fitting is amazing and true to size. I recommend your company to my friends and family. Amazing everything. Thanks again!

Superb service! They were extremely professional and I got my shirts within a timely manner. They will even give you suggestions if you like on how to arrange the content on the T-shirts to make them amazing. I'd definitely use their services in the future.

I have been to Toronto Tees twice this week and had a great experience. I got a ladies t-shirt printed the first time and was surprised but just how small and fitted it was - they clearly say this on their website and it was totally my own fault. I went back again to get a men's t-shirt and spoke with Jay. I explained what happened and that it was my own fault and he gave me the 2nd shirt for free! It was totally my fault, but he was so good about it and really patient with me trying on multiple men's sizes to get one I liked. They have a changing room, so you can try before you buy which I should have done the first time. They print the shirt in less than 5 mins and I was really happy with the quality - and it's kinda cool watching your t-shirt get made! Thanks again Jay and team.
My design looks great and the turnaround was quick and easy. Hand delivered to my door! Will definitely be back.
Great experience. Design submission was quick and easy and the shirts ready when promised!

The t-shirts turned out amazing! Needed shirts done asap, stopped by the store and the guys got them done in 20 minutes. Highly recommend

Ordering was a breeze and super customizable. The ETD was less than 5 business days from the date of order and they were still done before. I would recommend against using Clipart images as the resolution is too low and comes out a bit blocky. I'm looking forward to gifting them to friends. Will definitely reorder in the future. Thanks Toronto Tees!

Loved this place. I worked with Tom and he was super friendly and professional got my job done in less than 20 minute. gave me a lot of advice and did a lot to give me the highest quality product. I totally suggest working with them they offer great quality sweatshirts with top notch printing.

I've had several t-shirts (mens, ladies, and even baby onesies).made here over the past couple years and have always been very impressed by both the quality and the customer service. The staff who work at Toronto Tees have a great eye and talent for design and are more than happy to help make your design that much better.
Highly recommended.
Fast turnaround (within 2 days for in-store pick-up), shirt came out as expected. Very responsive and great customer service!
Good quality shirts and printing..Slight problem with placement of the logo in the back (placed left side instead of right), but this did not diminish from overall look.
Ordering custom t-shirts from Toronto Tees is always super easy. A special thank you to Owen at Toronto Tees for helping to clean up the design on my recent order..It turned out great!

Really fast service and great staff..They went above and beyond to get me the colour of tshirts I wanted for St. Patrick's day..I was able to design 8 different tshirts in less than an hour on-line and picked them up within 48 hours and I could have picked them up sooner!..I'll definitely use Toronto Tees again.
Toronto Tees was amazing. They messaged to correct an oversite from my part and corrected it to make a perfect T-Shirt gift! Definitely order from them again. Excellent quality! Thank you Joe!

Service was super courteous and kind from everyone working! The tees and hoody are a really nice quality, even after a few washes. Did a great job on the screen printing. Perfect gift for a woman obsessed with her cat, that can bring his face everywhere she goes, without the smell of litter.
We love Toronto Tees for our employee swag. Even on the busiest days, a quick order gets done in record time and the printing never fades even after years. Thank you team!

Ordering the masks for our dance club was a breeze with Toronto Tees. Thank you for your friendly, professional service. Our questions were quickly answered and they were open to our ideas.

We can't wait for first day of classes to hand them out to all the dancers òÑ Stay safe!

Rana on behalf of Club de Ballet-Jazz de Buckingham

Toronto Tees have been printing tees for me for a few years now..They NEVER disappoint..This year, I could not supply my own shirt due to COVID measures (to keep everyone safe) so for the first time, I purchased one of their tees..OMG..What was I waiting for?.They're deliciously soft (without being clingy)..The sizes are spot on..(i.e. an extra large is an extra large)
Their printing work is fantastic..And they're always quick to answer any question.
Highly recommended!

I had a great experience! The staff was knowledgeable and helpful. I was able to easily design my t-shirt using their online tool during my lunch break. I headed over after work and tried on a few t-shirts, but couldn't find one that suited me (i'm quite picky), so they let me know I could bring in my own. I popped over to Winners and found one I liked and then returned to the store. My t-shirt was printed quickly and I am super happy with the results. I would go here again!

Shirts were awesome and designs were exactly what I wanted! Very easy to navigate the site and make the shirts online.

I did ask for the free mask because I had a large order and I never received it. My friend had the same issue.

Ordered a personalized T-shirt with an old photo printed on it. It turned out great! Was so easy to design and order online. Very user friendly design tools. Ordered a basic t-shirt and it's nice, thick, good quality cotton. Order was filled, completed and shipped in just a couple of days. Will be returning to make a bunch of silly family t-shirts for joke Christmas presents!

Easy to design on line and it looked great when I picked it up..Not sure why it told me on line it would be ready in 3 days cause when I called the day it was to be ready they said it would be done in 15 min..And then the next day I got an email and said my order was ready ?
Very happy with the overall product..Thanks

Yo the people loved my shirt; looks much higher quality than any of the online-based shops I've ordered from. Also thanks for sending a quick refund- I accidentally placed 2 orders, and was worried I'd get hit for both!

Top marks, will definitely go back next time the Raptors are in the Finals.
I needed a custom sweatshirt ASAP and was very pleased with the speed of the service and quality of the work. Colours and soft fabric options are great..Thanks!
Had a rush order that needed to get done for Valentine's day..They spoke to me on the phone and less than 24hrs later I picked it up..Very easy and smooth..Will do business with them in the future.

I had a great experience here. Ordered my shirt online, and went to pick it up the same afternoon. Staff hadn't made it by the time I got there because the color shirt I requested was out of stock. But it was better off, since the logo I had printed looked much better on the darker colored shirt I ended up getting. Took them less than ten minutes to have it ready for me.

Had an unfortunate incident about a week or two later. I washed the with cold water, and air dried it. But the shirt still shrunk. I emailed them and the store owner got back to me within five minutes to apologize and offer me a new shirt. So happy with my experience, and the great customer service. Well done!

I contacted Joe under relative duress..I wanted to boost morale amongst family by getting some hoodies printed - we have a daughter who is battling for her future and is undergoing a relatively long road to recovery..Joe was a pleasure to work with - very understanding and compassionate..Didn't really much to besides sending him the graphic and approving the mock up he sends back..We got our hoodies delivered super fast and they're a big hit at the hospital :)

I did a custom online order with Toronto Tees..They were very helpful with me, especially as I am not all that great with computers and techy stuff..The tshirt and mask came out fantastic, better than I expected..Proof that shopping local is better than using the big stores.

Amazing customer service. My oder was completed with excellence and professionalism. Outstanding job on printing.my design. I needed my order rushed, so I was especially impressed with the great quality of service and printing. Thank you Toronto Tees Younge location staff!
Shirts turned out great. Appreciated the quick response from Joe when I reached out with a question. Delivered on time.thank you!
These guys make the best custom t-shirts in the city! Great customer service, prompt turn around, and a great product! Super pleased with how our t-shirts turned out.
Very fast and friendly service. Sweatshirt looked great and was of good quality. Would definitely use torontotees again for any personalized shirt items.

I am extremely happy with the customer service and product you guys delivered. Love their service. Was trying to do a last minute father's day gift. Got my dad a custom made polo shirt with his favourite badge printed onto it. I highly recommend doing business with Toronto Tees. They are organized, efficient, and more than fair.

A+++Great experience. Unique gift for my son who was turning 16. Very user friendly website. It was very easy and fun to design the custom t shirt. Beautiful fonts available. I got a navy tshirt printed with gold text. Came out perfect.

Great Experience (as usual) with Toronto Tees as usual..We did a custom sweater with pictures on the back and they connected with us throughout the process to ensure the pictures were of a quality that would print well on the sweater..The sweater looks great.

very fast service, bought a gag gift for a friend's birthday and they loved it. called with a question and got my answer quickly. thanks so much.

I have been a customer of Toronto tees for over 3 years..The quality of the tshirts are much better then the typical 'high coller, bulky shirt' that are often used for custom tshirts..I have used the online design and mail delivery as well as going into their Toronto locations..Customer service is excellent..I am happy to support a company that is Canadian and local (to me) as well as one that listens to their customers concerns and addresses them so effectively..I will continue to use this company for great custom shirts.

Excellent service, dedication, and fast turnarounds, are just a few reasons why Toronto Tees is #1! Joe is passionate about what he does and is an absolute pleasure to work with. Every order I've done has turned out amazing! Really great work and I will be ordering more.
This was the 3rd time I've ordered from Toronto Tees, and every time the t-shirts were perfect! The service is fast, and their customer service is amazing. Thanks again!

So, already before arriving I thought "this is a quality place"..My research on their website was very fruitful..All my Qs answered..Then when I arrived and talked to Owen, it confirmed my impression - these folks are real pros..I was going to bring in my own design/font, but then I thought, "these guys are better designers than I am"..I was right..Owen worked me up a great sample right in front of my eyes..BOOM, 14.64 minutes later it was ready for pickup..MY TOP RECOMMENDATION, you will not be disappointed.

I had a rush bulk order with a couple of different t-shirt colours and with slight variations to what went on the t-shirts depending on the colour..Jay was extremely helpful and the t-shirts were a great success..So much so I had to go back for a few more and they turned that around right away..Thanks Jay and team!.I will definitely use TorontoTees again.
Great quality! I ordered a sweater with my own saying through the online store. The final product turned out great and the pickup was seamless. Thanks for a great sweater!

These guys are superb to work with! I've been getting apparel printed and ordered by them for a few years now doing bulk orders as well as one off designs for events. They're always helpful, easygoing and seem to really like what they're doing, which is what I like to see when I'm doing business with a company.

Toronto Tee's goes the extra mile to ensure that you're happy - I can think of one instance where I had given them instructions to do a black on charcoal grey, they silkscreened one and called me to report that the design was too dark/too subtle for the colour of the shirt and we went with a lighter ink. It saved me gigantic head ache and a lot of money! Aaaand they ended up looking amazing!

Absolutely AMAZING! Every time I go in they are great. which is why I keep going back! Last minute gifts that are perfectly customized are always so much more personal. The guys there are so talented and super fast. it's like watching magic on the screen as they bring together the designs. Jordan knocked out the masterpiece today in less that 45mins ~ start of design to finished product! Just fantastic and I know it'all be a hit! Thanks again Toronto Tees!

"No good. Employees don't care, don't try to help and act superior. I dealt with a very condescending kid named Trevor. Tons of attitude, high prices, don't recommend it at all"

THIS! Took the words right out of my mouth. If you plan on getting printed tees do so at another store. I sent Trevor an invoice for how much it was quoted in the online store and he refused to uphold the pricing. Trevor does not make sure your product is how you want it to be. I gave Trevor a mock up on how the picture was suppose to look like (the design on the right) and when Trevor printed it out it was smaller than what was discussed. Also if you look at the alignment between the writing and graphic are almost identical which is not what I wanted. The writing is higher than the graphic as seen on the design. When I went to ask Trevor about it, Trevor told me he needed the right measurements for the print. Why was this not purposed ahead of time? Trevor saw my mock up and said he can do it exactly as it was but how it turned out was in no way what I wanted. He did not reach out once to ask about my design and planned to charge me almost the same amount to reprint the pieces he messed up on.

TLDR: please avoid, do not recommend.

Update: There was no voicemail left, also my name is spelled Jacky. Great customer service.

Great service,.great quality products..Trust the process. If they put your logo on the back of your hoodie and it doesn't look centered,.they've already thought about how the hood hsngs..My mistake for moving it.

Extremely disappointed. Because of there great review from previous customers I wanted to have Toronto tees design some custom t-shirts for an event, Drove 1hr payed for parking only to visit the store and they closed down. The website doesn't state that neither a message when you call the number.

I purchased 6 shirts - Men's Performance Polo TT51 Team 365. They informed me that I would have to wait for them to become available. I told them that I had no problem waiting, as I am in no hurry. I waited two months and was told my order was ready. When I opened the package, I realized they substituted inferior quality shirts for the ones I paid for. When I spoke with the manager he told me that he is under no obligation to tell me that he substituted a shirt! I understand the need to substitute if I was putting a time pressure on them to deliver within a certain time, but if I am willing to wait, a substitution with no warning of a substitution is a classic bait and switch scam. When you purchase with this company you have no idea what you are actually purchasing and they couldn't care less. When I asked him why he doesn't care about his customers enough to even let them know of a substitution, he said he didn't have time. Terrible customer service!

Edit: In addition to my review here, I have filed a complaint with the Better Business Bureau and was surprised to learn that I am not the only one with an unresolved complaint.

So after 4 voicemails, 2 chat attempted, multiple unanswered calls and 5 emails, finally I arrive here. This company has zero customer service. They simply don't care if they have made any issue with their orders. I ordered this shirt recently, I finally washed it - cold, and hung dry as usual.

As soon as it came out of the wash I immediately noticed that the colour of the face was yellow. It makes the singer, look sickly. Its a black man now with a yellowish-green face. It's unwearable.

I have taken a photo of my 3-year-old, original version and you can see that the face has maintained his black complexion.

I asked for a redo on this tee, at $61 shipped this is not a cheap tee to make so I expect, and have received better.

ZERO RESPONSE.

I've been using T-Shirt Elephant for 6 years now for my yearly race..Our runners just love the shirts and hats he makes. They are excellent. The product (and product suggestions/alternatives) are high quality. Jason is very easy to work with. His prices are excellent..And he's come through in the clutch for me at the same price and quality when I was delayed getting him my order. We're a small not-for-profit and a small customer, but he really makes us feel like we are special. I wouldn't go anywhere else for my Art In Motion 10K/5K/2K race shirts.
I ordered some cotton tote bags for my wedding clients and they LOVED them. Very well made, great print, quick and free shipping. Will order again!

There are many things which I found great about the whole experience with T-Shirt Elephant. The selection of a wide variety of T-Shirts to match any style and quality. The easy to use design process. The rapid turn around of the product. The high quality of the T-Shirts which we selected. The great quality of the full colour printing of our logo on the shirts. We are thrilled both with the service and the quality of the finished product. We will be placing another order very soon. Thank you from the Electrical Banana!

Buyer beware:
I will say, years ago, this company was great..I ordered all my merch from them..Until now.
They made a mistake with my order (printed the wrong colour, and the colours in the logo were all bleeding together).
It was overall a terrible job.
They tried to blame me for the mistake..Even though I had ordered the same thing 4 years prior and they had done a wonderful job with it..This time they got the colour wrong, and it even varies from each shirt..It's bad enough that I won't even let my staff wear the shirts because it looks so bad and I pride myself on being a clean, professional business.
I sent photo evidence of how they messed it up..They avoided my emails and calls..Finally, I asked for a refund and they said they would reprint instead..They dragged that out for 3 months and still have yet to send me a reprint..They say "It's going out mid next week" and "we will send you shipping information then" and I have received nothing.
My order was almost $500, they messed it up and refuse to fix it or refund me.
I was trying to get my staff new shirts to wear, and 6 months later I am still out $500 and no staff shirts..We are a small business recovering from COVID and this was not a wasted expense we could afford.
I have given them plenty of business and this is how I was treated..I sent a complaint to the BBB..Hopefully no one else gets scammed.
Save your money, do not order from them..They will rob you.

I really tried to give them the benefit of the doubt.

I've had 2 separate orders with them come in fine and within a reasonable time so I won't knock that.

I made an order back in November of 2022, and I understand that the Christmas season was approaching so I buffed the time it would take print and deliver a single sweater. We're now approaching the end of January and I've sent multiple emails and chats (through their website) and have received little response and follow-through. I eventually received a response to which they didn't even at least apologize for the inconvenience. I was offered to be issued a refund or to have it reprinted and sent out the following day. I requested, the reprint since I just wanted to have the product as it was a long overdue Christmas gift. I have not heard back since, and it's been over a week. The customer service was very disappointing and I communicated that within my messages. Extremely disappointing, $70 dollars for a sweater I may not ever receive. I don't wish for this experience on anyone.

We use T-Shirt Elephant for our T-Shirt and Sweatshirts every few months. We usually print some very complex graphics and the prints turn out very well every time. They are local and the prices are excellent.

A month ago, I ordered 5 t-shirts with a one colour design through the T-shirt Elephant's online system. Soon after ordering, I realized I got one size wrong and wanted to make a change to the order. It was IMPOSSIBLE to contact the company. They never replied to the email and chat, didn't pick up the phone or called back. The order arrived 8 days late. Needless to say, my size change request was ignored.

The print quality was OK, and the price was affordable, but their customer service is non-existent. Not recommended.

The process of ordering and getting proofs to getting our order on time was seamless and easy. Jason was very communicative, prompt, and responded to all queries we had. Highly recommend for any business looking for any branded apparel. We're really happy with the quality of our sweatshirts!

My t-shirts arrived and are FANTASTIC. I don't know whether or not someone put an extra rush on them (as I requested via email) to absolutely ensure they made it on time for when I need them, but they indeed arrived plenty early!.These shirts are for my father's 80th birthday, which will sadly be his last..T-shirt Elephant was integral in ensuring we can have as many "special" elements for my father's party as possible by making & expediting my order..THANK YOU!

I ordered 3 T-shirts and 3 hoodies for my boyfriend as I wanted to custom design clothes for him using my artwork.

The prices are very competitive (I did my research) and the quality is excellent - they are super soft and have washed really well. Delivery was on time.

All in all this was one of those perfect online shopping experiences. I love the tshirts so much that I tend to wear them almost as much as Rob does!.Can't recommend highly enough!.å∏íïå∏íï

I went back to T-Shirt Elephant after a previous excellent purchase and was not disappointed! Great t-shirts with high quality colour prints, and adorable aprons - our BBQ competition team will definitely be the best dressed! Easy to design, competitive prices..Thank you!

Excellent quality shirts and my order was completed with a short turnaround time. Jason was very helpful with any questions I had and his responses were always very prompt. Will definitely order with T-Shirt Elephant again.

The best thing about ordering T-shirts here is how user-friendly their website interface is! Always such a breeze purchasing t-shirts here. Also their quality assurance has been top notch and consistent. 10/10 would recommend!
Extremely happy with the hoodies..They came in very quick and are excellent quality..We will be doing more business with T-Shirt Elephant.
Wonderful business. I've ordered shirts and hoodies from them multiple times. The last ordered they shipped in like 4 days. Always super fast. And the prints come out great!

I had ordered shirts from here before, and they were high quality screen printed. Assuming the same, I ordered some new designs, only to find they were made with heat transfers instead. The colours were washed out, and I suspect these will not wear nearly as well as the original order which was screen printed. Considering the high unit cost, this is disappointing.

I suspect this is what happens with one-off designs, but it should be made clear to customers if that is the case.

We work with T-Shirt Elephant regularly for our promotional gear needs. They have a great selection of items; the quality of the products and custom printing is always spot on; and the team is extremely helpful when we need advice selecting new products. Highly recommend!

I was pretty excited to be able to make some custom printed items for my wife; she had used your site in the past and they turned out terrific. The design process was straightforward and easy to navigate, print timeline was as stated/expected.
I was also advised that a proof would be sent for approval prior to printing; I received none, but as I had left specific notes during the ordering process, I assumed the job was simple enough.
This is direct from your website: 'Proofs - There is no document more important in the custom apparel business than a proof. Our designers can create a proof with your branding and message so you can stay professional when submitting art to clients and potential clients; we will ensure your design alignment is centred; We will also try to fix up pixelated artwork or contact you about any issue.'
Shipment was where things began to sour..The tracking number provided was incorrect, after a week and a half I sent an email requesting the correct tracking information..I still haven't received a reply. But the package arrived ‚Äì quelle surprise!
After inspecting the shirt there were several very noticeable design/print quality issues. I called your customer number but was unable to speak with anyone so left a voice message, which has yet to be returned..I sent an email clearly explaining the issues, with pictures of the deficiencies. Again ‚Äì no response. I tried the ‚Äúlive chat‚Äù option, but of course there isn't anyone live responding. The android's final reply was that someone would contact me. I waited 24 hours - again no response from your company. I called again, leaving a second voice message indication how disappointing the lack of customer service is. I waited another 24 hours, still no return contact. This now brings us to this horrible review.
It is unfortunate that my experience has forced me into this action. As I explained in my correspondence to you, the one item is to be worn to a Christmas party this weekend; she will still wear that shirt but the shoddy QC from your end will be evident for all to see, and make no mistake, everyone will made aware of your company name.
Word of mouth is an extremely powerful advertising tool.

UPDATE - it has been 13 days since my items arrived.still haven't received any responses for any of my voice messages and emails.
I have since read a ton of these reviews; shame on me for not prior to making my order..But it "always happens to the other guy".
How on earth can a company like this stay in business; that would be the day I would let customers have a terrible experience and bash my company like this and do absolutely zero to make things right.

Ordered bulk and wanted rush production and sir Jason did not disappoint me. This is my 2nd order with them. Great quality and fast turnaround times. I recommend this company for everybody's starting their clothing brand.

Hi.This is the worst customer service I have ever received..I placed my order and requested assistance and edits to my design immediately..I emailed and called more than 10 times to get someone to respond to me..No response ever; I then tried to cancel my order by phone and email several times - no response..I received the shirts with absolutely no edits or changes and they look ridiculous and are NOT at all what I wanted..I want a refund - but again cannot get any response. The shirts are terrible..I would not use this company again.

I get all of my tattoo shops merch printed at T-Shirt Elephant. The turn over time is great, and Jason is super easy to work with. The warehouse is conveniently located in Toronto, making pick up a breeze. Recommend to everyone!

Got my t-shirt the other day - absolutely love it, good quality, so will hopefully stand the test of time. Really like the focus of the company on quality, and although its quite a bit more than I would usually pay for a t-shirt I'm more than happy to do so for the quality and great service.

Buyer beware! Ordered ATC shirts for a staff order to see how this company was at fulfilling orders as we wanted to use a Canadian company. We received a poorer quality shirt than what we had ordered and when we contacted them on it they replied that it was in their terms and conditions that they could choose to substitute with other products of equal or greater quality without contacting..What a scam this is in my opinion and I wonder how many people have been taken advantage of by this one-sided loophole that only benefits them especially when the substitution is of lesser quality and something that we would have canceled if we were informed of the change they made with any notification at all.

This is so confusing - last year, May 2022, I placed an order and the customer service I got was amazing. Very fast, super helpful, great price and the quality was excellent. Then a few months later, we had another order so I contact them. which went fine for the first few email exchanges. then as of mid November, nothing. I emailed, called, used the chatbot, probably 20-30 times, and nothing. Having to re-do the entire process with another company was not cool, and I'm so confused as to what happened. I'm certainly not using TE in the future though.

This is an update to my past review; in which I not heard from the company whatsoever about a month after placing my order. Today I can say that I have recieved atleast PART of my order from t-shirt elephant. I am grateful to say thart what was delivered was the largest part of the order and it was well done/ liked by everyone. However, part of my order that is missing (about $225 worth of product) has been very hard to get the company to notice. I have emailed and tried their 'chat bot' which is a dead end. Even their scoial medias do not allow messaging. There seems to be no way to communicate with this company and this is disheartening. I definitely will be reaching out the BBB if I do not hear from this company soon on my missing order components.
Great embroidery on toques. Ordered 25 toques for my company for the upcoming winter and they came out amazing. Shipped faster too.

Jason and the T-Shirt Elephant team have been incredible in turning around our orders quickly and with great quality prints. Even with last minute orders they have always come through for our team. Hockey Helps the Homeless partners with Tshirt elephant for all our volunteer shirts and custom designs
Custom designed.some T-shirts for my husband, they turned out amazing so happy with the quality of the shirts and the quality of the printing. Will definitely order again
H.A.S Marketing & Sterling Screen Printing takes it to another level. Amazing correspondence with Jason. This shop does full colour process and the quality is world class. Super quick turn around.

I ordered a few different products..Order came quicker than expected. I ordered 2 different colors of the Gilden 1850 pullover hoodie, navy and white..Navy hoodies with white lettering these all came were you could see the navy color coming through and a couple had white spill out were it shouldn't..Also the pocket on these were not cut right, one side hand hole was 12.5cm and other side was 15cm..The navy color was a poor quality hoodie..All White hoodies with Navy lettering were good and had no issues..I have phoned company and left message, no call returned..I have sent email with pictures, also no response.

Customer service did come through..Took a while but replacement product was supplied, and they look amazing, if all products had come like this the first time would have been a 5-star rating.

We are a school in Vancouver BC and buy a lot of T-Shirts, hoodies, and other customized spirit wear from TSE..Been using them for years and always very happy with the quality and service..Very helpful and friendly.

Dealing with T-Shirt Elephant is very easy, they have great customer service, always replying to messages in a timely manner. They take the work out of the order for you and my end product turned out fantastic!
TShirt Elephant has been my go to for 10+ years! Always amazing service, fast when needed and a great price. The only place we go to and recommend for merch!

Customer service was great at first as I had answers under a day to my questions. Then, I received my order and the numbers I had ordered and paid a supplement for, were not on the shirts.

I sent two emails about two weeks ago to ask how we could solve this issue and didn't receive an answer yet. Everytime I call I go to voicemail. Left a message and never got a call back.

I am very disappointed in the service when things don't go as planned.
Quality,.fabric type, and garment size were accurately described. No issues with photo distortion at all. Everything made to my specifications..Will be ordering again.

I had a great experience with T-Shirt Elephant. I got my business t-shirts and hats embroidered within just a week. The t-shirt stamp is exactly as per the PMS colors provided and looks resistant enough for several washes. The hats are perfectly embroidered. Very satisfied and will do business again. Many thanks to William Lima who took special care to this order.

Absolutely loved my experience! I ordered a custom design sweatshirt for the holidays about a year ago, which I simply dragged my art onto the design area of the website, and the outcome was fantastic. The screen print remains just as vibrant as when I first received it (as seen in the photo), and the shirt itself was surprisingly fuzzy on the inside! I also plan to order another design for a group of people soon. Although the price is a little more than what I'd usually pay for clothing, and the shipping takes awhile depending on your order, these are custom designs and you do in fact get your bang for your buck.

We use T-Shirt Elephant as our provider for all are T-Shirt and apparel. We've worked together for almost 8 years now and they've been the back-bone of our business. We are both Canadian businesses, so it's been a pleasure to continue to support them.

This company is a JOKE. Emailed and attempted to call customer service multiple times. They ghosted on responses once I made a point that their product was subpar and no where near the mocked up design. Save your time and money and go somewhere else that will actually respond and take responsibility for their lack of expertise.
I've used this company in the past for toques. when I went to make a second order with a new design. again LAZILY they just reprinted my old design again. This time they actually took responsibility for their error and sent new toques with my new design.

Should have known to not use them again after that, but here we are. Almost $800 lost on a box of merch I don't even want to give out for free because it looks so pedestrian.
Delivered less than the quantity we ordered and paid for. Don't answer emails or phone calls to address problems with the order. Many items had loose threads and quality is bad. Do not recommend.

Terrible customer service. We made a team order for hoodies, and the first order came all uniform. The next order for new players was placed with the exact same product, exact same layout, was noted that it was to match the original order. They sent us a poor quality print and when I got in touch to have it replaced with the same quality as the other hoodies they said it was my fault that the print was so poor because I didn't request a certain type of printing. I was never made aware that there were different types of printing, and why would I want a poorer quality print? They said the manager reviewed the quality and said that it was fine. It looks completely different from the first order, and.looked faded before it was ever washed. You can see the difference in the photos. One was crisp and one is not. The kicker for all of this is that a local company offered the same product with same printing for HALF the price of T-Shirt Elephant. What a rip off. Find a local family owned company to support and take your business elsewhere.
They are very responsive, easy and quick. The shirts I ordered came out perfect both times I ordered.

They did a horrendous job on our shirts and are refusing to get back to me. The shirts looked really washed out and our logos almost looked bleached on most shirts. The logos that weren't bleached were just completely different colours than what we asked for. Save yourself the time and look elsewhere for your Custom T-shirt needs. You won't be able to get a hold of anyone if they do mess up.

Edit: It's only fair to share the good things as well. The company ended up making it right and sent us a brand new batch free of charge and they look 10x better. Thanks for looking out!

Extremely high quality prints and a tremendous selection of apparel. Fast shipping and good communication ensure I will use them again. I really can't say enough good thing about the company. Fully exceeded expectations. Don't let my camera phone fool you, the prints and colors are tremendous.

Easy to design, good/quick communication because 1 of the t-shirt colours I picked was out of stock. Got the order quicker than expected & they look amazing. Very happy with quality & customer service at T-Shirt Elephant.

Spoke to them via their online-chat app and had a handshake agreement to the timeline in regards to production and shipping, as we were trying to hit a milestone. Basically "We know it says 20 days, but it'll be printed and out the door way sooner". Once the order was placed and paid, that agreement disappeared, and even though the conversation was acknowledged, they reprimanded me for even inquiring as to production time and subsequent shipping date.

Chelsea, the person with the title "customer service", provided a series of contradictory comments via email in regards to timeline and my original order (apparently Estimated Arrival Date means when they'll actually ship). The original chat was "we'll turn this around super quick" to "we have fourteen days and it's only day twelve, so back off". When questioned on Day 14 as to the status was told weekends don't count - even though I went by her numbers.

Hell, at one point Chelsea sent me a screenshot of their website that shipping is an estimated timeframe and to tell me it was late because Canada Post was having a tough go with the pandemic. Mind you, they'd not even printed the shirts at this point - so super curious as to how it was the postal system's fault?

Long story short, these arrive eventually. Three simple white text on black t-shirts that cost just over $70 all in. Wicked expensive but hey, it was a joke gift of sorts, for a milestone that was already six days past, but was happy they'd arrived.

However, the print job was sub-par. Thick, undefined edges, paint that allowed for the fabric to show through, and letters that began to flake off when lightly rubbed with my fingers.

Asked for a refund and was told: "This falls within our acceptable printing guidelines. We will not be issuing a reprint or a refund for this. This matter is closed."

Are you serious? Imagine I treated my clients like this? Imagine any of us would? A server that brings you hamburger instead of steak and when queried responds with not only "this falls within our acceptable serving guidelines" but ends with "go eff yourself, this matter is closed".

This was not only a fun little gift, but a DTG supplier test run, and man alive lesson learned to run from these folks. They've got nice branding, a decent online interface and cool packaging - but their customer service is total trash and that end product is an embarrassment.

So you've paid money for a product or service to a level of quality that you'd not received, and the people who took that money tell you that not only they think this kind of poor craftsmanship falls within their "acceptable printing guidelines" but that you can't discuss a reprint, a refund or any other avenue.

"This matter is closed."

Wow. Both the production time, customer service and ultimately the product itself is just piss poor. Whoever screen-printed this has little to no talent, or needs to find their manager to walk them through the basics again. or just doesn't care. Three scenarios that don't work in a payment-for-skill based business.

Can't recommend giving zero business to T-shirt Elephant enough. Shop elsewhere.

Quality product, great price and outstanding customer service! I placed a large and complex order and there was a slight logo alignment issue with the sweatshirts. Rebecca bent over backwards to make sure the reprints were correct, checking and re-checking to be certain they'd come out properly. They were printed correct and shipped out immediately. I can't say enough about how impressed I am with her prompt communication and her attention to making sure I was 100% satisfied. Already taking orders for another batch - 2 thumbs up for the elephant.
I recently designed two shirts of behalf of a customer. Not only did she love the design, but she was also very pleased with the colour and quality of the Gildan 5000 t-shirts.

BEWARE! Would leave 0 stars if google let me.

No one answers a phone, an email, returns a voicemail, no matter how many times you contact them. They say 14 days for shipping which is a LIE.

Still haven't got what I'm waiting for, which was time sensitive so don't even need it if it ever comes.

Wish I read these other recent reviews earlier. Will be disputing this credit card charge.

For the last 3 years I've made multiple orders of around $1000-$2500 from Tshirt Elephant.
The first couple of years customer service was great and the product was good and it was always delivered in a timely manner.

This year the customer service has been atrocious. I have to say this is the worst customer experience I've dealt with in my 25 years alive and I'm not exaggerating. There's simply no way to get ahold of anyone at the company.

I'm giving 2 stars due to past performance being acceptable. But it's super easy to tell the company is having major internal issues right now. Supply chain issues are understandable in this time. Customer service issues are a lack of care and/or poor systems.

Working with my credit card company to see if they'll cancel this order so I can move onto another company!

Save yourself the trouble and please don't order from here. Calling their 1-800 number will lead straight to voicemail and emails to their orders account will never be returned. The 14 day guaranteed shipping is a flat lie and I was only able to get my product (still delayed by two weeks from the guaranteed date) when I called my credit card to report for fraud. The fraud division submitted the report and advised that if they don't respond back within 30 days or something I'd get my money back, and only then did I receive my order after 8 days passed. When I placed the order for a team baseball hat, it mentioned that all hat orders will be embroidered by default but some complex designs may need to be digitally printed of which they will confirm before printing. My design only had a simple ‚ÄúS‚Äù on it and it came digitally printed. Also the wrong hat selection too. Now I wish they haven't sent this at all so that I'd get my full refund back from my credit card but I guess they didn't want to be filed for fraud so they sent my order out of spite with the bare minimum effort using the cheapest selection for the design. Hope karma does wonders to the owners and employees of this scamful company.
Amazing! I have used these guys for Adult League hockey jerseys for 3 years in a row, and the jerseys are high quality, affordable, and easy to design!.

I recently placed a large order for Company T-shirts and am very happy with the pricing and quality of the Bella&Canvas prints. The team were quick to discuss the design and answer questions about the product via email. I placed the order on Apr 3 and received the completed order on the estimated delivery date of April 23. As long as they don't shrink much after first wash, the whole team is very happy with the quality prints!

Based on all recent reviews, everyone is having the same issue. They will be in contact with you until you order. They get your money then decide to ghost. Really its too bad I have ordered from here multiple times (not since 2018 though) and never had a bad experience, so the company must be in some trouble.

I made an order a month ago and was supposed to have a delivery last week at the latest. 10 emails, and 5 voicemails have not been answered. Just give me a refund. I will be filing a police report and a chargeback with my credit card, although I feel my $300 is gone.

DO NOT BUY HERE! IT IS A SCAM. After reading comments here, looks like i am not the only one who got scammed..My story: I purchased 3 pro performance shirts (2 designs in total). The 1st design came out good, as expected. On the more expensive 2 shirts (2nd design), they replaced my selected design with a different shirt. It was extremely poor quality and fit and most importantly a completely different design. I inquired with support and all they did was try to offer me 20% off the 2 shirts that were bad. 20% off something i didn't choose to buy or want. No one ever communicated to me that there would be a design change, as their policy stated. The 2 bad shirts are completely worthless..Look at the attached pics for what i ordered vs what i got.
Imagine going into a car dealership and paying $100k for the higher end model and when you come pick it up, they give you the $30k model, without telling you anything before you came then offer you 20% off. That's what happened here. I will be taking this guy to court so that others won't get scammed again. Jason Sterling is the apparent business owner. He is on Facebook.

Please do not order from this place. This is my first time ordering from this company and it was the worst.

The customer service is absolutely non-responsive (phone number, emailing, the chat box, you name it). Don't even bother trying to call them because it will only lead you to a voicemail every time. The quickest response I got was through email, and that was from Robyn Atherton who only responded to answer why there was a delay in my order and about my tracking number (but this is after I had to email them multiple times for them to respond back).

On top of that, one of the hoodies (which had no designs or anything) I received was a faulty: there was a hole, the finishing was not neat, loose threads, and the sewings were not straight.

Also, when designing the crewnecks on the website, the design I have made were large and it fit the crewnecks nicely. But when I received my order the design was wayyyy smaller (like embarrassingly smaller) which now looks pathetic.

Considering that this place has a 3.8 rating, and that a friend of mine recommended this place to me. I was expecting good customer service and the products being designed the way I wanted it to be.

In conclusion, don't order from this place. Just don't. I spent the last month and this past few weeks working on designing, ordering, and struggling to get a response from the company just for my order to have a delay and for the design to look wack.

My first order with Tshirt Elephant was a bit scary. I thought I had been scammed because there was hardly any communication once my order was placed. I eventually got my order so I forgave and forgot. Placed a second order hoping this time would be better - wrong. Second order was far worse. I had to send 5 emails asking if they received my payment and still haven't got a response. Imagine having to beg a company to let you know if your order has been processed. I guess they don't want my money. I do not recommend ordering from this company. The print is decent but the quality of the clothing is awful. One wash and the hoodies/tshirts are threading all over the place. Non-existant customer service. I work for a large business local to Calgary and we would've consistently placed large volume orders but now we are looking elsewhere.

If I could give a zero I would - extremely disappointed by the zero customer service provided. When I made an order for school purposes, there was a slight mistake in the order that we caught immediately after placing. Tried calling, emailing and using their text feature for a week solid and never got any response from anyone, despite their claims of having customer service daily throughout the week by phone message, and the automatic reply to my emails stating they would get back to me within 24 hours. Never did get a hold of anyone and when I got my order almost a month later it was not what I wanted and poor quality. Since I will not charge my students for this I am now personally out almost $300. Will never order from them again. Very disappointed

I had ordered previously and had a great experience. This time when I attempted to order additional matching shirts for the team it was awful.
Knowing my order was from several years ago, and trying to make it easier on the company, I enclosed a copy of my original order and pictures of one of the original jerseys with instructions I wanted them to match as perfectly as possible. When I got the new jerseys they didn't match. They were vinyl decals instead of silk screenedand and the font was in lowercase instead of all uppercase.
Upon contacting them to ask about a remedy, I was first told they had never silkscreened performance wear and that they matched the jerseys as best they could. I then emailed saying that I did have silkscreened jerseys and the font didn't match and this could have been avoided by showing a proof. They said they never show proofs for names and numbers on jerseys and i should have verified their methods of printing before I ordered. The remedy they offered was for me to sepify what I wanted more clearly on my next order (i guess copies of my previous order and photos of the jerseys i wanted mached wete not specific enough).There will be no next order.

Ordered $1800 worth of shirts and hats after using this company in the past. The logo on the shirts was missing half of the printed words. Terrible customer service with slow reply times. No reasonable offer of making things right. Will be taking my business elsewhere.

These guys knocked it out of the park again! This is the third year that the Art In Motion 10K/5K/2K has used Jason and his crew to do our race shirts and each year they have been amazing. We added some custom embroidered hats and they were better than I expected.

I spoke AT LENGTH with Jason who was extremely short in his emails but I tolerated it as it seemed he was giving me a reasonable price. Eventually we agreed on a final quote per T-shirt. I took orders, charged my customers and then provided him with the complete order only to be ignored and ghosted. I sent 4 emails. Called 3 times and left a voicemail which all went unanswered. I find this extremely unprofessional and apparently this "customer service" rep has done this before as I can see the review before mine went through the exact same experience.

Do yourself a favor and avoid this unprofessional business.

TERRIBLE SERVICE, product not as advertised, not as promised. save your money and buy elsewheres.
While my 2018 purchase went well, this year was quite the opposite. Jason was very responsive while we ordered our shirts, but after they arrive, the company is completely silent. Our order was not fulfilled in full, we paid for items which we did not receive, and we have heard radio silence from our multiple voicemails and multiple emails since early June. I will have to seek refund/re-imbursement for items not fulfilled as purchased. Wish me luck, LOL.

I am completely blown away at how well the picture came out, as I did not expect anywhere near that good of a result.

This is the second shirt I have ordered from them, and you can guarantee I will be giving my custom again.

Thank you so much!

2.5‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚ú®
The website is easy to navigate and they offer a lot of items. The prices get a lot better as you increase the quantities. Concerning the product itself. During my design process on their website, I made sure that everything was centered. However, my order seems to have the print a bit tilted to the left side - writing is not straight like you would expect. I made 15x shirts, some are worst than others, but pretty much all seems tilted. The delivery time is about 10 to 15 days; which is fairly good.

Unfortunately, my experience with them on the customer service side has been terrible. I ordered 15 pieces (t-shirts, long sleeves and hoodies). Very satisfied with the shirts and long sleeves. However, the color on the hoodies are extremely different from the other items in my order and the print quality is significantly worse.

I immediately contacted them to inform them of my issue and even after supplying pictures of the obvious drop in quality on the hoodies, they refused to accommodate me in any way whatsoever, stating they're not issuing reprints or any sort of refund/credit on print quality basis.

Extremely dissatisfied, will never order from them again.
I got some shirts for my friends engagement party weekend. Everyone loved them. They fit so well. I love to sleep in mine!
Ordering from T-shirt was a breeze, the order came quick and the quality of the product is amazing. Will order again for sure.
Ordered some t-shirt for Halloween and they came out great!

Thank you TShirt Elephant for the amazing sweatshirts! They came out perfectly and right on time and our team could not be happier. Highly recommend T-Shirt Elephant to anyone reading this.

Thanks again!

I put it an order of about $3000,.t shirts with logos and they were great, although I had 3 speical items that were the wrong items and not what I ordered. I have contacted the customer department 4 times and have not received a response back at all. 2 emails and 2 phone calls have not been returned. After reading the other recent reviews now I'm not surprised at all. Customer Service doesn't exist.

From ordering to delivery, the process was seamless! The website is very user-friendly but they also have a chat-box if you hit any snags. My order was processed right away, and I received it less than a week later. The quality of the shirt is great, the imprint looks spectacular and I know my partner is going to LOVE this surprise in his Xmas stocking. Thanks to the team at T-Shirt Elephant, I wouldn't hesitate to order from them again!

they were nice to accept to print my shirt when I had problems with the website and it had nothing on it because of the error. However, when I showed them what I wanted, they simply did it the way they wanted it. I sent them a picture telling them exactly what I wanted and they picked a different font from the one in the picture I sent because ‚Äúthey have standard fonts‚Äù?. The funny part was that the picture I sent them was a previous order so there shouldn't be any problem getting it exactly the way it was supposed to be. they refused to do it the right way and told me to next time order with the font I want. Like??

Was very pleased with our order!.The shirts and print is excellent quality. This was our second time ordering!.My kids like to make shirts of their artwork and this is a wonderful way for them to do that. We even had to contact T-shirt elephant to make last minute changes and the response was quick and satisfying!.Highly recommend!

Really disappointed with this experience. Rude client service. We ordered 6 matching tshirts for our friends for an upcoming vacation. The fit was extremely small. Their website doesn't tell you they fit small, so order a bigger size. They said "we must not be XL" and we should have ordered XXL. I have never put an XXL on in my life. I am barely an XL but these don't fit me. They won't do anything to make this right. Hopefully they realize that good customer service goes a long way. This could have been a 5 star review that helped them attract customers. Now, I hope they lose 20 customers over this. Buyer beware.

I'm so glad Jason Sterling ghosted me and never emailed or called back. Thank you! We ended up finding another printing company that delivered our jerseys on time, at a lower price, and the most important part, actually responds to correspondences. What a concept :D

I ordered custom T-shirts and hats for my company from this place. They sent me blank tshirts; without any logos (even though I was charged for custom logo printing.) I have sent them multiple emails and never received a response. I have called their customer service, left several voice messages and have received no response.

Scam scam scam! I placed a $200 order
Beginning of May, it is now the end of June, and I have not received anything and have tried to contact T-shirt elephant for over a month! I have tried email, phoning, Facebook, Instagram, every way possible and I have not received a reply. I filed a report with the Better Business Bureau and I am now contacting my credit card company to Get a refund! Do not use this company, it is a SCAM!

I have ordered from this company before and recieved good service but this time I ordered 10 custom shirts over 2 months ago. The first time I ordered the shipping status said it was delivered when I was not and when I brought this to customer service they said they would try to ship to a new address that I provided (both of these addresses have been used by this company in the last 2 years so I know they work). Fast forward another month and the second shipment said that it's been sent back to the sender. Very frustrating experience that still has yet to be resolved. Would not recommend this company. I'll update this review if this is ever resolved.

I have ordered several custom one-off t-shirts and tank tops through T-Shirt Elephant over the last.four or five years. I am consistently impressed with thier quality, speed, service, and pricing. Buying one-off shirts may be expensive, but the quality more than makes up for it, even the shirts I have from years ago are in excellent condition, no holes in the fabric, no fading or cracking of the image. I will definitely be using them again in the future.

DO NOT USE: I recently ordered an American Apparel 50/50 shirt and received a completely different shirt than what I ordered that was of significantly worse quality. I needed this shirt for an event and even super rushed the order that charged a 50% additional fee. I reached out to the co-owner Jason who told me they have the right to switch the shirt type at any time without warning and to check the FAQ next time. Not only did I not receive the right shirt but the customer service was extremely poor and non-sympathetic despite the company's error. I highly recommend you look at alternative companies or as Jason says read the fine print FAQ and if your lucky you will get what you ordered.

It was last minute I needed special shirts done for a memorial. I reached out to about 11 companies, all in which said they couldn't do the amount needed, or both sides of the shirt or I had to wait 7 bhsiness days. What a shocker..Not with this company..Thank God I found Jason. Jason was exquisite..He was understanding and continued to work with me to ensure these shirts would be done and ready. Further more when the shirts ran out and we needed more not once but two times in the same night , Jason was to our rescue..Such a great company and great staff. I dont know what we would have done if it wasn't for the care and understanding of the staff of this company..Shirts chosen and designed by me were done to the t on these shirts. No errors and nothing altered. If you need any shirt for any occasion. Stick with these guys. They will ensure the job is done right..Thank you so much íì

I have had the most terrible customer experience with this company. No one will respond to me since I submitted payment. I've sent so many messages. I have received no communication about the status of my order, when or at this point IF it will be ready. I shouldn't have tried to save a bit of money, and gone with a trusted company.
What.is crazy is companies like ours make repeat orders. You're losing so much future business!
REFUND THIS ORDER IMMEDIATELY.

I have never created a t-shirt but this experience was made very easy with a step- by- step simple process. I purchased two different styles and texture of shirts, and both were very much to my approval. When I submitted the order, they stated a specific date it would be ready, and I believe it was in the couriers hands before that date, so efficiency and being prompt are always a good thing to be associated with a company. Overall, I was extremely happy and I believe anyone ordering from T-Shirt Elephant will be also.

This Company is completely Terrible DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! , I ordered 4 Tshirts and the quality is Terrible . The custorm Service was extremly rude and they was not going to offer a refund for the t shirt that i am not even going to wear thats how poor the qualty is.

I really wish I read the reviews before purchasing! Please beware because this company made me 2 shirts for 120$ and they did them completely wrong and the Colour's were wrong! I sent them an email and they asked me to reply with pictures and then they never responded to avoid refunding me. Avoid at all cost.

Super disappointing. The colors of the shirts I ordered look very different than the swatch on the site and the quality of the printing is extremely poor. It looks like it will come off after a few washes. Not good for business t-shirts!

I cannot say enough good things about T-Shirt Elephant..I have ordered small batches of shirts (7 and 9) twice now, and not only have the shirts been superb quality, the customer service ROCKS. For my last order, I had a pretty specific request that involved T-Shirt Elephant putting something that typically goes on the back of a shirt on the front instead, to save me money..Jason Sterling was amazing, responded quickly to my questions, and MADE IT HAPPEN!.If you need custom T-shirts, get them here!.I promise I'll be back.

We ordered t-shirts on May 18, 2022. We paid 25% extra per item. With a promised delivery date of June 1, 2022 We have made multiple attempts to contact someone. It is now June 15, 2022. Still no t-shirts and still no reply to our multiple emails.

I have used T-Shirt Elephant for many years now for my TA shirts and they are always great quality, exactly how I order them with the logo placement and delivered timely..They have a very user friendly website that allows you to design your items with ease.highly recommend!

This is one of the best companies I've ever dealt with. Professional, quick and friendly. Loved it! A website that is very easy to navigate.amazing quality shirts, very customizable. Cannot wait to order my next tshirt and HIGHLY recommend it to everyone :)

The website and ordering process was great..Very easy to use..The experience I just had with Customer Service. not so much..I ordered one shirt for a Toddler's birthday (with shipping to Vancouver was almost $60)..I received an email that they didn't have the hoodie I ordered and they suggested an alternative which I agreed to..It ended up being a tshirt rather than a sweatshirt and I assumed I would be refunded the difference in price - whatever it was..They state "If any product is out of stock we reserve the right to replace the item with equal or higher quality comparable item" which I understand except my replacement was not equal or higher quality..When I contacted them asking if I would be receiving a refund, customer service went back and forth justifying why they can keep my money but offered 10% off my next order.. The last email from Chelsea in Customer Service said "We send substitution suggestion emails out as a courtesy and we are not obligated to do so. You were made fully aware of the substitution which you agreed to. We are not issuing any refunds or reprints for an order we printed to-order."
I had an extremely last-minute embroidery need -- and Jason and his team at T-Shirt Elephant helped me out. Great service. Wonderful work. Can't say enough about them.

Pros: print quality and colour selection
Cons: Customer service is so bad it's astounding!
What I had made - hoodies, long sleeve athletic shirts, polo and jackets.

Ordered five, various shirts. Two garments were not as expected for colour and style, as seen in the product choosing and design process.
Prices are on the mid to high end for low volume printing.
I don't think I would use them as a vendor again.

Worst customer service and products ever.(I ordered last Nov.). After confirming and paying, I was then told they could not deliver on time. I asked for money back. Nope. They claimed they had already ordered the t -shirts. Really? That's a super lame excuse for a t-shirt company that would sell them as it was pre-Xmas rush! I asked many times for a rep to call - never happened. No replies to emails. Design was messed up on our shirts and could not sell them. BAD BAD BAD I would give zero stars if possible.

i ordered from them recently and have been loving it a lot!
going to place another order soon

EXCELLENT quality, fast turnaround and great customer service. I was mistakenly given only part of my order when I picked it up. Jason took care of couriering the rest of the order immediately. Highly recommended!

The above is from my first time placing an order. My most recent repeat business order came back looking so good it brought a tear of joy to my eye. The colors were super-saturated and the registration of the screens was tight!

As a side note, the colors from the first order look as vibrant many many washings later as when I first picked up the order. :)
Great service and communication during and after the ordering process. Quick production and delivery. Quality and cost are great.

This company is not even deserving of one star. Their customer service is so bad! Still waiting several months into my order.
Order anywhere else but here

Tried to place an order by email. Whoever responds to their 'orders' email address (email signature is Jason Sterling, who has a LinkedIn saying this is his family's business) directed me to email transfer him money to make a shirt. After he received the money he ghosted me. No shirt, and I'm out $100.
