T-Shirt Elephant/Jason, if you're reading this, I want the shirt very soon or my money back. You have my email.

I have only good things to say about T-shirt Elephant..I had ordered 3 hoodies in November.2020. One was a gift for my daughter's birthday. It had a defect in the neck size of the hoodie. I had sent an email informing them of the defect. Within 12 hours, Robyn had responded to my email and was happy to do a reprint. She was very polite and professional..I will definitely be using this company again.

I don't often post public reviews, however I hope my review can help any prospect customers hoping to make a Christmas order around this time.

I placed a small order (7 custom sweatshirts) on Dec 2nd last year with a 'guaranteed date' of Dec 22..At the time of my order the website still showed that I could pick up locally, which I was hoping would be my back-up if it wasn't delivered in time for Christmas..After I emailed customer service to confirm this after my order, I received a templated email saying pick-up not available due to Covid..I tried calling and the phone was never picked up.

Dec 22 comes and goes, no delivery and no communication from the company..I send an email enquiry, and I get no response..Christmas comes and goes, and still no response or delivery..I try calling, and again, phone only goes to voicemail..I finally leave a voicemail January 7th enquiring about my order..I get no phone call back, and then finally I get an 2-line email effectively saying "sorry, order is pushed to front of queue and will be shipped rush"..They gave no explanation or acknowledgement that they must've forgot about my order (I presume). And yet still, by January 19th I received nothing and had to follow-up yet again..They never responded, but eventually by late January I got the order (which was anti-climatic, as the people who were suppose to get them at Christmas were no longer in the province).

I'm not sure if I was overlooked as my order was so small and personal, and not a corporate order, but I was very frustrated and upset by the whole experience..If the company cannot handle smaller-personal orders, or covid is disrupting the productivity, then they should clearly communicate that with their prospective customers..The lack of communication was just unacceptable..I even sent an email to customer service after my order was finally delivered, setting out how disappointing the process was and never got a response.
Got the Most amazing shirts from here ! Was really happy with the out come ! Highly recommended

I would give a higher rating for the service and the speed of delivery, however the product itself leaves so much to be desired. The shirts I ordered were a better quality material and cut than I had expected, the fit was great! However, I came to T-Shirt Elephant for printed shirts, so this review is based on the quality of printing. The window within which you can design is limited. The quality of the printing is fair at best and none of the products I have ordered have withstood the wash. I am incredibly disappointed and torn at whether or not I should actually share this product with customers due to the poor quality of printing.

A small business has been misled by this company thinking they delivered a quality product.

Instead they offer you cheap prints that are extremely low quality.

See photos - this is suppose to be a solid orange and their response has been "this fits our acceptable colour allowance". Their email response is also below.

Website was easy to use, but order took much longer to arrive than I was told it should. Also,
I didn't get exactly what I wanted. I ordered an embroidered toque, but instead they sent me a printed toque and didn't warn me in advance that there were any changes. I would've appreciated the heads up that my order wasn't going to be what I asked for.

Shipping was super slow and products were very small. although they do provide a size chart you must measure and expect to order 3 sizes larger than you normally wear, was pricey as well, $55 for a simple t shirt with custom print. Offered company chance to help but no offer of support. Bottom line don't use this service

I placed a large order for shirts during the Boxing Day sale event. It was a good deal and I was able to conveniently design the shirt online. However, when I received the order, the shirts' design was in the completely wrong color. Chelsea with T-Shirt Elephant quickly addressed my concerns and got us another shipment on a time-sensitive order. However, again this order was in the wrong color. Ultimately, we got a 25% refund on our order. Chelsea was great to address these concerns. However, we were greatly inconvenienced by this process and still have the wrong color for shirts.

I made a massive order. Immediately realized I forgot to enter my promo code for 15% off and emailed them immediately and asked for it to be applied or my order cancelled so I could reorder..I was told that nothing could be done and that I could get 10% off on my next purchase. I responded by saying that I was a repeat customer and it seemed preposterous that they couldn't do anything about it and asked to speak to a manager. Then I got a response that they could give me a refund of 10%, which meant they were lying in their initial response.

I would have been a loyal customer for life and would have recommended this company to everybody were it not for this pathetic customer service.

T-shirt Elephant was super easy to use and you're able to selected the type of clothing you would like to customize. Great selections at affordable prices. I was really please with the outcome of my order. The quality is good and they printed the logo I needed perfectly. Delivery also came really quickly way before my deadline. Really impressed with the company.

I placed an order to print me two shirts that I had designed myself.
I work as a graphic designer, and know that the art was "camera ready", in other words nothing needed to be changed to print them.
I selected the apparel that I wanted, nothing special, two grey Gildan shirts.
It took 5 weeks to arrive.
The website does not tell you how long to expect to have to wait, until after you have paid them.
The quality of the print was decent, and the shirts look great. I have no complaints about the products. My two star rating was entirely due to the utter lack of transparency regarding how long this was going to take. Elephant ignoring my email requests for an update (I got one notice/ reply to my queries in the five week period).
When the items did arrive, there was no "Sorry this took so long" email, or any offering of an explanation.
I had a series of designs, for multiple touring bands, and orders in the hundreds that were to follow this first small run/ test printing.
I ended up going with Jak prints out of Cleveland. With import fees, and shipping internationally included, their prices are similar, and often less than Elephant. I wished to use a CA company, but not when it takes five weeks to print two shirts.
Never again.

BE AWARE! Do not order from them. Find and support another local custom tshirt supplier. T-Shirt Elephant is a Disaster. I will be reporting.
The order was supposed to be delivered within 2 weeks as per contract. Of course I understand the current situation and I did allowed an extra time for delivery, I was okay with the delay, however there was NO communication, no Order updates, no emails, no.messages sent to me about the production times etc. It has been a month and no delivery. Finally after 1 month the package comes in (after I sent 2 emails) and 1/2 of the order is still missing! Website says the order is completed, but I only got half of the products ordered. I emailed customer service three times, tried to chat with them online, and called twice, and I am unable to reach the customer service. No one responds to your emails.

Also - QUALITY IS BAD - the printing is very light and not high-quality ink, the logo will go away after few washes, I'm sure. The embroidery is so bad, the thread is pulling already in one of the product, which means the quality of the supplies is low. I ordered from other stores before and it was never such bad quality.

DO NOT TAKE PEOPLES MONEY AND ORDERS IN IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO DELIVER !

Quality of garments was good. Got 2 sweatshirts..A lot of $$ but good quality. I sized my logo and placed on mock up, didn't see where I could add measurement and logos came on products ridiculously HUGE. About 4" wider than I had assumed based on mock-up. You never see logos that gigantic. Can't wear, looks so silly. Wasn't happy, emailed and all they offered was 10% off my next order. No thank you.

I was able to order only one shirt which was a nice selling feature. The other positive was that the shirt was completed and shipped to me within 5 days. Very fast service. However, there were a few issues.

First, after ordering, I realized I made a small error on what was to be printed. As soon as I realized (within 4 hours of purchase) I sent them an email and tried calling the contact number to simply add an '. I tried re-calling the number for the next few days and was re-routed to some marketing agency and no one answered back. My email was left unanswered as well. There seems to be no way to reach this company.

The second issue I had is with the overall quality of the shirt. I ordered a large, yet the sizing seems to be way bigger than normal. The shirt is a little shorter than a normal large but waaay wider. It gives the person a nice 'skinny fat' look, which should not be a look anyone is trying to achieve.

Honestly, I can overlook the poor customer service if the quality of material was good. I made the initial mistake and ultimately that's on me. However, I would not recommend the shirt in terms of quality either. Overall, a bit disappointing.

Website was easy to use, with minimal knowledge of what to do..The choices were abundant and very well priced..I loved that I didn't have to order a minimum of shirts, just the one I wanted.
Delivery was on time, actually a couple days ahead of the estimated delivery date..It was well packaged..The product was exactly as I requested, and the sizing was bang on!.I would recommend T-Shirt Elephant to anyone, and will definitely be ordering again!

Designed and ordered 1 custom shirt as a secret santa gift. Web site design program was pretty easy to use. Price jumped pretty quick from original shirt price when adding designs and did not change when I removed some print, but hey its custom so you pay for that. Placed the order and all was good. I got an order email that had pictures of my shirt design. Problem was email only showed the front of the shirt. I emailed customer service about this to make sure they had my back of shirt design as it was not in email. They got back to me within 1 day and assured me everything was good. The shipping cost seems high to me, especially if you want rush shipping. 14 business days time frame that they guarantee for delivery. My shirt showed up after 9 business days so I was quite happy about that. When I opened up shirt to check it out I was very happy. It turned out better then I thought it would. The gift went over as a bit hit. Overall good experience using T-shirt elephant. Service and speed was great. Cost was a little high, especially the shipping I.M.O. Thank you!
I was thrilled with the custom T-shirts I ordered. The colours were vibrant and the design was professional. The shirt material was also of excellent quality. I highly recommend T-shirt elephant.

I had a really great experience with them. It took a bit longer than anticipated but this is likely because I order during the Canada Post rotating strike. The quality of the print is great and our students loved it. The shirt is thick and feels like great quality. We pre-washed them all and they look great. Will definitely be ordering from them soon.
Shipping can take some time but IT IS WORTH IT - Great quality and alignment! I think it is a fair a totally fair shipping for the the product you get!
So very pleased with the quick and efficient service I received..Very good quality shirts and they were a hit at our Volunteer Appreciation Night.

Their design web app is pretty easy to use and fairly detailed enough to make specific requests on the design and colour. So thumbs up for that.

However, came the time when I wanted to place an order, their website went down!
Nothing would load, so that wasn't pleasant at all.

I did email them about it and they were quite responsive..It was fixed the next day and placed my order with no issues.

T-shirts shipped within less than 2 weeks, so that was great..The quality of the shirts were great, I ordered 150 of the Gildan Performance Tees, the colour (i chose athletic gold) was more like a yellow rather than a gold..Time will tell if they wash out over time.

One thing though is that their prices are competitive along with great customer service, so that already won me over other companies.

Overall, I had a good experience with them!

Just received my third order from T-Shirt Elephant..The t-shirts look great and the order arrived early, which was perfect as the projected delivery date was a little too close to the day I needed them for my comfort.

I will definitely order from this company again..Very satisfied.

Poor customer service. I ordered my package long long ago still haven't received it. The customer support will not help me further with my issues says it's not their responsibility once Canada post picks it up. I needed my jackets I ordered for a event. They never showed up. I was not offered any sort of refund or discount for my time and trouble. I payed for a product to be delivered within a time frame it did not arrive. The manager then told the customer support ‚Äú What I have relayed to you is the guidelines that have been provided to me by my manager. We have considered this matter closed and we will not be engaging further.‚Äú DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY. You can find more reviews about this company on other review sites.
DO NOT ORDER SHIRTS FROM HERE. It is a scam company - they will take your money but the shirts will never arrive. They likely paid for the positive reviews on here.

Very satisfied with T-Shirt Elephant! It was my first time using their services, and I would order from them again. I ordered a collection of personalized jackets for a high school volleyball team and they look great! I had some issues with choosing sizes during my order online, but they were very helpful in their support to correct the order. I was also unsure about the estimated delivery date, as I am on the west coast. To my surprise, I actually received them a few days early!

It was easy to design my own shirt, I put in an order with multiple colours, and I received 25+ shirts in about a week! Quality of the shirts was exactly as expected and the design came out perfectly. They also responded quickly and kindly to all of my questions. Would definitely recommend.

I have had exceptional customer service from T-Shirt Elephant. Every question was answered quickly and efficiently and I loved the final product so much that I ordered more of the same for a different event. I would highly recommend them.

I wanted to order from a Canadian company. Although quick, in the remarks for the design I asked for writing on the back and the background removed on the picture I submitted. I received confirmation with those notes. Then my sweatshirt came with neither done. When I emailed customer service I was offered 10% off my next order. I said this doesn't help what I paid for this order. She said you have to read the fine print. Some shirts can't be done. But you weren't billed for writing on the back. So now I have a shirt that cost good money that isn't what I wanted. Lesson learned read everything on their site before ordering. I guess custom remarks don't matter. Will never order from them again

Purchased custom hoodies for my family as Christmas gifts and they turned out better than I could have imagined. Quality of the hoodies and the printed designs are perfect. Would love to create more designs to purchase in the future!

Placed my order on may 5th is is may 27th I did not get a confirmation email. I had no luck in getting in contact with someone who actually works here.
Who knows if I'll ever get the products I spent $300.00 I am not a happy customer by any means.

I was very satisfied with the quality of the jerseys I ordered. The sizing was good and the logos and numbers looked great. Two of the jerseys in my order were delivered without the logo, but with one quick email they sent me two new jerseys with the logo to replace the two without, free of charge. The only negative thing I could say about this order was the delivery time was a week longer than it had stated it would be when I placed the order.

I placed my second order with T shirt Elephant just recently and I ordered about 20 tank tops. The material and quality of the tank that I ordered was really nice. However when I ordered online, I expanded my logo for my business very large on the front of the tanks and received the shirts with the print extremely small and hardly noticeable..The first time I ordered, I had placed an order for a bunch of Gildan Sweaters with the logo and they turned out great. The printed logo was a nice screen print (exactly what I wanted) and they were done very well..I would order the sweaters again for sure but I was not happy at all with the turnout of the tanks unfortunately. The print on the tanks looked like it had been sprayed on and some logos were very clear, others were fading already and not all the same colour.

The shipping I thought took extremely long. I ordered the tanks the last week of June and didn't receive my order until really late July beginning of August.

I had spent a lot of money for the tanks and was so excited to receive them as I sell them at my facility. Since my last experience, I am a little bit scared to place another order.

Terrible print quality! Avoid at all costs!

A proof was never received when ordering and there was no quality control in processing the order. The sweaters received were completed in such a poor manner. I cannot have my employees in outfit this atrocious!

I contacted their support team, who did nothing to rectify their poor quality. I want a refund for my product or better quality prints of the same design and quantity.

One star is being generous! If there were negative stars this business would take the cake
Not only are the shirts we ordered fantastic the team at T-Shirt Elephant went out of their way to make sure that our shirts arrived in time for our fundraising event! Thank you so much team!

I placed an order for about 25 T-shirts for a school dance club and I was extremely satisfied with my order! The price was very reasonable (had compared to several other sites) and the shipping was super fast! It was expected to be 15 days but I got it a week from my order date! I would highly recommend to Canadian customers since you don't need to deal with extra customs/duties charges and longer shipping times. I was also happy to see they accept Visa Debit. My only critic of my t-shirt quality is some loose threads found on a total of 3 shirts in my large order. Overall I am very happy and will definitely be ordering from T-Shirt Elephant again!

I am pleased with the service and the product I received from T- Shirt Elephant..Everything came as ordered and the quality of the material is very good. I had to call customer service when the shirts did not arrive on the day expected but I received excellent service and an acceptable explanation..They were so busy with orders that production got a little behind..Understandable when you provide this type of product. I was assured of a delivery date before we needed the shirts and they arrived as promised..I especially liked the fact that you could order different designs and any color in one order without a minimum number or an extra charge..Free shipping is great too..Thanks T-Shirt Elephant for making our family celebration a little more special!

I ordered 2 sweaters and received them with defects, completely unusable. Unfortunately, the customer service team was not knowledgeable enough to resolve my issue and refused to provide a refund/re-print. Instead, they asked the customer (me) to order another set of sweaters at a price.

I understand that process of printing may issues here and there, my critical review mainly stems from their lack of management in their customer service. Customer service is incentivized on blaming customers to brush off any issues rather than actually "resolving" the issues.

As a business owner, my review is in not doing business with TShirt Elephant due to their lack of technical and customer service management.

Regards,

I ordered 100 t-shirts for the first time from T-shirt Elephant for a local surf event. The website was super easy to use, the t-shirts came in two weeks and looked AMAZING. We are all so happy with them, we will definitely be ordering again! The only downside was the price. After the fact I was able to find a much cheaper price but I am still very happy with our order.

The graphics turned out very well. Wish they would have an option for longer sizes. The t shirts we're given to some taller people and looked too short on them. Many athletes are taller now so offering taller sizes would allow us to use them for future t-shirt designs.

First it was the only company I found that would let me order just 1 shirt.
Second, easy to design and create the shirt I wanted
Third, quality screen print (not the sticker style from out of country companies)
Fourth, made and shipped to my door within 2 weeks (a week earlier than quoted);
Issue, my mistake was not reading the material and thinking I ordered a cotton or cotton blend.it was polyester :( Nothing to do with the company, but not what I thought I ordered.
Over all I would use them again, but read the fine print on what shirts are what material

The T-shirt arrived quickly and as designed so that was good but immediately I felt there was something wrong with the fabric. I ordered a 100% cotton T-shirt and the one I received is 50% polyester. That's a HUGE mistake/discrepancy and now my husband is leaving in one week for Germany with this family gift ( we plan to all sign it) for his very terminally ill brother and the quality and comfort of the fabric are important. I'm not happy about it at all.

The t-shirt was very good quality including the image and text. It has been washed many times and is still in perfect condition. Shipping was also super quick. It came before the estimated time of arrival. Awesome experience with this company

The purpose of my review is to let others know about how disappointed I am with the service that I received with their customer service. I had ordered sweatshirts with logo for my staff. I received the sweatshirts without the logo print. When I emailed about my surprise, the response I received was ‚Äúyou should have known that there was no logo print because of the price you paid‚Äù. I was shocked with this response. Where's the compassion and understanding there, let alone acknowledging the customer? What kind of core value does this business has? I also realized that the sweatshirts were oversized once which was my mistake that I did not pay attention to the sizing. So I asked them if I can return the 6 garments and would purchase a more expensive brand of sweatshirts that fits better for my staff with the logo. Apparently I cannot do that. The only concern of this company is money and not the happiness of their customers. I went to 4imprint.ca and was so surprised to see their core value right at their home page which is to make sure their customers are happy with the products. But t-Shirt Elephant does not care if their customers are not satisfied with the products.

Amazing sweaters. I had 2 done for direct support professional and everyone at my job is very excited to order. I will be getting shirts done next. You guys are amazing. It's worth the price it's better if you are buying more then 2 but I am happy

I have had a very positive experience with T-Shirt Elephant. They are one of the few Canadian print on demand companies and have been excellent to work with. I mostly interact with Rachel who is phenomenal. She always responds to me in a timely manner and addresses my questions/concerns. I highly recommend this company!

Edit: I had a great experience with t-shirt elephant at the very beginning but customer service and quality control have significantly decreased in the last month or so. I received several garments that were printed incorrectly. In fact, just yesterday I received a garment that was printed incorrectly for the THIRD time which is mind blowing. All my orders were delivered past the estimated delivery date as well.

I ordered aprons and ball caps for an event..The ordering process was straightforward including adding and positioning the logo..Communication of confirmation and shipping was very good..When the order arrived I was very happy with the quality of all of the items..I will definitely.order again..Very good value and service.

I ordered a sweatshirt and hat. I contacted agents over chat to confirm that my order would be fine and shipped out. I actually spoke to two seperate chat agents to confirm that my designs were good to go (which they conveniently cannot find in their system apparently). I received an email multiple days after my order was placed to tell me the hat could not be made. When I asked to cancel my order, which was a suggestion offered by the agent, they told me my sweatshirt had already shipped a while ago and was being delivered. I have never received a tracking number or anything to this regard.
The agent told me that I could not cancel my order. which is ridiculous. I did not agree to pay for half of an order. Or pay to ship a single item.
They told me if I shipped it back it would be at my own expense, and NOW the item says delivered but it's not here.
This is by far one of the worst experiences I have had with a customer service team.

Waiting on an order for my group that has been in the works for months. We were in communication for a while but after we sent the payment and we received no response from the company. After four emails from me and at least three from my business partner, we have yet to get a response! Down about $1500 now.

I already ordered several items from T-Shirt Elephant and I am very pleased with all my orders. The quality is amazing, design is unique and creative. They also have a great customer service. On top of it I am happy to support local businesses.

Turnaround was quicker than what they quoted..Silk screening looks great..Unit price was affordable with a larger order..Cotton was soft..Stitching looks great..Two complaints..Shirts have a slight vinegar scent, which my customers noticed..Going to have to wash the order..Second complaint is the tags are curled up and kind of scratchy

There's two HUGE elephants in the room with T-Shirt Elephant: their glitched online ordering system and their customer service. I ordered a custom t-shirt for Father's Day to say ‚ÄúWORLD'S DOPEST DAD‚Äù. The apostrophe in ‚ÄòWorld's' was not showing up in the preview box; rather, there was a large space between the last two letters, so I kindly emailed customer service to ensure it would be printed properly. They assured me they would add a note to the work order, so they clearly acknowledged the preview glitch. Unfortunately, I received the shirt and they did NOT include the apostrophe, so it read ‚ÄúWORLD S DOPEST DAD‚Äù - the exact error I was trying to avoid. I emailed customer service to inquire about reprinting, they responded with the following: ‚ÄúWe cannot guarantee that order notes will be followed after the order is placed. All I had confirmed was that the note was added. As we printed this to order, we cannot issue a reprint or a refund‚Äù. I then requested to escalate the situation, and was met with the same, repeat response from the same customer service representative. I'm beyond disappointed, and will be contacting my credit card company to dispute the charge if they continue to deny my requests to speak to someone who could actually help. Their customer service deserves 0 stars. Get your custom T-shirts literally anywhere else.

Excellent customer service!.Very happy with the print quality and shipping times..I did run into an issue with the sizing on the t-shirt I ordered not matching the size chart (and not fitting) - but when I got in touch with customer service, they reprinted the design on another brand and shipped it back out to me for free..Happy customer here!

There were a few things that had gone wrong with my order. The "guaranteed on-time" was missed but I was willing to overlook that due to the holidays in order to get a good product into my teams hands. Once I received the product I noticed the toques were very small and the color was slightly faded. These toques would be good for youth or toddlers but not adults. They definitely do not fit adult men and most women. I ordered enough toques for two teams and we found that they didn't fit 98% of our employees.

After a bit of back and forth with t-shirt elephant they did make this right for us. We got a new order of toques in pretty quickly and they fit the team very well. I appreciate a company who will follow through to ensure the customer is satisfied with the end product.

Danielle

I have not even received order yet but the customer service was so awful that I feel compelled to warn others. They need to drop whoever is doing their user support. They are obviously losing a lot of business due to this. This was my first order and I emailed in for an update on shipping only to be told that once the order leaves their facility, it is on me to contact shippers. The emails just got nastier and ruder from there. Literally all they had to do was assure me that it was on the way. I have rarely ever crapped on a user support rep because their jobs are hard but this one really rubbed me the wrong way. Just a complete and total lack of any business sense or decorum. My first order will be my last now, thanks 100% to "Chelsea".

The website claims that all orders are professionally reviewed, and that customer satisfaction is guaranteed..However, the text on one of my shirts fell outside of the printing border, and I didn't notice..There was no warning on the website, and obviously no professional reviewed it..Also, the printing notes I included were ignored..I emailed the company saying I was not satisfied, and they will not reprint my shirt..I will not be using this company for future orders.

They also would not tell me how they honour their policy of ‚Äúcustomer satisfaction guaranteed‚Äù or the ‚Äúfact‚Äù that the designs are all professionally reviewed..Instead, I was told that my ticket is now closed.

Absolutely fantastic work and quality! I've ordered a few funny shirts online over the past few years and most are pretty disappointing with thin fabric and cheap vinyl transfers. Not the case here. Heavy fabric that so far is proving durable, and the image printed into the fabric. Only 4 washes so far but still looks new. I will definitely be a repeat customer

Ordered 9 jerseys for my basketball team with t shirt elephant for the first time and the overall experience was great. Website was easy to use, had plenty of variety, logo was easy to upload, quotes for the total amount was fast and accurate. The shipment came in earlier than expected. There were a few very minor issues with a few jerseys but customer service got back to my problem super fast and I was very satisfied with how it was handled. Would recommend this place!

Wow,.simply amazing!.Great quality T-shirts, beautiful bold prints..I love 'em all!.Above all my shipment arrived way ahead of the estimated schedule time line.Just fantastic!.Great Job My New Elephant Friends, I will highly recommend your service to love ones..Thanks so much!

My expectations were met..I was happy with the purchase..It was on the pricy side for one t-shirt when it was all said and done, but ordering 1 custom t-shirt comes at a price wherever I looked..I received the item on time, and the quality was what I expected..The basic t-shirt I ordered does fit on the small side, so keep that in mind when ordering..Over all I was satisfied with the purchase.

Customer service was not very helpful. I had wanted a custom logo on a hat and reached out to them because I was concerned about sizing and whether it would look the same as the online designer. Despite assurances, the logo was huge. Basically threw a couple hundred bucks away because the hats are garbage. To their credit, they know how to redirect blame like pros.

Ordered baseball shirts, expecting to get standard cotton t-shirts (coloured sleeves/white front and back). Instead I received some cheap polyester shirt that feels like a thicker version of slip material. I acknowledge that I should have read the fine print on the fabric when I bought them but it didn't even occur to me that anyone would even make a nylon baseball shirt (this isn't a league jersey). It arrived quickly, so that was a good thing. However both shirts in the order had a very distinct smell and had to be laundered before we could wear them.
I made an order for 12 shirts for our family for Christmas and all of them arrived in 2 weeks. They're perfect! They even made the artwork look better than what I sent them, can't wait to order more.

The quality of T-Shirt Elephant's products are reasonable, though not incredible. I had issues with shipping (it took forever and they sent my shipment in 2 batches). I feel that their price is high for what they do. They also were very unaccommodating with helping me with samples. Their website is great to see your designs on the product and position them etc. Pity about the remainder.

READ B4 PURCHASE - BEWARE.

My team submitted an order and had an extremely poor experience. Their website states that they have senior graphic designers on standby to double check orders. My take away from the experience was: bad service, hardly any communication/support, and even less of a care for the customer.

1. There were parts of the designs that they double stitched and other parts with a single stitch causing an incongruent image with various parts that were left unrecognizable compared to the original design. SOLUTION - Work with your customer.
2. Each item was of different quality. Some were better stitched than others. SOLUTION - Work with your customer and be transparent.
3. They provided no tracking number and no real notification other than when the order was placed. I had to reach out to them to get an update on my order. SOLUTION - Work with your customer and/or provide the tracking number.
4. I reached out with a very fair email seeing what can be done. No more was offered other than "we did our due diligence and can't be held responsible for the design, here's 10% off". I'm asking for customer service, not an excuse to close off my inquiry. SOLUTION - Work with your customer.

For less than 20 items, it took 2 and a half weeks to ship to me, no option to pick up. I live 5 minutes away from their location. Thought it'd be great to have a supplier next door. Absolutely not, do yourself a favour and continue to support companies who emphasize the customer experience.

Sorry for the lack of pictures, I am not posting a design that I am not happy with.

Our hats came on time and in the correct quantity! Shipping was fast and the quality is also very good. The only criticism is the design is a little smaller than we thought when designing it, but it is understandable that it will not be the exact same as the digital mock-up. Overall our team is super happy with the custom hats! We are warm and looking fly!

Had a horrible customer service for my order.
Obvious print quality inconsistencies through out the batch and very cheap looking dtg printing. Had notes sent before printing to make sure i get good printed shirts, but came to me with some looking worse than others.

When i contacted requesting some sort of help for the issue, they said my order quality issue was not significant enough for them to do reprints. Very disappointing to receive half of the order looking faded, and now i have to deal with their poor prints

Not worth my money and time trying to support this company.
I've had 4 different sweaters made and all of them have been amazing. Easy to use site, quick (free) shipping and great quality products. T-shirt Elephant is my go to for custom orders.

I ordered three shirts with separate designs..The turned out great and were received days ahead of the expected delivery date..Their support chat service was extremely helpful as I was developing my order..Will definitely use T-Shirt Elephant again.

They had sent me one of the shirts I ordered.in the wrong size and once I spoke to them about it they fixed it right away. We were on a very tight schedule since I needed the shirt three days from when they had arrived at my door, but they reprinted one right away and I received an email from a customer service rep saying that they had hand delivered the shirt for processing and it would arrive at my house the very next day.
Amazing customer service, great quality shirts, and I can definitely say Im impressed and would like to order from them again if I needed to. Great work and thank you for being so awesome!

Over the years, we've ordered products from Tshirt Elephant, and had great experiences with the longevity and durability of the prints. Ive always been quite happy with the large selection of clotting. However, this year I've ordered a few items, and while most have been ok, the most recent purchase failed expectations. The lightweight hoodie has been washed twice(using the recommended wash temp and always inside out to reduce wash wear) and in just one month,the screen print has begun peeling off small pieces in certain areas. While I do expect standard wear (fading, cracking) of screen product, I do not expect it in one month, and certainly not peeling. I ordered one shirt earlier in the year, and have not had any of the same issue with that one, so I will chalk the new problematic one to a random bad batch. Even though I emailed the company about the issue, their claim is that it was not a significant enough issue, and is standard wear, and no replacement or refund would be issued unless it was a more significant wear issue.
Based on the previous products I would absolutely recommend T Shirt Elephant, for quality and service, but based solely on my most recent purchase and issue, I will not recommend, and will be looking locally next time for my future orders.

Just bought ~$800 worth of sweatshirts. Name placement was horrible, instead of on a sleeve, it was on the bottom of the back in huge letters. Names and roles were printed on one line instead of 2 like in the preview. Also, some sweatshirts' backs were missing. Shipping was delayed and customer support is trash. The date they give is the date they ship, not the date you receive. I was asked to write this review by an email from the horrible company. DEFINITELY would NOT recommend.

I had the worst customer service from Chelsea R. I ordered a 17 sweaters that was 70/30 and 20oz and instead I received 17 sweaters that were 50/50 with an extremely lighter weight. Their policy says if the sweater is out of stock then they have the right to substitute it with a sweater thats of equal or higher quality which what I received was not the value of the sweaters were different as well. The one I ordered was around $18 and the sweaters that I received were around $12.

I would ask specific questions like "Can I have the link to the product I received" and that would be ignored. I also brought up the specifications of the sweaters and that was ignored. I also asked if I could speak to someone of higher authority and that was also ignored.

I used to order sweaters for Ryerson University student groups through T-shirt Elephant and I will not be anymore. Overall my experience was horrible.

Placed my order on April 9th. It's now May 21st and, even after contacting customer service, I STILL haven't received my order. Hopefully,.when it does finally arrive, there are no quality issues. That would just be the icing on the cake.

Update on June 13: Received my order the first week of June. Today, I got a canned response, from the company, about how shipping delays are out of their control. However, when I initially contacted customer service, in May, it had been a month since I placed my initial order..They hadn't even printed my items yet. Hmmmm, do they blame that on Canada Post too?
In terms of printing quality, it's so-so. Out of the 4 items ordered, 2 have excellent printing. Unfortunately, 2 of the prints are of poor quality (red colour is faded with streaks running through it).

Great quality printing and shirts (including an eco-friendly cotton). Easy to use website where I could create my design myself. Very good price, with a helpful low minimum order. Friendly interactions with staff when I had a question about shipping.

I don't have any negative words to say. I've ordered two customized shirts, both with very high quality images. I've also ordered several plain shirts, all of which have been shipped promptly. I'm very impressed with T-Shirt Elephant. Customer Service also never failed to get back to me when I had questions. I highly recommend this company! and I for one will continue buying from them!

We ordered $900 in company hats, on April 20, 2021. Not only have we not received any product, they have not answered emails or phone inquiries for over a month. We would like either a refund or the product but at this point any kind of response to our attempts at communication would be a start.

I custom designed an printed jerseys for a slow pitch team. The design studio felt intuitive and in no time I designed a jersey that looked so good that I couldn't fathom ordering anything else. I called in a few times, and the staff were fantastic. Each time they were able to help and guide the process, and went above and beyond. Shipping was quick. Shirts are very high quality, and the printing turned out great.

I received my first order yesterday and was very impressed by the quality of the t-shirts. Expected shipment date was two weeks but was shipped and delivered within one. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for quality custom apparel!

New customers - beware of the misleading shipping/delivery times and return/cancellation policy on T Shirt Elephant's website. I've now lost $80 on a product I can no longer use. If this happens to you, based on my experience, customer service will not care. I also got the impression that they will likely not clarify these items for future customers as I'm sure the deception gets them additional sales (like myself).

On the shipping/delivery times - I see multiple reviews here saying that the delivery time on the website is misleading, yet the business has done nothing to fix it. I unfortunately didn't see these reviews before I purchased and.it caused me to order a product that I expected for 2 week delivery (it even says "14 day delivery" in my order confirmation), but after reaching out directly to the business I found that the product will only be printed in 14 days, then it will deliver eventually thereafter.

On the return policy - despite the return policy explicitly stating they will consider cancellations due to order error on a case by case basis, they will not. Even if their misleading advertising was the cause of said order error. Once I pointed this out to the customer service rep I was corresponding with (Chelsea), she said that actually this statement only applies to errors in design imagery. Why is that not explicitly mentioned on the website?

Overall - wouldn't recommend purchasing from them. This business doesn't care about its customers and is willing to intentionally deceive them for extra business.

I ordered 4 custom jerseys from them for $71 each and they shipped us a different jersey from what we ordered. When I called them they said they have a policy that states they can ship you "the next closest item" without contacting you if they couldn't get what you wanted. I had to fight them for a refund and in the end only got 50% back. You shouldn't have to call a company to confirm if they have a product that they say they have on the website.

Funny experience, ordered 4 shirts they shipped two. Took 4 weeks to complete half the order they rushed the completion to get me the other two shirts to cover their mistake. A few weeks later ordered from spreadshirt. They completed a 55 T-shirt order and they were delivered in ten days with zero rush fees. Will I order from t shirt elephant again? No, there are far better companies to order from.
I was satisfied with my order however. Hence the 3 stars, but comparatively sub par

1. paid $177 express shipping (items never came), no one notified me either, they refunded me the shipping costs after i called.
2. took 2 days for them to tell me that they had 9/10 jerseys (one was a not for the sport i needed
3. went from Scarborough to the west to physically pick up 9 jerseys (took 30 mins to find my jerseys when i got there)
4. they placed the order for the missing jersey the same day i went to pick up the 9, i later had to come back to the west end location to pick up a single jersey (3 weeks after i was supposed to get my entire order)

Nothing wrong with the jerseys or the people that are working there but they offer 0 compensation for the headaches, not even a credit for future orders, i had to email and call to get answers. I would have appreciated something other then a "sorry sir" through email.

T shirts arrived one day later than tracking originally stated, however it was still earlier than expected, (before 14 days).

They are great!.Sizing looks good. Colour and printed artwork is great.

Will definitely place another order in near future!

Great products. Some items were twice as much as my usual supplier though. (American Apparel Tank Tops).Would love to be able to see where the price breaks are before designing and asking for a quote. Love that mixing colors is an option!.So easy to upload the design. Quick turnaround times too! Request for the review was poorly times, as the items were not scheduled for delivery for another week, but over all I would absolutely use them again, and I have already recommend T-Shirt Elephant to a few people! Planning our summer order now.

I ordered some company logo shirts. During the order process I was emailed saying stock of my selected shirt was not available and they would offer a rotation of a similar product. I agreed. On delivery of the product I relized the rotated shirt was not of similar quality and style. If you do a basic google search you can compare the stiching and fabric weight. Obviously I didn't check that closely when they offered the rotation as I took there word for it. So now I am stuck with a bunch of low quality shirts They are 2 oz less on fabric count. Its not even a close rotation. I don't get how they can just say we reserve the right to rotate as needed. I reserve the right to not except sub par quality.But.I am expected to pay over 500.00 for this? So disapointed. I have ordered from them in the past with good results

I am SO pleased with the professionalism and excellent experience I had with T-Shirt Elephant. I run a film production company located in Regina, Saskatchewan, Canada and we just wrapped on our Feature length film "Mercy." As a way of thanking our crew for doing such a fine job on the film, I thought it would be nice to order them in some good quality shirts. I spent several hours calling local businesses to try and find someone who would be willing to do a quality job for a reasonable rate (one that fit into our budget). I was not successful. I therefore spent an equal amount of time searching online and came across T-Shirt Elephant. I was totally amazed how EASY it was to place my order on-line and all the wonderful options I had, plus the VERY affordable rate they offered as well. Needless to say, I received the order within the amount of time I expected it to arrive and the shirts are very good quality, durable shirts and best of all, the logo I had them place on the front of the shirt was positioned exactly as I requested and the picture they placed on the back of the shirt with the words I required was clear and positioned just as well. THANK YOU T-Shirt Elephant for your excellence!
Very satisfied with the quality and service..Arrived a week early from original fulfillment date..Will order more..Thanks T-Shirt Elephant!

The good news: their shirts are beautiful and very easy to design. The bad news: they charge way too much for shipping; I know it's automatically calculated, but it seems ridiculous to charge me $12.50, then send it as lettermail for $2.95. Then, when I had an issue with the product, I simply asked if I could order another one but pay less shipping. Instead they gave me a discount of 10%, which obviously did not cover the shipping costs. I'm disappointed and going elsewhere for more reasonable prices and better service.

everything was great! a few loose threads but that's ok, they easy pulled out and on one of my hoodies, it's dark grey and the letters are black and it looked a lot more visible on the template than in person

Buyer Beware!

There wasn't a zero rating, otherwise that's what TShirt Elephant would get from me.

I ordered online, uploaded my logo and had proof my order had the logo. When I ordered the products they appeared blank.

I immediately contacted customer service. I have in writing they were going to correct with logo and give me a price on embriodery.

Then I don't hear anything from Chelsea from customer service so I ask for an update. I get no reply. I email again and she tells me they are sending blank items with no logo.

This was the biggest Canadian shopping disappointment.

Love the shirt good quality, however customer service experience was terrible. No one would answer my questions or help me. I had a problem with shipping. Contact method wasn't the best. Order the clothing sure suggested but customer service isn't the best so you can face bad problems with that

The size charts were WAY off, and so we sent them an email with photos proving it and they denied that that was their size chart even though it was their size chart?? So now I have custom shirts that are pretty much dresses and they wouldn't exchange or refund us at all! Definitely don't recommend using this site at all. Fix your size charts! And fix your exchange policy!

I placed an order beginning of June and received my order early-mid July. When the order came there were multiple issues with the prints on the shirts. One was poor quality printing, some had what looked like dried glue on it (that doesn't come out in the wash), and another had the logo noticeably lower than it was ordered.

I reached out to them to voice my dissatisfaction and, after a number of emails back-and-forth, they agreed to re-print the problem ones. Fast forward to September and a number emails sent (no replies) still no t-shirts. I was then informed that the employee I was originally corresponding with no longer worked for them. I was told that my shirts would be ordered and printed.

Enter November. Still no shirts. I emailed them and asked about the status. It appears as though they were never added to the "to print" stack and still weren't printed. They have now been printed and shipped and are scheduled to arrive next week.

I figure 2 stars is fair as the shirts that that were printed were great, but there were far too many little issues along the way to highly recommend them. I love the selection and the price, but waiting almost 6 months to get the proper shirts is too long. Will likely be taking company orders elsewhere in the future.

**UPDATE** I want to be fair in my feedback so here's an update. I got my reprinted shirts and they are exactly what I was hoping for when I originally ordered the shirts. Great quality prints on awesome shirts. All of my issues were addressed (quality, and location of prints). Hopefully others will have better luck getting what they ordered the first time.

I am very pleased with the quality of the t-shirt as well as the design. I am still waiting on my second shirt from my order as something got missed with my order. However I was very happy with how easy it was to get the situation fixed and how quickly they responded back from my email. They were able to give me a couple options on how they could help to make it right. Things sometimes happen but I truly believe that it makes the world of difference on how you get treated or the follow through from company. It will either make or break whether I would order again or not. I will for sure order from them again in the future.

I ordered jerseys for one of my teams (31 people) and the order came out just how I wanted. In my experience the costumer service was very helpful and would respond to my questions in less than 24 hours. The delivery came on time with all jerseys accounted for. I would defiantly order from this company again the next time I needed custom t-shirts or jerseys.

I ordered 25 t-shirts from T-Shirt Elephant and although I didn't receive all of the t-shirts I ordered, the customer service was really great, very understanding, and promptly fixed the mistake. The rest of the t-shirts came 6 days (4 business days) later after I had notified customer service. The t-shirts are good quality and I'm sure I'll be ordering from them again in the future.

Positive:
- user friendly website
- decent quality,fair prized t-shirts
So so:
- delivery time as promised, but slower than others we have used
- print quality is fine, but again not at par with another company we have used. Colors in particular are a bit dull, but overall nice.
Recommendations for improvements:
- It would be nice to separate/pack shirts individually or least organise them by color/size in the package.
I think T-Shirt elephant needs a bit of extra touch to really shine.
Hope this review is of use.
I ordered 22 shirts. They were done, shipped, and at my door within 2 weeks. All shirts were true to size and the design and print were perfect! I'll be ordering again real soon! :)

I purchased an order of tank tops with my business logo on it a few weeks ago. When the order came in the mail, I immediately noticed that the quality was fantastic however the colours printed on the shirt were not the same as my business logo. I contacted them right away and they looked into the issue and made me a completely new batch of shirts. The shirts came in today and I couldn't be happier. Not many businesses would go above and beyond like this for their customers! I'm very happy with the level of costumer service and quality of the product. Thank you T-Shirt Elephent!

My experience so far with T-shirt Elephant has been great; packages arrive a few days earlier than estimated, the t-shirts and other items I post my design on looked great and exact, its' flexibility in how you would like to pay for your things, and the great customer service.

The only thing that's keeping it from a full 5 Stars are the spike in prices for when you put on a design onto an item, and its' lack of variety of said items in its' inventory.

Other than those, it's a great site to work with.

I was asked to leave a review before receiving the product which is a little strange so I can't review the product itself yet but I can review the service so far. The website states 14 day free shipping however I had to still pay 12.50 in shipping fees for some reason and have yet to receive anything. It has also been almost 14 business days, I live in Montreal and not too far from where the company is located and because I had to end up paying 12.50 in shipping even though the website says otherwise, it's very dissapointing to wait this long for a single shirt after paying 12.50 for shipping when it was and still is advertised as free. Really hoping the shirt ends up being worth the trouble.

Update: The shirt finally arrived on the 14th business day after ordering and I absolutely love it, great quality and was worth the wait however their customer service has been awful. All attempts to receive an answer for my problem above have been ignored and forgotten about even though the same 14 day free shipping is still on their website. Because of that, the shirt ended up costing me twice as much as it would of having ordered it from somewhere else all because I was scammed out of free shipping. The lack of care and response shows me they don't value the smaller customers as much as they do bigger companies and corporations. Good product, bad customer service. With the shipping issue my single shirt came to over 50$ and although it's nicely done, that is absurd pricing and I can get the same thing done anywhere else for cheaper all because I was charged 12.50 for 'free shipping'. Make sure the stuff you advertise works and if it dosen't, don't ignore your smaller customer complaints for weeks. Just because I'm only ordering 1 shirt now dosen't mean I won't want 100 one day and based off how much I've been shown your company cares about these kind of issues I would definitely get them done somewhere else. I need to know I can trust the company should something end up going wrong-you've had a month to reply and nothing so. ultimately a good product but uncaring customer service. I will be going somewhere else next time that advertises promotions correctly.
Excellent service and the product quality is amazing. I will definitely be printing more of my designs using T-Shirt Elephant in the future!

T-Shirt Elephant does not stand behind their products..They take no accountability for ensuring the posted sizing charts reflect actual sizes..As a result, I received my order where sleeve length was 2.5 inches shorter than published sizing..T-Shirt Elephant's response was that they take no accountability for garment sizes. Would encourage T-Shirt Elephant to reconsider their approach to customer satisfaction and ensure a more reliable supply chain.

Got 9 basic T-shirts with 1 line of text across the chest, for around 14$ each. The website was a bit badly designed for this because you had to go back and forth from the design board to the cart to estimate total prices.
I chose the cheapest black T-shirt for this design so it is pretty poor quality in terms of thread count (that's on me). However I did expect the printed text to turn out better/more opaque. Also the printed text is crooked (as in slightly diagonal across the chest) on one T-shirt.
I received the order about 2.5 - 3 weeks after ordering (which is pretty much the time frame they said). So if you order from here, make sure you aren't on a tight deadline!

Was very excited to receive my first order until I opened it and discovered that the sizing is all wrong. I immediately emailed the company with my issue and was very impressed with how they handled the situation. I look forward to receiving the new t-shirts in the near future and if they fit properly, I'll be ordering more in the near future.

This is the first time I'd ever order a set of shirts and I'm, very please with the quality! I ordered 18 black baseball shirts with a full colour logo and names on the back. I'm please to say the logo on the front is not an iron one and it is very soft to wear. The sizes run a bit large (they are unisex) but I'm super please that I was able to use this Canada company as they gave me a great product, in my price range ($17 a shirt), as well as amazing shipping time!

I happened to see a blank that I thought was perfect for my etsy store. I'm always hesitant to purchase from some place that I've not heard of before because I've been scammed. HOWEVER..tshirt elephant had something I really wanted so I ordered it. The shirts arrived in record time. Customer service is super friendly and helpful and the quality is way better than anything I've had printed before.

I ordered a few t-shirts for my new business venture..I emailed them after placing my order to ask them to ensure everything was centered..They were more than helpful and the shirts look great! The shirts came earlier than expected and the quality is amazing! I will definitely order from T-Shirt Elephant again!

I used T-Shirt Elephant to order jerseys for a softball tournament, and I couldn't have been more pleased with the experience.
I procrastinated and left placing the order to a point that T-Shirt Elephant's 14 day shipping guarantee would have had us receiving the jerseys on the day we left for the tournament. I was super happy to have the shirts arrive a few days early!
The quality of the shirts were beyond what we expected, the entire team was super happy with the jerseys we received. The jerseys were comfortable and we looked good at the same time!
The product we received from T-Shirt Elephant was convenient, affordable, and of great quality!
I have since recommended using T-Shirt Elephant to others and I will definitely be using T-Shirt Elephant many more times in the future!

Really awesome web tool compared to competitors. Variety of high quality shirts at reasonable cost even if it is low volume order..Quick and helpful , responsive staff to settle concerns. And to top it off: very reasonable turnaround time to get the shirts to your door on time..Will use this company again for future orders indeed.

First time designing and ordering custom shirts and it couldn't have been easier..The hardest part was figuring out what I wanted as they offer so many great design ideas..My small custom order of ladies tank tops was shipped in less than a week and the shirts were perfect..The whole process exceeded expectations.

The customer service was beyond what was expected..They were amazing. The t-shirts were beautifully done and the cotton a very good quality. They arrived very quickly.
I wanted women's v-neck and they fit rather small..If I had it to do again I would order a size larger because I am past the age where showing every lump is attractive.

I ordered a custom t shirt from them on Dec. 21,2019 for a gift,.they say they shipped it Jan 06, as of Jan 17, still have not received it, they told me to contact Canada Post, I asked them to Print another one and I would pick it up, they told me they would not do anything for me. They didn't even offer to print another one for a reduced price! They said it's not their problem. Unbelievable $55. And embarrassment.

I absolutely LOVE T-Shirt Elephant. Their professionalism, helpfulness, quick on delivery and quality of printing is exceptional. We have been working with them for the past 4 years and love them dearly. Wouldn't give my business to anyone else.

I had ordered a t-shirt as part of a campaign. I was provided with a delivery date for my t-shirt, but when it did not arrive I reached out to Customer Service via email. I was told my order was never processed due to a glitch in the system. I was told that my order was re-processed and would be shipped out "rush" and that I would be provided with tracking information.

I never received an email containing tracking information. I reached out once again via email regarding my order and was told that they are unable to track my order because they entered the tracking information into their system incorrectly and could not provide me with a way to track my order.

Since my re-processed order could not be found, my order was re-printed and shipped once again. I finally received my order 1 month after the expected delivery date and after several emails and phone calls with the company.

The t-shirt that I received was also printed incorrectly. The front of the shirt was the correct design, however the back of the shirt had the wrong design. I chose not to reach out to T-Shirt Elephant regarding the misprinted shirt since it took nearly a month of communication with their customer service to get the one I received.

I probably won't be ordering anything from them in the future.

first order used their tshirt designer and they didnt print the backside for whatever reason i attempted to reach out but customer support blamed it on me and offered a pathetic %10 percent discount on my next order. Cant say ive enjoyed my experience with them and wont be using that discount anytime soon.

I received my uniform articles today from t shirt elephant. While I was not happy with the duration of the process and shipment taking so long , I quickly forgot when I opened up the package. Great quality material for my jersey polos and hoody. The logo is super clear and bright. Definitely ordering from them again in the near future . Highly recommend these guys

I have never experienced such IRRESPONSIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. We had a terrible customer service experience with this company and we will not be ordering from them again. We placed a large order which they 1) delivered to the billing address instead of the shipping address - and claimed no responsibility. 2) some of the merchandise had incorrect printing so cannot be used and ONCE AGAIN the company has taken 0 responsibility. We were very clear that our order was the first in a series of repeat orders, and they gave us 0 responses. We will place all future orders with another company that actually cares about client services,.AND, we will highly dis-recommend this company to our colleagues.

Placed our first order of shirts for our gym with T-shirt Elephant and we are very happy with how everything turned out..Online design and ordering process was easy to go through, shirts arrived earlier than expected and the quality of the shirts we ordered and print quality turned out great..We will be ordering again soon!

I loved the quality of the shirts. Customer service was fantastic. My email inquiry was replied to within the hour. Also, my order arrived a week before the predicted arrival date. I will definitely use this company again.

Great experience to order our shirts for our annual event..We had a bit of a hiccup this year, but was handled well and look after right away..Great products, and customer service with Chelsea was wonderful. We will be back next year!

I bought what I thought were premium tshirts and when I got them I was disappointed that the shirts were very rough, ichy and had a strong chemical smell. I tried to wash them but they didn't get softer. I was disappointed with the quality of these products, will not order again.

Horrible service. I will never use this company again. My order arrived weeks after the original estimated delivery date. The artwork on my order was done in the wrong colour and no one will communicate with me. I have called and left several messages (no one answers their phone).

We've ordered from this company twice now, and will be again soon. We love the quality product and the fast delivery! Our last order was an order of polo shirts and they are fairly small to size so I'm not sure if they are going to fit our staff.

Website was easy to use and created my custom T-shirts..Great that they let you buy in small amounts as not everyone wants 250 shirts!.Delivery was quick and shorts are good quality..I would recommend them to anyone looking to make custom t-shirts.

Early on we had great customer service as we set up our store with T-Shirt Elephant. Then when we had some problems they stopped responding to emails, never answered calls, etc. We're still trying to figure out why we were told an order of 4 had 3 items listed in our payout, why we're missing over $100 in payouts, and other annoyances that we simply don't get responses to. There are some clear managment issues I We'll be migrating away from this company.
.

Original review:

I work for a non-profit and T-Shirt Elephant has provided outstanding customer service, from the ability to choose both low cost and ethically-sourced apparel items to Rachel's incredible efforts to make our products look great and be available quickly. I've worked with various on-demand printers and drop shippers, and I can't recommend T-Shirt Elephant highly enough!

Received our tshirt order today..Exceeded my expectations to say the least - the colours and print quality are great and the shirt quality and material were higher than I anticipated for the low price we paid..Delivery was more than a week earlier than order stated..I would recommend and order from here again.

Great selection of garments, excellent review process and super fast shipping. We ordered 100 shirts with front, back, and side arm printing. It was all done correctly and shipped on time. Very happy!

I had a bad experience with this company. I ordered 20 black t-shirts with a pocket size design in the front. They ship to PO Box addresses through Canada Post, so I proceeded to do that. Unfortunately Canada Post went on strike. Instead of letting me know, this company proceeded to ship my package with UPS (UPS does not ship to PO Box addresses). I had to solve the issue and pay for the change of address.

Once I received the t-shirts, the company had messed up two of the sizes. We ordered an XL and XXL t-shirts but the XL t-shirt was larger than the XXL and the XXL was the same size as a M t-shirt. Also the logo on 3 t-shirts were faded. I contacted the company, as usual they were very quick to answer and after a few email exchanges they agreed to send us back the proper size for XL and XXL but this did not come without them putting the blame on their t-shirt supplier. Which is unprofessional because T-shirt Elephant should be the one doing quality control and making sure that what they ship out is correct - this a service that they're selling.

Once they agreed to ship the two t-shirts, I requested that they send to a ‚Äònormal' address to avoid the PO Box issue and they confirmed with me that they did. A week later, my package said that it had arrived but I got no package. Fortunately we tracked down the package, and guess what, it was sent to the PO Box address before. This was too much trouble for 20 t-shirts.

Order a custom t-shirt with text and made an error in the original ordered. Then I sent an email to customer service less than an hour later, within 10 minutes I sent the email. No response. Multiple emails and calls over the next several days no response. Called the customer service line several times no one answers due to covid. But several emails later still no answer. Instead they sent the wrong order and the new corrected ordered, charged me for both and the new one looks 100 years old after one wash. Absolutely garbage company. Terrible customer service. Terrible product. Don't waste your money.

I've ordered twice from them and had a great experience both times. Shirts came in a day earlier than projected. Customer service was great both times too (Thank you Rebecca). I recommend to anyone in Canada looking for a local T shirt company, you won't be disappointed. Thanks T Shirt Elephant!

I have placed a few orders in the last couple months and all of them have come out great. They have a great online design platform that is easy to use and you can design a shirt with no experience previous.

The shirts were made and shipped out within a couple of days, and shipping took a couple days at the most within the GTA.

They claim that you will have the shirts within 14 days, but I didn't wait any longer than a week on any occasion.

Anyone up for some class-action? Terrible customer service!

Before ordering I emailed the company and explicitly told them I would not place the order if it took 14 days. In writing, they said it would only take 7 days. I received my order 2 months later! Well past the birthday I needed it for. I made a complaint and they refused to offer any kind of refund or even a discount. Then they would not let me speak to a manager and just started ignoring my emails. Can't get thru by phone. What a Mickey Mouse company.

Ordered 14 t-shirts for some friends and they showed up way quicker than expected. Because of the price i was a little skeptical on the quality that I was going to receive but once I opened the package I was very impressed with the quality. The logo on the front was done exactly how I wanted it and was not put on cheaply like some other t shirts I have received from other companies.
I have ordered custom tshirts for my dad for Christmas two years in a row now and am always impressed and satisfied with the amazing quality. I will use this service again and again!

Unfortunately I have to give 1 star, the printing is amazing and done exactly the way I ask and the girl in customer service was also very nice and patient with me.

The problem is the size and the quality of the sweatshirt,.I order an XL mens because I'm 5'9 and I'm a fit person, but it fits a little tight I find and the arms are not long enough.also after wearing it only one day I started getting fluff balls all over the sweater and underneath the arms , I really hate that, when I contacted again the customer service I told them about it and the girl said that I didn't wash it properly,.it's funny because I didn't wash it I wear it the same day i got it and i never wash it yet!

Anyways i guess it's not there fault for the clothes, maybe they should change manufacture,.but the printing and the look is amazing!

Just received my order yesterday!.Superb service and quick turnaround..Me and my wife both love our shirts..I found their service to be the most worth it for no-minimum orders..Definitely would use them again.

Customer Service was excellent! Prompt replies to emails and they were very helpful in editing our image. Jason was wonderful to work with. We ordered black t-shirts and the quality and price was great! Would definitely work with this company again.

Fast service/ turn around time, and fair prices. But poor quality.
First batch did not have the correct colour/ saturation on the prints which were corrected and reshipped. The new batch has a slight size variation from the size on the print but nothing to complain about.

I've been wearing my product before the release and only after a handful of washes the print is falling apart. Contacted customer support/ management but they advised that there was no issues.

I've ordered employee uniforms from T-Shirt Elephant twice now. On both occasions, the service has been seamless from start to finish. Much more affordable than my previous supplier for good quality uniforms. Free Shipping is an added bonus! 5/5.

You email me and want me to write a review when the item hasn't even been delivered?
Sure, here goes:
I placed an order hoping it would arrive by Christmas. T-Shirt Elephant said Delivery Date of December 19. I thought: hey, that's enough buffer that it'll arrive by Christmas.
But they MEAN that THEY deliver it to Canada Post on that date. It's now December 30 at the item won't arrive until tomorrow.
If you want to be honest with your customers, it should read Estimated Shipping Date.
Who knows, maybe eventually when the item arrives it'll be worth the wait.
But seriously, how difficult is it to write Estimated Shipping Date instead?? You'll piss off fewer customers.

For Emphasis: ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE.

One might think it reasonable to assume that the method of shipping chosen by T-Shirt Elephant would have the best interests of the consumer in mind.
Based on my experience, this doesn't appear to be the case..Because they chose letter mail there is no way to track shipping..As a result, the package hasn't been delivered and their response is 'sorry, can't help you'..My suggestion then?.Don't walk away, run away from T-Shirt Elephant.

I am very pleased with the quality of the customized apron I ordered from T-Shirt Elephant..I ordered it in the first week of December, but unfortunately it was not delivered in time for Christmas and arrived on December 31st..It was for my son and so we were a little disappointed with the delay.

Poor customer relations. I had a webstore setup through them to sell my t-shirts to my clients online, which took countless hours to create, only to discover a few months ago that they took it down or closed it without informing me. When I reached out to the support staff I received no response.

Also, there were many many print issues throughout the process which has led me to believe this is an amateur company with lack of knowledge, support and quality control. Avoid.

I would definitely recommend this company. My shirts looked exactly the way I designed them. I chose a style for running which was a very comfortable and light fabric. I also received it sooner than the estimated shipping date which was a really nice surprise.

Jason and team at t shirt elephant are amazing! Quick, efficient and incredibly knowledgeable. Jason has gone out of his way to make sure our product was delivered quickly and to the hugest standard. Highly recommended.
Ordered shirts for my baseball team, awesome jerseys! Came on time with customer numbers on the back. Would recommend.

I recently ordered nine shirts from t-shirt elephant with one of my drawings printed on them and I was very pleased. After having received my order and seeing the quality of the print I immediately ordered more! The shipping is fast, the prices are great and the quality is good!

Thanks T-Shirt Elephant, I will continue order more products from you!

Can't say enough great things about my experience. I'll keep it short. GREAT price. Bought 17 shirts X2 for baseball team. Received proper sizes, and #'s. Design was perfect. FAST SHIPPING! communication was great. When I sent an email, I had a response right away. Quality is also great. I.will be back yearly for new team shirts, and will be adding hats, hoodies also.

Thanks guys.

I recently ordered a custom printed hoodie..Both the quality of the hoodie and the quality of the print were excellent..The order arrived earlier than the.estimated date they provided..There was an issue with the location of the print..When I wrote T-Shirt Elephant about it they responded in about 2 hours..After a brief and professional conversation over email they offered a suitable solution..Overall it was a good experience, but be cautious if you have a critical and time sensitive order in case a reprint is required.

Very disappointed with the service. Was suppose to receive something prior to Christmas and it hasn't even been printed yet. I had lots of options and would have liked to be informed of delay. When I asked for a refund they said no as they had pulled the hoodie and just continues to say they were trying to keep safe. I get it, but again, I should have been informed that was the case prior to completing my order.
