I used T-Shirt Elephant to order custom hoodies for my volleyball team..I found using their design tool fairly easy and like the pre-made templates..The price was reasonable and our orders came ahead of schedule..The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because when I was given the computer-generated quote, I wanted to confirm the price with a person so I could be certain of cost before asking athletes to purchase, and found there to be a price discrepancy..Overall though, I was pleased with the quality of service and product, and will most likely use them again.

As long as there are no issues T-Shirt Elephant offers great services. However in case you have an issue like in my case where a jersey for hockey-team was incorrectly printed; you are being sent on a wild-goose-chase, hence the two star review. Customer Service over the phone will tell you need to send an email as they can't deal with it (?you are CUSTOMER service?). These emails are getting lost apparently as miraculously two of my emails to the same address I have sent all other inquiries to didn't make it to their inbox. very strange. So here I am running out of time as I need the jersey reprinted until the end of the month (2 weeks out) and since customer service doesn't feel responsible and emails are getting answered sparingly; I have little hopes to get this issue actually resolved. Hoping T-Shirt elephant improves their grade of customer service. (learn something from e-commerce giants like walmart or amazon)
UPDATE:
changing this to a 1-star review for several reasons:
- none of the above has been rectified, same issue with an order from October 22nd has still not been resolved.
- I'm not getting any answers from customer service other than "we'll ship it when ready" or "we are really busy" (all I want is an updated shipping date)
- meanwhile I'm still getting promotional emails from t-shirt elephant, trying to increase their overall order-volume. - WHY? they are not able to truly satisfy the customers they already have and want more volume?
Conclusion: I'm buying new hockey jerseys for several teams every year and will not try t-shirt elephant again.

Received received my first order..The logo I had printed onto a t-shirt was an odd size and the T-Shirt Elephant software handled it perfectly..I am very pleased with both the service and quality of the product.

Was really impressed with how easy the software to design the shirts was. Also they made an error with my order but when I contacted them about it they were quick to admit the mistake and send me a corrected order still in time for my event. I was very impressed with the customer service to fix my issue.

Totally ordering again. Ordered two Gildan hoodies both with a large printed image on them. AMAZING quality. Fits a little small but not by much. I am generally a size small in tops but I like huge fits and so i ordered an XL which seems to me like a large so I would order a size up if you are ordering true to your own size. I live in Canada but after the order had shipped my package came within 3 days.

We have ordered from T-Shirt Elephant a number of times and never have a complaint. The tanks and tees are always great quality and our event participants love them! We also love that we can purchase any quantity and any size at a GREAT rate which is sooooo important for a small charity like us! Thanks T-Shirt Elephant!

They are very slow in returning emails and they have made several errors with my orders.Twice they let me down on important orders that I needed and was promised would be delivered by a certain date. I let several mistakes go, but I reached my limit when my last order was missing one item and after 2 months I still haven't received a refund or the missing item, even though I followed up about it several times. On the plus side, I have been happy with the quality of items I have received. I won't be using them again.

I'll start by saying that T-Shirt Elephant has the best customer service that I have come across in a long while. Special thanks to Rebecca who promptly fixed a slight design error on my last order. The quality of the t-shirts as well as the finished product are excellent. I definitely give this business the highest marks and would/will recommend them to anyone that needs any kind of.t-shirt design.

Ordered 2 custom hoodies from the Redwood Classics line. SO IMPRESSED! The cut of the hoodie is awesome, really well made and great quality. The print job was excellent. I am really happy and will definitely be ordering again. So pleased to support a Canadian business and supplier!

The website is really fun to work with.
There is also a huge selection of apparel.

I deduce 1 star for an error on my order, albeit a free reprint was promptly ordered when I emailed them.

The customer service was fast, courteous and easy to contact.

Ordered clothing for my business November 22nd, in time for their Christmas orders. I was given a two week delivery time. It is now one day until christmas, and the order is still in transit. This means that many of my clients will not be receiving their orders they had put in, in plenty of time!

I've never left a bad review before, and hate to leave one. but this is my second poor experience with T-shirt elephant.

This is my second time ordering from T-shirt Elephant. The first time the product was over two weeks delayed, with no contact with the company possible as they do not answer the phone at all and rarely return emails. When I did get them to respond back, they had misplaced the order and only began production because I had kept emailing. However, my brother had a good experience with them, so I decided to try with them again. I have placed an order and am currently in the midst of once again trying to get a hold of them in regards to the submitted logo and whether the image quality is good enough for them to work with. Again, no email response, phone rings until the voicemail tells you to email them. Going to have to cancel the order directly through my credit card rather than deal with them

Great jersey quality, full colour logo print and prompt service. I couldn't find any other site that was willing to print less than 12 jerseys and in full colour (let alone an affordable price). I'd highly recommend this company

WOW! I had a really really tight deadline. I called them to discuss the issue. They said it was a non-issue. And they managed to ship way before I could even start thinking of maybe somehow become stressed ;-) We ordered 2 jackets for roughly 300$ and were worried about the print and design quality we'd get (after seeing results from other companies). Opening the box, we were just so amazed. Best customer support and printing quality!

This is company runs out of a big factory that produces tshirts for several other companies. If you are ordering a one off, I am sure you will fine. But buyer beware, you likely wont see the same quality product twice. Their customer.

I placed my order then was told that shirt was not in stock..This took 3 days to let me know..Then I picked another shirt and they were delivered on time except they were all adult size when I ordered youth!.I brought this their attention and although they fixed the situation the second batch was shipped and did not arrive for the basketball camp..All they did was apologize and give me 10% off next order..Weak!

Huge waste of money and financial blow to the charity they were ordered for. Ordered large order of hats for a charity to help fundraise. First off, their website falsely advertises "14 day free shipping". Turns out, this does not refer to their shipping at all but production time (as told in an email from them AFTER it was too late to upgrade shipping time). So our order did not arrive on time for the event. Beyond missing out on sales at this event, the hat quality is very mediocre. Parts of the writing are completely illegible, and you can barely tell what the design is. At around $20/hat, one would expect much better quality that something that looks like it was purchased off Aliexpress for $5. I contacted the company prior to ordering on 3 separate occassions to make sure the design would turn out well, and that I would change it if it was too detailed. On all three occassions I was told it would turn out great. Contacted T-Shirt Elephant prior to writing this review, and they said they would do nothing unless threads were loose despite the hats not even being legible. Save yourself the risk and order off Aliexpress or Alibaba ‚Äì at least you won't be losing 5x the investment when the quality turns out mediocre.

T-Shirt Elephant helped my company with all the questions we had! Sade, the customer service representative that helped me with my order, was very helpful and patient with my questions. We are very pleased with the outcome with our order. It was an added bonus that they were completed and delivered two weeks before the expected date given. Thanks for everything T-shirt Elephant! Definitely ordering from you again! :)

NO STARS

I've never had such poor and dishonest customer service..My merchandise was shipped out but stolen before I could receive it..Canada Post confirmed to have reimbursed TShirt Elephant for the products and shipping and after a solid 6 months of communications..they have yet to reprint, reimburse or act in any way that would make their client not only happy, but actually have the products paid for in hand..I do not recommend TSHIRT Elephant.

The shirts were produced great but shipping and customer service was pretty bad. I ordered 8 different products and spent a fair amount of time and money on these designs. They told me I would receive the shirts by Dec 26 and I received them 2 weeks after that. When I talked to them, they just told me that they had a lot of orders so couldn't get to it. My opportunity to present these gifts was gone by the time I received them and I am pretty disappointed.

Very prompt replies from the shipping department; be careful to check your junk mail as they may put a hold on your order if its a big one (they will ask for a copy of your credit card and license to be sent before proceeding). They do not call you to advise you of this "hold". Despite this hiccup, I asked for a delivery date and my order was received well before this. Product is of good quality; I received the wrong colour but the company was very fair in finding a resolution. Overall, some improvements could be made but I am happy with the overall experience.
Used T-Shirt Elephant to create custom gear for our team. I found them very helpful every step of the way and they delivered us a great product.

Great customer experience. The front-end web-based ordering system is streamlined with friendly and intuitive UI/UX. Superb customer service -- I had a few extra shirts to add the day after placing the order. I called and a representative immediately picked up, said no problem to my request, and the extra order was immediately processed. The shirts arrived nearly 2 weeks earlier than quoted and the print quality is great. Both orders arrived together in the same box and there were no errors in the quantity or type. All 30+ people who placed orders are very happy with the final product. One minor improvement they could make would be to include easy to find sizing charts on their website, but all product codes were clearly identified so it was easy to find them externally. Would definitely recommend T-Shirt Elephant to anyone ordering custom printed clothing items in the extended Golden Horseshoe.

I was extremely pleased with my order and the service from tshirt elephant. Needed some themed shirts printed for our Greys Anatomy viewing nights and the group loved them! Will be re-ordering when Survivor starts back up :)

This had the potential to be a 5-star review and me not reccomending promotique.ca over them.
I had 2 issues with my first order.
#1 As you can see in the picture I ordered Royal blue tshirts. Although they are nice shirts they are far from the royal blue pictured on the site. When I emailed to tell them they sent me replacements at no cost, awesome. When I got the replacements, they were the exact same. There response this time was "sorry they don't look like the picture on our site but that's them." so, problem not solved.
#2 I ordered the "missy fit" ladies t-shirts for ladies of my gym to workout in. Being workout shirts the last thing I wanted was a heavy shirt. I recieved the shirts and they feel like they're made of burlap, the tag says heavy cotton. The problem is that it doesn't say heavy cotton anywhere on the shirts page. I just checked again now. Their solution to this was to tell me they can't (don't want to).do reprints or refunds due to customer error.
At least the sweaters I ordered were nice.

To whoever reads this from T-shirt elephant, I would be happy to change this to a 5-star review if you at the very least reprint the ladies tshirts on something lighter.
I have spent thousands of dollars with Promotique and will have to go back them if I can't trust your website and customer service.

Hi there. I just received my order by mail today. The logo design was a bit lower than I expected. I wanted it a bit closer to the neckline. Also, for the sizes, I ordered a medium in maroon from the same The Authentic Company T-shirt Company (Ladies dry-fit style) with my school's name and volleyball logo a few years ago but was smaller than the one I got today. Perhaps it shrinks in the wash? Anyways, next time I will have to order XS and S as well as fix the positioning of the logo.

I've ordered these shirts before. The ATC baseball jerseys are great quality.
I wasn't super happy with the print this time though. The colours were faded and not the right tone.
It would be good if there was an extra proofing step before they are manufactured.

Awesome company. The site is so easy to use and customizable. Price was also the cheapest around, no other company even came close to be honest. Order arrived exactly on time. Unfortunately, one jersey had light ink stains on the front, however after emailing right away, I was offered to be sent a new one ASAP. Great customer service, definitely recommending to all.

DO NOT order from this company if you expect quality customer service. I placed an extremely large bulk order for apparel that was printed horribly, not to order, with particles visibly trapped underneath the vinyl. When I reached out to ask for help getting it fixed, I was told they would not reprint or refund my order or help in any way. What I am stuck with is completely unusable and my small business is now out thousands of dollars in the middle of a global pandemic.

A family member has placed an order for a few hundred bucks..Ordered in mid November with estimated shipped out by Dec 4th which was supposed to be in time for Chanukah..Of course they charged her..Still waiting and it's Dec 10th. No one will answer the phone, despite the number on webpage being the way to contact them according to their website. Haven't responded to emails about timeline (after a token initial 1st email response - now they've gone dark). Won't respond to Facebook..Won't call us apparently because they are working from home during COVID (guess they are too "busy" to figure out how to block their number on their cell phones to call from a private number)..This reeks of being shady..If you're a big big order maybe they're fine..If you have a small order they take your money and forget about you until.well who knows?! I'd like to give them the benefit of the doubt and believe that this isn't a total scam. I'd like to believe that, as I scramble to find an alternate Chanukah gift for my soon-to-be dissapointed 6 year old..We chose them because they are local..Big mistake..Better to choose someone reputable.

I guess their other reviewers, most with conveniently one or 2 or few other Google reviews, think otherwise..Shady. One person wrote about buying their "entire T shirt collection" from them..For that person's single only review..Oh yeah, that sounds legit, esp for a custom printing shop. I mean, who doesn't buy all their T shirts as custom prints, right!?!?!.Beware of these guys. If I were you, I'd consider shopping elsewhere..As for my family member, well, 2 more days and then we're calling VISA. what a headache.

Will never use again. I was told by a live chat rep that if I placed my order prior to December 5th that I would arrive in time for Christmas. I went ahead and placed a single order on December 3rd and Today is December 30th and I have still received nothing. An email was sent out on the 19th saying it would arrive in 2-4 business days, and I'm still sitting here waiting. Extremely disappointing that T-shirt Elephant doesn't stay true to their promises and shocked that they have prompted me to write a review before I have even received the product.

T-Shirt elephant is amazing! They sponsored our non profit event and provided complimentary t-shirts to volunteers, attendees and speakers. Jason was very helpful and responsive to the design we wanted. The prints on the shirts were high quality and items were shipped within a few days. Definitely highly recommended.

Do not order from this company. My entire order of shirts were missing their designs. After multiple attempts, customer service was sporadic on their responses, and relatively slow. They claim that they are "Canada's leading source for custom apparel", but based on my current experience, this doesn't seem entirely truthful.

I was eventually able to get into contact with customer service, and after shipping the original misprinted shirts back to the company, the issue was mostly resolved. The "corrected" shirts were still not a direct match to the order.

A thoroughly positive experience, from the design and ordering process right through to delivery. The website was intuitive to use for uploading a personalized design, and there is a very good choice of good-quality products. Customer service responded quickly and efficiently to questions, and I was really pleased with the end product when it arrived.

I decided to give t-shirt elephant a try for printing company logo t-shirts..The prices were reasonable and you can buy small quantities..The two stars were given because when the pre-paid order arrived, they didn't ship most of the order..When I checked our account on their website, they had closed out the order indicating it was complete.
The bottom line is they didn't notice they hadn't completed my order and when I contacted them to fix it, they were extremely casual about the mistake and fixing it.
Lastly, I tried calling to get some information prior to placing the order, but the person answering the phones barely cares and sure didn't try to make it easier to do business. Still waiting for the forgotten portion of the order but the shirts that did arrive are fine.

I have ordered several times through this site (I think 6 times all together) and have noticed a substantial decrease in quality in my last couple of orders..My most recent order, a set of black sweaters with white and pink lettering for my rugby team was a huge disappointment. The ink used to screen the lettering on is translucent so instead of white and bright pink the letters are grey and sad pink. There was clearly no quality check before printing them or sending them out because you only need to glance at it to see they look like trash. I was offered no assistance by T-shirt elephant to remedy the situation as it is not a printing error ( they don't cover poor quality I guess).
I won't order from this company again and I will be contacting my friends to retract any previous recommendations I might have made. So much for supporting canadian businesses. Very disappointing.

A big thank you to TE and Rebecca in Customer Service. We ordered 50 hats and 50 T-Shirts. The T-Shirts arrive very quickly and were perfect. The hats experienced a delay HOWEVER when they learned about our Customer Event, TE rallied to ensure we had the Hats before Event. Great value and great Customer Service.

T-Shirt Elephant is fantastic!.In August, I was approaching our huge annual, charity fundraiser, and less than 2 weeks away, our original t-shirt vendor fell through..Jason quickly provided a quote and confirmed he would be able to have our t-shirts ready within the short turnaround time (colour, brand, print type.everything the other vendor said they couldn't do, T-Shirt Elephant quickly confirmed they could!)..The T-shirts looked fantastic, and dealing with Jason was super easy and stress-free..In addition, shout-outs to the wonderful, and helpful nature of their team.when I arrived to pick-up the t-shirts, I had some car trouble..Jason took time out of his work day to help me with the problem, and found a co-worker who generously lent me his CAA card to call for help..I sincerely appreciate this company's professional abilities to provide quality products/services to their customers, as well as their friendly, personable attitude and approach to how they treat their customers..I will definitely refer other people to this great company!

I ordered two types of shirts, one of them I was not happy with. I tried to ask for information on returns on many occasions but have not heard back. Now I am stuck with shirts I do not want. I will not order from you again.

How is T-Shirt Elephant still running as a business? I ordered 2 sweaters with a very simple logo. It was literally just a word with a black border around the font. I'm not a graphic designer so when I put the logo on the hoodie in the design, I zoomed in and saw that there were white pixels outside of the black font. I emailed their customer service to ask them to make sure that the white pixels be removed, as well as the space in the letter O of the logo to be empty, so that the colour of the hoodie is visible in that space. I was vaguely assured that "their designers will review the design before it goes into production" So I agreed and thought since this is a professional business, they know what they're doing. Low and behold, after receiving the order, the logo is exactly what I didn't want. The space in the O still has a background, and there are pixels around the black font. The font of the logo was supposed to be white but its a grey distressed shade of white. Clearly, their "designers" didn't review anything and just printed the logo as is in an off-white font.

I emailed customer customer service with their reply about the designers checking the product before production and was told the order falls within our acceptable print guidelines and there will be no refund or reprints. Even though they advised me that they would review the design to make sure my requests were fulfilled. There were no emails sent to me asking if it was ok to print, or that they weren't able to remove the pixels.

Lesson learned - don't have faith in a 'company' with so many bad reviews. You would think giving a company your business and money would warrant some kind of respect during a pandemic but they don't care at all. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY

T-Shirt Elephant used to be my go-to for printing shirts and sweaters, but has since gone downhill. by a landslide.

I first ordered from them a few times, printing my own designs on t-shirts and hoodies. I appreciated their wide selection of products and the quality of printing was quite good, even after multiple washes. As others have stated, shipping times are a little misleading but it never bothered me too much at the time since I was not on a deadline and/or would order early enough that it would still get to be on time despite delays. It was odd as some orders would arrive REALLY early, or quite late. There wasn't much consistency in this department.

What really got to me was when I started a webstore with them - at first, things were going great as the staff took their time to explain how this would work, answered all questions, and communication was open at all times. However, after partnering for some time and with some changes in their staffing, orders for clients were getting misprinted so I had to personally reorder it for them for reprints (time-consuming and annoying), and eventually, the person who was on their end just stopped replying emails completely. I literally have been chasing them for my commissions from Aug and Sept of 2019, which are STILL NOT PAID TO ME. RIDICULOUS. The last email they sent me was to say that they are changing structure and how the webstores work, and that they'll "update all the webstore owners" which is a lie as this was said at the end of 2019 and I have still not heard from them. Ultimately, closed my shop because I did not want anyone else purchasing my designs and them have more commissions being owed to me. At this point, it looks like I'm never going to get paid for those products with MY design and they've just pocketed all the money.

I created apparel for our academic program. Website wouldn't process if billing and shipping is different. Customer service had asked me to send shipping address by email. They sent it to the billing address anyways and told me that they can't do anything about it because there is no guarantee that the address change would happen. We are a team of students who had to move a 32lbs package across Montreal.
Customized names were printed at a different location as we requested through the website and we have asked about it in previous emails. We had a print on the back which is the default place for the names. They didn't even bother to double check with us when they claimed that they didn't see the request through the website.

We ordered 27 custom tank tops for a group trip from T-Shirt Elephant and they turned out great! There was one hiccup with 1 tank not having the nickname on the back, but they were very quick to respond and provide a new tank top free of charge and shipped in time for the trip. The pricing is very good and shipping was fast to Vancouver, BC. I would highly recommend using these guys and will be using them again down the road.

Brutal, brutal, and brutal. Is the only word to describe this companies operations and the customer service they pretend to offer.

This is the first time as a business owner that I have ever considered writing a review and on that note congrats to T-shirt-elephant.

From the first step of trying to redeem a 20% code that was guaranteed on all future orders ( on a combined order two years prior between family members) to the last on receiving sweaters that fit two sizes less then what they were supposed to fit has made this painful. To make matters worse it takes 3-4 days to get a response over email.

When contacted about the sweaters being to small I was presented with a Gildan measuring chart and ask to send in pictures with a tape measure. I have done this twice and it clearly doesn't Match the measurements on the chart. I am asking for the XXL's ( only 6 of them) to be replaced with the actually size sweaters and the rest of the $1200 order I will live with. I am now receiving no response and will be leaving this review up until my order has been resolved.

Do your self a favour and avoid unnecessary headaches by finding a different distributor with a solid review base unlike this one.

Carson

I am extremely happy with my recent order!
It was processed extremely fast and the quality of the t-shirt was impeccable. Will definitely be ordering from you in the future!

My Eve Online corp ordered 18 t shirts for an event in August, front and back printing with the front in full colour, 2 colour text on the back, in their lightweight 'budget' t shirt. All 18 shirts with the same print (no custom names).

First off, the shirt quality is amazing. I was expecting much flimsier t shirts. Second, the printing looks great. Everything was exactly as specified, and the shirts were at the door in like a week (tbf, I live within a couple hours of the location they were coming from, but still.)

Incredibly happy, and pricing for the size of the order was significantly lower than what we had been quoted from other printers. I will definitely be coming back for future clothing printing needs. I can't comment on customer service because we didn't have to use it.

I made multiple orders over the past few years and spent a lot on merchandise..I liked the idea of ordering from a Canadian company..The quality and service used to be top notch but has been steadily declining in the past year..and don't even think about opening up a webstore..It takes months to get set up and if you ever want to add any new products to your store it will probably take another 6 months to a year..I tried adding hoodies for the winter season back in September and they still haven't been added..After multiple follow ups and promises from them to add products to my webstore they have totally stopped replying to my emails..I do not recommend.

I ordered 3 black shirts and 2 white shirts..I provided the same resolution design for all the shirts only the only the designs were two different colours..One for the black shirts and one for the white shirts..I have to say that while the white shirts looked really good the quality of the image on the black shirts where terrible and at $30 per shirt I would expect better quality..I don't think I would attempt another order and it's sad because otherwise my shopping experience was good aside from the end result of the black shirts.

I've ordered from T-Shirt Elephant a couple of times and I've been really happy with everything. I had one shirt come in that was not the same as how it looked online so they're sending replacements with another base t-shirt, nice customer service. I would recommend them.

We ordered sweats for our company and we couldn't happier!.The quality of the shirts and printing was exactly what we ordered..The only downside is the delivery.please, please consider using a courier..Canada Post's online tracking is not accurate.
We placed an order for 20 pretty detailed shirts to get shipped 3500km away and I was super happy with the level of customer service and speed they had in getting our order to us!

I have made several orders for uniform polo shirts with graphics. I have found not only are the sizes accurate, but the materials and the graphics are not only a very high standard, but they hold up very well to daily wear and washing.

The system to creating your our custom shirt is fast and easy..I LOVE THE OPTION OF DOWN LOADING YOUR OWN ART CLIP ART WORK. THE BEST IS YOU HAVE AN OPTION TO REMOVE WHITE BACK GROUND ON THE ART WORK. I don't think this option is on many other custom t-shirts websites..Plus love the option that I can create my design and then I can use it on more then one type of item - shirt, hoodie etc.. it simply switches for you so you don't have to start from the being. 5 STARS ALL THE WAY!.I created 12 shirts for our family Christmas gathering. from kids XS to adult XXL. all with same design!
Sandra from Canada!

I ordered a couple T-shirt's and jacket with my business logo on them. I was very pleased with the quality of the clothing, and the speed in which it was delivered. I've already placed another order for more products because I was so happy with my first purchase!

T-shirts were great; unfortunately as soon as I submitted by order I realized I made a mistake with my size distribution list. I emailed the company immediately to try to fix it and they responded a number of days later (after 2 follow up emails from my end) basically saying I was SOL. "We do not amend orders after they are placed." Would have appreciated at least a little flexibility. Human error happens.

I am very happy with the product! I had t-shirts printed for a rec soccer team!
great colour choice and we used a soccer print T-shirt Elephant had! It was perfect.
I was happy to place the order and receive them 10 days later! Great quality!
Highly recommend!

T shirt elephant is great! òç I had my worries about how the quality would be on the prints for each shirt and the sweater I ordered. It looks as if I bought it out of a store. Looks amazing. I haven't washed the shirts or sweater yet. So I'm worried they may shrink or the picture may come off slightly but reading others reviews, it all seems pretty good! I'll definitely order again. Already have custom shirts sitting in my cart that I've created. Might be going a little crazy now with the designs ôÑòÅòú sooo excited to get more!

Very poor service, my orders were
never completed because they kept on forgetting things. I first emailed because I had only initially received half of my items. After emailing, I eventually received another package of what I thought was the rest but was unpleasantly surprised to see they had still forgotten part of my order. I emailed a second time and requested the rest of the order but it still has not come.a month has passed since I ordered the items. I did not receive any compensation for their order mistakes, I was just met with an offer of a 10% discount on my next purchase. Unfortunately, I will no longer be doing business with them and they have lost me as a customer. I was very displeased with their lack of service and organization.

Very pleased with my first shipment. Product turned out great. Only issue I had was shipping as the carrier said I would have it by a specific date after it had originally been shipped. I ended up receiving the product about 14 days after original.shipping date which was the intended shipping length.

Overall happy, and will be back.

Awesome and easy to use design platform. Ordered the t-shirts for a bachelor party with a pretty tight deadline and I was reassured that everything would be ready in time. Rebecca Mattina, the customer service rep, was amazing at ensuring that the order would be pushed along and get to us on time. Her communication with us was amazing and definitely was a huge reason this review is 5 star. Would order again!

The product I received looked just like I wanted it too and was produced very nicely. The article of clothing didn't look cheesy and was comfortable. There was also no difficulty in the ordering/delivery process. Will definitely be ordering from here again.

Ordered items for a team party, but needed a few days earlier than the scheduled shipping date. Customer Service team was able to help deliver the order earlier. Much appreciated. Quality items and tool to customize was easy to use. Great experience.

Great Experience!.I was in a bit of a rush to get some T-Shirts for a stag I was organizing and Sade from T-shirt Elephant really came through for me..When I ordered, the expected delivery date was three days after the event I was organizing..I called up T-shirt elephant and got Sade in customer service on the other end..She really helped me out and got my order to me just before my event without paying the extra $200 in shipping..The shirts were a hit..All the sizing fit as expected and the quality was top notch..After shopping around online I found T-Shirt Elephant was one of the cheapest and easiest to use..The design tool was also very simple anyone could use it.

One thing I might recommend in the design tool and this is really grasping at straws here is to make it so within a single text box you can have multiple colors..As of right now each text box must have only one color designated to it..For example if you have a three word sentence on the back of the shirt and you want to use three different colors you would have to create three text boxes and line them up manually..I still managed to make it work even with this limitation it just ended up taking more time, but the shirts still came out great.

Thanks Sade and thanks to the staff of T-Shirt Elephant, you guys rock!.I have already recommended your company to friends.

I looked at quite a few online shirt stores before I selected Shirt Elephant..Price was what drew me to order from them..They have the.best prices online that I could find by quite a margin..Once I made my order using their fairly simple design tool my order was shipped in a day or two and arrived 4 days before their estimated date..Using this company was a great experience and I would recommend to anyone.

Great quality, a very warm tuque. The embroidery is immaculate. Can't recommend highly enough.
I'll be ordering a cap in the spring for sure.

I've ordered three hoodies from there website. Each one i designed personally, and t-shirt elephant helped my designs become alive on the hoodies. Excellent material as the inside is soft and comfortable. Delivery is super quick as well. My order came within two weeks which was way before the original eta. Overall a great place to order clothing from.

Absolutely the worst company to deal with ! Messed up the order and despite 7 emails no reply ! Shame on you ! I have also reported them to better business beureau and will be contacting police against these fraudsters

I think the jerseys are pretty decent quality but had a little bit of troubles with the customer service. There was a mistake on my order that the system did not recognize the number "0" for one of the jerseys, so the jersey showed up as having no number. I had emailed them about this, and after a few days I got a response from one of the girls saying she would look into this and get back to me. Anyways - never got a response and when I received the jerseys the issue wasn't addressed at all. Would have just been nice to know rather than find out on the spot when I already had the jerseys. Also I had put as a note on my order a concern and I never got a response about any of those concerns. Overall, shipping and sizing of jerseys were good but customer service could have used a little more work.

I didn't feel like a valued customer at all,.it took them 52 days to ship my order. And I got no reason as to why it took that long. All in all, I wouldn't recommend t-shirt elephant for your company's merch
They do decent customer service. But there's always room for improvement

I like the lay out of the website, it is stream lined and easy to use. I was having issues in chrome browser so had to use firefox.

I picked out a more expensive shirt, it was soft and fit to size, unfortunately the seam started unraveling after first day of wear. In the end it was a waste of money so that really made me sad that the quality wasn't there even when I invested money into it. That may not be the companys fault and was more the brands fault. but perhaps the quality control just isn't there.

Placed an order for T-Shirts, only to pick them up and see that the designs were cropped from my original uploaded PDF and one of the designs were flipped backwards! I was surprised because the design studio had the right design, but the checkout picture had a slightly cropped version of that. If you're ordering from here be wary that the design studio may crop your design. After a rally of emails with Rebecca, she was nice enough to give me a 20% off the next order and correct the flipped jersey to the correct design (Hence the 2 stars), but I still needed to reorder all the other shirts because I desperately needed the shirts. I am disappointed and poor.

The quality of the first order was great, but graphic
placement was a bit sloppy. I placed a second order including instructions and the delivery was perfect. Customer service is robotic, with templated replies, but they are efficient and that made me happy too. Definitely will use again.

Excellent quality of fabric in the tee shirts I ordered. There was some shrinkage in some of them but I wash I. Warm water and use a dryer. No pilling and they hold their shape. No issues with ordering on line and receiving my order..I haven't found better quality or price anywhere else.
TShirt Elephant was quick to respond to my order request and was quick to produce and deliver my order. Jason was great to work with. I will definitely order from them again!

i'm so happy with my sweatshirt ! it was a bit of a one off thing and i wasn't sure what to expect but it came quickly and exactly the way i designed it. i only read the reviews after and was a bit skeptical but i couldn't suggest ordering from here anymore.

Customer service was good to deal with. Helped out with my needs right away. Shirts themselves we also good. Prints turned out really well.

Had a small issue with the color of the prints and they were accommodating

Don't bother using them if you're buying a few shirts.

The order manager has no sense of customer service to try and move up your order with sufficient lead time. They are always 'over whelmed with orders' or 'busier than usual' whether you follow up one day, one week or one month after. Expected arrival within 14 business days and it's been over a month and missed gifting this item on time.

I'm still waiting for my order, and am seriously wondering if they even shipped it via Canada Post.

Take your business elsewhere and avoid the headache.

One of my hoodies came without a logo, but customer service was quick to respond and refund me for the missed logo. So, overall, my experience with T-Shirt Elephant was positive.

I'm not sure I find the actual quality of the hoodies to be worthwhile, though. Personally, I thought I paid plenty for the hoodie + print, but the quality of the hoodie I got here is probably one of the worst hoodies I own. It's already getting fluff, even though I've only worn it a couple times. And the cuffs are too scratchy to wear without a long sleeve underneath.

While I'm very appreciative of receiving quality service, receiving quality products seems a bit more than my price point.
Great fit. Very pleased with the material. Will buy again

I got a custom.logo put on a youth fleece sweatshirt for my son. It's nice but the size small youth fits like an extra small so I recommend going one size up. Also it was $60, so I expected the quality to be a lot nicer.

I ordered 2 sweaters for nearly $100. They shipped the items to the wrong person and I got someone elses. I returned the other persons with the shipping label they provided but I never got mine. It is nearly impossible to reach them right now because their "office is closed due to Covid-19" even though customer service emails can be answered remotely. They never followed up to make sure we recieved our items after THEIR mistake. So I am out money and have no product. It has been months. The sweaters were a gift and now obviously they are very very late. Useless customer service. Oh but theyre still taking orders on their site you just cant contact them if they mess up. like usual.

This was our 1st order from T-Shirt Elephant..On November 21, 2019, we placed an electronic order from Victoria BC for 4 white aprons with recipes printed on them..We searched a couple of places, but T-Shirt Elephant was one of the best prices for what we wanted, which was actual printing on an apron (not a sticker, or any kind of stick on product)..First we filled out the form to see what the final cost, including shipping was..Once we determined.we were OK with that, we decided to place the order..The online ordering was pretty good for someone who has never done it before..We had multiple color options and we had to provide our artwork for printing..We were advised our order would be delivered by December 11th, but it showed up 1 week early on December 4th..The quality of the apron was very good..The printing of the recipes was about as good as it could be, as our artwork could have been a little better (very old hand printed recipes scanned at 600dpi to a pdf file)..We were very pleased with the entire final product and the process..If we ever need something printed again (as Arnold Schwarzenegger would say), I'll be back!.Thank you very much.

Having major problems with this company. Placed an order just 3 days ago, the artwork will not print properly as I need to supply a new artwork, I intended to cancel the order because I do not want that artwork printed as-is and I have no way of expanding the image. They are refusing to cancel the order, I have to do a credit card charge back unfortunately. Don't do business with them, they are not customer service oriented.
I've ordered hoodies from them twice. They are really soft, comfy and look amazing with our custom logo. Shipping is super fast and always arrives early as well.

The online ordering and configuration tool were simple and straightforward to use. I was given email update as my order was confirmed created and shipped. What arrived was better than I had hoped for. Thank you for making one thing I'm life easy!

Although customer service responded quickly T-shirt's are very poor quality & extremely small .child sizes for women's T-shirt's. The shirts I ordered are virtually unusable & a few did not arrive so I had to ask for a credit. I would not order from this company again. Looks good online but product I ordered was very very poor.

My daughter was very pleased with the hoodie that I purchased as a gift for her for Christmas. I ordered it rather late so I didn't expect it before Christmas and I received it on Dec 26 th. She loves how soft and warm the fleece is inside the hoodie. I would definitely buy from this company again.

Just got my 2nd order of custom Tees from them the design which I modified from the 1st order turned out perfect this time 1st order I located it a little too low my fault entirely. Their design program works well has a few glitches like any software but once you get familiar with it it works. I also like that you can save your designs for future. T shirt quality is good and great price if you order 12 or more.

We have ordered sample order of the prints from them (3items) to check the quality and size. The prints as promised arrived in 14days and looked great! BUT. we tried to order the remaining 10 items, and when we were told that the minimum order is 12! It's a joke! We did the sample order but we can't finish the remaining?.I would never work with them again and would never recommend them to anybody else!
Thanks for the my new t-shirts to upcoming Christmas. It's sooo originally designed, perfect quality and arrived nice & quickly. Ordering was a simple & pain-free process. I like it very-very!.:))))

The printed logo on the black hoodie looks amazing. The fabric weight of the hoodie was less than I expected; I wanted a heavier hoodie but it's hard to tell from the site what I was ordering. I'm for sure getting another, just heavier this time. Delivery was fast too - awesome biz!

I was super excited to find an incredible + affordable apparel printing company within Canada! I needed to get some custom shirts made for an upcoming event that I am hosting. I placed my order on March 7, 2016 so that they could arrive with plenty of time prior to my event on April 7, 2016.

As of today, March 31st, my shirts have still not arrived. I'm in Calgary, and my shirts were said to arrive within 2-3 days after they were shipped out on March 14th. After calling into customer service, I was told that since the packages are shipped out as letter mail that no one would even be able to find the missing parcel. I was told to contact Canada Post to see if they could help me.

I leave for 5 days for my event where I was hoping to have had these shirts for, and I'm super disappointed that I'll now not have any customized apparel seeing as mine are lost somewhere between Toronto and Calgary.

I absolutely love supporting and being able to support Canadian companies, but it's just such a bummer when this happens, and the customer service doesn't do anything to resolve the problem.

Well, it's convenient enough but they could use some lessons from Amazon on communications. Immediately after submitting my order and shirt logo, I noticed a mistake in the logo. I immediately called and went to voicemail. Next call, 2 minutes later I got through to someone and she said to send in the corrected logo by email - which I immediately did. The order was processed faster than my expectations and shipped several days earlier than promised. But, they used the wrong logo. Pricing was fair, delivery was fast, but communications sucked.
Very satisfied with my order..Purchased company logo hoodies which were nice quality and well printed..Received quicker than expected. Would order with this company again..All positive!

The proportion on you design page are not how the product turns out. Very disappointed on how all my garments turned out. The color option you display on the design page are far from the colors on the final product.
Love my hoodie I ordered. The print was good quality apart from the little specs of fabric in it, anyway overall very good. Definitely going to be coming back once my other designs are in.

My experience with this company was great. If you tell them exactly what you want, they will ensure to follow suit. My tshirts came out great and what I love the most is that you don't need to place a minimum order unlike other companies. The customer service was also amazing.

When the scheduled delivery date came and went I followed up, they said they would look into it. 5 days later I had heard nothing, so I followed up again, they said they had lost one of the items that I ordered. They would ship the other items and refund the one they lost. I can't use them again, there are other companies offering similar services who deliver on their commitments. 2 stars because the item that I eventually received was quite good.

Terrible customer service. Would have my emails ignored for days before I received a brusk and rude response. Ordered nearly $1000 in sweaters (crewnecks, hoodies, zip-ups) from this company and the first estimate they sent had the complete wrong numbers, colours, and sizes so I corrected them and they made the changes only for us to receive the order one week after the expected date because the embroidery machine was down because the company was moving locations. Finally received the order and it was all good except one product I ordered was not sent at all and when emailing the company they have yet to respond to my request for them to send it. Truly suggest ordering directly from a larger and more well established company‚Äì‚Äìpersonally will not use their company again.

I had a dozen shirts (tanks + t-shirts) with a logo. The logo print was good, and it was super easy to do online! The actual process itself was so simple, and the delivery was great. Unfortunately, after one wash (following directions of being inside out), I have noticed the logo already beginning to peel off in little sections on the various shirts, which is a bit disappointing.

Loved the shirts we ordered - they were exactly what we were wanting. :)

We also received them within the timeframe given, which was great.

The only thing that would have made it better was more colour options. We ordered the baseball Ts, but only had the option for a white body (with a choice of colour for sleeves). We'd ideally liked to have had black or grey-bodied Ts with contrasting coloured sleeves. If this is something you could incorporate in the future, that would be wonderful!

I received a shirt and the logo wasn't as big as I wanted it. I emailed and they were super helpful and sent out another one at no charge so fast. Very impressed with the service and the shirt. Thank you so much. Will buy again

I've used T-Shirt Elephant a few times and have always found their service and quality to be first class. Most recently, T-Shirt Elephant printed shirts to celebrate a friend's engagement with very short prior notice. The shirts were delivered early and turned out to be a perfect way to mark the occasion. I will definitely be coming back for the next time T-Shirts are needed!

Love (LOVE) the sweatshirts I ordered recently from T-Shirt Elephant. While these are for a personal (fam-jam) project, as a designer I have pretty high expectations, and they were definitely met! I feel confident moving forward using T.E. for larger orders and recommending for client work!
Very happy with my experience with T-Shirt Elephant. The shirts came out perfectly and I had a wonderful customer experience. Will definitely work with them again.

T-shirts' and mesh back hats are great! The knit skull caps (toques) were extremely small though. We purchased a whole bunch for adult employees but ended up giving it hem to our nephews..They are more of a toddler size.
Shirts got here a couple days sooner than expected. Everything was exactly as I would have hoped. Will be ordering again. Thank you T-shirt Elephant.

Good quality jackets, great customer service who responds quickly and answered all of my questions..Very reasonable prices and our order was received ahead of time..We will definitely use T-Shirt Elephant again for our swag items..Love that they are in the GTA too!

I love love love their designs/tees! I own so much of their product (the vast majority of my closet are t-shirts) and I cannot get enough! Would highly recommend checking them out for holiday shopping :)

Kind of a negative experience, I tried to make a design on a toque, but when it was delivered part of the design was left out. When I asked about it I was told that it didn't fit the specs set out on the website. This is fair, but why not tell me that, instead of sending a product that has a changed design. Overall good quality and fast delivery, I just wish that did not happen :/

Super easy to work with the website and designing your own clothes. Customer services responds quickly. Always satisfied with the products we have ordered, and since it is Canadian the shipping is very quick!

Although i've bought t-shirts from a designer that uses them and liked the t-shirts, this succesful designer whomi know well tells me there are supply inconsistency issues and they need to find a new place to use. I tried to get some of my own designs online with elephant and customer service was poor to non existent, promises broken, and my design never went online in over four months. Obviously this was not good for my business and i should not have trusted them to come through. Secondary issues include total lack of support of online services such as shopify, poor,y thought out web design, etc.

Not sure why there is a discrepancy between google reviews and review by Yelp and Facebook. I wish I read the reviews before I ordered from them..The order page says 14 business days, but when you actually get a confirmation email it is actually 14 business days for them to ship out your order, then they can blame it on any body. Do NOT order from them if you need your order in less then 3 weeks time without paying for the extra rush..I am sitting in regret right now, and not sure what I should do, as my order will most likely not arrive by the time I need them..A very Costly and embarrassing mistake.

Just an update,.I have changed my rating after contacting them and they have arrived before deadline.

We recently decided to put together a soccer team and quickly decided let's get some shirts made. so I started googling places and came across T-Shirt Elephant. The site was super easy to use which was a nice change from some other sites I had looked at. I placed the order on the Tuesday night and my order arrived the next week Thursday! I was so impressed with how quick they were, plus the quality is excellent and exactly what we wanted for soccer (comfortable & light weight) The print turned out better than I had expected so I will definitely recommend T-Shirt Elephant to anyone and use them again in the future! Thank you sooo much :D

Very unhappy with their professionalism and customer service. I had put in an order and approximately two weeks later on Thursday, February 27, they emailed me saying my order was ready for pick up. I went to their location on Friday, February 28 at 2:30pm (still within their operating hours) only to find that their receiving/shipping door was locked and there was no one in the visitors office (front door was also locked). I waited about 30 minutes, hoping maybe someone was on break and would return. At about 3:00pm, there was still no one so I sent them a detailed email expressing my frustration with the process. I also tried calling the number they provided multiple times and there was no reply on the other end. On Monday, March 2, I decided to call them before I drove there to make sure they were actually open when they said they were. Again, no answer on the phone line (I called twice, with about 30 minutes in between each call). I decided to go there anyway since it was on my way home, and thankfully I was able to pick up my order this time. I received an email after picking up my order saying that they were closed on the Friday because of a work event. Totally understandable, but it would have been nice if there was some sort of notice or warning that they would be closed on Friday. Even an automated recording on the voicemail stating that they'd be closed on Friday, February 28 would have been nice but as I called, their voicemail was still dated back to the holidays in December.making me a bit more skeptical about this company. I received no form of accomodation for my troubles and they clearly don't seem to care about customer relations.

This was my first time ordering custom online and it was amazing! Shipping was super fast! Came in 1 day! By far the best online purchase experience I have ever had. They made my hoodie perfectly as I request!

it is now May 14. order was made March 7th. Found a "FLAW" in one shirt so had to reprint..order is all YOUTH sizes. when we had ordered Adult. been dealing with this company for quite a few orders and always good. dont now what has happened..always double check order before going to pay. not impressed. looking for new company

I ordered t shirts and paid for Tshirts + $65 postage to have them delivered to New Zealand in June. I never received them and also random small transactions started appearing eg Amazon Prime Canada so I had to cancel my cc. When I contacted them and demanded a tracking number Rebecca Mattina their staff just said she'll look into it and I never heard back. No apologies, no sense of urgency despite payment having been taken 3 months ago. A daylight robbery of a place!

A joke of a business. Ordered 45 sweaters from these guys, they forgot to make an entire size. That was 21 sweaters out of the total 45. I drove down to their office to sort it out since they never answered the phone, they made me wait 1 hour while they searched. These were supposed to be gifts and were quite time sensitive (Christmas around the corner). The woman then told me that they would refund the entire order since they had nearly forgot half my order. I was disappointed but agreed. I went out and found someone that could do the job for the remaining 21, but had to charge more since I needed it the same day. I figured I wouldn't be in such bad shape financially since T-Shirt Elephant agreed to refund my order. A couple days later I received an e-mail from T-Shirt Elephant that all they could refund was the sweaters I didn't get. Not a sorry for screwing up my order and making me run around days before Christmas..They didn't even offer me a future discount. Live up to your word, scummy move. Would give 0 stars if it was possible.

My whole softball team is thrilled! They couldn't stop talking about how nice the shirts were during our first game wearing them, yesterday :) We ordered shirts from T-Shirt Elephant after price comparing at many other websites - we found their prices the most reasonable and loved the idea of supporting a Canadian company.
The shirts are excellent quality - even better than we were expecting - and they look great! Value is high, the website is intuitive, and we are all happy campers. Thanks TShirt Elephant!

I was very pleased with the service I received from T-Shirt Elephant. I custom made a shirt for my boyfriend's birthday, and it arrived within a week and was of excellent quality; the colors were very vivid and the finished product looked just like the preview of the shirt I had seen after I finished designing it. It is one of the cheapest websites I've found for custom clothing. I would highly recommend it!

Always great service, good communication throughout the entire process..The lead times are very reasonable, they turn around orders quickly..Fast, reliable and good quality products..A great company to deal with.
Ordered 2 t-shirts from them. They are super soft and the print is great quality. The e-mail said I would get them in 2 weeks and I got them in 4 days instead. Great service, will buy from again.

The shirts are high quality and they look great. I have had some trouble in the past with how quickly the orders are completed but the last couple times have been perfect. I will use this company again!

Update 2019-07-09
Following my 2* review, I finally reached customer service and they fixed the situation about the missing shirt. Despite the delay, they deserve at least 4*, for they have the best website to customize your image and shirt I've experienced so far, and they offer a fast delivery. And please, don't try to explain why you didn't notice my first email. Just tell me that this situation has allowed you to identify an important issue in your customer experience and that I've given you the opportunity to fix it. Still, I received a very polite response.
--------------------
I'm overall satifisfied with the ease of use of the website and the fast delivery. However, I tried twice to comunicate with them, including once about a missing shirt, and I didn't get any response from them. Fortunately, we ordered extra shirts and didn't absolutly need it, but we paid for it!

Got the email.to review before receiving the product. Understandably at this time that there are mail delays, however the website does not indicate shortage of staff, and processing delays. So far, not impressed with this company. Will revisit once the product is actually received in the mail.

Placed a second order. 2 months later never received. Keep using mail delays due to ongoing COVID circumstances. Revise to deal with the issue at hand, that the order is lost and they will not refund money. Thieves!

T-Shirt Elephant is my go to online store for getting customized shirts in a jiffy! The user interface was extremely intuitive and when I had to make a last minute change to my order, their customer service rep was friendly and helpful and got me the updates I needed. I would recommend these guys to anyone who likes A+ quality with A+ service and reliability.
Such a sweet and easy spot to order a T-shirt printing quickly! Really easy to explain what needs to get done & phenomenal customer service. I'll be using them again for sure

Very impressed with T-Shirt Elephant for their quality, t-shirt selections, fast turnaround,.price and most of all service. I placed my order on Dec 4th but I made an error online with my shirt selections. I called in and spoke with Sade who quickly and easily made the corrections and the order was shipped out on Dec 9th. I have already recommended them to friends and will be ordering more shirts from them in the future. No minimum order too!

This is our second year using T-Shirt Elephant for our convention..The quality has been spot on both years and the price is excellent..The one issue that we did have (A wayward fingerprint on one of the shirts in the ink) was quickly fixed with a replacement tshirt..Will certainly be ordering again next year!

The quality of the shirt is fantastic, although the logo press wasn't the greatest. One of the three shirts had a smudge in the logo. A bit disappointing from a QC prospective. The time to fulfill the order was extensive as well, but to be expected during a pandemic.

My order was taking longer than expected but my concern was attended to promptly by customer service in a professional manner. I love the products! Got 4 hoodies. They're very well made and I will be ordering again!

The guys are cracking me up . I don't think they ever heard of customer service in their life . first I ordered T-shirts that were not clearly labeled as youth however they are youth size. as soon as I realized their system mislabelled the T-shirt type, I contacted support via email. So no reply. After a day I called them on their phone line which is included in the order email and phone got dropped twice. Then next day I left 2 voice messages, and been calling about 9 times in the last week about updating the order.

Finally Friday I was able to get a hold of the "customer support", and the woman told me that apparently even though they have orders email thats listed you can't reply to that email even though you have to email with a "new email", and system automatically closes it otherwise. Also their phone number does not work properly for receiving voice messages, also the line where it says:

(up to 14 business days)
Est Delivery Thursday, July 4, 2019
(Note: This date refers to the shipping date. Final delivery will depend on the shipping location)

right below it saying the date about which is delivery date apparently is just a shipping date which is counter intuitive and just confusing .

And the reason for that apparently is their system does not allow to change it, so they themselves don't know how to update these messages.

So finally after week they said that manager will call me back .

So in short:

* Very very bad customer support you can't even call it customer support
* No replies to voice mail and 2 emails send 1 hour after order was placed
* Confusing and incorrect statements in order emails
* Misuse of labels on their products for shirt sizes
* No proper ticketing system for handling customer support requests
* Always busy and queued up with customer print requests . so if you need anything on time they won't delver . I have to adjust corporate event now for 20 people because they did not deliver .

On the side note I should have ordered locally and not bothered with out of province company, would have saved a lot of nerves .

Suggestions:
1. Create a *proper* ticketing system, its time to move on from the 90s for using email as communication like Jira or ZenDesk or whatever .
2. Please put someone to call or reply to customer feedback *don't ignore your customers, and say that you are too busy to pick up a phone
3. Focus on improvements and not fake reviews on Google to counter all the bad Local reviews .

I ordered two of a graphic that I intended to be "samples" for a mass order.
Glad I only ordered two..They are not awful, but it looks like a spray stencil. not screen printing..one of the graphics was a little off centre but nothing too bad..I would make a sample again but not order bulk.
Always great when I receive a creation back from T-Shirt Elephant..Their work is always exactly what I ordered.and well done too.
This T shirt gave me the confidence to apply for my new job! Thanks elephant t shirts

Just put an order in for 200 t-shirts..We had them quickly and done right.

One particular style of shirt was out of stock, the communicated with me on options for my order which was great..Will order again!
I order shirts monthly from T-Shirt Elephant and I am always happy with the results. Print quality is fantastic, much better than the other shops in the city I have used in the past

The shirts came promptly and were of very good quality. The pinting had left a smell of vinegar, but I assume this is due to the technology and it washes off. My logo was a bit bigger than expected based on the online tool for ordering, so I was a bit surprised by that, so be careful and probably you need to size, online, your logo a bit smaller than you intend it to be printed.

We order 10 shirts, and the quality is good, the price is great, the delivery is fast, and our logo super nice.
But..Oh boy. The shirts stinks! And they were not folded, just a big bunch of tshirts throwd in a box.
Overall, the smell and folding, I can do something about it soooo. I'll keep doing business with them.

I just took delivery of my new custiomized Markham Machine NHL calibre hockey jersey and it is a beauty! Excellent quality! I strongly recommend that anyone looking for customized jerseys look no further than T-Shirt Elephant. Next time I need an order made I will be vsiting their web site again for sure! Thank you T-Shirt Elephant!

DONT DO BUSINESS WITH THEM! I order ONE sweater and they messed it up. It took more than a month to get that ONE sweater and they were gonna send the right one but with faster shipping which was like 2 weeks. So I get the second sweater and they messed it up AGAIN! There customer service was slow and not professional! I had to wait another 2 weeks for the THIRD sweater and finally they got it right and I asked for a refund which the agreed to giving it to me and I have not received a penny back from them! I asked why I haven't gotten it yet and they claimed that I needed to talk to my bank about that???? Really unprofessional and disorganized!

I was super impressed with T-Shirt Elephant and would recommend their services anyone! Great selection of designs, awesome quality and came to my front door quicker than expected! Love this and will be ordering again.

great experience with t-shirt elephant! the site is extremely easy to use. customer service was quick and easy to get a hold of. shipping is super fast if your in the GTA area. received my order within a week of placing it. would definitely use them again!

I received my t-shirts today from t-shirt elephant they were exactly as ordered which made me very happy it's all online sales is how I did mine so I didn't speak to any staff or anyting and it worked out fun even though I made a mistake on my order I still received it. I accidentally clicked the hold for pickup button and they realized the mistake and ship me more t-shirts anyway the only concern I had was the price was a little high.

Flawless experience. The product was exactly as ordered. There was some confusion as to the exact placement of art, and a speedy back and forth email foray resolved the whole thing. Package arrived exactly on the date promised, so I was able to coordinate picture taking for Christmas. Will gladly use again. Good job!

Very happy with the quality of the product- looked just like the pics. My only complaint would be that I needed to start another whole order for an additional shirt which meant another shipping charge even tho I had only placed it a day beforehand. Otherwise great company.
I designed cute nurse t-shirts for my work and I love them. So happy that shipping was free because I hate paying for shipping. Can't wait to post them on Instagram!

Ordered over 3,000 kids t-shirts for a work initiative and T-Shirt Elephant gave us the best price and service of anyone. Very happy to support Canadian and have personal contact throughout the whole process. Great quality t-shirts and great printing.

My experience with T-Shirt Elephant was amazing! They provided us with discounts for our t-shirt purchase for our annual event both this year and the last. The communication for the creating and design process was smooth and effortless. Jason was amazing wonderful to work with! I would definitely recommend using T-Shirt Elephant!

I was looking for AA Tri-Blend Track Shirts and this was the best price anywhere - about $14 each. I was suspicious because the price was so good, but T-Shirt Elephant has a physical location in the GTA, and the shirts are authentic AA. Shipping took about 2 weeks - pretty good considering pre-Christmas order date. Unfortunately can't comment on the screen printing services, but I'm 100% ordering blanks from here again.

Don't expect much from this company. The quality of the hoodie materials is decent but the printing is horrible. Some printed blurry with very low pixel and it was just printed on the hoodies, just like how printer prints papers with color. Not even a sticker or threads over the surface. Quite disappointing. Will not use the site again.

Ordered a bunch of shirts, and they look great. I was concerned about the screen printing because my design had many colours in it, however it turned out great.
I had asked for athlete's numbers to be added to the sleeves, which wasn't done. No additional cost though, so just a mild convenience.

I ordered my shirts on Sunday and they came the following Friday (less than a week). They were very affordable and the quality is amazing. The resolution of the design is very good and the printing is high quality.

I am pleased with the quality of the the work t-shirts with logo. Not as much with the beenie. It's feels loose, the lip curls out and up and it doesn't keep my head as warm as I would like. Overall though a positive experience.

T-Shirt Elephant was amazing with my first order..They were very fast to fulfill the order, and quick with all of my questions about the process.

The products are of a very high quality, and I would recommend them to anyone looking for a local option for marketing materials.

Very bad. I ordered 2 years ago from us and service was okay, price was good, quality was good.
Now, it's just went downhill. Almost 2 months to receive my order, service were non-existant, quality was okay.

I was litteraly stuck with them: on one hand, they were having delays and order was not processed yet; on the other hand, they didn't want to refund anything and cancel the order.

Make yourself a favor and order from somewhere else. They are not worth your time and money anymore.

Every time I order any merch for my band through TShirtElephant I am always amazed and very happy. The quality is perfect, the placement and look is always what I imagine for it to turn out. Ive had them print everything from hats, hoodies, shirts to cinch bags and I have always been pleased. Outstanding work! òÑ§.

Incredibly disappointing. After browsing for awhile and being directed to this site, I was somewhat excited that I could customize the merchandise. Did just that and ordered a few weeks before I was to go on tour. I even laid down the extra $100 to have it expedited. Now I'm on tour, no t-shirts. Called them 3 times and whoever "Chris" is, never answers his phone. Pretty sure I'll never use this company again and look for something in Montreal instead. I'm so frustrated it's taking a lot of willpower not to drop F bombs in this review. Elephant indeed. More like an elephant in the room. Terrible.
Screen printing was not centred on tshirts and hoodies. No quality checks to confirm printing would not bleed together.

I've just received my hoodie! It came quickly which I found really nice. I think my only complaint is the smell. It smells like new clothes but also kind of sour? and the hood of my hoodie is super bulky (style choosing error on my part) but nothing a couple washes couldn't fix!
I ordered 22 personalized soccer jerseys for my team. The order arrived in less than 2 weeks and the jerseys are perfect. The fit and the material is great. My team is loving them!

First things first the shirts i ordered are great, I'am wearing one right now at work and my customers think the quality is great. I always try to buy local when ever possible and your web site made the designing of my shirts so easy. So i will be using you in the future for more stuff to make my pizza shop stand out from the rest. One small issue is the sizing chart, now that i know you use the gildan performance line of shirts i
will order 1 size up next time.
Thanx great products great service.
Patric PizzaOne.

I was so surprised. When I opened the bag it was like magic. The printing was so clean. I did my best to edit on the computer and when it came in the mail it looked fantastic. If you need any printing done, go to these guys. I get so many compliments on my sweater that everyone wants to buy one. Thanks again!

I ordered 2 tank tops - for the first one I followed the size chart provided and it fits okay, the other style didn't have a size chart provided so I ordered the same size as the first one and it is way too small and I won't be able to wear it. I called customer service to inquire if I had any options and she kept insisting that I follow the size chart provided even though there wasn't one provided. I would suggest ordering from a company that provides all the information on a product, especially when they don't offer any return or discount options, as I was very disappointed with my first order and experience with this company.

The employees at the T-Shirt elephant are a pleasure to work with! They are professional and want you to have the best experience you can. The printing was crisp and the sweater is soooo comfy! I looked at many t-shirt design companies before choosing this one. and I'm so glad I did! Great Quality, Great Service!

These folks are awesome! Circumstances had me needing to get new buttons asap and Sade was wonderful. I contacted them Monday around 4 pm and by 5 pm had things ordered, Tuesday morning proof was sent first thing and 24 hours after I approved that I had them at my front door. And they look great. Great price! Great product! Great customer service! Great turn around time. Simply-GREAT! Totally have confidence in using them. -hannah-maria

Somehow lost my order? Then didn't start a new one until a week after I had contacted them. Took a month longer than the ‚Äòguaranteed shipping date' and they offered no compensation. The bags came after 6 weeks and they were so thin I could see right through them. Do yourself a favour and do not waste your time or money on this company!

Love the tank top I ordered as a birthday gift for a friend..Wish I would of go one for myself..It came 5 days earlier than expected..The only thing is the size seems a little smaller than what I would of expected so hopefully it fits her
Without actual sizing guides it's really hard to know what size will fit. That said, the product itself is good quality, the printing it great. The sweater is just on the small side.

The process took over a month to get a set of team jerseys for baseball. The wording on the website was very deceiving. Once we received our jerseys we had 5/14 that had the wrong number on the wrong sized shirt. The quality was good, but time and accuracy was poor.

First time ordering embroided hats, online, without talking to someone. So I was a little nervous. Adding my logo to the design builder showed my logo was off center, I was worried I would end up getting off centered products. When my shipment arrived, every hat was flawless! Amazing! Trust these guys!

Very excited with the quality of workmanship and the t-shirt as well..The manager of T-shirt Elephant went the extra mile to ensure my t-shirt arrived on time (a day early) and it was exactly what we were looking for.
Thank you for the wonderful service.

I was very pleased with the customer service we received. We received the wrong colour jackets in the mail, and the team at Tshirt elephant were quick to right the matter by printing and sending us the right colour. Thank you for being a great company who stands up to mistakes made and corrects them!
