Submitted my own design and totally impressed with the.workmanship thus it is with hope.that my 12-year old.Grandson is going to love it!.Also the quality of the T-shirt itself is impressive..To conclude ; since sizing and styles vary.I might suggest to take such into consideration based on its.purpose as well as.its fabric content.(i.e.: 100% cotton may shrink when laundered/heat dried) ..For example, as this t-shirt is to be worn for night wear I chose his exact sizing (L 14-16 . he has a slim build).and a fabric blend of 50% cotton & 50% polyester otherwise I may have gone up a size.
First time: got t-shirts of some other company :( . Second time they sent inferior tshirts not what I ordered. Emailed numerous times and they never reply. Never am i ordering through them again.

I made an order about a month ago for 80 mixed youth and adult t-shirts with T-Shirt Elephant, with two different screen sizes. In our invoice, it was agreed that we would get 2 different screen sizes and they even drafted a mock-up for us of the two sizes. However, when we received it approximately 2 weeks ago on August 10th, I opened the box to find that all the screen sizes were the same. I have left at least 4 voicemails and numerous emails to T-Shirt Elephant asking them to acknowledge the mistake and make amendments, but it has been 2 weeks since the first attempt at contacting them and I have yet to receive any reply (August 28th). We ended up being forced to start our event with the wrongly sized t-shirts and are very unhappy that not only was there a mistake, but also because we feel like we have been ignored for the past two weeks from the seller. At least a third of our t-shirts were made with the wrong screen size. DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM. They were nice at first but they made a mistake and they are NOT owning up to it and are flat out ignoring me.

Ordered sweater from here and they turned out fabulous! The names were exactly where I wanted them on the back and they arrived before their expected delivery date which worked fabulously! Glad I ordered them from here! Would recommend to any Canadian looking from custom clothing!

The size of the XXL sweatshirt was the size of an average Large in mainstream clothing brands..Dimensions of products should be posted, and T-Shirt Elephant could have helped me out a great deal by being familiar with the items they are selling and making customers aware, if not of the actual dimensions which is prefereable, at least that the XXL I was ordering in this product was a comparable to a Large in other clothing lines..Not a great job on this one.

I had a terrible experience every step of the way with this company. The communication was poor, they couldn't process my American company credit card, my order was late, and t-shirts arrived with stains and discolourations. I would not recommend, and I will not be purchasing from them again. I would give 0 stars if possible.

Good print quality on the shirts. Great customer service and they respond within minutes of an inquiry. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is the actual t-shirt quality. The Anvil t-shirts they were printed on were a bit cheap feeling and smaller than normal fit. Personally, I would use different t-shirts.

PROS:
-my order is exactly what I wanted and looks great!
-Customer Service is supper friendly, patient and knowledgeable
-Great prices

CONS:
-Poor communications with clients, my order came in 6 days late, and that was after I was nagging them to give me updates on my order.

Overall:
Great product and great prices. But they need to work on their communication with their customers and inner workforce.

On the day I ordered the shirt I also ordered a shirt from China. I received the shirt from China with free shipping a week before the one from T-shirt elephant which charged 12.99 to ship from the country I live in. I understand the shirt was probably made to order but when it was finally shipped it still took a week to arrive which is unacceptable when you are charged that much to ship a t-shirt. I suspect this tactic is used to make the shirts look cheaper than they are.
The quality has only gone up for the printing from the first order. Sadly this most recent order showed me how good the quality I wanted vs the quality I received on previous orders.

It's always stressful when you order apparel and gear for a group (which I do a lot of), but the quality and the turn around time was amazing!.I think the best part though, was the customer service..I asked a bunch of questions and got quick and accurate responses by incredibly friendly and helpful people!.EXCELLENT company!.I will be a repeat customer, guaranteed!
Very highly recommend!

Ordered sweaters and polos for my construction business with specific details and was very pleased with final product. Logo is crisp, materials were of high quality. Will be using T-Shirt Elephant again in the near future!

T-Shirt Elephant is a great company to work with. Quick, competitive rates, and good customer service. Had a shirt come in with a stain on it, brought it to their attention, and they're getting another shirt sent no questions asked. Would definitely recommend them to friends/family.

My T-shirt's arrived early, not as I designed and printed on the wrong shirt. Impossible to get in touch with the company through email and calling. I wrote a complaint email Tuesday then they sent my this review, now hoping I will be heard. I would like my order corrected or a refund. One star for prompt shipping.

The design tool was super easy to use, I loved the variety of shirts to choose from, I received my product quickly and I am thrilled with the quality of the image. All that and I thought the price was great. I've already recommended the company!

The design tool was easy to use and had great features. I was able to share my design ideas with my crew and get feedback. We are already thinking about our next purchases. I also agree with another reviewer that hats would be a great option as now I need to look to another company for this.

Cheers

Some minor logistic hiccups before the Tshirts were made but it was easy to get back on track and once they worked on the shirts is was only a few days before they were in my possession. The shirts look create. The design on the shirts matched the only design exactly. I'll definitely be ordering more shirts from T-Shirt Elephant.

They were amazing from start to finish..Website was easy, customer service was impeccable!.We ordered a bit too late and after exchanging some emails with Rebecca they got them shipped out 2 days early and we got them in time for our show, they look awesome!
Custom ordering was a breeze with the intuitive website interface. The end product was amazing and the T-Shirts are top quality. Shipping time was very reasonable. Couldn't be happier!
Product did not arrive on time..T-shirts were without a back graphic and trying to have it rectified became exhausting..Very overpriced and very poor customer service.

After paying nearly $100 for a tshirt (birthday present) over a month ago, I still have nothing. I have made multiple attempts to Tshirt Elephant (via phone, chat and email) and not an answer on a single one. I'm giving up on this company. VISA will get their money back.

Save yourself the irritation and birthday disappointment and order from the screen printing lady down the road.

Just wanted to leave a very dissatisfied review for T-Shirt Elephant
I received my order of 5 tees and all were warped on the front to the point that my logo looked unprofessional. The sizing also did not match what was on the site. When I emailed with pictures, instead of apologizing and resend the order that I spent a fortune on shipping on, they said, all we can do is giving 20% off future orders knowing full well I was unsatisfied and wouldn't NOT be returning.I have a huge base of colleagues that also need branding and shirt designs but rest assured there have now not only lost my business but also that potential clientele. Be warned.

The shirt is good, fits well and seems to be good quality..My only major compliant is the time to deliver. They indicated it would be quite a few days but I thought they were just being cautious when in fact they were even longer than they said. This was supposed to be a gift but was way too late. Seems to be a production issue here somewhere.
Received the shirt yesterday. Very good communication re order and shipping. The shirt looks great, exactly as ordered, and is very soft. This is a gift I'm sure will be much appreciated!

We ordered some long sleeve customized baseball tees with T-Shirt Elephant for Get REAL Queen's and loved them!

Great design and ordering system, great quality and quick delivery.

I will be ordering from these guys again!

Horrible experience start to finish. Phoned 2 days before my order was supposed to be delivered, they had not even started printing it yet. Was told it would be rushed out to me, but it has not arrived and now nobody will return an email or voicemail, after over 20 attempts at contact. Have since had to dispute the transaction with my credit card company. Have since found another Canadian option that beat their price by $100 for the exact same product. And they answered their phone!

Very happy.with T-shirts and hoodies I ordered last month.~ look awesome ~ excellent quality ~ customer service was very responsive ~ washed the tshirts in cold water and they still look great ~ turnaround was quicker than expected ~ Very impressed with the company so.I will be ordering again in January

I ordered a dozen personalized aprons for our company function and Rebecca was amazing to deal with..My order was received in a week and they look amazing!.Thank you so much!.Definitely keep you top of mind for future orders!
Received the T-shirts a day before predicted arrival and they were exactly what I wanted. I got the cheapest shirt they had and it's still pretty good quality. Very impressed!
Ordered Dec 26, arrived Jan 8. I am 60 miles from sender. I ordered extra large. Label says extra large but Tshirt is smaller than all other xlarge tshirts I have and is unwearable.

I had a couple of t-shirts designed to be used as a pregnancy announcement to my parents - who were going to be first time grandparents.

I explained the situation to T-Shirt Elephant and said I needed them fast..Their turnaround was amazing and they were completely attentive to my order.

When my parents first opened the gift, they chuckled thinking it was a joke, then they froze and looked at me in shock..I guess that means they loved it. ;)

Tshirt was good quality, material is nice and soft. The only reason it's not 5 star is that it takes a bit of time to deliver, however, it did arrive a few days before the estimated delivery date, which was great.

Not trustworthy, would not pay commission back to not for profit registered charity Teddy's Outreach Foundation. Initially provided excuses for months of delays until finally stopped responding. Perhaps they are crooked or sloppy, either way they should be avoided at all costs.

Ordered two women's medium sport shirts. The actual printing is fine, but the shirts were massive. The sleeves went down to my elbows (and I'm usually a large). We are swimming in them. Not at all what is pictured on the site. Waste of money.

Bought the ATC‚Ñ¢ EUROSPUN¬Æ RING SPUN TEE and I'm happy overall. However, the negative: it seemed like the logo I desired on my shirts was centered on the website. however, when they came in they were quite a bit off. A little frustrating but not the end of the world. Again overall happy with the quality/print of the shirts!

T-Shirt Elephant was the perfect way to design some hoodies to celebrate good memories of our challenge as a family to swim in all 5 Great Lakes this summer. We liked the fact that there was no minimum and the kids had fun designing the hoodies online. They did a good job and the order came sooner than expected. We will use their services again in the future and tell others about them.
Online ordering was super easy. Great quality of products. Delivery came 2 weeks early. I am a very satisfied customer and will be ordering from T-Shirt Elephant again!
print nearly disintegrated all together after one wash. pretty disappointed, have ordered several times from t-shirt elephant before and have never had this issue. lost almost all color saturation.

Well worth the price..Great quality sweatshirt and the decal was better than I had expected!
The site is very easy to use..Love that you can upload your own pictures and that there's the option for creating single items.

I ordered a custom hoodie as a gift. It came better than I ever expected..The decals on the front and back are great (on the front I asked for the faded or worn look)..I got standard shipping (was a tad pricey but Canada Post so.) it came a week early which was just what I needed! Right on time for the bday..I choose the Men's "Fruit of the Loom" hoodie in Small and its a great fit for a female that wears Medium..I feel the Men's selection for hoodies is better than the Ladies and that's the only reason my rating isn't a 5.

Received a printed apron as a gift from T-Shirt Elephant and it was perfect! Love this product from a Canadian company. The site was user friendly with so many options! Will use this again for future gifts and prints :)

If I could give this zero stars, I would. I was hugely dissatisfied with my custom T-shirt order. I had ordered for my son for a Halloween costume because he has sensory issues and can't wear a typical costume. I gave it at quick rinse and the artwork faded so badly you can barely see it. Huge waste of time, money. and we have no Halloween costume now. :(

T-shirt and graphic turned out great :).Received as expected, with only a minor delay due to COVID-19 measurements in place..Not the first time I've shopped T-Shirt Elephant & I'm sure it won't be the last..Would definitely recommend.

After I placed the order I realized I was entitled too a first time customer 10% discount..I immediately called but they refused to give me that discount retroactively..Now they are asking for a positive review!
My order was for just one single T-shirt as a test run. The shirt and printing quality were both fine however the 3 week delivery time was terrible. Sorry.won't be a Return Customer.

Very disappointed they don't seem to care much to have good customer service. Hard to get a hold of on the phone or via email. First time ordering and 60% of my order was printed incorrectly i notified them they credit me 15% and re issued the items almost two weeks later after countless calls and emails only to be told they are very busy. I was made to feel because my order was small compared to the large daily orders I was ignored. When I received the reprints this week there is still issues. Not impressed.

Great speedy service! I've ordered from these guys twice already and got my shirts faster than I thought I would. They look exactly like how they were designed online. Would definitely order with them again
Very good quality as usual! My only concern is the colors were not exactly the same as my photo (the orange turned more red than orange) but overall I'm satisfied ‚úåÔ∏è

Okay experience. I needed shirts printed for a KS fulfillment and the printing was subpar - white had leaked around the design and made it look messy and unprofessional. Disappointed by how they look, but I had to go ahead with a short deadline and will have to send these along with an apology to backers.

Just received the shirts and the DTG printing quality is amazing. My order got shipped out on Wednesday and was received the very next day. So happy with how everything turned out and will definitely be ordering again.

Creating the t-shirts images was easy, plenty of choices of t-shirts, fabric, etc, to choose from, rapid delivery. My only reason for not allowing 5 stars is that the t-shirt size guide may induce error, as mine were L and I barely fit in both models, whereas normally I am a medium to large person, fitting loosely in a size L. Otherwise, great experience, will play again :)

Shirts were exactly what I asked for. They came in half the estimated time. I was impressed with how quickly they arrived but more than anything I love the ease and simplicity of the site. I've been searching for a site like this for a while.
Only criticism is I want to order hats and other merchandise that they don't offer.

Absolutely abysmal customer service. Dealing with Chelsea was a nightmare that I don't care to revisit for another second of my life. Refused to give me a quote for my order unless I manually setup the order myself (to the point of getting to the checkout page). Upon explaining that what I was seeing seemed wrong, I was again informed that I could only get a quote through the page. I'm trying to get t-shirts for my business (staff, as well as for resale) so trying to plug in 50+ t-shirts/etc into the system just to get a quote is a brutal thing to tell potential customers to do.

Will not do business with this company. I don't like talking to a wall and having someone absolutely disregard everything I'm saying to them. I strongly suggest the same of you.

Edit: I asked a few times for a quote from your people. You were given a list of specifics, sizes, and I even offered to make the design in your design tool. You refused to help me and told me I had to use the online tool for a quote. I told you I was seeing discrepancies in pricing and things weren't working out for me with your tool and still you pushed me to the tool. There is no confusion here. I wasn't looking to place my order, I was looking for a general price for my order without having to spend an hour putting in each individual item.

Customer service here needs work when they don't even admit to their faults when negatively reviewed.

I printed some T's for my blog, Indie Trendsetters. My design was pretty ambitious and I was worried that they wouldn't be able to do it or the T's would end up not looking great. Turns out they did just a spectacular job, the print was clear, the online representatives were really friendly and supportive (they answered all my beginner's questions), and the T shirts arrived on time. I honestly couldn't be happier.

Refused to let me know how long my order woudl take after being several months late and then refused to cancel my order. The entire process with their customer support has been terse and snarky.

Order took several months to arrive, I wish I could review them 0 stars

High quality Logo printing, fast e-mail response times, really good quote system that is accurate. They missed printing 4 out of my 27 hoodies but customer service responded fast and.dealt with the problem in a timely and excellent manner.

I rarely ever order things online but I've had this gift in mind for my boyfriend for a while now. I took a chance when i decided to go with T-Shirt Elephant, and I'm ecstatic to say how happy I am with my final product. I ordered a custom hoodie with a logo, and got my order within a few days, faster than I expected. THANK YOU!

BEWARE- This company has a messed up return policy as they processed my order as a blank T-SHIRT and then tried to get me to "reorder" with the design I requested to begin with so they can scam me twice. Customer service is rude as hell and isn't actual CUSTOMER SERVICE. New customers theres alot of other reputable companies that will value your business. Thank god I didn't process a large order. Yikes

Items on shipping slip not in the bag - print quality was extremely disappointing..Even after contacting the company to say items were missing, the reshipped and certain items were still missing..Cost was inexpensive but will never order again from this company

I comparison shopped all over the net for the company that would get my 50 hoodie order, and T-Shirt Elephant had everything I was looking for! Best prices, products, selection, turnaround, customer service, and Canadian! I'm thrilled with my hoodies, thank you so much!

Great experience and great product. I was searching for a company to make one custom hoodie and I absolutely love it. The website was easy to use and I received my order in a timely manner. The customer service was also very good.

This company is a scam. Submitted & paid for order, 2 months later no shirts, no updates, no emails returned, one bogus message about saying in might have been a shipping error (in the same message they also said it hadn't yet shipped) . It's a scam. I don't think this company actually makes anything, it just charges your credit card and probably sells the info. I feel badly for trying them out, please heed the other reviews here and don't ever go near them

Ordered shirts for our band and they were about 2 weeks late showing up. Opened the box and the logo is about a 1/3rd of the size that was submitted. Emailed back and forth half a dozen times and was basically told too bad and thanks for your money. We Have dealt with tshirt companies before and never have had this arrogance from the so called customer support. Never again would I place a order from this clown shoes of a company! You are crooks.

Order experience was good. I would recommend that this business integrate proofing prior to press to ensure they get it right. Our order had an error which could've been caught prior to press run.

Customer service on our order was great. They handled with utmost professional approach. Well done!

Bad experience with t-shirt elephant. The colours printed were completely wrong, and the graphic had a weird white border around it. A quick QA step on their end could mitigate things like this. They have agreed to reprint the shirts, so will update my review based on those results.

The program for making the t-shirt was super easy to use. There are lots of options. The product arrived exactly when predicted. They had get there in time for christmas options. I am super satisfied with this site and I will use them again.

I love coming here to say great things about great people. Too bad this is not one of these moments. T-Shirt Elephant has low quality product, poor execution, bad quality prints, unskilled staff, and the worst customer service ever. They basically do everything wrong and when you complain, they say it's your fault. Makes me sad. I feel sorry for them.
Very happy with our first order with T-shirt Elephant. The quality of the print is good and the t-shirts we picked are very soft. Will order from you guys again!

The products received were as expected, and the order came in reasonable time. But due to a mistake in the store's website some products I ordered were not available. This was disappointing. Further, they refunded only the value of those products I did not receive and not the tax on them. And they did not adjust the shipping cost. Overall, if I knew these products were not available, I would not have placed the order at all.

t-shirt elephants products did not disappoint and arrived in a timely fashion. Their customer service went above and beyond when I realized I had forgotten to order an extra shirt. Highly recommended :)

Ordered Dec 17 2020. Date of completion was supposed to be Jan 6 2021. As of Jan 18 2021 nothing. When I contacted them, just got the run around. Very poor customer service. Just wanted to know approximate delivery date and where my order sits in the Q. I respect the delays during Covid, but communication is awful. I will not order again. Beware if you need anything expedited or have problems. I wish I could have picked 0 stars.
My custom t-shirts look great! Excellent communication and reasonable turnaround time. Recommended!
I ordered.7 T-shirts. Everything was fine but the sizes run small so one shirt was not useable, unfortunately. Otherwise the quality is great and everything was as ordered.
Our performance baseball shirts are better than expected..The unisex sizing was great for men and women..Great price, quick delivery and a.quality custom shirt!

I love the shirts from here the colour and picture quality it's really good! The shirts also stand up to a lot of use and washes, with a little bit of wear. My only thing I wish I would get is a picture that covers the entire front to the shirt. When making the shirts in the template it shows that it's what I'll be getting but when they arrive it's just a larger picture in the middle.

Terrible customer service and delivery services. I got a shipping confirmation email nearly a month ago which said it would arrive in 2-4 business days. It didn't so I reached out to customer service and still haven't heard a reply back. That was a few weeks ago

I just want my shirt man

Used them to start a business since they are in Canada and didn't want the hassle of borders and exchange.
They don't do any checking of images you send in, they just print them regardless of how digitized they are when they are blown up. They reprinted and resent this at no charge but they do not review your image as they say they do.
They are very criptic with their pricing and won't tell you full costs unless you get on the phone with them.
They are very slow to repond to emails and more often than not they don't answer the question so typically I had to call.
It takes them 2 weeks to print a shirt then they ship it..This is print on demand it should be days not weeks.
They messed up commissions constantly and everytime you get a statement the amounts differ..I am still waiting for payment from their error..I spent numerous calls trying to sort out the right numbers.
You always have to call them in order for them to actually do anything.
I have moved to a new supplier who can perform the way they say they will.
Stay away if you are trying to run a business.

Don't waste your time/money - this company is a joke..The worst customer service I've ever experienced..We ordered tshirts for a baseball team under the impression that their 14 day guarantee would hold up.Don't let their fancy website and positive reviews on their own website fool you.after thet 14 day guarantee passed, we contacted the company and it was virtually IMPOSSIBLE to reach anyone..Always goes to voicemail, emails un-returned, left messages on every single extension at the company with not a single return phone call..I lost track of how many voicemails and emais we left..We were finally able to get the company's attention only by inquiring via their 'contact us' form on their website - we anonymously asked how long shipping would take for a new order, and what do you know, they answered right away - only then did they give the explanation that the shirts weren't here because of backorder from their supplier..When they finally did ship the shirts (over a month later) there were 4 shirts missing and 2 were the wrong size and the quality was less than desirable, and our ball season was essentially over. Do not waste your time/money on this company. I could go on and on. HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT/WASTE OF MONEY!
We ordered 14 (I think) ball shirts, the sleeves are a bit long, next time I would size down (I sized up according to the chest in the size chart) but they came on time and look great! Great price!

The website was very easy to use and it gave me a lot of options to customize the shirt..The product showed up ahead of schedule and it was exactly what was shown to me in the preview. The process was seamless and I look forward to doing business with them again.

the sweater itself wasn't too bad, however I specifically wanted my print smaller and it came out larger than expected. the print wasnt as opaque as i wanted it to be and just looks cheaply printed on. Overall not bad but just not worth the price.
Ordered a number of items from Jason at T-Shirt Elephant. He was extremely professional and I would highly recommend him/his team. The items received were fantastic! Thanks again.

I received 6 polo shirts today for a corporate event. I can't imagine anyone doing a worse possible job than these shirts. The logos are ironed-on labels that appear to have been printed in someone's basement on a $50 printer and then irregularly ironed. This is despite their website stating clearly that they never use iron-ons. I could not possibly be more disappointed. I could have done a better job myself. Still waiting to hear about a refund.

Order a printed hat but logo was not printed correctly ,.I designed the hat with a bigger logo and placed to the right of the hat but they centered it and logo was small . I contacted customer service but they refused to fix the problem all they afford was 10% discount what a joke . It's a good thing I didn't place a bigger order as I just wanted to try them out but I would not order again . Save yourself the head ache and order from Vista print better customer service

Very impressed!
I did not have the time necessary to do the job but Client Service told me they could deliver within my deadline. And they did! Even 3 days earlier that promised.
The T-shirts were of good quality, the picture that I supplied was really well reproduced.
Being of advertising background, I am VERY fussy.

Will definitelly used them again,

Paulette Arsenault of Montreal
Great customer service! Went above and beyond on my order. Fast shipping,.competitive.pricing. Very high quality print on sweaters..Thank you and I will be ordering again!
We recently bought and named our boat and wanted to design our own sweatshirts with the boat name..The process was very easy and the sweatshirts were amazing..Can't wait to be using them on the boat!

I have used T-Shirt Elephant for the past 3 years for an annual event. They are incredibly customer-focused and responsive. Their online store works flawlessly and they truly care that the customer gets what they want, when they need it.

the sweater and print was all good and i love it the only problem is the color of the sweater was different then expected online it was safety green hoodie but when i received it, it was more like a highlighter yellow i still like it, it's just eh at first bc i was expecting the color online.
Great company. Great product..The sweatshirts made awesome staff gifts for Christmas. Thank you again..(So glad I DIDN'T go with amazon).

I am not happy at all. The first shipment arrived with no logos on the shirts. I was guaranteed the shirts would be printed and arrive the first week of September and they may arrive on the 11th.
I have been offered a 10% refund, but this is not acceptable.

Pat Larre
Ordered customized quarter-zips. Great price and fast delivery. Customer service is super responsive. Highly recommend for bulk orders, custom designs, for school clubs and teams.
Great website to design my product..Helpful staff..Small error on one of the shirts and the staff quickly and without hassle sent a corrected product..Very friendly..I will be ordering again from TSE
I had a great experience designing my custom hoodie using T-Shirt Elephant. The pricing was good and the delivery was quick. I will definitely use them again for my next custom design project.
Ordered polo shirts for my bowlers online and they were everything I hoped for. I was very happy with the service. Definitely will order from T Shirt Elephant again.

Our package got stolen and they are less than cooperative in helping us get replacement shirts. Some of the worst customer service I've seen so far and it's hard to get a hold of them. Don't make the same error we did and get your business somewhere else.

(aka has marketing aka sterling screen printing) 6+ years working with screen printers and have never experienced such a poorly managed company - they have been holding.our goods hostage for over two months. no one will respond to you, via phone or email. sent couriers direct to get our goods from them, refused to give them to us. save yourself a gigantic, months-long, unmistakable headache and go elsewhere.

Was quite disappointed with the service here as I did not receive any notifications that my order arrived and had to follow up with an email for them to respond that they were sorry I didn't get an email and told me my order was ready. At pickup, I was instructed to go through a side door and I walked through the door to find an incredibly filthy factory and had to ask some random guy standing around nearby to get my order.

In terms of the quality of the product, it was to my satisfaction and no complaints but wholistically factoring in their lack of customer satisfaction, I probably won't order here again.

This was one of the worest experiences of my online purchasing experiences.

No sample sizes given and no actual photos of the product on the website (only computer generated ones).

Printing was done wrong several times (wrong colour, missing our logo).

It took over a month to rectifiy the situation and during that time the initial sales person either quite or was let go. At this point I was unable to get a hold of anyone via phone. I was told only e-mail communication woud be permitted.

There are other Canadian online options that are available that I would recommend using over this company.

Unsatisfied and an overall very disappointing expereince. I would NOT recommend using this company if you want the job done right!

Product is good quality and pricing was reasonable. Could work on their communication a bit. They were supposed to send an email when it was finished but I never received one. The product just showed up one day.

While I was really happy with how the purchase (hat) looked, the hat itself is super uncomfortable - so much so that it is unwearable. I raised this with customer service and they offered a 10% discount on my next purchase. I think replacing the hat would have been more appropriate. Unfortunately, after spending $46 on a hat and it being unwearable, I don't expect to purchase from them again.

It was my first time ordering custom printed t-shirt. I'm very satisfied with the quality and the whole process.

Will order from them for now on.

Quick service, good selection of product, accommodating customer service, they've done well for us!.I just wish they had a wider selection of ink colors for some of the printing - didn't quite match up with our logo colors.

The shape of some of the t-shirts didn't fit at all even though it was the same size as the other the rest. Poor quality product, no exchange possible, no refound, had to wait about two months before receiving my order.

Managing an online store through T-Shirt Elephant has been amazing - their efficient and knowledgeable staff are prompt to respond to any requests, leaving minimal work for the requesting organisation. If you are looking for a seamless process ordering merchandise or beginning an online store for your business,.I highly recommend T-Shirt Elephant.

I placed my order on May 27th with a projected delivery date of June 14th. My item wasn't even shipped until June 18th and the Canada Post tracking is estimating that my order will not arrive until the 9th of July! I can get shipment faster from overseas.
Graphics were well printed -- clear & with precision. ATC women's t-shirt was excellent quality cotton. Overall, I was very satisfied..I will definitely use T-shirt Elephant again!

I have ordered twice from T-Shirt Elephant and i have been very happy with both orders, shirts come printed the way I imagined and hoped for and they usually ship very quick especially within Canada, will be ordering more from them for sure.

Just got my shirts in the mail. The print is amazing however, the XL shirt was obviously smaller than the medium shirt (it looked like a small). Emailed customer service and since the shirts weren't personalized, I'm out of luck. The solution suggested by customer service was give the medium to the person who fits into a XL and the (small) XL to the person who wears medium. Yes, because someone who needs an XL can wear a medium size shirt.

I wish I could rant and rave about the service I received however I can't.
I would like to support Canadian Business as well as some of the other reviewers however I work in Customer Service and this company does not have it.

I sent several emails and left 2 voicemails with no response..It felt like the company was saying "we don't need your money".

I see that many people got great service however my order fell through the cracks and would not recommend t-shirt elephant.

Great customer service and a great product (which allowed for lots of creative, individual touches) at a good price. I was given a estimated arrival date for my order which was unfortunately not accurate. However when I emailed to inquire about the delay, they rushed the order to me..Thank you!

Product was decent, website not a great experience.

The confirmation email with size and numbering info was formatted in a way that obscured an error I would have caught had it displayed properly.

Ended up with 2 useless jerseys, partly my fault, partly theirs. Very annoying.

Ordered 30 shirts 16 hats. Shirts the distress effects was much worse than the website made it look. Hats arrived 3 weeks after shirts. Was lied to about the status of hats they said UPS error originally. Will not use them again.

I ordered some hats at first to see if they were any good, but when the hats showed up I was very disappointed. I had "No Rest" screen printed on the hats, and all except 2 were printed noticeably off center. And on one of the hats the "e" was just a mess that didn't even look like a letter. I gave them a second chance and ordered some shirts, but again the screwed up. The design was again off center and even lopsided on some shirts.
I had a pretty detailed print made on a hoodie. It was pretty bad, I was expecting better. shipping is fast. not impressed with the product however.
Not fast at all. It has taken 20+ days for 2 tank tops that have a design they already had on file from my purchase last year and I still haven't even got a shipping message yet.

Ordered zippered hoodies. Smaller sizes are good fit but the x-large hoodie is very baggy in the body. Material is great and the hoodie itself is very warm. I would order a large hoodie in hindsight but am concerned about the arm length.

Made my order of 10 hoodies with prints on the back, front & sleeves. The material they used was so garbage that out of the box the print was already all cracked on the sleeves. I own several different hoodies and these guys by far have the cheapest material. Not flexible. Still waiting from a response from "Jason". Staff seems to be ok.

My wife and I have been looking for years for a specific hat. Since her birthday was coming up, I decided that since I couldn't find the hat she wanted, I'd have one custom printed. The quality was great and my Wife absolutely loves her new hat.

This place is a scam. I ordered embroidered polos, they came very late, and were not embroidered. When I contacted them they first told me I must have ordered this wrong because you have to call in to order embroidered polos. Then she said she "double checked" and they "do not offer embroidered polos". I went back on the website to double check.I triple checked.I checked for the fourth time. Yes, this website is telling me I am ordering embroidered polos. When I go to the check out it states embroidered polos. I got the run around from 3 different emails who all ended up being the same woman in the end, and I sent screenshots of what the website was showing me.the woman just kept asked for more screenshots. I mean its your own site, look for yourself! SCAM
Easy transaction, super fast service. Only down side, the t-shirts were bigger than expected. Maybe a grading ought to be included in the item description.
We are very pleased with the quality of T-shirt used. The process from ordering to shipping was very quick. Thank you.for the great service.

Incredibly fast from computer to doorstep, easy designing online, very great price level,.and excellent feedback when i emailed their customer service! Love the sweaters and will definitely be using t-shirt elephant again soon!

I ordered some shirts for my store,.the website it pretty user friendly, but when my shirts arrived they were REALLY small, Im not sure who they are going to fit???? they are SO small. I normally were a medium and the XL fits me. Very Disappointing
Don't waste your time or money. Zero customer service. Waited over a month for nothing to show up. No updates or anything either!
Excellent clothing company. Order arrived on time, and did not take very long. High quality hoodie and excellent design. Overall satisfied with my order.
I order merchandise for my cannabis company regularly from T-Shirt Elephant, we order toques, and hoodies and they always come out perfect. Love ordering from these guys.

Had an excellent experience with the customer service site of Tshirt Elephant..I had a serious of super prompt and helpful interactions while working on resolving an issue I was experiencing. Tshirt quality itself is good too. I would highly recommend using this company.

I purchased 3 shirts , im very happy.with quality of shirt and the writing.on back looks amazing . Undortanatly.my logo looks horrible.and very old.and worn out . Sad to say i dont think ill be a returning customer.as it looks as if.i have had it for years.now . I thought with.the price.and reviews.they would have came out much better

SO HAPPY WITH MY SWEATSHIRT. For Christmas I wanted to give unique sweaters to my family with different images. I was nervous that the images may come out blurry, but they were so nice and clear, even the writing came out clear. Just a note that Large is large ;)
I am very happy with my order. The quality of the T-Shirts is excellent. Ordered on a Sunday afternoon, and it arrived a week later.

Well in short, my experience with T-Shirt Elephant was an absolute breeze, it could not have gone any better. I was able to work with the same agent with all communication, and she knew exactly what I needed. I was able to go in to their office and try on a range of shirts and pick out the one I liked best. Easy Peasy!

Wow..In a word?."Outstanding!" Quality of cotton tee's excellent..Super thick..Resolution on graphics superb..(I used good-sized png art files per a web-forum recommendation.).Came out great..And shipped in less than two weeks..I'll be doing this again..Thanks, T-Shirt Elephant!

Ordered a t shirt almost 3 weeks ago, and I have yet to receive it or see any trace of it. Whenever i asked about it I've only been told they don't have any more information. 45$ down the toilet thanks T shirt elephant.

Not impressed with the print quality.! ordered two of a graphic and while they are not awful, the prints look like a spray stencil that'll likely fall apart in the first wash. I would potentially make a sample again as delivery was quite fast.
Pleased with the product and a very fast turnaround from the date the order was placed to the order arriving. Jason was available when needed and always responded quickly. Thanks team!

I ordered a tshirt for my boyfriend, a medium Gildan shirt is actually fairly large. The white print on it was also very patchy, with numerous tiny holes that let you see the black shirt underneath. Furthermore, the print did not reach to the edges of the shirt like it was displayed on the computer.
This design was actually a duplicate I made for my boyfriend as the one I got him last year from pmall was starting to show wear and tear. I will not be buying a shirt from here again, go to pmall, it's cheaper and ready in a few moments (no need to pay for shipping).

A huge thank you to everyone at T-shirt Elephant !.I'll definitely be coming back with future jobs. Thank you so much for the quick turnaround and your professionalism..These shirts are going to sell like hot cakes . And will be raising.funds for my friends family. He lost his life during a special effects test .Warren Appleby.was a stand up guy and amazing boss . The Special effects and film family.has lost a great leader .these shirts are going to help the healing in our close knit community.I have perma smile on my face right now!
Thank you.

I received the jersey prints for our team and they arrived very quickly . The printing on them is great quality and the jerseys are also high quality.

Definitely recommend t shirt elephant.
Awesome customer service, great prices. Shirts came in under budget and almost a week sooner than promised. I will happily use T-Shirt Elephant again for our next event!

Really good quality items. I had a bit of a hard time getting the design to fit.in their dimensions because the website is clunky and confusing (I gave feedback about this). But once I received my items, and in record time, I was so pleased. Will definitely be back for more. Thanks!
Excellent experience, great product, I'm wearing my shirt right now..It's so soft and fits perfectly..It shipped quickly and I received it just yesterday!.Thanks guys and keep up the great work!

This company "punishes" people with their unfair cancellation policy. I totally understand that business moves fast today, but I find it hard to believe that ink to shirt occurred in less than 5 minutes. Very disappointed that I was given no consideration and simply told "tough". Stay away unless you're perfect.
I wish I could give them less starts. I have tried to contact them multiple times about a botched order..

This place doesn't reply to emails/phone msgs. If you have a good experience all is well if you have a bad experience they tell u to shove it. Ordered ball shirts, numbers on the back we're the wrong colour, 2 showed up with no numbers at all and when the FINALLY answered back they said too bad so sad. You are taking a chance with this place if you order from them. Also pay attention to the negative reviews, every reply was the same from them‚Äùcontact us and we will try to make it right‚Äù yah did that and they replyed to bad so sad. But they are Canada's leading option as they claim lmao.
Amazing Customer Service, a lot of attention to details. Easy to use website, High Quality products. Quick Delivery. Will defiantly be only using T-Shirt Elephant from now on! Thank you Team.

The new embroidered new era snap back caps were done nicely, and the shirt order were good quality. Ordering from a few provinces over, the turn around was only a couple weeks. Thanks T-Shirt Elephant!

print quality is good however shirt sizes run quite small; there was an error on 2 shirts of 4 that I ordered; they offered to reprint and when I asked to have them printed on a size larger they couldn't accommodate; seems kind of silly when you are trying to correct a problem

I decided to try out T-Shirt Elephant for my schools spirt wear and when the order came in I was amazed with the quality of the long sleeves and sweaters! The quality came out 100 times better then we ever imagined. I definitely recommend this company!

The order came on time despite I made a mistake on the address. They managed to change it on time and I got a pretty awesome quality t-shirt! the quality was beyond expectation, no visible pixels or anything like it.

I had five t-shirts made for my grown kids. I hate to admit this but they were used in the making of t-shirt quilts. There were missing shirts representing events in their lives --especially my daughter who never keeps anything. It was so easy to use the website --even for a 70 year old. I was able to save and upload images from the web --eg. my son's high school logo and size the words and images to fit the 12x12 " requirement for the quilt. They arrived more than a week before I was expecting them and they were beautiful -- I couldn't believe how a crest I uploaded was so perfectly reproduced. It was so hard to have to cut them for the quilt but now that I realize how easy they are to make and how well they turn out, I will be making some to actually be worn.

Easy, fast and affordable.

My main criticism would be that the design does not appear to be scaled on each t-shirt. Maybe it would be helpful to have a preview the design on small medium vs large or have an option to scale to fit the size of the shirt.
The shirts I ordered are of a good quality and they arrived when expected. They fit a bit larger than I hoped. I am happy with the experience thus far.

took them 3 weeks to tell me they couldnt (copyright) make my project

"Hi James, sorry, we cannot print copyrighted Visual Content or IP that does not.

Please make sure to include The Youth size on the same line as the size.
As, I had made a very costly mistake selecting XL thinking it was adult size, I don't know how I made that mistake but it was done. Now I have a wonderful youth size XL hoodie that cost me 100$. Thank You!

I order a long white sleeve shirt with a custom design I made on it, upon receiving it it did not have the design on it, it what just the blank shirt without the design on it. If someone is reading this I would like to either have a refund or the design that I asked for put on the shirt please.

Not impressed at all..I paid $50.00 for a tshirt that was really poor quality..I didn't expect extremely high end - but this was a light grey tshirt that was very see through..The tshirt also had a smell to it - I don't know if it was the ink from the logo but I wasn't impressed at all..I will try to find another company going forward.
Hoodie came out great! My friend says it's super comfy and she loves the yellow colour! Customer service was great at answering questions I had. :)

Impossible to contact this company. Send emails, no response. Leave voicemail,.no response.

Just needing some basic customer service.

This order was received in a timely fashion and everyone likes them. I made a mistake in some numbers for sizes and T-Elephant has been wonderful in helping me get them on time. Rebecca has been wonderful in walking me through what I had to do.
Great service. Created our shirts online using Elephant's software and got them quicker than date quoted. Definitely will use again.
ordered a crewneck and hoodie and the quality is great! and the shipping was SO fast. i will definitely order again from t-shirt elephant in the future.

Great options, great service, super fast turn around and product exactly as ordered. Missing a star as the images impressed on the t-shirt are creased and wrinkled due to shipping. More careful folding could have mitigated this. Thanks.

Great quality with awesome customer service!.Ordered shirts for a fundraiser for my young niece diagnosed with AML and they delivered without any worry and even arrived earlier than expected..Thank you so much!.Will be sure to recommend to others

I was impressed that staff contacted us for a higher resolution photo and that they edited the background from the photo I sent so it worked better on the clothing I ordered..The clothes are high quality and shipment was fast.

I ordered some t-shirts for my apparel brand samples (Musclechino).
T-Shirt Elephant were fast on the delivery. Plus the shirts turn out amazing.

Thanks
Musclechino and The Condo Trainer

Customer service gives courteous responses but don't actually do anything, I was advised my order was rush delivery guaranteed Wednesday June 6th, did not show up. They then advised no worries will for sure ship out today. It did not.

They then said they apopologize and will. Ship out Thursday. It did not.

And then on friday no one is available to chat, email or take a phone call, absolutely unacceptable and my order is useless since I needed it before the end of this week.Terrible service, would avoid at all costs
Second time using them, excellent prints..My wife couldn't have been happier with her new hoodies!.Easy to use, solid selection, fair pricing.

Their screen printing wears off over time and the customer service is absolutely terrible. They forgot to send a shirt and I was told they would make another and send it. 6 months later haven't heard a word from them and haven't received the shirt.

Terrible customer service. I placed an order in early August which was expected to arrive by September 9th. By the 16th I still hadn't received anything so I contacted the company. They told me that it was going to print immediately (meaning they completely forgot my order and was rushing to get it done now after nearly a month of waiting) - and that I would have it by the following Tuesday. Well.the following Tuesday came and went and nothing received.

Eventually cancelled my order with nothing received.

I needed 500 neon tank tops turned around quickly for a weird party I was throwing and the Elephant got me them very quickly and for a better price than anywhere I could find online or in the city. I just got my order and the shirts look great.

I ordered 4 prints on clothing there with 2 different graphics. On the website you can size and move the graphic to be appealing.

First: 5 weeks after ordering, still no news. The provided ETA by the company overdue. I write them and a week later it arrived.

Then:
It's a very cheap iron on print.
They used one of the graphics on all of the pieces of clothing. Not the second one.
And to make it super cheap and easy for them they used the same size for all of them.
Completely ignoring the provided design from their design website!
This looks horrible.
I also chose a ‚Äúused washed out‚Äù look for the graphics as it works well with the 80s look, but this was also not applied.

I wrote a mail to customer service that this is unacceptable work and they are not replying to me! I remind them every week and It's been 3 weeks of them ignoring me.
And those 4 pieces of clothing cost me 200$ and I got the cheapest laziest print.

UPDATE
After 4 weeks they got back to me, offering me to reprint the shirts with the wrong signature design. They double checked with me that the sizing and placement was correct. Which was a very pleasant interaction and lead to nice and correct shirts.
With the last experience I change my one star rating to two.

I'm so happy with the shirts I ordered! Everyone was so professional and answered back to any concerns in a timely manner. Thank you so much for everything! I will definitely be using you guys again in the near future!
I had a small order of 4 t-shirts. The interface to see the design on the t-shirt before ordering was very helpful. The turn around was quick. And the t-shirts took great!

The quality of pants were great and the print came out amazing great colour as well but I don't know if I miss read the description of the track pants but even the cheapest tracks you buy at walmart have pockets and these one from T-Shirt Elephant did not have any pockets. Very disappointed about that.

I ordered this t-shirt well in advance of my event, and was told it would arrive by May 5th. It is now May 12th, and it is apparently arriving on May 19th.3 days after my event. Zero stars wasn't an option.
I have been ordering for the last 4 years. Always very pleased with finished product. My crew love wearing the shirts.

Order delayed and landed about a month late because of covid - the order was not a rush - Happy with the product - Hoodies and beanies - A bit more communication would have helped - just an update would have sufficed during the delay.

Products were great..Customer service was excellent..I needed the shirts very quickly and they came through for me..I would definitely recommend their products and service.

Greg O

Ran out of one item offered a switch which they called a free upgrade to a completely different item with a lesser price point. Missing items, items shipped weren't ordered..Contacted and only response was I approved the change..My other concerns were not addressed at all.

The online API for making custom shirts is a complete mess!
I spent a total of 3 hours for what should've taken 30 minutes, AND they got my order quantities and design specifications wrong.
After receiving a poorly printed shirt and a wrong size shirt (0/2) I contacted the Elephant in the room..They quickly reproduced the shirts correctly in size and quality..Satisfied customer now.
Shirts were as ordered, at a fair price given that they're custom. I'd order again.

price was awesome, order came in time, picture quality was awesome and they even went through the trouble to improve the resolution on our image when it was too low. Sweaters look awesome an are super comfy!

This place is ridiculous and has the WORST customer service I have ever encountered. Ordered a shirt in April and still haven't received it. They haven't even shipped it, even though it should have been shipped weeks ago. They won't even respond to my emails anymore. Avoid this company at all costs
This is my second time using T-shirt Elephant and I am not only impressed with the easy to use software but the quality of the shirts. good pricing, good shipping, will be using again.
Customer service is a little hit or miss. But after several attempts the response once good once initiated. Paid for express service and that was received.
Custom T-Shirt looks really nice. Medium fits allot smaller than the average size (M). Company were unwilling to adjust or help out.

My first experience was better than expected same as the quality of my tshirts. The only thing is that it runs way to big for the size. Other than that it was great from designing it to delivery ëçèª.

Terrible service. Order may 20th and still haven't recieved my item. Asked for rush they said no. I get no status updates on my order and I finally got that it shipped June 5th..Still haven't gotten it. The mail service is not that behind as I've gotten things from other places that I ordered later. But apparently there's no tracking info. Will no order again.
Just would like to add they were fast to respond, confirm technical details, reassure delivery before our event and stand behind they products quality (and replace if necessary)..Very Happy!

Ordered in November, this was a replacement and printed incorrectly for the second time. Missing orders and no reply from emails since early December. Great products when printed correctly but lacking customer service and communication.
I use T-Shirt elephant for all my projects. Great quality sweatshirts, great quality printing and great customer service. Thanks for always making my vision come to life!

Okay, so I live on Canada's west coast & the shirts get shipped to me from somewhere in Vancouver (I think), and anyways - they took ONE DAY to get to me..ONE DAY..I've literally never had anything delivered that fast..Anyways, I'm just super stoked & pleasantly surprised, so THANK YOU!

Just got my shirts and they look good and fit well.

The screen printing came out crisp just like I ordered.

I would order from here again.

I love the clothing options and the control the site gives you over the final product. It leaves no doubt about what's going to be made. The final product in my case (direct-to-clothing printing on cotton) was fantastic.

Made an order and two weeks later I got an email asking me to change the product because it was sold out. A week later, a new email for the same reason. Took forever to get my order. Pretty satisfied with the quality though.
Absolutely brutal service. Had an issue with a product the company said they would fix then nothing happened and can't get any further response. Such bad business.

The tshirt I ordered wasn't available so I was contacted and offered an alternative that I am incredibly satisfied with. I was taken care promptly and I would do business with the company again. in a heartbeat!

Excellent costumer service.

I had a problem with my order and when I told them, they sent me a 15% code with which to be honest I wasn't really happy with. The thing is that when I bought another shirt, they sent me a second one for free and this was the absolute best thing ever.

Excellent compagny
Website easy to use, price reasonable, and the ability to order just one shirt was nice. Just wish the quality of the shirt itself was better - not a nice soft cotton.
Ordered a gardening apron in denim for my daughter in law..It is well made and the personalization looks amazing! Would definitely recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è
After a small delay due to a printer problem from a power outage it was shipped out and arrived sooner than expected. Pleased with the product and definitely plan to order again some day.

Good products, you exactly get what you order. Great and quick responses by customer service. Design wasnt as good as I thought it would be but It might be because of the pictures I uploaded werent very good quality. Overall I would order again.

Initially I was going to give the place one star because the placement of our design was incorrect. However after getting a hold of the team, they rush ordered more shirts in the same colour, even resized them because some were too small, re-printed them asap and ensured the placement was where we wanted. I know it can be hard to get a hold of customer service but they just moved and are settling in, so if you live in the GTA, it might be worth it to visit their north york location (Raitherm Rd).
Shorts ordered but the mesh fabric makes them almost transparent..Contacted customer services and they told me there is nothing they can do based on their return policy.

Great price, great product. They promised we would have our shirts in before our race and they absolutely delivered!

Wouldn't hesitate to buy from again.

Thanks for everything!

I had a rather complicated design that needed to go on dry-fit style shirts and I asked a few other companies if they can do it..Everyone but this company said no. They were championship shirts for a bunch of kids who did something amazing. Thank-you so much for making it happen!

Great company!.I was easily able to design my own product, and the shipping was QUICK..I'm a teacher, and needed apparel for my school programs..I would highly recommend this company to schools in need of t-shirts/hoodies!
extremely high quality work. This is my third order with them as of this review. Outstanding work if I say so myself..Highly recommended if you're into making some designs for yourself or to sell.

It's a great cheap custom printing site! If you are looking for a super small order (less than 6) they definitely do that which can be hard to find and if you want bigger than its even cheaper and delivery was like a weak early which was just great!

Products shipped quickly as was very impressed with the quality of the items.
One of the designs ordered was out of stock, but I was quickly contacted by them and the issue was resolved.

The customer service is very rude and bad in service and answering calls about the placed order. it took more then 60 days to delivered the products ordered and prepaid..But the quality and workmanship is good.

Website is great, very easy to use, easy to upload your own images..I wasnt super impressed with the accuracy of the stitching on the hats i ordered..Very expensive at $65 a hat, so I expected more I guess.

Although we were missing one shirt when they were delivered, Chris was quick to remedy the situation and shipped the missing shirt express. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for custom printing.

Once ordered two hoodies that were not as good as I expected, I wrote to them, they were super cooperative and shipped me good ones without charging anything more. Great customer service and great quality!
I've used T-Shirt Elephant for many years and have always been blown away with the service and quality of each of my orders. I would highly recommend.them to anyone and everyone!
Jason answered all of my questions in a timely manner and was there to help me every step of the way with my order! We love our tees!

The biggest mistake I've made in business so far, was trusting this company with mine. They promised the world initially, but it was all ‚Äúsmoke and mirrors.‚Äù Pricing might be good, but at the cost of poor quality and terrible customer service. I hope anyone's experience with this company is better than mine, but I would recommend you look elsewhere.
I designed a hoodie for my boyfriend and he was really happy. I was satisfied with the work too. The hoodie is good and warm material and design was exactly what I wanted it to be. Thank you!

Would give them zero stars if I could. Ordered shirts, they took 2 weeks longer than expected, and there is no one operating the company. Tried contacting them to seek help, zero response.
DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! Not even sure if they still exist.
I have shamelessly bought my entire t shirt collection from T Shirt Elephant! I can't get enough of the unique designs! Will wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone and everyone.
Ordered tshirts for my bachelor party and they turned out great. The ordering process was very easy especially putting names on the back. Tshirts came on time, boys looked epic in the shirts.

BEWARE: They will hold you hostage even if you try to cancel your order 15 minutes after you placed it! I wish I could give this place 0 stars! Save your money and go to your local promotional supplier instead. Low quality work from low quality people. They ruined Christmas for my team :(
My shirt arrived and I love it. It's big on me but that's my own fault because I think I'm bigger than what I actually am lol. Would definitely order again
We ordered merch and they printed it wrong. They are holding our money hostage and they will not pay us back

The worst quality shirts I have ever gotten. Customer service refused to fix the problem and has purposely pushed communication so that she can clock out and go home for the day. Extremely unprofessional company and terrible products.
This needs to be fixed

Great products, fast shipping, great customer service.
Had an issue with a couple of sweaters in my order, they re-printed them and sent them out to me very quickly.

Not at all service friendly. Very unsatisfied with product. Faulty t-shirt. Picture came off after one washing. The entire picture crazed. Looks terrible, unable to wear. Cheap product. Never again purchase from this company.
Printed out the exact shirt I wanted, which was pleasing. As well it was shipped out quite fast. Overall Elephant T Shirtis a good company for a good price

Was a little disappointed in the design process. I was hoping for embroidery on the jacket I ordered but it came with a heat press..Product was fine but there was a lack of communication and execution of process.
Great quality, easy to design online and fast and free shipping! I've compared many companies for my custom apparel needs and this one is by far the best.

I was hesitant to use this service due to several negative reviews, however I was extremely happy with the price, quality, and speed of my order..I didn't receive a shipping confirmation, so the package was a bit of a surprise, but other than that everything was great.

After hours of combing the internet and comparing many quotes these guys are always competitively priced. I've placed several tshirts/hoodie/hat orders with them now.and I have consistently been impressed with quality,.speed and customer service.
I ordered merchandise and it was printed wrong. My money is being held hostage and they are refusing to reimburse me.
Product itself was good but shipped a week later than stated when purchasing without any notice. Customer service was short, unclear, and unfriendly from first interaction on.
Very professional and accurate. Order was affordable and arrived promptly withing the expected shipment time. I recommend T-Shirt Elephant to all my friends

So user-friendly, creative, fun, efficient, fair pricing and hyper fast delivery (they announced 4 weeks and it took only one)! Very happy with the result, almost exactly as shown on the computer, which matters most! I'll be back for more, that's a fact!

Really disappointed with my order. Ordered an XL as a gift and when it came it barely fit a medium. Sizing chart wasn't something I found during my order. Even then I expect an XL to at least be close to fitting but it's tiny. I'll be looking somewhere else for my custom work.
Great customer service, great people, great product!.Highly recommend for your custom t-shirt needs..Online t-shirt creator really easy to use.
Ordered a hoodie for my son. Love the quality of hoodie and they delivered it to us because they were a day late on order..Great customer service and quality as well as price

Came very fast and is a soft, warm sweater. Only default would be that the words on the front came slightly faded but other than that very good quality and will definitely be ordering soon!
Overall happy with my large order but was disappointed to realize my sweat pants didn t have any pockets!??.The fabric isn t heavy, that s basically what I wanted something light.
Very nice quality printing with accurate colours and sharp definition. Shirts are great quality and the website lets you pick from many options for shirt brands and styles. Highly recommended
It was so fast and exactly what I ordered. Unfortunately I was having a crazy day and mistakenly ordered youth shirts when I needed adult shirts but the product was great!
We ordered hoodies with the logo on the front upper and on the back. The hoodies are great. They look good and are very warm and comfortable. Totally recommend T-shirt Elephant

Ordered shirts for my business. They sent the wrong design. 5 weeks late and they wont respond for me to return them. I'm personally going to drive from Ottawa to Toronto next week to return them in person.
Ryan R.
My first order of hoodies came fast & were great, the t shirts & hat took months & we were disappointed compared to the Hoodies.
Easy to use design area,.I uploaded my file and sized as required and placed my order..Delivery was to be 14 days however, it arrived several days earlier than expected.

Be aware that the size you order will show up 2 sizes small than the actual size. Ridiculous. Plus the $24 for the short and $12 for SLOW shopping makes this purchase nothing but a regret. Don't waste your money folks.
I appreciate the quality of material, prompt shipping and the fact that the shirt was color fasted before it was delivered to us. Thanks so much for your great work.

You guys did a fantastic job. It turned out exactly how it looked in the online design centre and delivered prior to the expected time of completion. A lil' pricey with delivery charge but quality work. Well done !

I just got my order, the shirts I ordered were awesome! I also had the best customer service experience ever with Rixa, they answered every question and concern I had when I first placed my order and made sure that I was going to get my order on time (and it came early!) thanks so much guys!
Ordered t-shirts for a bachelor party..Online design options were easy to use..Final product looked great and delivery was fast.
horrible experience,good thing i didn't order my 200 shirts right away! Will find a better place,that treat their customers better and take the time to do a.quality print. They sure didn't
I ordered two custom-made crewneck sweaters and they turned out fantastic! The sweaters were even shipped earlier than expected. I absolutely love this company!
Excellent service. I ordered three shirts, chose my own font, etc. They arrived earlier than expected and were perfect. thanks so much, Bev.

Great quality shirts/jackets and top notch printing on the material.
Was delivered in a timely manner. I'll be ordering more soon for sure!
It was easy to design and choose product. They are fast and even message to make sure of one of my choices as it was the wrong color. Fast shipping as well! Thank you!
Made a special order for team jerseys, and although there was an initial error, they were quick to fix it beyond expectations. The quality of work was also very good.

I placed an order on Jan. 21 and didn't receive it until March 4th after paying $15.00 for shipping. Turns out they knew my order would be delayed and didn't bother to contact me until I reached out to them twice via email.

This company has the most incredible customer service! We had a few issues totally on our end and they couldn't do enough to help us. I've used them a few times and tell absolutely everyone to use them aswell. Couldn't rate it higher

I had a old black and white picture of our band of 35 years ago. It was not the best quality black and white print copy. I asked for a black and white . It came in as black and white contrast. the faces a little grey. It was fantastic and more than I expected. Though black and white high contrast, you can easily tell who is who. Some of the our equipment and back drop came out well. Thank you
Ordered a couple shirts and they are good quality. They arrived pretty quickly too. Would recommend.
I've used T-Shirt Elephant as a screen printing company for several years and they've always been reliable, even during the pandemic. I will continue to use them for years to come.

I was VERY disappointed with this purchase..The product which arrived was NOT the same as the product which I designed, and T-Shirt Elephant was NOT helpful at all in resolving the issue..I will NOT shop here again.

This team is awesome. Had an issue with my most recent order.(lost count). contacted them and they had it resolved in Two days! What great customer service.
I will order again.and again. and etc.
The design site was easy to use, the price very reasonable with no minimum order limits, the order was completed, shipped and delivered well within the time frame and the quality is great. Thanks!
T-Shirts were decently done for qaulity but shipping and management was horrible. I waited almost 2 months for my tshirts. Would never buy from here again.
Very easy process to order some new toques for my guys. Prices and quality were good. We received them in timely manner also
Ordered a single full colour custom shirt. It arrived when promised and looks absolutely incredible. Worth every penny.

False advertising on website. Not 100% made in canada. not made in canada at all. Also was weeks late shipping, and had extremely poor customer service. Design also didn't match what we ordered, it wasn't far off but a good business would've told the client there'd be a noticeable difference. All around horrible experience.

The customer service is very good and the delivery was fast.
The t-shirts are very good quality.
I would recommend this company to any person that want custom t-shirts.
Website is awesome..Makes it easy to order. Fast delivery and the shirts are great..Bored with t-shirts?.Make your own! It's so much fun wearing something original.

Won't be ordering from you again.
AVOID!.I ordered 4 hats and 4 t-shirts early Dec..I still haven't received the hats and "Customer Service" is now ignoring my emails..This is currently in with credit card fraud department
I just received the two shirts I ordered for my dad and boyfriend for Christmas, they're excellent! Exactly what I had designed :) I'll definitley be ordering again soon :)
T shirt looked great. Fast dispatch - arrived in Canmore earlier than the quoted date. Excellent service all round. Recommended
Great quality, fast service. Everything arrived perfectly before Christmas and our "family" T-shirt was a huge hit at the Christmas get-together and a memorable, affordable present to give.
Product was good and as expected. Issue was when I ordered, the estimated delivery date turned into estimated shipping date after order placed, received product week later than was expected.
I love how easy and fast it is to order with TShirt Elephant! They are great to deal with! I send them a photo of what I want and ask them to review any background and they do a fantastic job!
I have had great service from this company..Not only that but the quality is excellent..I will use T-shirt for any of my custom clothing needs..A great Canadian company!
Got T-Shirts made for my 40th Wedding Anniversary..Taking the whole family to WDW..The customer service at T-Shirt Elephant was outstanding.
This is the second time I've ordered shirts from them and it was just as pleasant as the first. Quality work and fast shipping!
My jerseys were ready on time and as ordered. The print quality was really good. Overall a great experience.

Great Quality, Easy to use Website, and Great Customer Service! I had a small hiccup in an order and they fixed it ASAP..I will use this Canadian company in the future for any of my custom design needs.
The t-shirt image, I designed, turned out beautifully! Bright vivid colors, placement was perfect. Will definitely order from them again!

Where is the - (negative) star!.I am beginning to this this web site is a SCAM!.It has been 1.5 months now since I ordered and paid $$..but have never received anything, but headaches from this place!.Customer service is a total joke!.BEWARE of this site!
I've ordered a few sets of shirts from them with complicated design work. They've always done a stellar job with the printing and delivering them on time for a great price.
Exactly as ordered and the hoodies are very warm and comfortable. The price is excellent and they delivered within a 2 week window.
T-shirt received 1 month after the order. even if I paid for the rush delivery. got finally a refund after multiplying chat with customer service agent. Very disappointed. Never again.
My order was great it cam in just like I ordered and I received it before the the original shipping day.
Great products..The processing is a bit slow (~2 weeks) but got my t-shirts and happy with the prints on them!
Easy and positive transaction. My t-shirt was as described - size, colour, look etc. It was an attractive design and came quickly!

Would not recommend. Designed a jersey and logo but there colours of the logo that were sent to me were much different than what I had designed online. Cost was better than most, but I guess you get what you pay for.
