Took 3 weeks to have my hoodie created. But otherwise the hoodie itself is exactly as expected and the printing is clean, clear and flawless.
Good quality shirts, super fast, easy design tools, and reasonable pricing. I've used them a few times now and it's great to support a Canadian company!
The hoody was delivered in very good time, and looked exactly the way we wanted. The logo was well placed on the garment and was perfectly printed. Thanks!

The design on the shirts was good, unfortunately the colour of the words was too light and looked faded on the front of the shirt. I wish I could have seen that better online to know to go with a darker colour.
Fantastic! High quality product and seamless design. My order took just over a week to ship instead of the estimated 2 weeks

Unfortunately Google does not allow me to give a 0. This company does not know the meaning of customer service. They take your money and then do nothing to fulfill the order in a timely manner. Would never use them again and am telling everyone I know about their poor service.

The service was quick and we got the shirts done quickly my only complaint is when they were out of youth med in black and I requested that they switch the whole order to grey they said that they would it it this once as though they were doing me a favour.

Although mistakes were made in the design process these should have been caught by quality control (eg. black text on a black shirt or white text on top of black text) . Unfortunately they were unwilling to remedy the errors
Great looking shirts. The printing is exactly how I envisioned it and looks the same as the artwork I sent. My only complaint is the speed, 2 weeks to get them.
T-shirt Elephant delivered promptly and everything looks great..Issue I have is with the actual apparel..Not very happy with garments.

I have used T-Shirt Elephant 4 times now, and every time my expectations have been surpassed. Great product for an even greater price!

Keep up the great work!
The quality of the t-shirts are excellent and the service for ordering and delivery is prompt. Because of these T-shirts I have ordered many different styles
Great communication with customer service, quick response time, easy to use design interface, love my shirt! A bit expensive when only designing a single shirt, but totally worth it!òä.

The shirt came out fire. If you live close to them go pick up.its cheaper. The only problem is the pick up area is not located properly and rather odd. You need to use a back door that goes into a big warehouse. You might feel out of place for just picking up one item.
Great service and awesome looking tee..They were great even after the recipient didn't check her stupid mailbox and the shirt was sent back!.thanks so much :-)
Just as ordered..The graphics we sent came out perfect with vibrant colors. Well done. It wont be our only order.
Great product, easy service to design my own shirts and fast turn around and delivery. I will be back again.

First order went well..Second order was a mess -- would not answer phones, did not return phone messages, order was shipped to the wrong address, shipping department does not communicate with customer service, mistakes in order..Would give 1 star but full refund was issued.
Will be finding another company in the future.

I've been trying and trying to get a hold of this company for over a month now to ask questions about a large order I'd like to place and I haven't heard back from them. No emails, no return phone calls (apparently "Dave" is always away from his desk), no response at all. Going with someone else.
Super fast and easy and the shirts are great..I would love to see a better way to help position a logo..Some sort of rules of thumb for typical height, size etc.
Order was made and shipped on time. The logo is lower on the hat than I'd like and I was told it would be embroidered but it wasn't.
good price for the crewneck sweater that i got customized, fast process of my order, got it in only 2-3 days by post to Quebec. Comfy shirt! ;)
Excellent service. Was very happy with my sweatshirts and the design was exactly as I expected. Will definitely be ordering more.

This was my first time using T-shirt Elephant
and am very happy. Easy to use site and good quality for price point and fast delivery.

great quality print, I actually got a picture of my dad on a shirt for his retirement party and the graphics turned out great, exactly how i wanted it and fast shipping,

I'm very happy with the hoodies that I ordered with them. The website was super easy to use. Their customer service is just AMAZING!

wish i could give it a zero, the service was horrible and overall "jason" was completely rude we had several questions and he left us waiting for weeks for a reply, not to mention that their phones never "seemed to work." yes the price is decent and the print is decent but for the service i will never be coming back to this place and i hope you guys heed mine and the other warnings and steer clear of this place.

Sent an email and called in regards to changing order before it was shipped, but no one got back to me. The order was shipped as the original order, I wasn't able to make any changes as the customer service is lacking.

Extremely helpful and I was pleased with our bowling shirts!.The colours and prints were clearly matched..Our names on the back of the shirts stand out!
Easy order process -had my order done BEFORE the estimated time - accommodated last minute changes - great customer service.
ordered t-shirts and hoodies from elephant and this place is commited to serving its costumers right. awesome quality and fast shipping. you get what you pay for

Very annoyed with this company, shirts were estimated to come in on the 12th, havent arrived, and have been emailing and calling asking for time frames and no one has gotten back to me. Wouldnt reccomend.

I ordered some shirts and a hoodie which arrived on time. Good quality shirts. Would buy from them again for sure.

I love the fact that this company is Canadian!
Great quality product and my order came right on time!
This was my first experience with this company and it won't be my last!
Love my new hoodies!
By far the best value in Canada for small order custom clothing. Free shipping! Everything came perfect and on time.

Overall horrible experience. Will never work with again.
Performance shirts were of high quality and the printing was excellent. Uploading my logo and shirt selection was super easy.
They were fantastic to deal with. High quality clothing, and stellar customer service! I would definitely recommend T-shirt Elephant !
I'm very satisfied with my shirts! They came in a timely manner, and were exactly what I was expecting. Thank you, T-Shirt Elephant!
Great work!.The shirts came out perfectly and I'll be ordering more in the near future.

T-Shirt Guys (especially Joanna) did a great job on our order. There was a small issue that they quickly resolved. Great customer service! The shirts are comfortable and look great! I will use their services again in the future!

These guys did a last minute job for a shirt that I needed for a 70th birthday, and they totally went above and beyond and delivered something that was even better than I originally had on order through Amazon. Amazon let me down which gave me the opportunity to support a local business instead. Lesson learned, just support the local business first.,  called and spoke with Jenny to discuss some embroidery work I needed done and was running out of time due to a weird situation with the first place I thought I had lined up. She verbally confirmed embroidery was something they do and told me to come in the next morning. They moved so it was a solid 30 minute drive from me but thats ok i needed the work done. When I arrived I was very disappointed to hear that embroidery is NOT something they can do. I was so clear when I spoke with Jenny about my needs so I don't understand where this went sideways. A warning to anyone else caught in the same situation because although the owner is pleasant enough, he really didn't seem to care. §∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Just had a small order of 2 shirts for a Christmas present and when I went to pick them up the shirts look great but unfortunately one was printed on the wrong type of shirt. ( I had specifically asked, and paid, for Bella & Canvas and it was substituted with American Apparel). I immediately emailed them and got a fairly short response that they use the two brands interchangeably and I would be refund the $2 difference. I realize this is a small problem but I specifically asked for and wanted the Bella and Canvas shirt and not thrilled that they would use a cheaper ( by $2 but still) shirt that I would have paid more for had I not noticed the swap. The printing is beautiful and the service was quick and friendly but I wont be able to recommend this business. Maybe attention to detail could be something to work on in the new year.

Fantastic quality, fantastic service!.They drove a shirt all the way across Toronto for a Mother's Day rush delivery, free of charge, and the shirt was sensational :).I wouldn't expect this once the pandemic is over, but they were really amazing, and I will 100% work with them again..The T-shirt Guys made it very easy to support local businesses..Thanks!

That is out of our control as our supplier is a major Canadian garment provider. Our apologies -- but it does happen, all we can do is try and switch colours to an available option." My late mother-in-law had a wonderful shortbread recipe and baked it every holiday. To honour her memory I had decided to have permanent copies of the recipe printed. With the help of the T-ShirtGuys, particularly Katherine and Steven, I was able to create the best Christmas gifts ever! I worked with Katherine just under 2 weeks. My original 12-year-old, typed copy was formatted in a new layout; three different font sizes and font styles were chosen, and 23 lines of text were perfectly spaced over the 18‚Äùx26‚Äù area of a cotton tea towel. I brought in 5 tea towels of varied quality and patterns to be tested and used for printing. One minor adjustment was made in the first printing and all remaining results were successful. In the end, 17 tea towels were printed with ‚ÄúHelen's Christmas Shortbread‚Äù recipe. I don't imagine this was a huge order for the T-ShirtGuys but it was a very special order for me - near and dear to my heart. I feel that Katherine and Steven put as much care, effort and thought into my small printing needs as they would have with any bigger project. The people who received these early Christmas gifts were quite touched - as one family member said, ‚ÄúMarking the first Christmas without Mum was so right and enshrining one of her loving annual traditions in a pretty tea towel . ahhh.‚Äù Thank you T-ShirtGuys. Thank you Katherine and Steven. It was the most gift-giving fun for me, ever.‚Äù.Jean Simon

Ellen and the staff at T-Shirt Guys were very friendly, helpful and accommodating to the many requests + inquiries that I had for our staff t-shirts and hoodies. Their responses to e-mails and telephone calls were prompt. Thanks for all of your help! As Arnold would say, 'I'll be back.'

The owner is rude and abusive.

I had them confirm for my quote - twice - that I was going to go through with the order on the condition that the shirts were made in North America. After I paid for and received my shirts, the tag said they were made in Bangladesh.

Clearly, they made a mistake which I was willing to overlook as long as they remedied the situation. They offered a refund, but I was shocked when the owner then had the nerve to start an argument with me based on his "feelings about the situation" and yell at me over the phone for his mistake claiming that I was trying to scam him because no one could possibly expect to have a shirt printed for $30 each from North America (which, by the way, I have already found at a different store for $32 each - American Apparel)..He then proceeded to tell me how wrong I was to want shirts made in North America in the first place. His behaviour was nothing short of rude, abusive and completely inappropriate towards anyone let alone his paying customers. There are plenty of other options in Toronto.
Amazing service! Very helpful. Very pleased with my shirt design and purchase. Will be going back for more.

Bought a custom large canvas for 220$. Paid in advance. Told me it would take 2 weeks to get. 2 weeks turned into 3, 3 into 4.and everytime I contacted them I got the runaround that it was almost ready and they'd call me soon.

A full 31 days after I had given them my money, I went to the Atwater store before being told it was ready.but at Eaton Center store.but after getting there the employee told me they didn't have the frame. Asked for a refund.and the employee had to call someone who I figured was the manager. We agree to a refund. They have to send it by email transfer though for some reason.

3 hours later get a call telling me my canvas is ready and I have to come pick it up. I tell the woman I already agreed to a refund and she just hangs up without a word.

5 days later I call to see what's up woth the refund and that I want to talk to a manager. I get the runaround and a promos that the manager will call me back within the hour. 8 hours later, no call, no text, no email.

I consider my money now simply lost. AVOID AT ALL COST they will scam you wihout a second thought.

I was super excited to get my custom shirt. There was a new employee who helped me was very helpful. The shirt took about 20 minutes to print.

When I returned there was a heavy set man who I assumed was the manager or the owner. He was so disrespectful. He acted as if he was doing me a favour by being there. He was so bad I considered taking my money elsewhere but I had already paid and knew this guy wasn't the person who was going to help me get a refund. Maybe that was the reason for the attitude? He knew I had already paid so I would just have to take it.
On top of the terrible treatment, the shirt started chipping within a few weeks. So, the service was terrible, the product was over priced and the quality was ultimately lacking. GO ELSEWHERE.

We contacted Next Day T-shirts based on just looking for a local place to order t-shirts for our Childhood Cancer Awareness Month event at McMaster Children's Hospital..It was luck that we called this place first as the experience was better than we could have hoped for!.Barbara was happy to work with us and was caring enough to give me suggestions on how our design could be improved so the t-shirts would look as good as possible (our original design was not very clear)..She was quick to respond to calls and e-mails and was able to make our large order in time for our event..The shirts were organized and boxed at pick-up and she offers payment options online or in-store..The shirts were so fantastic (great quality shirts!) that we ended up needing to order about 15 more and she was able to make them for us very fast..The shirts really "made" our event..They showed a staff that was dedicated to our patients and it made the families so happy..We were able to order t-shirts for all our patients as well and many parents were touched and the kids were THRILLED..I know I could have ordered shirts online, anonymous, from a business far away and had them shipped in but the end result would have been different..Barbara's investment in wanting to ensure our shirts were as nice as possible and dedication to making sure we got them in time made the difference..Those shirts really brought together a team of staff and patients to show that we are strong, united and dedicated to fighting childhood cancer..EVERYONE SMILED THAT DAY..I really credit Barbara's involvement for this..Will definitely ONLY go to her shirts from now on.

TERRIBLE experience! We put in an order on Wednesday for a T-shirt which was planned as a birthday gift for the weekend. I provided an example of what I wanted, paid in full immedy and then made arrangements for pick up. Despite the company being called "Next day t-shirts" the earliest available pick up time was Friday. We agreed to a 1pm pick up and I confirmed twice, explaining that I had a meeting at 2:15 in Burlington. I arrived to pick the shirt up at 1:40 and was told that they were still working on the mock up of the shirt. It hadn't even been started. She gave me a line about only receiving the example a few minutes earlier, perhaps she thought she had spoken to someone else on Wednesday, but as I was the person who placed the order AND sent the example, I knew I had sent it straight away. I also knew that we had firmly agreed upon a pick up time and that she was aware of my meeting. I left to pick up my husband to give them more time to complete the shirt. When we returned 10 minutes later, my husband went in and found that they were not even working on the order. She lied again, saying she had only receive the example image 2 minutes earlier, and then made a fuss about apparently not knowing I had a meeting and it being difficult to print on a dark grey t-shirt, so it wasn't reasonable that I would expect it done two days after the initial order. Long and Short, the shirt looks okay, and they DID give me a refund for the trouble, but honestly, the whole experience was awful and it isn't worth it to me to give them anymore business.

Summary: making mistakes in printing, no product quality control, slow turn around. very reluctant to do proper customer support.
I online-ordered embroidered zip-up hoodies and printed t-shirts with my company logo and year number. The year number got printed with a wrong font for both zip-up hoodies and t-shirts, making them look different from the web preview.
At least, the year number was properly center-aligned, so we accepted them. If we haven't, they would have to re-embroider, which we thought would cause too much trouble for them. So we were simply being nice (which we regret now)
However, the year number on the t-shirts were shifted left so visibly, so we asked for reprint via the company's email customer support channel. The customer rep asked me to drop off the t-shirts to the shop, and then they would reprint them right away. When I pointed it out that it was an online order, thus issuing a return shipping label is the correct process, the rep finally gave me the shipping label. But getting the replacement T-shirts took more than a week. (so right away means more than 1 week?) When I contacted the customer support again while waiting, I was told that the garment had to be ordered, so there is the delay. (so printing shop doesn't have any garment in stock?)Finally we received the replacement T-shirts, But this time, one of them had a sewing issue. When I contacted the customer support about it with pictures(attached below), the rep said now I have to pay for the shipping because it is uncertain if it's the defect from their ship. The reasoning is because I did not contact them promptly after I get their replacement shipment. (Yes, the T-shirts were sitting in the original packaging for 30 days since I received them, and the only thing I checked right after receiving the t-shirts was if the logo and year number is properly printed) I've ordered many T-shirts and hoodies for my company, and this was the only online company that made this many mistakes and had poor quality control and customer support. Maybe Coastal Reign Printing is okay for offline orders, but definitely not ready for online orders. UPDATE: After reading my review, someone in the company contacted me and offered free return shipping as well as partial refund. However, I had to decline. My reasonings were - I tried(and failed) to resolve this issue via their customer support channel already, which made me waste enough time. - if I accept any refund after leaving a bad public review, that would make my review as blackmailing, which is not how I do business.

I had a FANTASTIC experience with Coastal Reign! I worked with them for about 2 months on a tote bag design and there was a lot of back and forth (mostly me being indecisive haha). The entire time they were so patient and accommodating. They made it so easy and a pleasure to work with! 100% would order again from them!
High quality items, our account rep was amazing to work with. Items arrived quickly and were better than expected.

Just received our promotional hats from Coastal Reign.They look amazing and our exactly what we ordered. The staff were easy to deal with and the order was done and delivered with a quick turn around. I will be using them as our exclusive representative for promotional gear going forward.

I've been using Coastal Reign for a few months now and am quite happy with the clothing and print quality. I always try to look for a company with great customer service and communication when printing clothing and Coastal Reign has been great at both. They state clearly the expected pick up time so there are no surprises when an order is ready. Minor thing I've found is that around 1 of 100 shirts may have a bit of ink smudged somewhere from the screenprinting process causing the shirt to be stained a bit. From the large quantities of clothing Coastal Reign prints out you should also expect some lint. Otherwise, very happy so far and will continue using for my business.

Anson was very helpful and responsive.

They have fast and Professional service, great designs and high quality items. Highly recommend.

I ordered 250 pieces of Face Mask/Neck Warmers for the company I work for and Coastal Reign did a fantastic job. The material was really good and stretchable, so it can fit anyone. Product delivery was completed in timely manner even during COVID-19. I would definitely recommend this company!

I first heard about Coastal Reign when I was in high school playing ultimate. Back then it was really cool getting sublimated prints for ultimate jerseys and although I am not sure where my ultimate team ordered their jerseys, I looked into Coastal Reign products when my dance team needed team apparel. The order process was easy and streamlined, and process time was fast. As I moved into university and ordered more apparel for clubs I am involved in, I discovered that Coastal Reign website updates made the entire process extremely user-friendly, as I am able to calculate cost directly on the site without even contacting reps for quotes, and it even lets me design my product as well as customizing. This speeds up the ordering process immensely. Every single order the Coastal Reign artists helped touch up my artwork for free and I can't be thankful enough! Shipping was also free of charge when I ordered over a certain amount (it wasn't too hard to reach that amount). This also solved my problems converting from USD to CAD sometimes for US printing sites. Other local printing companies that I have worked with do not often put taxes, discounts, and shipping costs into consideration when I ask them for a quote, and Coastal Reign definitely delivers on time and their products are always fabulous. My favourite printing company to work with as they have great customer service! Receiving the big turquoise box in the mail always puts a smile on my face.

Editing my review from a 3 star to a 4 star.

Originally had errors with a recent order that were fixed by Coastal Reign, which I very much appreciate! I don't want a negative review to be stuck on their page, as I've had far more positive experiences with the company in regards to large mask orders. My only hope is that quality remains with all aspects of production, communication remains clear with future orders and that they are open to making corrections to any issue with an order promptly.

Thank you so much for the hard work and for providing a service that is highly valued in these times! My own customers have been extremely satisfied with the masks they've received that contain my own designs, and I really hope to continue providing more!

Overall positive experience. I dealt with Nikki, she had a very vibrant personality and provided excellent customer service. The products received met my exact expectations. Will do business with them in the very near future.

I've ordered from Coastal Reign a few times over the last year and their product/embroidery is overall decent. Their receptionist/sales girl is fairly new. She was mostly helpful with me on my orders. There are a couple of things that, to me, lowers the rating. They are:

1) They don't have a designated.parking area, at least at their old location. Not sure with the new one. I had to walk a few blocks to get to their store. Not a huge deal, just thought it would have been slightly more covenient if they had at least a couple spots for their customers. Their storefront is limited and feels a bit under equipped (wanted to touch and feel the materials for design purposes).

2) I was given an invoice/quote that had an item at a certain price and upon calling to confirm an order in the new year, the price had increased astoundingly; close to 50% without any mention on the website or through email. I also wasn't given any, "we'll give it to you at your invoice price" either, and was told that bigger orders (100+ items) would retain the old pricing. My orders are usually 10-20 pieces at a time, not 100+. Before, I would get the reasonable prices on 10+ items - so tha't increased to over 10x as well. That would mean I would have to order over 3 thousand dollars worth of merchandise just to keep the current pricing! Not impressed with this move.

Given the nature of all this, I realize they are a fairly new business. However, it has been frustrating dealing with the lack of clear communication on pricing. Overall, I am generally pleased with their product and embroidery. It's their customer service communication and pricing arrangement is what keeps them at 3 stars. Othewise I would have given them more.

I brought some literal and metaphorical receipts so please look at the photos.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For context on this review we used Coastal Reign for 7 months, spent over $7,500 over 11 separate orders. We switched suppliers a few months ago and tonight my business partner and I sat down and looked at our sunk cost for apparel costs over the last 6 months. We almost quit running the shop after Christmas because it seemed impossible to make money at this. lol turns out it‚Äôs totally possible as long as you don‚Äôt use Costal Reign for your printing?

Like honestly, I want to cry but I want to laugh because I can‚Äôt believe we stayed. They were incredibly rude to us every time we called, misprinted multiple orders and the their turn around time is like a month and a half *unless you pay a rush fee*

If you stay long enough you realize the 10% rush fee is part of the business model. It's dishonest and even when you pay rush they'd just drag out the process, change the expected by date (sometimes by WEEKS) and suggest a 25% rush fee.
We spent almost 1 grand in rush fees and complimentary products for clients who'd waited over a month for back ordered products. It‚Äôs astonishing. I also cannot stress enough how rude they were to us on a regular basis. Some of these friendly reviews seem suspicious, they ask you to scan a qr code and leave a review after every order and the running joke with my team is like "lol they'll regret asking that if we left an honest review after this"

The reason we switched was because they misprinted up an order. 10/25 shirts were off centre by almost 2 inches. We didn't bust out a measuring tape to check before mailing them and then we got dragged online by a customer. When I called to ask for reprints the guy who answered said ‚ÄúI‚Äôm gonna let you in on a little secret, the most successful brands who users do their own quality control‚Äù like bruh, what?

HOW MANY UNSUCCESSFUL BRANDS DO YOU WORK WITH MY DUDE??

If you think you‚Äôre getting a good price call a few other shops because you‚Äôre really not. One of our first orders we spent almost $17 per piece for a one colour print on an ACT everyday cotton t-shirt because they bake the set up fee into the order. Here's the other thing you realize if you shop around, that's not normal. With Coastal Reign the price never *really* lowers. We're paying almost half the price now and the quality is better, turnaround time is 2 weeks and the people who work there are not mean.

I feel like I need to talk to my therapist about why I hate myself enough to have tolerated their behaviour.

Everything arrived in perfect form. Exact quantities in all the different sizes, designs were sharp and the artists adjustments were much needed and perfectly executed. Thank you Coastal Reign, you knocked it out of the park.
